atk-s0510a:1105_1: gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā, puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā, ñātipalibodhaṃ, mittāmaccapalibodhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1105_2: sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā
atk-s0510a:1105_3: nikkhamma anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā ekova carati viharati iriyati
atk-s0510a:1105_4: vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti evaṃ so paccekasambuddho pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko.
atk-s0510a:1106_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho adutiyaṭṭhena eko? So evaṃ pabbajito samāno eko araññavanapatthāni
atk-s0510a:1106_1: pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni
atk-s0510a:1106_2: paṭisallānasāruppāni. So eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0510a:1106_3: eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, eko paṭikkamati, eko raho nisīdati, eko caṅkamati, eko
atk-s0510a:1106_4: carati viharati iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti evaṃ so adutiyaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0510a:1107_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko? So eko adutiyo appamatto ātāpī
atk-s0510a:1107_1: pahitatto viharanto mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto māraṃ sasenakaṃ namuciṃ kaṇhaṃ pamattabandhuṃ
atk-s0510a:1107_2: vidhametvā ca taṇhājāliniṃ visaritaṃ visattikaṃ pajahi vinodesi byantiṃ akāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.
atk-s0510a:1112: Evaṃ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0510a:1113_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekantavītarāgoti eko? Rāgassa pahīnattā ekantavītarāgoti
atk-s0510a:1113_1: eko, dosassa pahīnattā ekantavītadosoti eko, mohassa pahīnattā ekantavītamohoti eko,
atk-s0510a:1113_2: kilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantanikkilesoti eko, evaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekantavītarāgoti eko.
atk-s0510a:1114_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko? Ekāyanamaggo vuccati cattāro
atk-s0510a:1114_1: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
atk-s0510a:1116: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
atk-s0510a:1118_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko? Bodhi
atk-s0510a:1118_1: vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ. Paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
atk-s0510a:1118_2: vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi. So paccekasambuddho tena paccekabodhiñāṇena “sabbe
atk-s0510a:1118_3: saṅkhārā aniccā”ti bujjhi, “sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti bujjhi, “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
atk-s0510a:1118_7: upādāna”nti bujjhi, “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti bujjhi, “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti bujjhi,
atk-s0510a:1118_10: bujjhi. “Idaṃ dukkha”nti bujjhi, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti bujjhi, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti
atk-s0510a:1118_12: āsavasamudayo”ti bujjhi…pe… “paṭipadā”ti bujjhi, “ime dhammā abhiññeyyā”ti bujjhi,
atk-s0510a:1118_13: “ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti bujjhi, “ime dhammā sacchikātabbā”ti bujjhi, “ime dhammā
atk-s0510a:1118_14: bhāvetabbā”ti bujjhi. Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca
atk-s0510a:1118_15: ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca bujjhi, pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca…pe… nissaraṇañca
atk-s0510a:1118_16: bujjhi, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca
atk-s0510a:1118_17: bujjhi, “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti bujjhi.
atk-s0510a:1119_0: Atha vā yaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ anubujjhitabbaṃ paṭibujjhitabbaṃ sambujjhitabbaṃ adhigantabbaṃ
atk-s0510a:1119_1: phassitabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ tena paccekabodhiñāṇena bujjhi anubujjhi
atk-s0510a:1119_2: paṭibujjhi sambujjhi adhigañchi phassesi sacchākāsīti, evaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko
atk-s0510a:1120_0: Careti aṭṭha cariyāyo – iriyāpathacariyā, āyatanacariyā, saticariyā, samādhicariyā,
atk-s0510a:1120_1: ñāṇacariyā, maggacariyā, patticariyā, lokatthacariyā. Iriyāpathacariyāti catūsu iriyāpathesu,
atk-s0510a:1120_2: āyatanacariyāti chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu, saticariyāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu,
atk-s0510a:1120_3: samādhicariyāti catūsu jhānesu, ñāṇacariyāti catūsu ariyasaccesu, maggacariyāti catūsu
atk-s0510a:1120_4: ariyamaggesu, patticariyāti catūsu sāmaññaphalesu, lokatthacariyāti tathāgatesu arahantesu
atk-s0510a:1121_0: Iriyāpathacariyā ca paṇidhisampannānaṃ, āyatanacariyā ca indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1121_1: saticariyā ca appamādavihārīnaṃ, samādhicariyā ca adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ, ñāṇacariyā
atk-s0510a:1121_2: ca buddhisampannānaṃ, maggacariyā ca sammāpaṭipannānaṃ, patticariyā ca adhigataphalānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1121_3: lokatthacariyā ca tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ, padesato paccekasambuddhānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1122_0: Aparāpi aṭṭha cariyāyo – adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena carati,
atk-s0510a:1122_1: upaṭṭhapento satiyā carati, avikkhepaṃ karonto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya
atk-s0510a:1122_2: carati, vijānanto viññāṇacariyāya carati, evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyatananti
atk-s0510a:1122_3: āyatanacariyāya carati. Evaṃ paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti visesacariyāya carati. Imā aṭṭha cariyāyo.
atk-s0510a:1123_0: Aparāpi aṭṭha cariyāyo – dassanacariyā ca sammādiṭṭhiyā, abhiniropanacariyā ca sammāsaṅkappassa,
atk-s0510a:1123_1: pariggahacariyā ca sammāvācāya, samuṭṭhānacariyā ca sammākammantassa, vodānacariyā
atk-s0510a:1123_2: ca sammāājīvassa, paggahacariyā ca sammāvāyāmassa, upaṭṭhānacariyā ca sammāsatiyā,
atk-s0510a:1123_3: avikkhepacariyā ca sammāsamādhissa. Imā aṭṭha cariyāyo.
atk-s0510a:1124_0: Khaggavisāṇakappoti yathā khaggassa nāma visāṇaṃ ekameva hoti, adutiyaṃ, evameva
atk-s0510a:1124_1: so paccekasambuddho takkappo tassadiso tappaṭibhāgo. Yathā atiloṇaṃ vuccati loṇakappo,
atk-s0510a:1124_2: atitittakaṃ vuccati tittakappo, atimadhuraṃ vuccati madhurakappo, atiuṇhaṃ vuccati
atk-s0510a:1124_3: aggikappo, atisītaṃ vuccati himakappo, mahāudakakkhandho vuccati samuddakappo, mahābhiññābalappatto
atk-s0510a:1124_4: sāvako vuccati satthukappoti. Evameva so paccekasambuddho khaggavisāṇakappo, khaggavisāṇasadiso
atk-s0510a:1124_5: khaggavisāṇapaṭibhāgo eko adutiyo muttabandhano sammā loke carati viharati iriyati
atk-s0510a:1124_6: vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. Tenāhu paccekasambuddhā –
atk-s0510a:1125: “Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1126: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1128: Ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno; Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1130: Etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1131: “Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
atk-s0510a:1132: Vaṃse kaḷīrova asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1133: “Migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya;
atk-s0510a:1134: Viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1135: “Āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ca ṭhāne gamane cārikāya;
atk-s0510a:1136: Anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1137: “Khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu pemaṃ vipulañca hoti;
atk-s0510a:1140: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1142: Appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1144: Chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1145: “Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
atk-s0510a:1146: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
atk-s0510a:1147: “No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
atk-s0510a:1148: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
atk-s0510a:1149: “Addhā pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā;
atk-s0510a:1150: Ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1152: Saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1153: “Evaṃ dutīyena sahā mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā vā;
atk-s0510a:1154: Etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1155: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1156: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1157: “Ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1158: Etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1159: “Sītañca uṇhañca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vātātape ḍaṃsasarīsape ca;
atk-s0510a:1162: Yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1164: Ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1168: Nirāsayo sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1170: Sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1172: Aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1174: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1175: “Puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni;
atk-s0510a:1176: Hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1177: “Saṅgo eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamevettha bhiyyo;
atk-s0510a:1178: Gaḷo eso iti ñatvā matimā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1180: Aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1186: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1188: Anissito chejja sinehadosaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1190: Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1194: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1196: Saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1198: Padumaṃva toyena alimpamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1199: “Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī;
atk-s0510a:1200: Sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1201: “Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle;
atk-s0510a:1202: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1205: “Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā;
atk-s0510a:1207_0: Tattha sabbesu bhūtesūti khaggavisāṇapaccekabuddhāpadānasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Sabbasuttānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1207_1: catubbidhā uppatti – attajjhāsayato, parajjhāsayato, aṭṭhuppattito, pucchāvasitoti.
atk-s0510a:1207_2: Tattha khaggavisāṇasuttassa avisesena pucchāvasito uppatti. Visesena pana yasmā ettha
atk-s0510a:1207_3: kāci gāthā tena tena paccekabuddhena puṭṭhena vuttā, kāci apuṭṭhena attanā adhigatamagganayānurūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:1207_4: udānaṃyeva udānentena, tasmā kāyaci gāthāya pucchāvasito, kāyaci attajjhāsayato uppatti.
atk-s0510a:1207_5: Tattha yā ayaṃ avisesena pucchāvasito uppatti, sā ādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā –
atk-s0510a:1208_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa rahogatassa
atk-s0510a:1208_1: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi – “buddhānaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro
atk-s0510a:1208_2: ca dissati, tathā sāvakānaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ na dissati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1208_3: upasaṅkamitvā puccheyya”nti? So paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yathākkamena
atk-s0510a:1208_4: etamatthaṃ pucchi. Athassa bhagavā pubbayogāvacarasuttaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1209_0: “Pañcime, ānanda, ānisaṃsā pubbayogāvacare diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0510a:1209_1: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti, atha maraṇakāle aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0510a:1209_2: Atha devaputto samāno aññaṃ ārādheti. Atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño hoti.
atk-s0510a:1211: “Paccekasambuddhā nāma, ānanda, abhinīhārasampannā pubbayogāvacarā honti, tasmā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ sabbesaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro ca icchitabbo”ti.
atk-s0510a:1212_0: So āha – “buddhānaṃ, bhante, patthanā kīva ciraṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Buddhānaṃ, ānanda, heṭṭhimaparicchedena
atk-s0510a:1212_1: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0510a:1212_3: Ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikānaṃ vasena ñātabbā. Paññādhikānañhi
atk-s0510a:1212_4: saddhā mandā hoti, paññā tikkhā. Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hoti, saddhā tikkhā.
atk-s0510a:1212_5: Vīriyādhikānaṃ saddhā paññā mandā hoti, vīriyaṃ tikkhanti. Appatvā pana cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0510a:1212_6: kappasatasahassañca divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ dānaṃ dentopi tadanurūpe
atk-s0510a:1212_7: sīlādipāramidhamme ācinantopi antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0510a:1212_8: Ñāṇaṃ gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti, vepullaṃ nāpajjati, paripākaṃ na gacchatīti. Yathā nāma
atk-s0510a:1212_9: timāsacatumāsapañcamāsaccayena nipphajjanakaṃ sassaṃ taṃ taṃ kālaṃ appatvā divase
atk-s0510a:1212_10: divase satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattuṃ keḷāyantopi udakena siñcantopi antarā pakkhena
atk-s0510a:1212_11: vā māsena vā nipphādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā? Sassaṃ gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0510a:1212_12: vepullaṃ nāpajjati, paripākaṃ na gacchatīti. Evamevaṃ appatvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0510a:1212_13: kappasatasahassañca antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Tasmā yathāvuttameva
atk-s0510a:1212_14: kālaṃ pāramipūraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ ñāṇaparipākatthāya. Ettakenāpi ca kālena buddhattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1212_15: patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe aṭṭha sampattiyo icchitabbā. Ayañhi –
atk-s0510a:1216_0: Abhinīhāroti mūlapaṇidhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha manussattanti manussajāti. Aññatra
atk-s0510a:1216_1: hi manussajātiyā avasesajātīsu devajātiyampi ṭhitassa paṇidhi na ijjhati, tattha
atk-s0510a:1216_2: ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthayantena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā manussattaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1216_3: patthetabbaṃ, tattha ṭhatvā paṇidhi kātabbo. Evañhi samijjhati. Liṅgasampattīti purisabhāvo.
atk-s0510a:1216_4: Mātugāmanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānañhi manussajātiyaṃ ṭhitānampi paṇidhi na ijjhati.
atk-s0510a:1216_5: Tattha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā purisabhāvoyeva
atk-s0510a:1216_6: patthetabbo, tattha ṭhatvā paṇidhi kātabbo. Evañhi samijjhati. Hetūti arahattassa
atk-s0510a:1216_7: upanissayasampatti. Yo hi tasmiṃ attabhāve vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho,
atk-s0510a:1216_8: tassa paṇidhi samijjhati, no itarassa yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle
atk-s0510a:1216_9: pabbajitvā tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho ahosi. Satthāradassananti
atk-s0510a:1216_10: buddhānaṃ sammukhādassanaṃ. Evañhi ijjhati, no aññathā yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So
atk-s0510a:1216_11: hi dīpaṅkaraṃ sammukhā disvā paṇidhiṃ akāsi. Pabbajjāti anagāriyabhāvo. So ca kho
atk-s0510a:1216_12: sāsane vā kammavādikiriyavāditāpasaparibbājakanikāye vā vaṭṭati yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa.
atk-s0510a:1216_13: So hi sumedho nāma tāpaso hutvā paṇidhiṃ akāsi. Guṇasampattīti jhānādiguṇapaṭilābho.
atk-s0510a:1216_14: Pabbajitassapi hi guṇasampannasseva ijjhati, no itarassa yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa.
atk-s0510a:1216_15: So hi pañcābhiñño ca aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ca hutvā paṇidhesi. Adhikāroti adhikakāro,
atk-s0510a:1216_16: pariccāgoti attho. Jīvitādipariccāgañhi katvā paṇidahatoyeva ijjhati, no itarassa
atk-s0510a:1218: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0510a:1219_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ katvā paṇidhesi. Chandatāti kattukamyatā. Sā yassa balavatī hoti,
atk-s0510a:1219_1: tassa ijjhati paṇidhi. Sā ca sace koci vadeyya “ko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0510a:1219_2: niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā yo “aha”nti vattuṃ ussahati, tassa
atk-s0510a:1219_3: balavatīti veditabbā. Tathā yadi koci vadeyya “ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1219_4: pūraṃ akkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi ākiṇṇaṃ akkamanto
atk-s0510a:1219_5: atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ samatittikaṃ udakapuṇṇaṃ uttaritvā
atk-s0510a:1219_6: buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ nirantaraṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ maddanto atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1219_7: buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti, taṃ sutvā yo “aha”nti vattuṃ ussahati, tassa balavatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0510a:1219_8: Evarūpena ca kattukamyatāchandena samannāgato sumedhapaṇḍito paṇidhesīti.
atk-s0510a:1220_0: Evaṃ samiddhābhinīhāro ca bodhisatto imāni aṭṭhārasa abhabbaṭṭhānāni na upeti. So
atk-s0510a:1220_1: hi tato pabhuti na jaccandho hoti na jaccapadhiro, na ummattako, na eḷamugo, na pīṭhasappi,
atk-s0510a:1220_2: na milakkhesu uppajjati, na dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattati, na niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko
atk-s0510a:1220_3: hoti, nāssa liṅgaṃ parivattati, na pañcānantariyakammāni karoti, na kuṭṭhī hoti,
atk-s0510a:1220_4: na tiracchānayoniyaṃ vaṭṭakato pacchimattabhāvo hatthito adhikattabhāvo hoti, na
atk-s0510a:1220_5: khuppipāsikanijjhāmataṇhikapetesu uppajjati, na kālakañcikāsuresu, na avīciniraye,
atk-s0510a:1220_6: na lokantarikesu uppajjati. Kāmāvacaresu pana na māro hoti, rūpāvacaresu na asaññībhave,
atk-s0510a:1220_7: na suddhāvāsesu uppajjati, na arūpabhavesu, na aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ saṅkamati.
atk-s0510a:1221: Yā cimā ussāho ca ummaṅgo ca avatthānañca hitacariyā cāti catasso buddhabhūmiyo, tāhi samannāgato hoti. Tattha –
atk-s0510a:1224_0: Veditabbā. Ye ca ime nekkhammajjhāsayo, pavivekajjhāsayo, alobhajjhāsayo, adosajjhāsayo,
atk-s0510a:1224_1: amohajjhāsayo, nissaraṇajjhāsayoti cha ajjhāsayā bodhiparipākāya saṃvattanti, yehi
atk-s0510a:1224_2: samannāgatattā nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāmesu dosadassāvino, pavivekajjhāsayā
atk-s0510a:1224_3: ca bodhisattā saṅgaṇikāya dosadassāvino, alobhajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā lobhe dosadassāvino,
atk-s0510a:1224_4: adosajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā dose dosadassāvino, amohajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā mohe
atk-s0510a:1224_5: dosadassāvino, nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvinoti vuccanti,
atk-s0510a:1225_0: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana kīva ciraṃ patthanā vaṭṭatīti? Paccekabuddhānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0510a:1225_1: kappasatasahassañca, tato oraṃ na sakkā, pubbe vuttanayenevettha kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1225_2: Ettakenāpi ca kālena paccekabuddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe pañca sampattiyo
atk-s0510a:1228: Tattha vigatāsavadassananti buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ yassa kassaci dassananti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0510a:1229_0: Atha “sāvakānaṃ patthanā kittakaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? Dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1229_1: kappasatasahassañca, asītimahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassameva. Tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1229_2: upaṭṭhākassa puttassa cāti, tato oraṃ na sakkā, tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. Imesaṃ
atk-s0510a:1229_3: pana sabbesampi adhikāro ca chandatāti dvaṅgasamannāgatoyeva abhinīhāro hoti.
atk-s0510a:1230_0: Evaṃ imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena yathāvuttappabhedaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0510a:1230_1: buddhā loke uppajjantā khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā uppajjanti, paccekabuddhā
atk-s0510a:1230_2: khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatikulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ, aggasāvakā pana buddhā viya khattiyabrāhmaṇakulesveva.
atk-s0510a:1230_3: Sabbabuddhā saṃvaṭṭamāne kappe na uppajjanti, vivaṭṭamāne kappe uppajjanti, tathā
atk-s0510a:1230_4: paccekabuddhā. Te pana buddhānaṃ uppajjanakāle na uppajjanti. Buddhā sayañca bujjhanti,
atk-s0510a:1230_5: pare ca bodhenti. Paccekabuddhā sayameva bujjhanti, na pare bodhenti. Attharasameva
atk-s0510a:1230_6: paṭivijjhanti, na dhammarasaṃ. Na hi te lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ āropetvā desetuṃ
atk-s0510a:1230_7: sakkonti, mūgena diṭṭhasupino viya vanacarakena nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso viya ca
atk-s0510a:1230_8: nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti. Sabbaṃ iddhisamāpattipaṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0510a:1230_9: Guṇavisiṭṭhatāya buddhānaṃ heṭṭhā sāvakānaṃ upari honti, na aññe pabbājetvā ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1230_10: sikkhāpenti, “cittasallekho kātabbo, vosānaṃ nāpajjitabba”nti iminā uddesena uposathaṃ
atk-s0510a:1230_11: karonti, ajja uposathoti vacanamattena vā, uposathaṃ karontā ca gandhamādane mañjūsakarukkhamūle
atk-s0510a:1230_12: ratanamāḷe sannipatitvā karontīti. Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1230_13: sabbākāraparipūraṃ patthanañca abhinīhārañca kathetvā idāni imāya patthanāya iminā
atk-s0510a:1230_14: ca abhinīhārena samudāgate te te paccekabuddhe kathetuṃ “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya
atk-s0510a:1230_15: daṇḍa”ntiādinā nayena imaṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ abhāsi. Ayaṃ tāva avisesena pucchāvasito
atk-s0510a:1231_0: Idāni visesena vattabbā. Tattha imissā tāva gāthāya evaṃ uppatti veditabbā – ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1231_1: kira paccekabuddho paccekabodhisattabhūmiṃ ogāhanto dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0510a:1231_2: pāramiyo pūretvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1231_3: pūrento samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇanto
atk-s0510a:1231_4: nāma natthi. Kiṃ panetaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ nāma? Haraṇapaccāharaṇanti. Taṃ yathā
atk-s0510a:1232_0: Idha ekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati, ekacco paccāharati na harati, ekacco neva
atk-s0510a:1232_1: harati na paccāharati, ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca. Tattha yo bhikkhu pageva
atk-s0510a:1232_2: vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_3: pūretvā pānīyamāḷe ṭhapetvā ācariyavattaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ katvā dveasīti khandhakavattāni
atk-s0510a:1232_4: ca cuddasa mahāvattāni samādāya vattati. So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:1232_5: yāva bhikkhācāravelā, tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā velaṃ ñatvā nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_6: bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiṃ khandhe karitvā pattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_7: manasi karonto cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā gāmasamīpe cīvaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_8: pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati. Evaṃ paviṭṭho ca lābhī bhikkhu puññavā
atk-s0510a:1232_9: upāsakehi sakkato garukato upaṭṭhākakule vā paṭikkamanasālāyaṃ vā paṭikkamitvā upāsakehi
atk-s0510a:1232_10: taṃ taṃ pañhaṃ pucchiyamāno tesaṃ pañhavissajjanena dhammadesanāvikkhepena ca taṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_11: manasikāraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamati. Vihāraṃ āgatopi bhikkhūhi pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti,
atk-s0510a:1232_12: dhammaṃ bhaṇati, taṃ taṃ byāpārañca āpajjati. Pacchābhattampi purimayāmampi majjhimayāmampi
atk-s0510a:1232_13: evaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ papañcetvā kāyaduṭṭhullābhibhūto pacchimayāmepi sayati, neva
atk-s0510a:1232_14: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati “harati na paccāharatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1233_0: Yo pana byādhibahulo hoti, bhuttāhāro paccūsasamaye na sammā pariṇamati. Pageva vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:1233_1: yathāvuttaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi kātuṃ, aññadatthu yāguṃ
atk-s0510a:1233_2: vā khajjakaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā patthayamāno kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0510a:1233_3: gāmaṃ pavisati. Tattha yāguṃ vā khajjakaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā laddhā pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1233_4: nīharitvā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā paññattāsane nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā
atk-s0510a:1233_5: visesaṃ patvā vā apatvā vā vihāraṃ āgantvā teneva manasikārena viharati. Ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0510a:1233_6: “paccāharati na haratī”ti. Edisā hi bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā buddhasāsane
atk-s0510a:1233_7: arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā, sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1233_8: taṃ āsanaṃ natthi, yattha bhikkhū nisinnā yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ appattā.
atk-s0510a:1234_0: Yo pana pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro, sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhanabaddhacitto
atk-s0510a:1234_1: viharanto kammaṭṭhānamanasikāramananuyutto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā gihīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1234_2: kathāpapañcena papañcito tucchakova nikkhamati. Ayaṃ vuccati “neva harati na paccāharatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1235_0: Yo pana pageva vuṭṭhāya purimanayeneva sabbavattāni paripūretvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0510a:1235_1: tāva pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1235_2: sabbatthakañca pārihāriyañca. Tattha sabbatthakaṃ nāma mettā ca maraṇānussati ca.
atk-s0510a:1235_3: Tañhi sabbattha atthayitabbaṃ icchitabbanti “sabbatthaka”nti vuccati. Mettā nāma
atk-s0510a:1235_4: āvāsādīsu sabbattha icchitabbā. Āvāsesu hi mettāvihārī bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo
atk-s0510a:1235_5: hoti manāpo, tena phāsu asaṅghaṭṭho viharati. Devatāsu mettāvihārī devatāhi rakkhitagopito
atk-s0510a:1235_6: sukhaṃ viharati. Rājarājamahāmattādīsu mettāvihārī tehi mamāyito sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0510a:1235_7: Gāmanigamādīsu mettāvihārī sabbattha bhikkhācariyādīsu manussehi sakkato garukato
atk-s0510a:1235_8: sukhaṃ viharati. Maraṇānussatibhāvanāya jīvitanikantiṃ pahāya appamatto viharati.
atk-s0510a:1236_0: Yaṃ pana sadā pariharitabbaṃ cariyānukūlena gahitaṃ. Taṃ dasāsubhakasiṇānussatīsu
atk-s0510a:1236_1: aññataraṃ, catudhātuvavatthānameva vā, taṃ sadā pariharitabbato rakkhitabbato bhāvetabbato
atk-s0510a:1236_2: ca “pārihāriya”nti vuccati, mūlakammaṭṭhānantipi tadeva. Atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane
atk-s0510a:1236_3: pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā
atk-s0510a:1236_4: katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti – “āvuso, tumhe na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvikāpakatā
atk-s0510a:1236_5: pabbajitā, dukkhā muccitukāmā panettha pabbajitā. Tasmā gamane uppannakilese gamaneyeva
atk-s0510a:1236_6: niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne, nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilese sayaneyeva niggaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1237_0: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-s0510a:1237_1: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-s0510a:1237_2: kileso uppajjati, so tattheva naṃ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati, athassa pacchato
atk-s0510a:1237_3: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati. So “ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti, ananucchavikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1237_4: te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0510a:1237_5: Tathā asakkonto nisīdati. Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti. Soyeva nayo ariyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1237_6: okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1237_7: na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena cittena pādaṃ uddharati. Uddharati ce, paṭinivattitvā
atk-s0510a:1238_0: So kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento evaṃ vihāsi. Manussāpi sudaṃ
atk-s0510a:1238_1: antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni karontā ca theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1238_2: disvā “ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho, udāhu kiñci
atk-s0510a:1238_3: pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti. So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttena citteneva samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1238_4: karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattapattadivaseyevassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1238_5: adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi, cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca
atk-s0510a:1238_6: devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu. Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsī
atk-s0510a:1238_7: mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi – “rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1238_8: kiṃ so”ti? Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti maṇiobhāsopī”ti
atk-s0510a:1238_9: evamādimāha. So “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho “āmā”ti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:1239_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento
atk-s0510a:1239_1: “paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-s0510a:1239_2: adhiṭṭhāsi, puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Evaṃ
atk-s0510a:1239_3: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttacitteneva pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto
atk-s0510a:1239_4: gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā “gāvī nu kho pabbajito nu kho”ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā saṅghāṭiṃ
atk-s0510a:1239_5: pārupitvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāmadvāraṃ patvā kacchakantarato udakaṃ gahetvā gaṇḍūsaṃ
atk-s0510a:1239_6: katvā gāmaṃ pavisati “bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ vandituṃ vā upagate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti
atk-s0510a:1239_7: vacanamattenāpi mā me kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti. Sace pana naṃ “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1239_8: kiṃ sattamī, udāhu aṭṭhamī”ti divasaṃ pucchanti, udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti. Sace divasapucchakā
atk-s0510a:1239_9: na honti, nikkhamanavelāyaṃ gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvāva yāti.
atk-s0510a:1240_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca. Te kira vassūpanāyikauposathadivase
atk-s0510a:1240_1: katikavattaṃ akaṃsu – “arahattaṃ appatvā na aññamaññaṃ ālapissāmā”ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-s0510a:1240_2: pavisantā gāmadvāre udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu, divase pucchite udakaṃ gilitvā
atk-s0510a:1240_3: ārocesuṃ, apucchite gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvā vihāraṃ āgamaṃsu. Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1240_4: disvā jāniṃsu – “ajja eko āgato, ajja dve”ti. Evañca cintesuṃ – “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva
atk-s0510a:1240_5: saddhiṃ na sallapanti, udāhu aññamaññampi, yadi aññamaññampi na sallapanti, addhā
atk-s0510a:1240_6: vivādajātā bhavissanti, handa nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti. Sabbe vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1240_7: Tattha paññāsāya bhikkhūsu vassaṃ upagatesu dve bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu. Tato
atk-s0510a:1240_8: tesu yo cakkhumā puriso, so evamāha – “na, bho, kalahakārakānaṃ vasanokāso īdiso
atk-s0510a:1240_9: hoti, susammaṭṭhaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ, sunikkhittā sammajjaniyo, sūpaṭṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1240_10: pānīyaparibhojanīya”nti, te tato nivattā. Tepi bhikkhū antovasseyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:1241_0: Evaṃ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū
atk-s0510a:1241_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ
atk-s0510a:1241_2: katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0510a:1241_3: vā natthi, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Tattha ca piṇḍāya caranto na turitaturito javena
atk-s0510a:1241_4: gacchati, javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma natthi, visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakabharitasakaṭamiva
atk-s0510a:1241_5: niccalo hutvā gacchati. Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ
atk-s0510a:1241_6: tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1241_8: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya na madāya…pe… bhuttāvī
atk-s0510a:1241_9: ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ vinodetvā yathā purebhattaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0510a:1241_10: pacchābhattaṃ, purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0510a:1241_11: “harati ca paccāharati cā”ti. Evametaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇaṃ gatapaccāgatavattanti vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1242_0: Etaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. No
atk-s0510a:1242_1: ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti, atha majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti. No ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0510a:1242_2: atha maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti. No ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti, atha devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0510a:1242_3: No ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti, atha paccekasambuddho hutvā parinibbāti. No ce paccekasambuddho
atk-s0510a:1242_4: hutvā parinibbāti, atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño hoti seyyathāpi thero
atk-s0510a:1242_5: bāhiyo, mahāpañño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero sāriputtoti.
atk-s0510a:1243_0: Ayaṃ pana paccekabodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā
atk-s0510a:1243_1: vīsati vassasahassāni etaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0510a:1243_2: uppajji. Tato cavitvā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0510a:1243_3: Kusalā itthiyo tadaheva gabbhasaṇṭhānaṃ jānanti. Sā ca tāsaṃ aññatarā, tasmā esāpi
atk-s0510a:1243_4: taṃ gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṃ rañño nivedesi. Dhammatā esā, yaṃ puññavante satte gabbhe uppanne
atk-s0510a:1243_5: mātugāmo gabbhaparihāraṃ labhati. Tasmā rājā tassā gabbhaparihāraṃ adāsi. Sā tato
atk-s0510a:1243_6: pabhuti nāccuṇhaṃ kiñci ajjhoharituṃ labhati, nātisītaṃ nāccambilaṃ nātiloṇaṃ nātikaṭukaṃ
atk-s0510a:1243_7: nātitittakaṃ. Accuṇhe hi mātarā ajjhohaṭe gabbhassa lohakumbhivāso viya hoti, atisīte
atk-s0510a:1243_8: lokantarikavāso viya, accambilaloṇakaṭukatittakesu bhuttesu satthena phāletvā ambilādīhi
atk-s0510a:1243_9: sittāni viya dārakassa aṅgāni tibbavedanāni honti. Aticaṅkamanaṭṭhānanisajjasayanatopi
atk-s0510a:1243_10: naṃ nivārenti “kucchigatassa sañcalanadukkhaṃ mā ahosī”ti. Mudukattharaṇatthatāya
atk-s0510a:1243_11: bhūmiyā caṅkamanādīni mattāya kātuṃ labhati, vaṇṇagandhādisampannaṃ sāduṃ sappāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1243_12: annapānaṃ bhuñjituṃ labhati. Pariggahetvāva naṃ caṅkamāpenti nisīdāpenti vuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-s0510a:1244_0: Sā evaṃ parihariyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle sūtigharaṃ pavisitvā paccūsasamaye puttaṃ
atk-s0510a:1244_1: vijāyi pakkatelamadditamanosilāpiṇḍisadisaṃ dhaññapuññalakkhaṇūpetaṃ. Tato naṃ pañcamadivase
atk-s0510a:1244_2: alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ rañño dassesuṃ, rājā tuṭṭho chasaṭṭhiyā dhātīhi upaṭṭhāpesi. So
atk-s0510a:1244_3: sabbasampattīhi vaḍḍhamāno nacirasseva viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Soḷasavassuddesikaṃ naṃ rājā
atk-s0510a:1244_4: rajjena abhisiñci, vividhanāṭakāhi ca upaṭṭhāpesi. Abhisitto rājaputto rajjaṃ kāresi
atk-s0510a:1244_5: nāmena brahmadatto, sakalajambudīpe vīsatiyā nagarasahassesu. Jambudīpe kira pubbe
atk-s0510a:1244_6: caturāsīti nagarasatasahassāni ahesuṃ, tāni parihāyantāni saṭṭhi ahesuṃ, tato parihāyantāni
atk-s0510a:1244_7: cattālīsaṃ, sabbaparihāyanakāle pana vīsatisahassāni honti. Ayañca brahmadatto sabbaparihāyanakāle
atk-s0510a:1244_8: uppajji, tenassa vīsati nagarasahassāni ahesuṃ vīsati pāsādasahassāni, vīsati hatthisahassāni,
atk-s0510a:1244_9: vīsati assasahassāni, vīsati rathasahassāni, vīsati pattisahassāni, vīsati itthisahassāni
atk-s0510a:1244_10: orodhā ca nāṭakitthiyo ca, vīsati amaccasahassāni.
atk-s0510a:1245_0: So mahārajjaṃ kārayamānoyeva kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññāyo, aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0510a:1245_1: ca nibbattesi. Yasmā pana abhisittaraññā nāma avassaṃ aṭṭakaraṇe nisīditabbaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0510a:1245_2: ekadivasaṃ pageva pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīdi. Tattha uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ
atk-s0510a:1245_3: akaṃsu, so “ayaṃ saddo samāpattiyā upakkileso”ti pāsādatalaṃ abhiruhitvā “samāpattiṃ
atk-s0510a:1245_4: appemī”ti nisinno nāsakkhi appetuṃ rajjavikkhepena samāpatti parihīnā. Tato cintesi
atk-s0510a:1245_5: – “kiṃ rajjaṃ varaṃ, udāhu samaṇadhammo”ti? Tato “rajjasukhaṃ parittaṃ anekādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1245_6: samaṇadhammasukhaṃ pana vipulaṃ anekānisaṃsaṃ uttamapurisehi sevitañcā”ti ñatvā aññataraṃ
atk-s0510a:1245_7: amaccaṃ āṇāpesi “imaṃ rajjaṃ dhammena samena anusāsa, mā kho adhammakāraṃ kāresī”ti
atk-s0510a:1245_8: sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā samāpattisukhena vītināmesi, na koci
atk-s0510a:1246_0: Tato addhamāsamatte vītikkante mahesī pucchi – “rājā uyyānagamanabaladassananāṭakādīsu
atk-s0510a:1246_1: katthaci na dissati, kuhiṃ gato”ti? Tassā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Sā amaccassa pāhesi
atk-s0510a:1246_2: – “rajje paṭicchite ahampi paṭicchitā homi, etu mayā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetū”ti.
atk-s0510a:1246_3: So ubho kaṇṇe thaketvā “asavanīyameta”nti paṭikkhipi. Sā punapi dvattikkhattuṃ pesetvā
atk-s0510a:1246_4: anicchamānaṃ santajjāpesi “yadi na karosi, ṭhānāpi taṃ cāvemi. Jīvitāpi taṃ voropemī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1246_5: So bhīto “mātugāmo nāma daḷhanicchayo, kadāci evampi kārāpeyyā”ti. Ekadivasaṃ raho
atk-s0510a:1246_6: gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sirisayane saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. Sā puññavatī sukhasamphassā, so
atk-s0510a:1246_7: tassā samphassarāgena ratto tattha abhikkhaṇaṃ saṅkitasaṅkitova agamāsi. Anukkamena
atk-s0510a:1247_0: Tato rājamanussā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā na saddahati. Dutiyampi tatiyampi
atk-s0510a:1247_1: ārocesuṃ, tato rājā nilīno sayameva disvā sabbe amacce sannipātāpetvā ārocesi. Te
atk-s0510a:1247_2: “ayaṃ rājāparādhiko hatthacchedaṃ arahati, pādacchedaṃ arahatī”ti yāva sūle uttāsanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1247_3: tāva sabbakammakāraṇāni niddisiṃsu. Rājā “etassa vadhabandhanatāḷane mayhaṃ vihiṃsā
atk-s0510a:1247_4: uppajjeyya, jīvitā voropane pāṇātipāto bhaveyya, dhanaharaṇe adinnādānaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:1247_5: alaṃ evarūpehi katehi, imaṃ mama rajjā nikkaḍḍhathā”ti āha. Amaccā taṃ nibbisayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1247_6: akaṃsu. So attano dhanasārañca puttadārañca gahetvā paravisayaṃ agamāsi. Tattha rājā
atk-s0510a:1247_7: sutvā “kiṃ āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Deva, icchāmi taṃ upaṭṭhātu”nti. So taṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0510a:1247_8: Amacco katipāhaccayena laddhavissāso taṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca – “mahārāja, amakkhikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1247_9: madhuṃ passāmi, taṃ khādanto natthī”ti. Rājā “kiṃ etaṃ uppaṇḍetukāmo bhaṇatī”ti na
atk-s0510a:1247_10: suṇāti. So antaraṃ labhitvā punapi suṭṭhutaraṃ vaṇṇetvā avoca. Rājā “kiṃ eta”nti
atk-s0510a:1247_11: pucchi. “Bārāṇasirajjaṃ, devā”ti. Rājā “kiṃ maṃ netvā māretukāmosī”ti āha. So “mā,
atk-s0510a:1247_12: deva, evaṃ avaca, yadi na saddahasi, manusse pesehī”ti. So manusse pesesi. Te gantvā
atk-s0510a:1248_0: Rājā disvā “kissa āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Corā mayaṃ, mahārājā”ti. Rājā tesaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1248_1: dāpetvā “mā puna evaṃ akatthā”ti ovaditvā vissajjesi. Te āgantvā tassa rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1248_2: So punapi dvattikkhattuṃ tatheva vīmaṃsitvā “sīlavā rājā”ti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā
atk-s0510a:1248_3: sīmantare ekaṃ nagaraṃ upagamma tattha amaccassa pāhesi “nagaraṃ vā me dehi, yuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1248_4: vā”ti. So brahmadattassa rañño tamatthaṃ ārocāpesi – “āṇāpetu, deva, ‘kiṃ yujjhāmi,
atk-s0510a:1248_5: udāhu nagaraṃ demī”’ti. Rājā “na yujjhitabbaṃ, nagaraṃ datvā idhāgacchā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1248_6: So tathā akāsi. Paṭirājāpi taṃ nagaraṃ gahetvā avasesanagaresupi tatheva dūtaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1248_7: Tepi amaccā tatheva brahmadattassa ārocetvā tena “na yujjhitabbaṃ, idhāgantabba”nti
atk-s0510a:1249_0: Tato amaccā brahmadattaṃ āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, tena saha yujjhamā”ti. Rājā “mama pāṇātipāto
atk-s0510a:1249_1: bhavissatī”ti vāresi. Amaccā “mayaṃ, mahārāja, taṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā idheva ānessāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:1249_2: nānāupāyehi rājānaṃ saññāpetvā “ehi, mahārājā”ti gantumāraddhā. Rājā “sace sattamāraṇappaharaṇavilumpanakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1249_3: na karotha, gacchāmī”ti bhaṇati. Amaccā “na, deva, karoma, bhayaṃ dassetvā palāpemā”ti
atk-s0510a:1249_4: caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā ghaṭesu dīpe pakkhipitvā rattiṃ gacchiṃsu. Paṭirājā
atk-s0510a:1249_5: taṃ divasaṃ bārāṇasisamīpe nagaraṃ gahetvā idāni kinti rattiṃ sannāhaṃ mocāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1249_6: pamatto niddaṃ okkami saddhiṃ balakāyena. Tato amaccā brahmadattarājānaṃ ādāya paṭirañño
atk-s0510a:1249_7: khandhāvāraṃ gantvā sabbaghaṭehi dīpe nīharāpetvā ekapajjotaṃ katvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1249_8: Paṭirañño amacco mahābalakāyaṃ disvā bhīto attano rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “uṭṭhehi
atk-s0510a:1249_9: amakkhikaṃ madhuṃ khādāhī”ti mahāsaddaṃ akāsi. Tathā dutiyopi tatiyopi. Paṭirājā
atk-s0510a:1249_10: tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajji. Ukkuṭṭhisatāni pavattiṃsu. So
atk-s0510a:1249_11: “paravacanaṃ saddahitvā amittahatthaṃ pattomhī”ti sabbarattiṃ taṃ taṃ vippalapitvā
atk-s0510a:1249_12: dutiyadivase “dhammiko rājā, uparodhaṃ na kareyya gantvā khamāpemī”ti cintetvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1249_13: upasaṅkamitvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā “khama, mahārāja, mayhaṃ aparādha”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:1249_14: Rājā taṃ ovaditvā “uṭṭhehi, khamāmi te”ti āha. So raññā evaṃ vuttamatteyeva paramassāsappatto
atk-s0510a:1249_15: ahosi. Bārāṇasirañño samīpeyeva janapade rajjaṃ labhi. Te aññamaññaṃ sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1250_0: Atha brahmadatto dvepi senā sammodamānā ekato ṭhitā disvā “mamevekassa cittānurakkhaṇāya
atk-s0510a:1250_1: asmiṃ mahājanakāye khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitabindu na uppannaṃ, aho
atk-s0510a:1250_2: sādhu, aho suṭṭhu, sabbe sattā sukhitā hontu, averā hontu, abyāpajjā hontū”ti mettājhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1250_3: uppādetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ sacchikatvā
atk-s0510a:1250_4: sayambhutaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ maggaphalasukhena sukhitaṃ hatthikkhandhe nisinnaṃ amaccā
atk-s0510a:1250_5: paṇipātaṃ katvā āhaṃsu – “yānakālo, mahārāja, vijitabalakāyassa sakkāro kātabbo,
atk-s0510a:1250_6: parājitabalakāyassa bhattaparibbayo dātabbo”ti. So āha – “nāhaṃ, bhaṇe, rājā, paccekabuddho
atk-s0510a:1250_7: nāmāha”nti. “Kiṃ devo bhaṇati, na edisā paccekabuddhā hontī”ti. “Kīdisā, bhaṇe, paccekabuddhā”ti?
atk-s0510a:1250_8: “Paccekabuddhā nāma dvaṅgulakesamassū aṭṭhaparikkhārayuttā bhavantī”ti. So dakkhiṇahatthena
atk-s0510a:1250_9: sīsaṃ parāmasi, tāvadeva gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi, pabbajitaveso pāturahosi. Dvaṅgulakesamassu
atk-s0510a:1250_10: aṭṭhaparikkhārasamannāgato vassasatikattherasadiso ahosi. So catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:1250_11: hatthikkhandhato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā padumapupphe nisīdi. Amaccā vanditvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1250_12: bhante, kammaṭṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ adhigatosī”ti pucchiṃsu. So yato assa mettājhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1250_13: ahosi, tañca vipassanaṃ vipassitvā adhigato, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento udānagāthañca
atk-s0510a:1250_14: byākaraṇagāthañca imaṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsi “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa”nti.
atk-s0510a:1251_0: Tattha sabbesūti anavasesesu. Bhūtesūti sattesu. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana
atk-s0510a:1251_1: ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma. Nidhāyāti nikkhipitvā. Daṇḍanti kāyavacīmanodaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1251_2: kāyaduccaritādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kāyaduccaritañhi daṇḍayatīti daṇḍaṃ, bādheti
atk-s0510a:1251_3: anayabyasanaṃ pāpetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritañca. Paharaṇadaṇḍo
atk-s0510a:1251_4: eva vā daṇḍo, taṃ nidhāyātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Aviheṭhayanti aviheṭhayanto. Aññatarampīti
atk-s0510a:1251_5: yaṃkiñci ekampi. Tesanti tesaṃ sabbabhūtānaṃ. Na puttamiccheyyāti atrajo, khettajo,
atk-s0510a:1251_6: dinnako, antevāsikoti imesu catūsu puttesu yaṃkiñci puttaṃ na iccheyya. Kuto sahāyanti
atk-s0510a:1251_7: sahāyaṃ pana iccheyyāti kuto eva etaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1252_0: Ekoti pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko, ekantavigatakilesoti
atk-s0510a:1252_1: eko, eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko. Samaṇasahassassāpi hi majjhe vattamāno
atk-s0510a:1252_2: gihisaṃyojanassa chinnattā eko, evaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko. Eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1252_3: eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko iriyati vattatīti evaṃ adutiyaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0510a:1257_0: Evaṃ taṇhāpahānaṭṭhena eko. Sabbakilesāssa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā
atk-s0510a:1257_1: āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti evaṃ ekantavigatakilesoti eko. Anācariyako hutvā sayambhū
atk-s0510a:1257_2: sāmaṃyeva paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti evaṃ eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
atk-s0510a:1258_0: Careti yā imā aṭṭha cariyāyo. Seyyathidaṃ – paṇidhisampannānaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0510a:1258_1: iriyāpathacariyā, indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ chasu ajjhattikāyatanesu āyatanacariyā,
atk-s0510a:1258_2: appamādavihārīnaṃ catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saticariyā, adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ catūsu
atk-s0510a:1258_3: jhānesu samādhicariyā, buddhisampannānaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu ñāṇacariyā, sammāpaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1258_4: catūsu ariyasaccesu maggacariyā, adhigatapphalānaṃ catūsu sāmaññaphalesu patticariyā,
atk-s0510a:1258_5: tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ sabbasattesu lokatthacariyā, tattha padesato paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānanti.
atk-s0510a:1258_6: Yathāha – “cariyāti aṭṭha cariyāyo iriyāpathacariyā”ti vitthāro. Tāhi cariyāhi samannāgato
atk-s0510a:1258_7: bhaveyyāti attho. Atha vā yā imā adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena
atk-s0510a:1258_8: carati, upaṭṭhahanto satiyā carati, avikkhitto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya
atk-s0510a:1258_9: carati, vijānanto viññāṇena carati, evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyatantīti āyatanacariyāya
atk-s0510a:1258_10: carati, evaṃ paṭipanno visesaṃ adhigacchatīti visesacariyāya caratīti evaṃ aparāpi
atk-s0510a:1258_11: aṭṭha cariyāyo vuttā, tāhipi samannāgato bhaveyyāti attho. Khaggavisāṇakappoti ettha
atk-s0510a:1258_12: khaggavisāṇaṃ nāma khaggamigasiṅgaṃ. Kappa-saddassa atthaṃ vitthārato maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1258_13: pakāsayissāma, idha panāyaṃ “satthukappena vata, bho, kira sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā”ti
atk-s0510a:1258_14: evamādīsu viya paṭibhāgo veditabbo. Khaggavisāṇakappoti khaggavisāṇasadisoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:1259_0: Adhippāyānusandhito pana evaṃ veditabbo – yvāyaṃ vuttappakāro daṇḍo bhūtesu pavattiyamāno
atk-s0510a:1259_1: ahito hoti, taṃ tesu appavattanena tappaṭipakkhabhūtāya mettāya parahitūpasaṃhārena
atk-s0510a:1259_2: ca sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, nihitadaṇḍattā eva ca yathā anihitadaṇḍā sattā
atk-s0510a:1259_3: bhūtāni daṇḍena vā satthena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā viheṭhayanti, tathā aviheṭhayaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1259_4: aññatarampi tesaṃ imaṃ mettākammaṭṭhānamāgamma yadeva tattha vedanāgataṃ saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇagataṃ
atk-s0510a:1259_5: tañca tadanusāreneva tadaññañca saṅkhāragataṃ vipassitvā imaṃ paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti
atk-s0510a:1260_0: Ayaṃ pana anusandhi – evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “idāni, bhante, kuhiṃ gacchathā”ti?
atk-s0510a:1260_1: Tato tena “pubbe paccekabuddhā kattha vasantī”ti āvajjetvā ñatvā “gandhamādanapabbate”ti
atk-s0510a:1260_2: vutte puna āhaṃsu – “amhe dāni, bhante, pajahatha na icchathā”ti. Atha paccekasambuddho
atk-s0510a:1260_3: āha “na puttamiccheyyā”ti sabbaṃ. Tatrādhippāyo – ahaṃ idāni atrajādīsu yaṃkiñci
atk-s0510a:1260_4: puttampi na iccheyyaṃ, kuto pana tumhādisaṃ sahāyaṃ. Tasmā tumhesupi yo mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1260_5: gantuṃ mādiso vā hotuṃ icchati, so eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. Atha vā tehi “amhe
atk-s0510a:1260_6: dāni, bhante, pajahatha na icchathā”ti vutte so paccekasambuddho “na puttamiccheyya
atk-s0510a:1260_7: kuto sahāya”nti vatvā attano yathāvuttenatthena ekacariyāya guṇaṃ disvā pamudito
atk-s0510a:1260_8: pītisomanassajāto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi – “eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. Evaṃ vatvā
atk-s0510a:1260_9: pekkhamānasseva mahājanassa ākāse uppatitvā gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1261_0: Gandhamādano nāma himavati cūḷakāḷapabbataṃ mahākāḷapabbataṃ nāgapaliveṭhanaṃ candagabbhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1261_1: sūriyagabbhaṃ suvaṇṇapassaṃ himavantapabbatanti satta pabbate atikkamma hoti. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1261_2: nandamūlakaṃ nāma pabbhāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanokāso, tisso ca guhāyo – suvaṇṇaguhā,
atk-s0510a:1261_3: maṇiguhā, rajataguhāti. Tattha maṇiguhādvāre mañjūsako nāma rukkho yojanaṃ ubbedhena,
atk-s0510a:1261_4: yojanaṃ vitthārena. So yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni tāni pupphayati,
atk-s0510a:1261_5: visesena paccekabuddhāgamanadivase. Tassūparito sabbaratanamāḷo hoti. Tattha sammajjanakavāto
atk-s0510a:1261_6: kacavaraṃ chaḍḍeti, samakaraṇavāto sabbaratanamayavālukaṃ samaṃ karoti, siñcanakavāto
atk-s0510a:1261_7: anotattadahato ānetvā udakaṃ siñcati, sugandhakaraṇavāto himavantato sabbesaṃ sugandharukkhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1261_8: gandhe āneti, ocinakavāto pupphāni ocinitvā pāteti, santharakavāto sabbattha santharati.
atk-s0510a:1261_9: Sadā supaññattāneva cettha āsanāni honti, yesu paccekabuddhuppādadivase, uposathadivase
atk-s0510a:1261_10: ca sabbe paccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti. Ayaṃ tattha pakati. Ayaṃ paccekabuddho
atk-s0510a:1261_11: tattha gantvā paññattāsane nisīdati. Tato sace tasmiṃ kāle aññepi paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti,
atk-s0510a:1261_12: tepi taṅkhaṇeyeva sannipatitvā paññattāsanesu nisīdanti. Nisīditvā ca kiñcideva samāpattiṃ
atk-s0510a:1261_13: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahanti. Tato saṅghatthero adhunāgatapaccekabuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ anumodanatthāya
atk-s0510a:1261_14: “kathamadhigata”nti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati, tadāpi so tameva attano udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ
atk-s0510a:1261_15: bhāsati. Puna bhagavāpi āyasmatā ānandena puṭṭho tameva gāthaṃ bhāsati. Ānandopi
atk-s0510a:1261_16: saṅgītiyanti evaṃ ekekā gāthā paccekasambodhiabhisambuddhaṭṭhāne, mañjūsakamāḷe,
atk-s0510a:1261_17: ānandena pucchitakāle, saṅgītiyanti catukkhattuṃ bhāsitā hotīti.
atk-s0510a:1263_0: 92. Saṃsaggajātassāti gāthā kā uppatti? Ayampi paccekabodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1263_1: sāsane vīsati vassasahassāni purimanayeneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1263_2: katvā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā lakkhaṇasammasanaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1263_3: ariyamaggaṃ anadhigamma brahmaloke nibbatti. So tato cuto bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0510a:1263_4: kucchimhi uppajjitvā purimanayeneva vaḍḍhamāno yato pabhuti “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti
atk-s0510a:1263_5: visesaṃ aññāsi. Tadupādāya itthīnaṃ hatthe na ramati, ucchādananhāpanamaṇḍanādimattampi
atk-s0510a:1263_6: na sādiyati. Taṃ purisā eva posenti. Thaññapāyanakāle dhātiyo kañcukaṃ paṭimuñcitvā
atk-s0510a:1263_7: purisavesena thaññaṃ pāyenti. So itthīnaṃ gandhaṃ ghāyitvā saddaṃ vā sutvā rodati,
atk-s0510a:1263_8: viññutaṃ pattopi itthiyo passituṃ na icchati. Tena taṃ anitthigandhotveva sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1264_0: Tasmiṃ soḷasavassuddesike jāte rājā “kulavaṃsaṃ saṇṭhapessāmī”ti nānākulehi tassa
atk-s0510a:1264_1: anurūpā kaññāyo ānetvā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi “kumāraṃ ramāpehī”ti. Amacco upāyena
atk-s0510a:1264_2: taṃ ramāpetukāmo tassa avidūre sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā nāṭakāni payojāpesi. Kumāro
atk-s0510a:1264_3: gītavāditasaddaṃ sutvā “kasseso saddo”ti āha. Amacco “taveso, deva, nāṭakitthīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1264_4: saddo, puññavantānaṃ īdisāni nāṭakāni honti. Abhirama, deva, mahāpuññosi tva”nti
atk-s0510a:1264_5: āha. Kumāro amaccaṃ daṇḍena tāḷāpetvā nikkaḍḍhāpesi. So rañño ārocesi. Rājā kumārassa
atk-s0510a:1264_6: mātarā saha gantvā kumāraṃ khamāpetvā puna amaccaṃ āṇāpesi. Kumāro tehi atinippīḷiyamāno
atk-s0510a:1264_7: seṭṭhasuvaṇṇaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakāre āṇāpesi “sundaraṃ itthirūpaṃ karothā”ti. Te vissakammunā
atk-s0510a:1264_8: nimmitasadisaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ itthirūpaṃ karitvā dassesuṃ. Kumāro disvā vimhayena
atk-s0510a:1264_9: sīsaṃ cāletvā mātāpitūnaṃ pesesi – “yadi īdisiṃ itthiṃ labhissāmi, gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1264_10: Mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto mahāpuñño, avassaṃ tena saha katapuññā kāci dārikā loke
atk-s0510a:1264_11: uppannā bhavissatī”ti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā amaccānaṃ appesuṃ – “gacchatha,
atk-s0510a:1264_12: īdisiṃ dārikaṃ gavesathā”ti. Te taṃ gahetvā soḷasamahājanapade vicarantā taṃ taṃ
atk-s0510a:1264_13: gāmaṃ gantvā udakatitthādīsu yattha yattha janasamūhaṃ passanti, tattha tattha devataṃ
atk-s0510a:1264_14: viya suvaṇṇarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā nānāpupphavatthālaṅkārehi pūjaṃ katvā vitānaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0510a:1264_15: ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhanti “yadi kenaci evarūpā diṭṭhapubbā bhavissati, so kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpessatī”ti?
atk-s0510a:1264_16: Etenupāyena aññatra maddaraṭṭhā sabbajanapade āhiṇḍitvā taṃ “khuddakaraṭṭha”nti avamaññamānā
atk-s0510a:1265_0: Tato nesaṃ etadahosi – “maddaraṭṭhampi tāva gacchāma, mā no bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhepi
atk-s0510a:1265_1: rājā puna pesesī”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu. Sāgalanagare ca maddavo nāma
atk-s0510a:1265_2: rājā. Tassa dhītā soḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā ahosi. Tassā vaṇṇadāsiyo nhānodakatthāya
atk-s0510a:1265_3: titthaṃ gacchanti. Tattha amaccehi ṭhapitaṃ taṃ suvaṇṇarūpaṃ dūratova disvā “amhe
atk-s0510a:1265_4: udakatthāya pesetvā rājaputtī sayameva āgatā”ti bhaṇantiyo samīpaṃ gantvā “nāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1265_5: sāminī, amhākaṃ sāminī ito abhirūpatarā”ti āhaṃsu. Amaccā taṃ sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1265_6: anurūpena nayena dārikaṃ yāciṃsu. Sopi adāsi. Te bārāṇasirañño pāhesuṃ – “laddhā,
atk-s0510a:1265_7: deva, kumārikā, sāmaṃ āgacchatha, udāhu amheva ānemā”ti. So “mayi āgacchante janapadapīḷā
atk-s0510a:1266_0: Amaccāpi dārikaṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhamitvā kumārassa pāhesuṃ – “laddhā suvaṇṇarūpasadisā
atk-s0510a:1266_1: kumārikā”ti. Kumāro sutvāva rāgena abhibhūto paṭhamajjhānā parihāyi. So dūtaparamparāya
atk-s0510a:1266_2: pesesi – “sīghaṃ ānetha, sīghaṃ ānethā”ti. Te sabbattha ekarattivāsena bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0510a:1266_3: patvā bahinagare ṭhitā rañño pesesuṃ – “ajjeva pavisitabbaṃ, no”ti. Rājā “seṭṭhakulā
atk-s0510a:1266_4: ānītā dārikā, maṅgalakiriyaṃ katvā mahāsakkārena pavesessāma, uyyānaṃ tāva naṃ nethā”ti
atk-s0510a:1266_5: āha. Te tathā akaṃsu. Sā accantasukhumālā kumārikā yānugghāṭena ubbāḷhā addhānaparissamena
atk-s0510a:1266_6: uppannavātarogā milātamālā viya hutvā rattibhāge kālamakāsi. Amaccā “sakkārā paribhaṭṭhamhā”ti
atk-s0510a:1266_7: parideviṃsu. Rājā ca nāgarā ca “kulavaṃso vinaṭṭho”ti parideviṃsu. Sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1266_8: kolāhalaṃ ahosi. Kumārassa sutamatteyeva mahāsoko udapādi.
atk-s0510a:1267_0: Tato kumāro sokassa mūlaṃ khanituṃ āraddho. So evaṃ cintesi – “ayaṃ soko nāma na
atk-s0510a:1267_1: ajātassa hoti, jātassa pana hoti. Tasmā jātiṃ paṭicca soko. Jāti pana kiṃ paṭiccāti?
atk-s0510a:1267_2: Bhavaṃ paṭicca jātī”ti. Evaṃ pubbabhāvanānubhāvena yoniso manasikaronto anulomapaṭilomaṃ
atk-s0510a:1267_3: paṭiccasamuppādaṃ disvā puna anulomañca saṅkhāre sammasanto tattheva nisinno paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1267_4: sacchākāsi. Amaccā taṃ maggaphalasukhena sukhitaṃ santindriyaṃ santamānasaṃ nisinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1267_5: disvā paṇipātaṃ katvā āhaṃsu – “mā soci, deva, mahanto jambudīpo, aññaṃ tato sundarataraṃ
atk-s0510a:1267_6: kaññaṃ ānessāmā”ti. So āha – “na socāmi, nissoko paccekabuddho aha”nti. Ito paraṃ
atk-s0510a:1268_0: Gāthāvaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā – saṃsaggajātassāti jātasaṃsaggassa. Tattha dassanasavanakāyasamullapanasambhogasaṃsaggavasena
atk-s0510a:1268_1: pañcavidho saṃsaggo. Tattha aññamaññaṃ disvā cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo
atk-s0510a:1268_2: dassanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tattha sīhaḷadīpe kāḷadīghavāpī gāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ kalyāṇavihāravāsidīghabhāṇakadaharabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:1268_3: disvā paṭibaddhacittā kenaci upāyena taṃ alabhitvā kālaṅkatā kuṭumbiyadhītā ca tassā
atk-s0510a:1268_4: nivāsanacoḷakhaṇḍaṃ disvā “evarūpaṃ vatthaṃ dhāriniyā nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālabhi”nti
atk-s0510a:1268_5: phalitahadayo kālaṅkato. So eva daharo ca nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1269_0: Parehi pana kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ sutvā sotaviññāṇavīthivasena
atk-s0510a:1269_1: uppannarāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tatrāpi girigāmavāsikammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārikāhi
atk-s0510a:1269_2: saddhiṃ padumassaraṃ gantvā nhatvā mālaṃ āropetvā uccāsaddena gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:1269_3: ākāsena gacchanto kāmarāgena visesā parihāyitvā byasanaṃ patto pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsī
atk-s0510a:1270_0: Aññamaññaṃ aṅgaparāmasanena uppannarāgo kāyasaṃsaggo nāma. Dhammabhāsanadaharabhikkhu
atk-s0510a:1270_1: ca rājadhītā cettha nidassanaṃ. Mahāvihāre kira daharabhikkhu dhammaṃ bhāsati. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1270_2: mahājano āgato, rājāpi aggamahesiyā rājadhītāya ca saddhiṃ agamāsi. Tato rājadhītāya
atk-s0510a:1270_3: tassa rūpañca sarañca āgamma balavarāgo uppanno, tassa daharassāpi. Taṃ disvā rājā
atk-s0510a:1270_4: sallakkhetvā sāṇipākārena parikkhipāpesi. Te aññamaññaṃ parāmasitvā āliṅgiṃsu. Puna
atk-s0510a:1270_5: sāṇipākāraṃ apanetvā passantā dvepi kālaṅkateyeva addasaṃsūti.
atk-s0510a:1271_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālapanasamullapanavasena uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Bhikkhu
atk-s0510a:1271_1: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ paribhogakaraṇe uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Dvīsupi etesu
atk-s0510a:1271_2: pārājikappatto bhikkhu ca bhikkhunī ca nidassanaṃ. Maricavaṭṭināmamahāvihāramahe
atk-s0510a:1271_3: kira duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayarājā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā ubhatosaṅghaṃ parivisati. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1271_4: uṇhayāguyā dinnāya saṅghanavakasāmaṇerī anādhārakassa saṅghanavakassa sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0510a:1271_5: dantavalayaṃ datvā samullapanamakāsi. Te ubhopi upasampajjitvā saṭṭhivassā hutvā
atk-s0510a:1271_6: paratīraṃ gatā aññamaññaṃ samullapanena pubbasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tāvadeva sañjātasinehā
atk-s0510a:1271_7: sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamitvā pārājikā ahesunti. Evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yena kenaci
atk-s0510a:1271_8: saṃsaggena jātasaṃsaggassa bhavati sneho, purimarāgapaccayo balavarāgo uppajjati.
atk-s0510a:1271_9: Tato snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti tameva snehaṃ anugacchantaṃ sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1271_10: sokaparidevādinānappakārakaṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ pahoti pabhavati jāyati.
atk-s0510a:1272_0: Apare “ārammaṇe cittassa vossaggo saṃsaggo”ti bhaṇanti. Tato sneho, snehadukkhamidanti.
atk-s0510a:1272_1: Evamatthappabhedaṃ imaṃ aḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā so paccekabuddho āha – “svāyaṃ yamidaṃ
atk-s0510a:1272_2: snehanvayaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ pahoti, tameva snehaṃ anugatassa dukkhassa mūlaṃ khananto
atk-s0510a:1273_0: Evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “amhehi dāni, bhante, kiṃ kattabba”nti? Tato so āha
atk-s0510a:1273_1: – “tumhe vā aññataro vā imamhā dukkhā muccitukāmo, so sabbopi ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno,
atk-s0510a:1273_2: eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. Ettha ca yaṃ taṃ “snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotī”ti
atk-s0510a:1273_3: vuttaṃ, tadeva sandhāya “ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1273_4: Atha vā yathāvuttena saṃsaggena ‘saṃsaggajātassa bhavati sneho, snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ
atk-s0510a:1273_5: pahoti’, evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno ahamadhigatoti evaṃ sambandhitvā
atk-s0510a:1273_6: catutthapādo pubbe vuttanayeneva snehavasena vuttoti veditabbo. Tato paraṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0510a:1275_0: 93. Mitte suhajjeti kā uppatti? Ayaṃ paccekabodhisatto purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva
atk-s0510a:1275_1: uppajjitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārento paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā “kiṃ samaṇadhammo
atk-s0510a:1275_2: varo, rajjaṃ vara”nti vīmaṃsitvā amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1275_3: Amaccā “dhammena samena karothā”ti vuttāpi lañjaṃ gahetvā adhammena karonti. Te lañjaṃ
atk-s0510a:1275_4: gahetvā sāmike parājayantā ekadā aññataraṃ rājavallabhaṃ parājesuṃ. So rañño bhattakārakehi
atk-s0510a:1275_5: saddhiṃ pavisitvā sabbaṃ ārocesi. Rājā dutiyadivase sayaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1275_6: Tato mahājanā – “amaccā, deva, sāmike asāmike karontī”ti uccāsaddaṃ karontā mahāyuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1275_7: viya akaṃsu. Atha rājā vinicchayaṭṭhānā vuṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā samāpattiṃ appetuṃ
atk-s0510a:1275_8: nisinno. Tena saddena vikkhittacitto na sakkoti appetuṃ. So “kiṃ me rajjena, samaṇadhammo
atk-s0510a:1275_9: vara”nti rajjasukhaṃ pahāya puna samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā pubbe vuttanayeneva vipassitvā
atk-s0510a:1275_10: paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Kammaṭṭhānañca pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1276_0: Tattha mettāyanavasena mittā. Suhadayabhāvena suhajjā. Keci ekantahitakāmatāya mittāva
atk-s0510a:1276_1: honti na suhajjā. Keci gamanāgamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsamullāpādīsu, hadayasukhajananena
atk-s0510a:1276_2: suhajjāva honti, na mittā. Keci tadubhayavasena suhajjā ceva mittā ca honti. Te duvidhā
atk-s0510a:1276_3: agāriyā ca anagāriyā ca. Tattha agāriyā tividhā honti upakāro samānasukhadukkho anukampakoti.
atk-s0510a:1276_4: Anagāriyā visesena atthakkhāyino eva. Te catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0510a:1277_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi upakāro mitto suhado veditabbo. Pamattaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0510a:1277_1: pamattassa sāpateyyaṃ rakkhati, bhītassa saraṇaṃ hoti, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu
atk-s0510a:1279_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi samānasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo. Guyhamassa
atk-s0510a:1279_1: ācikkhati, guyhamassa parigūhati, āpadāsu na vijahati, jīvitaṃpissa atthāya pariccattaṃ hoti”.
atk-s0510a:1281: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo. Abhavenassa na nandati, bhavenassa nandati, avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ nivāreti, vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ pasaṃsati”.
atk-s0510a:1283: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi atthakkhāyī mittā suhado veditabbo. Pāpā nivāreti, kalyāṇe niveseti, assutaṃ sāveti, saggassa maggaṃ ācikkhatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1284: Tesvidha agāriyā adhippetā, atthato pana sabbepi yujjanti. Te mitte suhajje anukampamānoti anudayamāno, tesaṃ sukhaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo dukkhaṃ apaharitukāmo ca.
atk-s0510a:1285_0: Hāpeti atthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena tividhaṃ, tathā attatthaparatthaubhayatthavasenāpi
atk-s0510a:1285_1: tividhaṃ atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti. Paṭibaddhacittoti
atk-s0510a:1285_2: “ahaṃ imaṃ vinā na jīvāmi, esa me gati, esa me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne
atk-s0510a:1285_3: ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti. “Ime maṃ vinā na jīvanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ gati, ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:1285_4: tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti. Idha
atk-s0510a:1285_5: pana evaṃ paṭibaddhacitto adhippeto. Etaṃ bhayanti etaṃ atthahāpanabhayaṃ, attano
atk-s0510a:1285_6: samāpattihāniṃ sandhāyāha. Santhaveti tividho santhavo taṇhādiṭṭhimittasanthavavasena.
atk-s0510a:1285_7: Tattha aṭṭhasatapabhedāpi taṇhā taṇhāsanthavo, dvāsaṭṭhibhedāpi diṭṭhi diṭṭhisanthavo,
atk-s0510a:1285_8: paṭibaddhacittatāya mittānukampanā mittasanthavo. Tesu so idha adhippeto. Tena hissa
atk-s0510a:1285_9: samāpatti parihīnā. Tenāha – “etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno ahaṃ adhigato”ti. Sesaṃ vuttasadisamevāti.
atk-s0510a:1287_0: 94. Vaṃso visāloti kā uppatti? Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane tayo paccekabodhisattā
atk-s0510a:1287_1: pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā. Tato
atk-s0510a:1287_2: cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājakule nibbatto, itare dve paccantarājakulesu. Te
atk-s0510a:1287_3: ubhopi kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā
atk-s0510a:1287_4: nandamūlakapabbhāre vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “mayaṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1287_5: imaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ anuppattā”ti āvajjetvā paccavekkhamānā kassapabuddhakāle attano
atk-s0510a:1287_6: attano cariyaṃ addasaṃsu. Tato “tatiyo kuhi”nti āvajjentā bārāṇasirajjaṃ kārentaṃ
atk-s0510a:1287_7: disvā tassa guṇe saritvā “so pakatiyāva appicchatādiguṇasamannāgato hoti, amhākaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1287_8: ovādako vattā vacanakkhamo pāpagarahī, handa, naṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā ārocemā”ti okāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:1287_9: gavesantā taṃ ekadivasaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0510a:1287_10: uyyānadvāre veḷugumbamūle aṭṭhaṃsu. Mahājano atitto rājadassanena rājānaṃ ulloketi.
atk-s0510a:1287_11: Tato rājā “atthi nu kho koci mama dassane byāpāraṃ na karotī”ti olokento paccekabuddhe
atk-s0510a:1287_12: addakkhi. Saha dassaneneva cassa tesu sineho uppajji. So hatthikkhandhā oruyha santena
atk-s0510a:1287_13: ācārena upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, kiṃ nāma tumhe”ti pucchi. Te “mayaṃ, mahārāja, asajjamānā
atk-s0510a:1287_14: nāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Bhante, asajjamānāti etassa ko attho”ti? “Alagganattho, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1287_15: Tato veḷugumbaṃ dassetvā āhaṃsu – “seyyathāpi, mahārāja, imaṃ veḷugumbaṃ sabbaso
atk-s0510a:1287_16: mūlakhandhasākhānusākhāhi saṃsibbitvā ṭhitaṃ asihattho puriso mūle chetvā āviñchanto
atk-s0510a:1287_17: na sakkuṇeyya uddharituṃ, evameva tvaṃ anto ca bahi ca jaṭāya jaṭito āsattavisatto
atk-s0510a:1287_18: tattha vilaggo. Seyyathāpi vā panassa vemajjhagatopi ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhattā
atk-s0510a:1287_19: kenaci alaggova ṭhito, sakkā ca pana agge vā mūle vā chetvā uddharituṃ, evameva mayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1287_20: katthaci asajjamānā sabbā disā gacchāmā”ti tāvadeva catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:1287_21: passato eva rañño ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamaṃsu. Tato rājā cintesi – “kadā
atk-s0510a:1287_22: nu kho ahampi evaṃ asajjamāno bhaveyya”nti tattheva ṭhito vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1287_23: sacchākāsi. Purimanayeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1288_0: Tattha vaṃsoti veḷu. Visāloti vitthiṇṇo. Va-kāro avadhāraṇattho, eva-kāro vā ayaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1288_1: sandhivasena ettha e-kāro naṭṭhā. Tassa parapadena sambandho. Taṃ pacchā yojessāma.
atk-s0510a:1288_2: Yathāti paṭibhāge. Visattoti laggo jaṭito saṃsibbito. Puttesu dāresu cāti puttadhītubhariyāsu.
atk-s0510a:1288_3: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sineho. Vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamānoti vaṃsakaḷīro viya alaggamāno.
atk-s0510a:1288_4: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā,
atk-s0510a:1288_5: sāpi evaṃ tāni vatthūni, saṃsibbitvā ṭhitattā visattā eva. Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya
atk-s0510a:1288_6: apekkhavā visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1288_7: maggañāṇena chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā lābhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu vā
atk-s0510a:1288_8: diṭṭhādīsu vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena asajjamāno paccekabodhiṃ adhigatoti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1290_0: 95. Migo araññamhīti kā uppatti? Eko kira bhikkhu kassapassa bhagavato sāsane yogāvacaro
atk-s0510a:1290_1: kālaṃ katvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhikule uppanno aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge. So subhago
atk-s0510a:1290_2: ahosi, tato paradāriko hutvā kālaṅkato niraye nibbatto tattha paccitvā pakkāvasesena
atk-s0510a:1290_3: seṭṭhibhariyāya kucchimhi itthī hutvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Nirayato āgatānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1290_4: gattāni uṇhāni honti. Tena seṭṭhibhariyā ḍayhamānena udarena kicchena kasirena taṃ
atk-s0510a:1290_5: gabbhaṃ dhāretvā kālena dārikaṃ vijāyi. Sā jātadivasato pabhuti mātāpitūnaṃ sesabandhuparijanānañca
atk-s0510a:1290_6: dessā ahosi. Vayappattā ca yamhi kule dinnā, tatthāpi sāmikasassusasurānaṃ dessāva
atk-s0510a:1290_7: ahosi appiyā amanāpā. Atha nakkhatte ghosite seṭṭhiputto tāya saddhiṃ kīḷituṃ anicchanto
atk-s0510a:1290_8: vesiṃ ānetvā kīḷati. Sā taṃ dāsīnaṃ santikā sutvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nānappakārehi
atk-s0510a:1290_9: anunayitvā ca āha – “ayyaputta, itthī nāma sacepi dasannaṃ rājūnaṃ kaniṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0510a:1290_10: cakkavattino vā dhītā, tathāpi sāmikassa pesanakarā hoti. Sāmike anālapante sūle
atk-s0510a:1290_11: āropitā viya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Sace ahaṃ anuggahārahā anuggahetabbā, no ce,
atk-s0510a:1290_12: vissajjetabbā. Attano ñātikulaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Seṭṭhiputto – “hotu, bhadde, mā soci
atk-s0510a:1290_13: kīḷanasajjā hohi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āha. Seṭṭhidhītā tāvattakena sallāpamattena
atk-s0510a:1290_14: ussāhajātā “sve nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti bahuṃ khajjabhojjaṃ paṭiyādeti. Seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0510a:1290_15: dutiyadivase anārocetvāva kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Sā “idāni pesessati, idāni pesessatī”ti
atk-s0510a:1290_16: maggaṃ olokentī nisinnā ussūraṃ disvā manusse pesesi. Te paccāgantvā “seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0510a:1290_17: gato”ti ārocesuṃ. Sā taṃ sabbaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ ādāya yānaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0510a:1291_0: Atha nandamūlakapabbhāre paccekasambuddho sattame divase nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_1: khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā “kattha ajja bhikkhaṃ carissāmā”ti āvajjento
atk-s0510a:1291_2: taṃ seṭṭhidhītaraṃ disvā “mayi imissā saddhākāraṃ kāretvā taṃ kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_3: gamissatī”ti ñatvā pabbhārasamīpe saṭṭhiyojanamanosilātale ṭhatvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0510a:1291_4: abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā ākāsenāgantvā tassā paṭipathe oruyha bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_5: abhimukho agamāsi. Taṃ disvāva dāsiyo seṭṭhidhītāya ārocesuṃ. Sā yānā oruyha sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_6: vanditvā pattaṃ sabbarasasampannena khādanīyena bhojanīyena pūretvā padumapupphena
atk-s0510a:1291_7: paṭicchādetvā heṭṭhāpi padumapupphaṃ katvā pupphakalāpaṃ hatthena gahetvā paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0510a:1291_8: hatthe pattaṃ datvā vanditvā pupphakalāpahatthā patthanaṃ akāsi – “bhante, yathā
atk-s0510a:1291_9: idaṃ pupphaṃ, evāhaṃ yattha yattha upapajjāmi, tattha tattha mahājanassa piyā bhaveyyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_10: manāpā”ti. Evaṃ patthetvā dutiyampi patthesi – “bhante, dukkho gabbhavāso, taṃ anupagamma
atk-s0510a:1291_11: padumapupphe eva paṭisandhi bhaveyyā”ti. Tatiyampi patthesi – “bhante, jeguccho mātugāmo,
atk-s0510a:1291_12: cakkavattidhītāpi paravasaṃ gacchati. Tasmā ahaṃ itthibhāvaṃ anupagamma puriso bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:1291_13: Catutthampi patthesi – “bhante, imaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ atikkamma pariyosāne tumhehi
atk-s0510a:1291_14: pattaṃ amataṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti. Evaṃ caturo paṇidhī katvā taṃ padumapupphakalāpaṃ pūjetvā
atk-s0510a:1291_15: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā “pupphasadiso eva me gandho ceva vaṇṇo ca hotū”ti imaṃ
atk-s0510a:1292: Tato paccekabuddho pattañca pupphakalāpañca gahetvā ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0510a:1294: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:1295_0: Imāya gāthāya seṭṭhidhītāya anumodanaṃ katvā “seṭṭhidhītā maṃ gacchantaṃ passatū”ti
atk-s0510a:1295_1: adhiṭṭhahitvā ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi. Seṭṭhidhītāya taṃ passantiyā
atk-s0510a:1295_2: mahatī pīti uppajji. Bhavantare kataṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ anokāsatāya parikkhīṇaṃ ciñcambiladhotatambalohabhājanamiva
atk-s0510a:1295_3: suddhā jātā. Tāvadevassā patikule ñātikule ca sabbo jano tuṭṭho. “Kiṃ karomā”ti piyavacanāni
atk-s0510a:1295_4: ca paṇṇākārāni ca pesesi. Sāmikopi manusse pesesi – “seṭṭhidhītaraṃ sīghaṃ ānetha,
atk-s0510a:1295_5: ahaṃ vissaritvā uyyānaṃ āgato”ti. Tato pabhuti ca naṃ ure vilittacandanaṃ viya āmuttamuttāhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1295_6: viya pupphamālā viya ca piyāyanto parihari. Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ issariyabhogayuttasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1295_7: anubhavitvā kālaṃ katvā purisabhāvena devaloke padumapupphe uppajji. So devaputto
atk-s0510a:1295_8: gacchantopi padumapupphagabbhe eva gacchati, tiṭṭhantopi nisīdantopi sayantopi padumapupphagabbheyeva
atk-s0510a:1295_9: sayati. “Mahāpadumadevaputto”ti ca naṃ vohariṃsu. Evaṃ so tena iddhānubhāvena anulomapaṭilomaṃ
atk-s0510a:1296_0: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasirañño vīsati itthisahassāni honti. Tāsu ekāpi puttaṃ na
atk-s0510a:1296_1: labhati. Amaccā rājānaṃ viññāpesuṃ – “deva, kulavaṃsānupālako putto icchitabbo, atraje
atk-s0510a:1296_2: avijjamāne khettajopi kulavaṃsadharo hotī”ti. Atha rājā “ṭhapetvā mahesiṃ avasesā
atk-s0510a:1296_3: itthiyo sattāhaṃ dhammanāṭakaṃ karothā”ti yathākāmaṃ bahi carāpesi, tathāpi puttaṃ
atk-s0510a:1296_4: nālattha. Puna amaccā āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, mahesī nāma puññena ca paññāya ca sabbaitthīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1296_5: aggā, appeva nāma devo mahesiyā kucchimhi puttaṃ labheyyā”ti. Rājā mahesiyā etamatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:1296_6: ārocesi. Sā āha – “mahārāja, yā itthī sīlavatī saccavādinī, sā puttaṃ labheyya, hirottapparahitāya
atk-s0510a:1296_7: kuto putto”ti pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pañca sīlāni samādiyitvā punappunaṃ āvajjesi, sīlavatiyā
atk-s0510a:1296_8: rājadhītāya pañca sīlāni āvajjentiyā puttapatthanācitte uppannamatte sakkassa āsanaṃ saṃkampi.
atk-s0510a:1297_0: Atha sakko āvajjento etamatthaṃ viditvā – “sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya puttavaraṃ demī”ti
atk-s0510a:1297_1: ākāsenāgantvā deviyā sammukhe ṭhito “kiṃ varesi, devī”ti? “Puttaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Dammi
atk-s0510a:1297_2: te, devi, puttaṃ, mā cintayī”ti vatvā devalokaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho ettha khīṇāyuko”ti
atk-s0510a:1297_3: āvajjento “ayaṃ mahāpadumo uparidevalokaṃ gantukāmo ca bhavissatī”ti ñatvā tassa
atk-s0510a:1297_4: vimānaṃ gantvā “tāta mahāpaduma, manussalokaṃ gacchāhī”ti yāci. So “mā evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1297_5: bhaṇa, jegucchito manussaloko”ti. “Tāta, tvaṃ manussaloke puññaṃ katvā idhūpapanno,
atk-s0510a:1297_6: tattheva ṭhatvā pāramiyo pūretabbā, gaccha, tātā”ti. “Dukkho, mahārāja, gabbhavāso,
atk-s0510a:1297_7: na sakkomi tattha vasitu”nti. “Tāta, te gabbhavāso natthi, tathā hi tvaṃ kammamakāsi,
atk-s0510a:1297_8: yathā padumagabbheyeva nibbattissasi, gaccha, tātā”ti punappunaṃ vuccamāno adhivāsesi.
atk-s0510a:1298_0: So devalokā cavitvā bārāṇasirañño uyyāne silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:1298_1: Tañca rattiṃ paccūsasamaye mahesī supinantena vīsatiitthisahassaparivutā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1298_2: gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe puttaṃ laddhā viya ahosi. Sā pabhātāya
atk-s0510a:1298_3: rattiyā sīlāni rakkhamānā tattha gantvā ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ addasa, taṃ neva tīre
atk-s0510a:1298_4: hoti na gambhīre. Saha dassaneneva cassā tattha puttasineho uppajji. Sā sayaṃ eva
atk-s0510a:1298_5: otaritvā taṃ pupphaṃ aggahesi, pupphe gahitamatteyeva pattāni vikasiṃsu. Tattha suvaṇṇapaṭimaṃ
atk-s0510a:1298_6: viya dārakaṃ addasa, disvāva “putto me laddho”ti saddaṃ nicchāresi. Mahājano sādhukārasahassāni
atk-s0510a:1298_7: pavattesi. Rañño ca pesesi. Rājā sutvā “kattha laddho”ti pucchitvā laddhokāsaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:1298_8: “uyyānañca pokkharaṇiyaṃ padumañca amhākaṃyeva, tasmā amhākaṃ khette jātattā khettajo
atk-s0510a:1298_9: nāmāyaṃ putto”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā vīsatisahassaitthiyo dhātikiccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0510a:1298_10: Yā yā kumārassa ruciṃ ñatvā patthitaṃ patthitaṃ khādanīyaṃ khādāpeti, sā sā sahassaṃ
atk-s0510a:1298_11: labhati. Sakalabārāṇasī calitā, sabbo jano kumārassa paṇṇākārasahassāni pesesi. Kumāro
atk-s0510a:1298_12: taṃ taṃ atinetvā “imaṃ khāda, imaṃ bhuñjā”ti vuccamāno bhojanena ubbāḷho ukkaṇṭhito
atk-s0510a:1299_0: Tadā aññataro paccekabuddho bārāṇasiṃ nissāya isipatane vasati. So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:1299_2: “ajja kattha bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti āvajjento kumārassa sampattiṃ disvā “esa pubbe
atk-s0510a:1299_3: kiṃ kammaṃ karī”ti vīmaṃsanto “mādisassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā catasso patthanā patthesi,
atk-s0510a:1299_4: tattha tisso siddhā, ekā tāva na sijjhati, tassa upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassemī”ti bhikkhācāravasena
atk-s0510a:1299_5: kumārassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Kumāro taṃ disvā “samaṇa, mā idha āgacchi, ime hi tampi
atk-s0510a:1299_6: ‘imaṃ khāda, imaṃ bhuñjā’ti vadeyyu”nti āha. So ekavacaneneva tato nivattitvā attano
atk-s0510a:1299_7: senāsanaṃ agamāsi. Kumāro parijanaṃ āha – “ayaṃ samaṇo mayā vuttamattova nivatto,
atk-s0510a:1299_8: kuddho nu kho mamā”ti. So tehi “pabbajitā nāma na kodhaparāyaṇā honti, parena pasannamanena
atk-s0510a:1299_9: yaṃ dinnaṃ, tena yāpentī”ti vuccamānepi “duṭṭho evarūpo nāma samaṇo, khamāpessāmi
atk-s0510a:1299_10: na”nti mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā mahatā rājānubhāvena isipatanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1299_11: migayūthaṃ disvā pucchi – “kinnāmete”ti? “Ete, sāmi, migā nāmā”ti. “Etesaṃ ‘imaṃ
atk-s0510a:1299_12: khādatha, imaṃ bhuñjatha, imaṃ sāyathā’ti vatvā paṭijaggantā atthī”ti? “Natthi, sāmi,
atk-s0510a:1300_0: Kumāro “yathā ime arakkhiyamānāva yattha icchanti, tattha vasanti, kadā nu kho ahampi
atk-s0510a:1300_1: evaṃ vaseyya”nti etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggahesi. Paccekabuddhopi tassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā senāsanamaggañca
atk-s0510a:1300_2: caṅkamanañca sammajjitvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā ekadvattikkhattuṃ caṅkamitvā padanikkhepaṃ
atk-s0510a:1300_3: dassetvā divāvihārokāsañca paṇṇasālañca sammajjitvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā pavisanapadanikkhepaṃ
atk-s0510a:1300_4: dassetvā nikkhamanapadanikkhepaṃ adassetvā aññatra agamāsi. Kumāro tattha gantvā
atk-s0510a:1300_5: taṃ padesaṃ sammajjitvā maṭṭhakataṃ disvā “vasati maññe ettha so paccekabuddho”ti
atk-s0510a:1300_6: parijanena bhāsitaṃ sutvā āha – “pātopi so samaṇo dussati, idāni hatthiassādīhi attano
atk-s0510a:1300_7: okāsaṃ akkantaṃ disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ dusseyya, idheva tumhe tiṭṭhathā”ti hatthikkhandhā
atk-s0510a:1300_8: oruyha ekakova senāsanaṃ paviṭṭho vattasīsena susammaṭṭhokāse padanikkhepaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:1300_9: “so dānāyaṃ samaṇo ettha caṅkamanto na vaṇijjādikammaṃ cintesi, addhāyaṃ attano hitameva
atk-s0510a:1300_10: cintesi maññe”ti pasannamānaso caṅkamaṃ abhiruhitvā dūrīkataputhuvitakko gantvā pāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0510a:1300_11: nisīditvā sañjātaekaggo hutvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigantvā
atk-s0510a:1300_12: purimanayeneva purohitena kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito gaganatale nisinno imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1301_0: Tattha migoti dve migā – eṇīmigo ca pasadamigo ca. Apica sabbesaṃ āraññikānaṃ catuppadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1301_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana pasadamigo adhippetoti vadanti. Araññamhīti gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
atk-s0510a:1301_2: ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ araññaṃ, idha pana uyyānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā “uyyānamhī”ti vuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:1301_3: hoti. Yathāti paṭibhāge. Abaddhoti rajjubandhanādīhi abaddho, etena vissatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1301_4: dīpeti. Yenicchakaṃ gacchati vocarāyāti yena yena disābhāgena gantumicchati, tena
atk-s0510a:1301_5: tena disābhāgena gocarāya gacchati. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0510a:1302_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āraññako migo araññe pavane caramāno vissattho gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1302_1: vissattho tiṭṭhati, vissattho nisīdati, vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. Taṃ kissa hetu?
atk-s0510a:1302_2: Anāpāthagato, bhikkhave, luddassa, evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
atk-s0510a:1302_3: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu antamakāsi
atk-s0510a:1302_4: māraṃ apadaṃ, vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0510a:1303_0: Seritanti sacchandavuttitaṃ aparāyattataṃ vā, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā migo araññamhi
atk-s0510a:1303_1: abaddho yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya, tathā kadā nu kho ahampi taṇhābandhanaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0510a:1303_2: evaṃ gaccheyyanti. Viññū paṇḍito naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno eko careti.
atk-s0510a:1305_0: 96. Āmantanā hotīti kā uppatti? Bārāṇasirañño kira mahāupaṭṭhānasamaye amaccā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1305_1: Tesu eko amacco “deva, sotabbaṃ atthī”ti ekamantaṃ gamanaṃ yāci. So uṭṭhāyāsanā agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1305_2: Puna eko mahāupaṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ yāci, eko hatthikkhandhe nisinnaṃ, eko assapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1305_3: nisinnaṃ, eko suvaṇṇarathe nisinnaṃ, eko sivikāya nisīditvā uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ yāci.
atk-s0510a:1305_4: Rājā tato orohitvā agamāsi. Aparo janapadacārikaṃ gacchantaṃ yāci, tassapi vacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1305_5: sutvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha ekamantaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ so tehi nibbinno hutvā pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:1305_6: Amaccā issariyena vaḍḍhanti. Tesu eko gantvā rājānaṃ āha – “asukaṃ nāma, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1305_7: janapadaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti. Rājā taṃ “itthannāmo bhuñjatī”ti bhaṇati. So rañño vacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1305_8: anādiyitvā “gacchāmahaṃ taṃ janapadaṃ gahetvā bhuñjāmī”ti tattha gantvā kalahaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1305_9: puna ubhopi rañño santikaṃ āgantvā aññamaññassa dosaṃ ārocenti. Rājā “na sakkā ime
atk-s0510a:1305_10: tosetu”nti tesaṃ lobhe ādīnavaṃ disvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi. So purimanayena imaṃ udānaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1306_0: Tassattho – sahāyamajjhe ṭhitassa divāseyyasaṅkhāte vāse ca, mahāupaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte
atk-s0510a:1306_1: ṭhāne ca, uyyānagamanasaṅkhāte gamane ca, janapadacārikasaṅkhātāya cārikāya ca, “idaṃ
atk-s0510a:1306_2: me suṇa, idaṃ me dehī”tiādinā nayena tathā tathā āmantanā hoti, tasmā ahaṃ tattha
atk-s0510a:1306_3: nibbijjitvā yāyaṃ ariyajanasevitā anekānisaṃsā ekantasukhā, evaṃ santepi lobhābhibhūtehi
atk-s0510a:1306_4: sabbakāpurisehi anabhipatthitā pabbajjā, taṃ anabhijjhitaṃ paresaṃ avasavattanena
atk-s0510a:1306_5: bhabbapuggalavasena seritañca pekkhamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā anukkamena paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1308_0: 97. Khiḍḍāratīti kā uppatti? Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ekaputtakabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1308_1: So tassa ekaputtako piyo ahosi manāpo pāṇasamo, rājā sabbairiyāpathesu puttakaṃ gahetvāva
atk-s0510a:1308_2: vattati. So ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ ṭhapetvā gato. Kumāropi taṃ divasaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1308_3: uppannena byādhinā mato. Amaccā “puttasinehena rañño hadayampi phaleyyā”ti anārocetvāva
atk-s0510a:1308_4: naṃ jhāpesuṃ. Rājā uyyāne surāmadena matto puttaṃ neva sarati, tathā dutiyadivasepi
atk-s0510a:1308_5: nhānabhojanavelāsu. Atha bhuttāvī nisinno saritvā “puttaṃ me ānethā”ti āha. Tassa
atk-s0510a:1308_6: anurūpena vidhānena taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Tato sokābhibhūto nisinno evaṃ yoniso
atk-s0510a:1308_7: manasākāsi – “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti. Evaṃ anukkamena
atk-s0510a:1308_8: anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sammasanto paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Sesaṃ
atk-s0510a:1309_0: Atthavaṇṇanā pana – khiḍḍāti kīḷanā. Sā duvidhā hoti kāyikā ca vācasikā ca. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1309_1: kāyikā nāma hatthīhipi kīḷanti, assehipi rathehipi dhanūhipi tharūhipīti evamādi.
atk-s0510a:1309_2: Vācasikā nāma gītaṃ silokabhaṇanaṃ mukhabheriālambarabherīti evamādi. Ratīti pañcakāmaguṇarati.
atk-s0510a:1309_3: Vipulanti yāva aṭṭhimiñjaṃ ahacca ṭhānena sakalattabhāvabyāpakaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0510a:1309_4: Anusandhiyojanāpi cettha saṃsaggagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā, tato parañca sabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1311_0: 98. Cātuddisoti kā uppatti? Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pañca paccekabodhisattā
atk-s0510a:1311_1: pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke nibbattā. Tato
atk-s0510a:1311_2: cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājā ahosi, sesā pākatikarājāno. Te cattāropi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1311_3: uggaṇhitvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā nandamūlakapabbhāre
atk-s0510a:1311_4: vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vaṃsakkaḷīragāthāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attano
atk-s0510a:1311_5: kammañca sahāyañca āvajjetvā ñatvā bārāṇasirañño upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:1311_6: gavesanti. So ca rājā tikkhattuṃ rattiyā ubbijjati, bhīto vissaraṃ karoti, mahātale
atk-s0510a:1311_7: dhāvati. Purohitena kālasseva vuṭṭhāya sukhaseyyaṃ pucchitopi “kuto me, ācariya,
atk-s0510a:1311_8: sukha”nti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Purohitopi “ayaṃ rogo na sakkā yena kenaci
