atk-s0510a:1433_2: Ye katasambhārā dhīrā janā jinasāsanamhi sāvakattaṃ sāvakabhāvaṃ na vajanti na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0510a:1433_3: te dhīrā katasambhārā sayambhū sayameva bhūtā paccekajinā paccekabuddhā bhavanti.
atk-s0510a:1434_0: 134. Kiṃ bhūtā? Mahantadhammā pūritamahāsambhārā bahudhammakāyā anekadhammasabhāvasarīrā.
atk-s0510a:1434_1: Punapi kiṃ bhūtā? Cittissarā cittagatikā jhānasampannāti attho. Sabbadukkhoghatiṇṇā
atk-s0510a:1434_2: sakalasaṃsāraoghaṃ tiṇṇā atikkantā udaggacittā kodhamānādikilesavirahitattā somanassacittā
atk-s0510a:1434_4: paramatthaṃ uttamatthaṃ dassanasīlā. Acalābhītaṭṭhena sīhopamā sīhasadisāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1435_1: Santamanāti santacittā, nikkilesabhāvena santasabhāvacittasaṅkappāti attho. Samādhīti
atk-s0510a:1435_2: suṭṭhu ekaggacittā. Paccantasattesu patippacārāti paccantajanapadesu sattesu dayākaruṇādīhi
atk-s0510a:1435_3: paticaraṇasīlā. Dīpā parattha idha vijjalantāti sakalalokānuggahakaraṇena paraloke
atk-s0510a:1435_4: ca idhaloke ca vijjalantā dīpā padīpasadisāti attho. Paccekabuddhā satataṃ hitāmeti
atk-s0510a:1435_5: ime paccekabuddhā satataṃ sabbakālaṃ sakalalokahitāya paṭipannāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1436_0: 136. Pahīnasabbāvaraṇā janindāti te paccekabuddhā janānaṃ indā uttamā kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1436_1: sabbesaṃ pañcāvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnasabbāvaraṇā. Ghanakañcanābhāti rattasuvaṇṇajambonadasuvaṇṇapabhā
atk-s0510a:1436_2: sadisaābhāvantāti attho. Nissaṃsayaṃ lokasudakkhiṇeyyāti ekantena lokassa sudakkhiṇāya
atk-s0510a:1436_3: aggadānassa paṭiggahetuṃ arahā yuttā, nikkilesattā sundaradānapaṭiggahaṇārahāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1436_4: Paccekabuddhā satatappitāmeti ime paccekañāṇādhigamā buddhā satataṃ niccakālaṃ appitā
atk-s0510a:1436_5: suhitā paripuṇṇā, sattāhaṃ nirāhārāpi nirodhasamāpattiphalasamāpattivasena paripuṇṇāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1437: 137. Patiekā visuṃ sammāsambuddhato visadisā aññe asādhāraṇabuddhā paccekabuddhā. Atha vā –
atk-s0510a:1438: “Upasaggā nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
atk-s0510a:1440_0: Vuttattā patisaddassa ekaupasaggatā pati padhāno hutvā sāmibhūto anekesaṃ dāyakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1440_1: appamattakampi āhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā saggamokkhassa pāpuṇanato. Tathā hi annabhārassa
atk-s0510a:1440_2: bhattabhāgaṃ paṭiggahetvāpassantasseva bhuñjitvā devatāhi sādhukāraṃ dāpetvā tadaheva
atk-s0510a:1440_3: taṃ duggataṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā koṭisaṅkhadhanuppādanena ca, khadiraṅgārajātake
atk-s0510a:1440_5: piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsagamanena somanassuppādanena ca,
atk-s0510a:1440_6: padumavatīaggamahesīputtānaṃ mahājanakarañño deviyā ārādhanena gandhamādanato ākāsena
atk-s0510a:1440_7: āgamma dānapaṭiggahaṇena mahājanakabodhisattassa ca deviyā ca somanassuppādanena
atk-s0510a:1440_8: ca, tathā abuddhuppāde chātakabhaye sakalajambudīpe uppanne bārāṇasiseṭṭhino chātakabhayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1440_9: paṭicca pūretvā rakkhite saṭṭhisahassakoṭṭhāgāre vīhayo khepetvā bhūmiyaṃ nikhātadhaññāni
atk-s0510a:1440_10: ca cāṭisahassesu pūritadhaññāni ca khepetvā sakalapāsādabhittīsu mattikāhi madditvā
atk-s0510a:1440_11: limpitadhaññāni ca khepetvā tadā nāḷimattamevāvasiṭṭhaṃ “idaṃ bhuñjitvā ajja marissāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:1440_12: cittaṃ uppādetvā sayantassa gandhamādanato eko paccekabuddho āgantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1440_13: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā pasādaṃ uppādetvā jīvitaṃ pariccajamāno paccekabuddhassa patte okiri.
atk-s0510a:1440_14: Paccekabuddho vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano ānubhāvena passantasseva seṭṭhissa pañcapaccekabuddhasatehi
atk-s0510a:1440_15: saha paribhuñji. Tadā bhattapacitaukkhaliṃ, pidahitvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1441_0: Niddamokkantassa seṭṭhino chātatte uppanne so vuṭṭhahitvā bhariyaṃ āha – “bhatte
atk-s0510a:1441_1: ācāmakabhattamattaṃ olokehī”ti. Susikkhitā sā “sabbaṃ dinnaṃ nanū”ti avatvā ukkhaliyā
atk-s0510a:1441_2: pidhānaṃ vivari. Sā ukkhali taṅkhaṇeva sumanapupphamakuḷasadisassa sugandhasālibhattassa
atk-s0510a:1441_3: pūritā ahosi. Sā ca seṭṭhi ca santuṭṭhā sayañca sakalagehavāsino ca sakalanagaravāsino
atk-s0510a:1441_4: ca bhuñjiṃsu. Dabbiyā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūritaṃ. Sakalasaṭṭhisahassakoṭṭhāgāresu
atk-s0510a:1441_5: sugandhasāliyo pūresuṃ. Sakalajambudīpavāsino seṭṭhissa gehatoyeva dhaññabījāni gahetvā
atk-s0510a:1441_7: pati sāmibhūto buddhoti paccekabuddho. Paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānīti paccekabuddhehi
atk-s0510a:1441_8: ovādānusāsanīvasena suṭṭhu bhāsitāni kathitāni vacanāni. Caranti lokamhi sadevakamhīti
atk-s0510a:1441_9: devalokasahite sattaloke caranti pavattantīti attho. Sutvā tathā ye na karonti bālāti
atk-s0510a:1441_10: tathārūpaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitavacanaṃ ye bālā janā na karonti na manasi karonti,
atk-s0510a:1441_11: te bālā dukkhesu saṃsāradukkhesu punappunaṃ uppattivasena caranti pavattanti, dhāvantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1442_0: 138. Paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānīti suṭṭhu bhāsitāni caturāpāyato muccanatthāya bhāsitāni
atk-s0510a:1442_1: vacanāni. Kiṃ bhūtāni? Avassavantaṃ pagghantaṃ khuddaṃ madhuṃ yathā madhuravacanānīti
atk-s0510a:1442_2: attho. Ye paṭipattiyuttā paṇḍitajanāpi paṭipattīsu vuttānusārena pavattantā tathārūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:1442_3: madhuravacanaṃ sutvā vacanakarā bhavanti, te paṇḍitajanā saccadasā catusaccadassino
atk-s0510a:1443_0: 139. Paccekabuddhehi jinehi bhāsitāti kilese jinanti jiniṃsūti jinā, tehi jinehi
atk-s0510a:1443_1: paccekabuddhehi vuttā bhāsitā kathitā. Kathā uḷārā ojavantā pākaṭā santi pavattanti.
atk-s0510a:1443_2: Tā, kathā sakyasīhena sakyarājavaṃsasīhena gotamena tathāgatena abhinikkhamitvā buddhabhūtena
atk-s0510a:1443_3: naruttamena narānaṃ uttamena seṭṭhena pakāsitā pākaṭīkatā desitāti sambandho. Kimatthanti
atk-s0510a:1444_0: 140. Lokānukampāya imāni tesanti lokānukampatāya lokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca imāni
atk-s0510a:1444_1: vacanāni imā gāthāyo. Tesaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vikubbitāni visesena kubbitāni bhāsitānīti
atk-s0510a:1444_4: hutvā sayameva bhūtena jātena paṭividdhena sīhena abhītena gotamena sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0510a:1444_5: imāni vacanāni pakāsitāni, imā gāthāyo pakāsitā vivaritā uttānīkatāti attho. Itīti
atk-s0510a:1448_1: āha. Atha-apadāna-saddānamattho heṭṭhā vuttova. Ettha thera-saddo panāyaṃ kālathirapaññattināmadheyyajeṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0510a:1448_2: anekesu atthesu vattati. Tathā hi “therovassikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātānī”tiādīsu kāle,
atk-s0510a:1448_3: therovassikāni cirakālaṃ ovassikānīti attho. “Theropi tāva mahā”iccādīsu thire thirasīloti
atk-s0510a:1448_4: attho. “Therako ayamāyasmā mahallako”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ, lokapaññattimattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1448_5: “Cundatthero phussatthero”tiādīsu nāmadheyye, evaṃ katanāmoti attho. “Thero cāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1448_6: kumāro mama puttesū”tiādīsu jeṭṭhe, jeṭṭho kumāroti attho. Idha panāyaṃ kāle ca thire
atk-s0510a:1448_7: ca vattati. Tasmā ciraṃ kālaṃ ṭhitoti thero, thiratarasīlācāramaddavādiguṇābhiyutto
atk-s0510a:1448_8: vā theroti vuccati. Thero ca thero ceti therā, therānaṃ apadānaṃ kāraṇaṃ therāpadānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1448_9: taṃ therāpadānaṃ suṇāthāti sambandho. Himavantassa avidūre, lambako nāma pabbatotiādi
atk-s0510a:1448_10: āyasmato sāriputtattherassa apadānaṃ, tassāyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1449_0: Atīte kira ito kappato satasahassakappādhike ekaasaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā sāriputto
atk-s0510a:1449_1: brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi. Mahāmoggallāno gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0510a:1449_2: nibbattitvā nāmena sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiko nāma ahosi. Te ubhopi sahapaṃsukīḷanasahāyā
atk-s0510a:1449_3: ahesuṃ. Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1449_4: rahogato cintesi – “imesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma ekantikaṃ, tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:1449_5: upagantvā vimokkhamaggo gavesitabbo”ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma, ahaṃ pabbajitukāmo.
atk-s0510a:1449_6: Kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vatvā tena “na sakkhissāmī”ti vutte “hotu ahameva
atk-s0510a:1449_7: pabbajissāmī”ti ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0510a:1449_8: pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa pabbajitassa anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā
atk-s0510a:1449_9: catusattatisahassamattā brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ. So pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo
atk-s0510a:1449_10: nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. Te sabbepi pañcābhiññā aṭṭha
atk-s0510a:1450_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0510a:1450_1: satte saṃsāramahoghato tāretvā ekadivasaṃ saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0510a:1450_2: kattukāmo eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena gantvā “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti
atk-s0510a:1450_3: tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Saradatāpaso satthu
atk-s0510a:1450_5: paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Saradatāpaso
atk-s0510a:1451_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni
atk-s0510a:1451_1: phalāphalāni gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā sañjātapasādā attano ācariyassa satthu
atk-s0510a:1451_2: ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā “ācariya, mayaṃ pubbe ‘tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī’ti
atk-s0510a:1451_3: maññāma, ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti āhaṃsu. Kiṃ vadetha, tātā,
atk-s0510a:1451_4: sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0510a:1451_5: sabbaññubuddhena maṃ tulaṃ mā karitthāti. Atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:1451_6: “yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1452_0: Atha te ācariyo āha – “tātā, satthu anucchaviko no deyyadhammo natthi, satthā ca
atk-s0510a:1452_1: bhikkhācaravelāya idhāgato, handa, mayaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathābalaṃ dassāma. Tumhehi
atk-s0510a:1452_2: yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā
atk-s0510a:1452_3: sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā
atk-s0510a:1452_4: dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhojanakiccaṃ
atk-s0510a:1452_5: niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkosāpetvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1452_6: kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0510a:1452_7: cintesi. Tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_0: Tato saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena
atk-s0510a:1453_1: pūjā kātabbā, tasmā pupphāni āharathā”ti. Te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni
atk-s0510a:1453_2: pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ, ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_3: tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ, saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1453_4: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1453_5: mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ atiruhathā”ti āha. Nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane.
atk-s0510a:1453_6: Satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_7: Satthā “tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti nirodhaṃ samāpajji. Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0510a:1453_8: dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu. Tāpaso sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_9: satthu pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi. Itare vanamūlaphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle
atk-s0510a:1453_10: añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā aggasāvakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_11: nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi – “tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti. Thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe
atk-s0510a:1453_12: ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ akāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_13: anomattheraṃ āmantesi – “tvampi imesaṃ dhammaṃ desehī”ti. Sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_14: sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. Dvinnampi desanāya dhammābhisamayo nāhosi. Atha
atk-s0510a:1453_15: satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. Desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1453_16: avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā te “etha bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0510a:1453_17: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Te tāvadeva antarahitatāpasavesā aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1454_0: Saradatāpaso pana “aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0510a:1454_1: sāvako bhaveyya”nti desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā maggaphalāni
atk-s0510a:1454_2: paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi. Atha satthāraṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā anantarāyena
atk-s0510a:1454_3: samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1454_4: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako sāriputto nāma bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā
atk-s0510a:1454_5: dhammakathaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Saradatāpasopi sahāyassa
atk-s0510a:1454_6: sirivaḍḍhassa santikaṃ gantvā “samma, mayā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle anāgate
atk-s0510a:1454_7: uppajjanakassa gotamasammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, tvampi tassa
atk-s0510a:1454_8: dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehī”ti. Sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre
atk-s0510a:1454_9: aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1454_10: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1454_11: sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā saradatāpasena satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1454_12: pavattetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā dutiyasāvakabhāvāya
atk-s0510a:1454_13: paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā
atk-s0510a:1454_14: bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1454_15: dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. Saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0510a:1455_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ ubhinnampi antarā kammaṃ na kathitaṃ. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1455_1: uppattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissāgāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0510a:1455_2: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme
atk-s0510a:1455_3: moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tasmā moggallāno moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0510a:1455_4: puttoti moggallāno. Moggaligottena jātoti vā moggallāno. Atha vā mātukumārikakāle
atk-s0510a:1455_5: tassā mātāpitūhi vuttaṃ – “mā uggali mā uggalī”ti vacanamupādāya “muggalī”ti nāmaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1455_6: Tassā muggaliyā puttoti moggallāno. Atha vā sotāpattimaggādimaggassa lābhe ādāne
atk-s0510a:1455_7: paṭivijjhane alaṃ samatthoti moggallānoti. Tāni kira dve kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā
atk-s0510a:1455_8: ābaddhasahāyāneva. Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāramadaṃsu. Dasamāsaccayena
atk-s0510a:1455_9: jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo paṭṭhapesuṃ. Nāmaggahaṇadivase rūpasārībrāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0510a:1455_10: puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Itarassa kolitagāme
atk-s0510a:1455_11: jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Te ubhopi mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā
atk-s0510a:1456_0: Athekadivasaṃ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa
atk-s0510a:1456_1: paripākaṃ gatattā yoniso ummujjantā “sabbepime oraṃ vassasatāva maccumukhaṃ pavisantī”ti
atk-s0510a:1456_2: saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā “amhehi mokkhadhammo pariyesitabbo, tañca pariyesantehi ekā
atk-s0510a:1456_3: pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcamāṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa
atk-s0510a:1456_4: paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0510a:1456_5: ahosi. Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimajjitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā
atk-s0510a:1456_6: tato nibbijjitvā tattha tattha paṇḍitasammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe pañhaṃ pucchanti, te
atk-s0510a:1456_7: tehi puṭṭhā na sampādenti. Aññadatthu teyeva tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. Evaṃ te mokkhaṃ

atk-s0510a:1457_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0510a:1457_1: anupubbena uruvelakassapādike sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1457_2: upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ assajittheraṃ rājagahe
atk-s0510a:1457_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo, santadhammena
atk-s0510a:1457_4: nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti sañjātapasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito
atk-s0510a:1457_5: piṭṭhito anubandhi. Theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:1457_6: Paribbājako attano paribbājakapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Bhattakiccapariyosāne cassa
atk-s0510a:1457_7: attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena
atk-s0510a:1457_8: saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā – “ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1457_9: Thero sammāsambuddhaṃ apadisi. Puna tena “kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā”ti puṭṭho “imassa
atk-s0510a:1457_10: sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti attano navakabhāvaṃ pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena
atk-s0510a:1457_11: cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthamāha. Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva
atk-s0510a:1457_12: sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattimaggaphale patiṭṭhahi. Itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle
atk-s0510a:1457_13: niṭṭhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne pana sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese apavattante “bhavissati
atk-s0510a:1457_14: ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “mā, bhante, upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha,
atk-s0510a:1457_15: ettakameva alaṃ, kahaṃ amhākaṃ satthā vasatī”ti? “Veḷuvane”ti. “Bhante, tumhe purato
atk-s0510a:1457_16: gacchatha, ahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0510a:1457_17: vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1458_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya
atk-s0510a:1458_1: addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ
atk-s0510a:1458_2: pucchi. Sopissa “āvuso, amatamadhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0510a:1458_3: kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā āha – “kahaṃ no satthā”ti? “Veḷuvane”ti. “Tena
atk-s0510a:1458_4: hi, āvuso, āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti. Upatisso sabbakālampi ācariyapūjakova,
atk-s0510a:1458_5: tasmā sañcayassa satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo ahosi. So lābhāsāpakato
atk-s0510a:1458_6: antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto “na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ hotu”nti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0510a:1458_7: Te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi aḍḍhuteyyasatehi
atk-s0510a:1458_8: antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā te dūratova āgacchante disvā “etaṃ
atk-s0510a:1458_9: me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati, aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vatvā tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena
atk-s0510a:1458_10: dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. Yathā
atk-s0510a:1458_11: tesaṃ evaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgatameva. Uparimaggattayakiccaṃ
atk-s0510a:1458_12: pana na niṭṭhāsi. Kasmā? Sāvakapāramīñāṇassa mahantatāya.
atk-s0510a:1459_0: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme

atk-s0510a:1459_4: sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante

atk-s0510a:1460_0: Evaṃ pattasāvakapāramīñāṇo āyasmā sāriputto “kena kammena ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti

atk-s0510a:1464_0: Tattha himavantassāti himo assa atthīti himavā, tassa himavantassa avidūre samīpe,
atk-s0510a:1464_1: himālayapaṭibaddhavanehi attho. Lambako nāma pabbatoti evaṃnāmako paṃsumissakapabbato.
atk-s0510a:1464_2: Assamo sukato mayhanti tasmiṃ lambake pabbate mayhaṃ mamatthāya kato assamo araññavāso
atk-s0510a:1464_3: āsamantato samoti assamo. Natthi paviṭṭhānaṃ samo parissamo etthāti vā assamo, so
atk-s0510a:1464_4: itthambhūto araññavāso suṭṭhu kato, rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapādivasena sundarenākārena
atk-s0510a:1464_5: katoti attho. Paṇṇasālāti usīrapabbajādīhi paṇṇehi chāditā nivasanapaṇṇasālāti attho.

atk-s0510a:1597_4: pañcahi abhiññāhi visesapaññāhi balasampanno, paripuṇṇoti attho. Nāmena suruci nāma
atk-s0510a:1598: Ettakena attano guṇasampattiṃ dassetvā parisasampattiṃ dassento –

atk-s0510a:1671_4: kañci puggalaṃ na vambhenti nīcaṃ katvā na maññantīti attho.

atk-s0510a:1675_0: 207. Punapi attano guṇe pakāsento uppāte supine cāpītiādimāha. Tattha brāhmaṇasippesu

atk-s0510a:1685: 222. Bhante, sabbaññu ākāso sakalantalikkhaṃ rajjuyā vā aṅgulena vā minituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, tava pana ñāṇaṃ ñāṇākāsaṃ na tu eva pametave minituṃ sakkāti attho.

atk-s0510a:1687_0: 224. Cakkhuma pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumanta, ālapanametaṃ. Saha devehi pavattassa
atk-s0510a:1687_1: lokassa, bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Sadevake lokasmiṃ antare yesaṃ yattakānaṃ sattānaṃ

atk-s0510a:1688_0: 225. Bhante, sabbaññu sabbadhammajānanaka, tvaṃ yena ñāṇena catumaggasampayuttena
atk-s0510a:1688_1: sakalaṃ uttamaṃ bodhiṃ nibbānaṃ patto adhigato asi bhavasi, tena ñāṇena paratitthiye
atk-s0510a:1689_0: 226. Tena tāpasena thomitākāraṃ pakāsentā dhammasaṅgāhakā therā imā gāthā thavitvānāti
atk-s0510a:1689_1: āhaṃsu. Tattha imā gāthāti ettakāhi gāthāhi thavitvāna thomanaṃ katvāna nāmena suruci
atk-s0510a:1689_2: nāma tāpaso sesaṭṭhakathāsu pana “saradamāṇavo”ti āgato. So aṭṭhakathānayato pāṭhoyeva

atk-s0510a:1689_5: pattharitvāna pathaviyaṃ nisīdi, accāsannādayo cha nisajjadose vajjetvā sarado nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1690_0: 227. Tattha nisinno tāpaso tassa bhagavato ñāṇameva thomento cullāsītisahassānītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1690_1: Tattha cullāsītisahassānīti caturāsītisahassāni, girirājā merupabbatarājā, mahaṇṇave
atk-s0510a:1690_2: sāgare ajjhogāḷho adhiogāḷho paviṭṭho, tāvadeva tattakāni caturāsītisahassāni accuggato

atk-s0510a:1692_0: 229. Bhante, sabbaññu tava ñāṇaṃ lakkhe ṭhapiyamānamhi ñāṇe sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā

atk-s0510a:1692_2: tava ñāṇaṃ pametave pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ eva na sakkāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1693_0: 230. Sukhumacchikena sukhumacchiddena jālena yo sakalamahāsamudde udakaṃ parikkhipe
atk-s0510a:1693_1: samantato parikkhaṃ kareyya, evaṃ parikkhite ye keci pāṇā udake jātā sabbe te antojālagatā
atk-s0510a:1694_0: 231. Tamupameyyaṃ dassento tatheva hītiādimāha. Tattha yathā udajā pāṇā antojālagatā
atk-s0510a:1694_1: honti, tatheva mahāvīra mahābodhiadhigamāya vīriyakara. Ye keci puthu anekā titthiyā

atk-s0510a:1695_0: 232. Tava suddhena nikkilesena ñāṇena anāvaraṇadassinā sabbadhammānaṃ āvaraṇarahitadassanasīlena
atk-s0510a:1695_1: ete sabbe titthiyā antojālagatā ñāṇajālassanto pavesitā vā tathevāti sambandho. Ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1695_2: te nātivattareti tava ñāṇaṃ te titthiyā nātikkamantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1696_0: 233. Evaṃ vuttathomanāvasāne bhagavato attano byākaraṇārabbhaṃ dassetuṃ bhagavā tamhi
atk-s0510a:1696_1: samayetiādimāha. Tattha yasmiṃ samaye tāpaso bhagavantaṃ thomesi, tasmiṃ thomanāya
atk-s0510a:1696_2: pariyosānakāle saṅkhyātikkantaparivāratāya mahāyaso anomadassī bhagavā kilesamārādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1696_3: jitattā jino. Samādhimhā appitasamādhito vuṭṭhahitvā sakalajambudīpaṃ dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0510a:1697_0: 234-5. Tassa anomadassissa bhagavato munino monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatassa
atk-s0510a:1697_1: nisabho nāma sāvako santacittehi vūpasantakilesamānasehi tādīhi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvattā,
atk-s0510a:1697_2: tādibhi khīṇāsavehi suddhehi parisuddhakāyakammādiyuttehi chaḷabhiññehi tādīhi aṭṭhahi
atk-s0510a:1697_3: lokadhammehi akampanasabhāvehi satasahassehi parivuto buddhassa cittaṃ, aññāya jānitvā
atk-s0510a:1697_4: lokanāyakaṃ upesi, tāvadeva samīpaṃ agamāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1698_0: 236. Te tathā āgatā samānā tattha bhagavato samīpe. Antalikkhe ākāse ṭhitā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1698_1: padakkhiṇaṃ akaṃsu. Te sabbe pañjalikā namassamānā ākāsato buddhassa santike otaruṃ
atk-s0510a:1699: 237. Puna byākaraṇadānassa pubbabhāgakāraṇaṃ pakāsento sitaṃ pātukarītiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1700_0: 241. Yo maṃ pupphenāti yo tāpaso mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā anekapupphena maṃ pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:1700_1: ñāṇañca me anu punappunaṃ thavi thomesi, tamahanti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi
atk-s0510a:1700_2: pākaṭaṃ karissāmi, mama bhāsato bhāsantassa vacanaṃ suṇotha savanavisayaṃ karotha manasi karotha.
atk-s0510a:1701_0: 250. Pacchime bhavasampatteti byākaraṇaṃ dadamāno bhagavā āha. Tattha pacchime pariyosānabhūte
atk-s0510a:1701_1: bhave sampatte sati. Manussattaṃ manussajātiṃ gamissati, manussaloke uppajjissatīti
atk-s0510a:1702_0: 253. Byākaraṇamūlamārabhi aparimeyye ito kappeti. Ettha dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0510a:1702_1: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca pāramī pūritā, tathāpi gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ antarakappāni
atk-s0510a:1703_0: 254. “Sāriputtoti nāmena, hessati aggasāvako”ti byākaraṇamadāsi, byākaraṇaṃ datvā
atk-s0510a:1703_1: taṃ thomento so bhagavā ayaṃ bhāgīrathītiādimāha. Gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, mahī, aciravatīti
atk-s0510a:1703_2: imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ gaṅgānaṃ antare ayaṃ bhāgīrathī nāma paṭhamamahāgaṅgā himavantā
atk-s0510a:1703_3: pabhāvitā himavantato āgatā anotattadahato pabhavā, mahodadhiṃ mahāudakakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1703_4: appayanti pāpuṇanti, mahāsamuddaṃ mahāsāgaraṃ appeti upagacchati yathā, tathā eva
atk-s0510a:1703_5: ayaṃ sāriputto sake tīsu visārado attano kule pavattamānesu tīsu vedesu visārado
atk-s0510a:1703_6: apakkhalitañāṇo patthaṭañāṇo. Paññāya pāramiṃ gantvā attano sāvakañāṇassa pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1703_7: gantvā, pāṇine sabbasatte tappayissati santappessati suhittabhāvaṃ karissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1704_0: 257. Himavantamupādāyāti himālayapabbataṃ ādiṃ katvā mahodadhiṃ mahāsamuddaṃ udakabhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1704_1: sāgaraṃ pariyosānaṃ katvā etthantare etesaṃ dvinnaṃ pabbatasāgarānaṃ majjhe yaṃ pulinaṃ
atk-s0510a:1704_2: yattakā vālukarāsi atthi, gaṇanāto gaṇanavasena asaṅkhiyaṃ saṅkhyātikkantaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1705_0: 258. Tampi sakkā asesenāti taṃ pulinampi nisesena saṅkhātuṃ sakkā sakkuṇeyya bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:1705_1: sā gaṇanā yathā hotīti sambandho. Tathā sāriputtassa paññāya anto pariyosānaṃ na
atk-s0510a:1706: 259. Lakkhe…pe… bhavissatīti lakkhe ñāṇalakkhe ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ kale ṭhapiyamānamhi ṭhapite sati gaṅgāya vālukā khīye parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1707_1: taraṅgarāsayo gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyā saṅkhyāvirahitā yathā honti, tatheva sāriputtassa
atk-s0510a:1707_2: paññāya anto pariyosānaṃ na hessati na bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1708_0: 261. So evaṃ paññavā sāriputto gotamagottattā gotamaṃ sakyakule jeṭṭhakaṃ sakyapuṅgavaṃ
atk-s0510a:1708_1: sambuddhaṃ ārādhayitvā vattapaṭipattisīlācārādīhi cittārādhanaṃ katvā paññāya sāvakañāṇassa
atk-s0510a:1708_2: pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gantvā tassa bhagavato aggasāvako hessatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1709_0: 262. So evaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patto sakyaputtena bhagavatā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvena
atk-s0510a:1709_1: pavattitaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ dhammacakkaṃ saddhammaṃ anuvattessati avinassamānaṃ dhāressati.
atk-s0510a:1709_2: Dhammavuṭṭhiyo dhammadesanāsaṅkhātā vuṭṭhiyo vassento desento pakāsento vivaranto
atk-s0510a:1710_0: 263. Gotamo sakyapuṅgavo bhagavā etaṃ sabbaṃ abhiññāya visesena ñāṇena jānitvā bhikkhusaṅghe
atk-s0510a:1710_1: ariyapuggalamajjhe nisīditvā aggaṭṭhāne sakalapaññādiguṇagaṇābhirame uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapessatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1711_0: 264. Evaṃ so laddhabyākaraṇo somanassappatto pītisomanassavasena udānaṃ udānento
atk-s0510a:1711_1: aho me sukataṃ kammantiādimāha. Tattha ahoti vimhayatthe nipāto. Anomadassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1711_2: satthuno garuno sukataṃ suṭṭhu kataṃ saddahitvā kataṃ kammaṃ puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ aho vimhayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1711_3: acinteyyānubhāvanti attho. Yassa bhagavato ahaṃ kāraṃ puññasambhāraṃ katvā sabbattha
atk-s0510a:1711_4: sakalaguṇagaṇe pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato paramaṃ koṭiṃ sampatto, so bhagavā aho vimhayoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1712_0: 265. Aparimeyyeti saṅkhyātikkantakālasmiṃ kataṃ kusalakammaṃ, me mayhaṃ idha imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1712_1: pacchimattabhāve phalaṃ vipākaṃ dassesi. Sumutto suṭṭhu vimutto chekena dhanuggahena
atk-s0510a:1712_2: khitto saravego iva ahaṃ tena puññaphalena kilese jhāpayiṃ jhāpesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1713_0: 266. Attano eva vīriyaṃ pakāsento asaṅkhatantiādimāha. Tattha asaṅkhatanti na saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0510a:1713_1: paccayehi samāgamma na katanti attho. Taṃ asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ kilesakālussiyābhāvena
atk-s0510a:1713_2: acalaṃ katasambhārānaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena padaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto sabbe titthiye
atk-s0510a:1713_3: sakale titthakare diṭṭhuppādake puggale vicinaṃ upaparikkhanto esāhaṃ eso ahaṃ bhave
atk-s0510a:1714_0: 267-8. Attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento yathāpi byādhito posotiādimāha. Tattha byādhitoti
atk-s0510a:1714_1: byādhinā pīḷito poso puriso osadhaṃ pariyeseyya yathā, tathā ahaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amataṃ
atk-s0510a:1714_2: padaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesanto abbokiṇṇaṃ avicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ, pañcasataṃ jātipañcasatesu
atk-s0510a:1715: 271. Kutitthe sañcariṃ ahanti lāmake titthe gamanamagge ahaṃ sañcariṃ.
atk-s0510a:1716_0: 272. Sāratthiko poso sāragavesī puriso. Kadaliṃ chetvāna phālayeti kadalikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1716_1: chetvā dvedhā phāleyya. Na tattha sāraṃ vindeyyāti phāletvā ca pana tattha kadalikkhandhe
atk-s0510a:1716_2: sāraṃ na vindeyya na labheyya, so puriso sārena rittako tucchoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1717: 273. Yathā kadalikkhandho sārena ritto tuccho, tatheva tathā eva loke titthiyā nānādiṭṭhigatikā bahujjanā asaṅkhatena nibbānena rittā tucchāti sambandho. Seti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1718_0: 274. Pacchimabhave pariyosānajātiyaṃ brahmabandhu brāhmaṇakule jāto ahaṃ ahosinti
atk-s0510a:1718_1: attho. Mahābhogaṃ chaḍḍetvānāti mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ iva chaḍḍetvā,
atk-s0510a:1718_2: anagāriyaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajiṃ paṭipajjinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1720_0: 275-7. Ajjhāyako…pe… muniṃ mone samāhitanti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena monena samannāgato
atk-s0510a:1720_1: muni, tasmiṃ mone sammā āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ samāhitaṃ cittanti attho. Āgusaṅkhātaṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0510a:1720_2: na karotīti nāgo, assajitthero, taṃ mahānāgaṃ suṭṭhu phullaṃ vikasitapadumaṃ yathā
atk-s0510a:1721: 278-281. Disvā me…pe… pucchituṃ amataṃ padanti uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1722: 282. Vīthintareti vīthiantare anuppattaṃ sampattaṃ upagataṃ taṃ theraṃ upagantvāna samīpaṃ gantvā ahaṃ pucchinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1723_0: 284. Kīdisaṃ te mahāvīrāti sakaladhitipurisasāsane arahantānamantare paṭhamaṃ dhammacakkapavattane,
atk-s0510a:1723_1: arahattappattamahāvīra, anujātaparivārabahulatāya mahāyasa te tava buddhassa kīdisaṃ
atk-s0510a:1723_2: sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ sāsananti sambandho. So bhadramukha, me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1723_3: sādhu bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ kathayassu kathehīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1724_0: 285. Tato kathitākāraṃ dassento so me puṭṭhotiādimāha. Tattha soti assajitthero,
atk-s0510a:1724_1: me mayā puṭṭho “sāsanaṃ kīdisa”nti kathito sabbaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1724_3: nipuṇaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ taṇhāsallassa hantāraṃ vināsakaraṃ sabbassa saṃsāradukkhassa
atk-s0510a:1725_0: 286. Tena kathitākāraṃ dassento ye dhammātiādimāha. Hetuppabhavā hetuto kāraṇato
atk-s0510a:1725_1: uppannā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā, ye dhammā ye sappaccayā sabhāvadhammā
atk-s0510a:1725_2: santi saṃvijjanti upalabhantīti sambandho. Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetuṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgato
atk-s0510a:1725_3: āha kathesi. Tesañca yo nirodhoti tesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ yo nirodho nirujjhanasabhāvo,
atk-s0510a:1725_5: ca mahāsamaṇo bhagavā evaṃvādī hetuvūpasamanādivadanasīlo kathetāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1726: 287. Tato vuttadhammaṃ sutvā attanā paccakkhakatappakāraṃ dassento sohantiādimāha. Taṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0510a:1727_0: 289. Eseva dhammo yaditāvadevāti sacepi ito uttariṃ natthi, ettakameva idaṃ sotāpattiphalameva
atk-s0510a:1727_1: pattabbaṃ. Tathā eso eva dhammoti attho. Paccabyatha paṭividdhatha tumhe asokaṃ padaṃ
atk-s0510a:1727_2: nibbānaṃ. Amhehi nāma idaṃ padaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehi adiṭṭhameva abbhatītaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1728_0: 290. Yvāhaṃ dhammaṃ gavesantoti yo ahaṃ dhammaṃ santipadaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto
atk-s0510a:1728_1: kutitthe kucchitatitthe ninditabbatitthe sañcariṃ paribbhaminti attho. So me attho
atk-s0510a:1728_2: anuppattoti so pariyesitabbo attho mayā anuppatto sampatto, idāni pana me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1729: 291. Ahaṃ assajinā therena tosito katasomanasso, acalaṃ niccalaṃ nibbānapadaṃ, patvāna pāpuṇitvā sahāyakaṃ kolitamāṇavaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto assamapadaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1730_0: 292. Dūratova mamaṃ disvāti assamapadato dūratova āgacchantaṃ mamaṃ disvā susikkhito
atk-s0510a:1730_1: me mama sahāyo ṭhānanisajjādiiriyāpathehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto idaṃ upari vuccamānavacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1731_0: 293. Bho sahāya, pasannamukhanettāsi pasannehi sobhanehi daddallamānehi mukhanettehi
atk-s0510a:1731_1: samannāgato asi. Munibhāvo iva te dissati paññāyati. Itthambhūto tvaṃ amatādhigato
atk-s0510a:1731_2: amataṃ nibbānaṃ adhigato asi, kacci accutaṃ nibbānapadaṃ adhigato adhigacchīti pucchāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1732_0: 294. Subhānurūpo āyāsīti subhassa pasannavaṇṇassa anurūpo hutvā āyāsi āgacchasi.
atk-s0510a:1732_1: Āneñjakārito viyāti tomarādīhi kārito āneñjo hatthī viya dantova tīhi māsehi susikkhito
atk-s0510a:1732_2: iva bāhitapāpattā, brāhmaṇa dantadamatho sikkhitasikkho nibbānapade upasanto asīti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1733: 295. Tena puṭṭho amataṃ mayātiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1734_0: 299. Apariyositasaṅkappoti “anāgate ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthitapatthanāya
atk-s0510a:1734_1: koṭiṃ appattasaṅkappoti attho. Kutitthe agantabbamagge ahaṃ sañcariṃ paribbhamiṃ.
atk-s0510a:1734_2: Bhante gotama, lokajeṭṭha tava dassanaṃ āgamma patvā, mama saṅkappo mayhaṃ patthanā
atk-s0510a:1734_3: pūrito arahattamaggādhigamena sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pāpuṇanena paripuṇṇoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0510a:1735_0: 300. Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāyāti pathaviyaṃ nibbattā samaye hemantakāle pupphanti vikasanti,
atk-s0510a:1735_1: dibbagandhā sugandhā suṭṭhu pavanti pavāyanti, sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbe devamanusse tosenti
atk-s0510a:1736_1: patiṭṭhāya ahaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā pupphituṃ arahattamaggañāṇena vikasituṃ samayaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0510a:1737_0: 302. Vimuttipupphanti sabbakilesehi vimuccanato vimocanato vā vimutti arahattaphalavimuttisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:1737_1: pupphaṃ esanto gavesento, tañca kho bhavasaṃsāramocanaṃ kāmabhavādibhavesu saṃsaraṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1737_2: gamanaṃ bhavasaṃsāraṃ, tato mocanaṃ bhavasaṃsāramocanaṃ. Vimuttipupphalābhenāti vimuccanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1737_3: vimuccanti vā katasambhārā etāyāti vimutti, aggaphalaṃ. Pupphanti vikasanti veneyyā
atk-s0510a:1737_4: etenāti pupphaṃ. Vimutti eva pupphaṃ vimuttipupphaṃ. Labhanaṃ lābho, vimuttipupphassa
atk-s0510a:1737_5: lābho vimuttipupphalābho. Tena vimuttipupphalābhena adhigamanena sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbasatte
atk-s0510a:1738_0: 303. “Yāvatā buddhakhettamhī”tiādīsu cakkhuma pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumanta yattake
atk-s0510a:1738_1: ṭhāne ratanasuttādīnaṃ parittānaṃ āṇā ānubhāvo pavattati, tattake satasahassakoṭicakkavāḷasaṅkhāte
atk-s0510a:1738_2: buddhakhette ṭhapetvāna mahāmuniṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ vajjetvā avasesesu sattesu añño
atk-s0510a:1738_3: koci tava puttassa tuyhaṃ puttena mayā paññāya sadiso samo natthīti sambandho. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0510a:1739_0: 308. Paṭipannāti catumaggasamaṅgino ca phalaṭṭhā arahattaphale ṭhitā ca sekhā phalasamaṅgino
atk-s0510a:1739_1: heṭṭhimehi tīhi phalehi samannāgatā ca ete aṭṭha ariyabhikkhū, uttamatthaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1739_2: āsīsakā gavesakā, taṃ paññavantaṃ parivārenti sadā sabbakālaṃ sevanti bhajanti payirupāsantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1740: 310. Kāyavedanācittadhammānupassanāsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kusalā chekā satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ sattannaṃ sambojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvanāyavaḍḍhanāya ratā allīnā.
atk-s0510a:1743_0: 315. Rukkhapabbataratanasattādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī, dharaṇiyaṃ ruhā sañjātā vaḍḍhitā
atk-s0510a:1743_1: cāti dharaṇīruhā rukkhā. Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya ruhanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1743_2: āpajjanti. Vepullataṃ vipulabhāvaṃ paripūrabhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti, te rukkhā kamena phalaṃ
atk-s0510a:1744_0: 317-9. Punapi bhagavantameva thomento sindhu sarassatītiādimāha. Tattha sindhuvādi
atk-s0510a:1744_1: nāma gaṅgā ca sarassatī nāma gaṅgā ca nandiyagaṅgā ca candabhāgāgaṅgā ca gaṅgā nāma
atk-s0510a:1744_2: gaṅgā ca yamunā nāma gaṅgā ca sarabhū nāma gaṅgā ca mahī nāma gaṅgā ca. Sandamānānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1744_3: gacchantīnaṃ etāsaṃ gaṅgānaṃ sāgarova samuddo eva sampaṭicchati paṭiggaṇhāti dhāreti.
atk-s0510a:1744_4: Tadā etā sabbagaṅgā purimaṃ nāmaṃ sindhuvādigaṅgātyādikaṃ purimaṃ nāmapaññattivohāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1744_5: jahanti chaḍḍenti sāgaroteva sāgaro iti eva ñāyati pākaṭā bhavati yathā. Tatheva
atk-s0510a:1744_6: tathā eva ime catubbaṇṇā khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddasaṅkhātā cattāro kulā tavantike
atk-s0510a:1744_7: tava antike samīpe pabbajitvā pattakāsāyacīvaradhārino paricarantā purimaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:1744_8: khattiyādināmadheyyaṃ paññattivohāraṃ jahanti cajanti, buddhaputtāti buddhassa orasāti
atk-s0510a:1745_0: 320-4. Cando candamaṇḍalo abbhā mahikā rajo dhumo rāhūti pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitattā
atk-s0510a:1745_1: vimalo vigatamalo nimmalo, ākāsadhātuyā ākāsagabbhe gacchaṃ gacchanto, sabbe tārakasamūhe
atk-s0510a:1745_2: ābhāya maddamāno loke atirocati daddallati yathā. Tatheva tathā eva tvaṃ…pe….
atk-s0510a:1746_0: 325-7. Udake jātā udake saṃvaḍḍhā kumudā mandālakā ca bahū saṅkhātikkantā, toyena
atk-s0510a:1746_1: udakena kaddamakalalena ca upalimpanti allīyanti yathā, tatheva bahukā sattā aparimāṇā
atk-s0510a:1746_2: sattā loke jātā saṃvaḍḍhā rāgena ca dosena ca aṭṭitā bandhitā virūhare viruhanti.
atk-s0510a:1746_3: Kaddame kumudaṃ yathā viruhati sañjāyati. Kesarīti padumaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1747_0: 329-30. Rammake māseti kattikamāse “komudiyā cātumāsiniyā”ti vuttattā. Vārijā padumapupphādayo
atk-s0510a:1747_1: bahū pupphā pupphanti vikasanti, taṃ māsaṃ taṃ kattikamāsaṃ nātivattanti vārijāti
atk-s0510a:1747_2: sambandho. Samayo pupphanāya soti so kattikamāso pupphanāya vikasanāya samayo kāloti
atk-s0510a:1747_3: attho. Yathā pupphanti tatheva tvaṃ, sakyaputta, pupphito vikasito asi. Pupphito
atk-s0510a:1747_4: te vimuttiyāti te tuyhaṃ sissā katasambhārā bhikkhū vimuttiyā arahattaphalañāṇena
atk-s0510a:1747_5: pupphito vikasito. Yathā vārijaṃ padumaṃ pupphanasamayaṃ nātikkamati, tathā te sāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1748_0: 333-4. Yathāpi selo himavāti himavā nāma selamayapabbato. Sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbesaṃ byādhitānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1748_1: sattānaṃ osadho osadhavanto sabbanāgānaṃ sabbaasurānaṃ sabbadevānañca ālayo agārabhūto
atk-s0510a:1748_2: yathā, tatheva tvaṃ, mahāvīra, sabbapāṇinaṃ jarābyādhimaraṇādīhi pamocanato osadho
atk-s0510a:1748_3: viya. Yathā so himavā nāgādīnaṃ ālayo, tathā tevijjāya ca chaḷabhiññāya ca iddhiyā
atk-s0510a:1748_4: ca pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gatā pattā tuvaṃ nissāya vasantīti sambandho. Heṭṭhā vā upari
atk-s0510a:1749_0: 342. Āsayānusayaṃ ñatvāti ettha āsayoti ajjhāsayo cariyā, anusayoti thāmagatakileso.
atk-s0510a:1749_1: “Ayaṃ rāgacarito, ayaṃ dosacarito, ayaṃ mohacarito”tiādinā āsayañca anusayaṃ kilesapavattiñca
atk-s0510a:1749_2: jānitvāti attho. Indriyānaṃ balābalanti saddhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhindriyo
atk-s0510a:1749_3: mudindriyo svākāro dvākāro suviññāpayo duviññāpayoti evaṃ balābalaṃ jānitvā. Bhabbābhabbe
atk-s0510a:1749_4: viditvānāti “mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ ayaṃ puggalo bhabbo samattho, ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1749_5: puggalo abhabbo”ti viditvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, bhante, sabbaññu tvaṃ cātuddīpikamahāmegho
atk-s0510a:1749_6: viya dhammadesanāsīhanādena abhītanādena gajjasi sakalaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karosi.
atk-s0510a:1750_0: 343-4. Cakkavāḷapariyantāti samantā cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā parisā nisinnā bhaveyya.
atk-s0510a:1750_1: Te evaṃ nisinnā nānādiṭṭhī anekadassanagāhino vivadamānā dveḷhakajātā vivadanti,
atk-s0510a:1750_2: taṃ tesaṃ vimaticchedanāya dubuddhichindanatthāya sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ cittamaññāya
atk-s0510a:1750_3: cittācāraṃ ñatvā opammakusalo upamāupameyyesu dakkho tvaṃ, muni, ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova
atk-s0510a:1750_4: ekeneva pañhakathanena sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe nisinnānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vimatiṃ saṃsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1751_0: 345. Upadisasadisehevāti ettha udakassa upari dissanti pākaṭā hontīti upadisā, sevālā.
atk-s0510a:1751_1: Upadisehi sadisā upadisasadisā, manussā. Yathā hi upadisā sevālā udakaṃ adissamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1751_2: katvā tassupari pattharitvā ṭhitā honti, tathā vasudhā pathavī tehi upadisasadisehi
atk-s0510a:1751_3: eva manussehi nirantaraṃ pattharitvā ṭhitehi pūritā bhaveyya. Te sabbeva pathaviṃ
atk-s0510a:1751_4: pūretvā ṭhitā manussā pañjalikā sirasi añjaliṃ paggahitā kittayuṃ lokanāyakaṃ lokanāyakassa
atk-s0510a:1752_0: 346. Te sabbe devamanussā kappaṃ vā sakalaṃ kappaṃ kittayantā guṇaṃ kathentāpi nānāvaṇṇehi
atk-s0510a:1752_1: nānappakārehi guṇehi kittayuṃ. Tathāpi te sabbe parimetuṃ guṇapamāṇaṃ kathetuṃ na
atk-s0510a:1752_2: pappeyyuṃ na sampāpuṇeyyuṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ. Appameyyo tathāgato sammāsambuddho aparimeyyo
atk-s0510a:1753_0: 347. Sakena thāmena attano balena heṭṭhā upamāupameyyavasena jino jitakileso buddho
atk-s0510a:1753_1: mayā kittito thomito yathā ahosi, evameva sabbe devamanussā kappakoṭīpi kappakoṭisatepi
atk-s0510a:1754_0: 348. Punapi guṇānaṃ appamāṇataṃ dīpetuṃ sace hi koci devo vātiādimāha. Pūritaṃ parikaḍḍheyyāti
atk-s0510a:1754_1: mahāsamudde pūritaudakaṃ samantato ākaḍḍheyya. So puggalo vighātaṃ dukkhameva labheyya pāpuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1755_0: 350. Vattemi jinasāsananti jinena bhāsitaṃ sakalaṃ piṭakattayaṃ vattemi pavattemi
atk-s0510a:1755_1: rakkhāmīti attho. Dhammasenāpatīti dhammena paññāya bhagavato catuparisasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0510a:1755_2: parisāya pati padhānoti dhammasenāpati. Sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane ajja imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1755_3: vattamānakāle cakkavattirañño jeṭṭhaputto viya sakalaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ pālemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1756_0: 352-3. Attano saṃsāraparibbhamaṃ dassento yo koci manujo bhārantiādimāha. Yo koci
atk-s0510a:1756_1: manujo mānuso bhāraṃ sīsabhāraṃ matthake sīse ṭhapetvā dhāreyya vaheyya, sadā sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0510a:1756_2: so manujo tena bhārena dukkhito pīḷito atibhūto assa bhaveyya. Bhāro bharitabhāro
atk-s0510a:1756_3: bharito atīva bhārito. Tathā tena pakārena ahaṃ rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi tīhi
atk-s0510a:1756_4: aggīhi ḍayhamāno, giriṃ uddharito yathā mahāmerupabbataṃ uddharitvā ukkhipitvā sīse
atk-s0510a:1756_5: ṭhapito bhavabhārena bhavasaṃsāruppattibhārena, bharito dukkhito bhavesu saṃsariṃ
atk-s0510a:1757_0: 354. Oropito ca me bhāroti idāni pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya so bhavabhāro mayā oropito
atk-s0510a:1757_1: nikkhitto. Bhavā ugghāṭitā mayāti sabbe nava bhavā mayā viddhaṃsitā. Sakyaputtassa
atk-s0510a:1757_2: bhagavato sāsane yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kattabbaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā kilesaviddhaṃsanakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1757_3: atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ mayā katanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1758_0: 355. Puna attano visesaṃ dassento yāvatā buddhakhettamhītiādimāha. Tattha yāvatā
atk-s0510a:1758_2: bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesasattesu kocipi paññāya me mayā samo natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0510a:1758_3: Tenāha – “ahaṃ aggomhi paññāya, sadiso me na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1759: 356. Puna attano ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento samādhimhītyādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1760_1: “vimokkha”nti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lokuttaravimokkhānañca khippalābhī sīghaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1761_0: 362. Evaṃ mahānubhāvassāpi attano sabrahmacārīsu gāravabahumānataṃ pakāsento uddhatavisovātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1761_1: Tattha uddhataviso uppāṭitaghoraviso sappo iva chinnavisāṇova chinditasiṅgo usabho
atk-s0510a:1761_2: iva ahaṃ idāni nikkhittamānadappova chaḍḍitagottamadādimānadappova gaṇaṃ saṅghassa
atk-s0510a:1762_0: 363. Idāni attano paññāya mahattataṃ pakāsento yadirūpinītiādimāha. Evarūpā me mahatī
atk-s0510a:1762_1: paññā arūpinī samānā yadi rūpinī bhaveyya, tadā me mama paññā vasupatīnaṃ pathavissarānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1762_2: rājūnaṃ sameyya samā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Evaṃ attano paññāya mahattabhāvaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0510a:1762_3: tato pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbe kammaṃ saritvā anomadassissātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1762_4: anomadassissa bhagavato mayā katāya ñāṇathomanāya phalaṃ etaṃ mama paññāmahattanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1763_1: vāhane vattati. “Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke”tiādīsu desanāyaṃ. “Cakkaṃ
atk-s0510a:1763_3: iriyāpathe. “Icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”tiādīsu khuracakke “rājā
atk-s0510a:1763_4: cakkavattī cakkānubhāvena vattanako”tiādīsu ratanacakke. Idha panāyaṃ desanāyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1763_5: Tādinā tādiguṇasamannāgatena sakyaputtena gotamasambuddhena pavattitaṃ desitaṃ piṭakattayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:1763_6: dhammacakkaṃ ahaṃ sammā aviparītena anuvattemi anugantvā vattemi, desemi desanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1763_7: karomi. Idaṃ anuvattanaṃ desitassa anugantvā pacchā desanaṃ purimabuddhānaṃ katāya
atk-s0510a:1764_0: 365. Tato sappurisūpanissayayonisomanasikārādipuññaphalaṃ dassento mā me kadāci pāpicchotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1764_1: Tattha pāpiccho lāmakāya icchāya samannāgato pāpacārī puggalo ca ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0510a:1764_2: vattapaṭivattakaraṇe kusīto ca jhānasamādhimaggabhāvanādīsu hīnavīriyo ca ganthadhuravipassanādhuravirahitattā
atk-s0510a:1764_3: appassuto ca ācariyupajjhāyādīsu ācāravirahitattā anācāro ca puggalo kadāci kāle
atk-s0510a:1764_4: katthaci ṭhāne me mayā saha sameto samāgato mā ahu mā bhavatūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1765_0: 366. Bahussutoti pariyattipaṭivedhavasena duvidho bahussuto ca puggalo. Medhāvīti
atk-s0510a:1765_1: medhāya paññāya samannāgato ca. Sīlesu susamāhitoti catupārisuddhisīlamaggasampayuttasīlaaṭṭhaṅguposathasīlādīsu
atk-s0510a:1765_2: suṭṭhu āhito ṭhapitacitto ca. Cetosamathānuyuttoti cittassa ekībhāvamanuyutto ca
atk-s0510a:1765_3: puggalo. Api muddhani tiṭṭhatu evarūpo puggalo mayhaṃ muddhani sirasi api tiṭṭhatūti attho.
atk-s0510a:1766: 367. Attano laddhaphalānisaṃsaṃ vatvā tatthaññe niyojento taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddantetiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1767_0: 368-9. Yamahanti yaṃ assajittheraṃ ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ ādimhi disvā sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhena
atk-s0510a:1767_1: sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā vimalo malarahito ahuṃ ahosi, so assajitthero
atk-s0510a:1767_2: me mayhaṃ ācariyo lokuttaradhammasikkhāpako ahuṃ. Ahaṃ tassa savanāya anusāsanena
atk-s0510a:1767_3: ajja dhammasenāpati ahuṃ. Sabbattha sabbesu guṇesu pāramiṃ patto pariyosānaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:1768_0: 370. Attano ācariye sagāravaṃ dassento yo me ācariyotiādimāha. Yo assaji nāma thero
atk-s0510a:1768_1: satthu sāvako me mayhaṃ ācariyo āsi ahosi, so thero yassaṃ disāyaṃ yasmiṃ disābhāge
atk-s0510a:1768_2: vasati, ahaṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ ussīsamhi sīsuparibhāge karomīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1769_0: 371. Tato attano ṭhānantarappattabhāvaṃ dassento mama kammantiādimāha. Gotamo bhagavā
atk-s0510a:1769_1: sakyapuṅgavo sakyakulaketu sabbaññutaññāṇena mama pubbe katakammaṃ saritvāna ñatvā
atk-s0510a:1769_2: bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno aggaṭṭhāne aggasāvakaṭṭhāne maṃ ṭhapesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1770_1: imā catasso paṭisambhidā ca, tāsaṃ bhedo paṭisambhidāmagge vuttoyeva. Catumaggacatuphalavasena
atk-s0510a:1770_2: vā rūpārūpajhānavasena vā aṭṭha vimokkhā saṃsāravimuccanadhammā ca iddhividhādayo
atk-s0510a:1770_3: cha abhiññāyo ca sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā. Kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti buddhassa
atk-s0510a:1770_4: anusiṭṭhi ovādasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ kataṃ arahattamaggañāṇena nipphāditanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1771_0: Itthaṃ sudanti ettha itthanti nidassanatthe nipāto, iminā pakārenāti attho. Tena
atk-s0510a:1771_1: sakalasāriputtāpadānaṃ nidasseti. Sudanti padapūraṇe nipāto. Āyasmāti garugāravādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1771_2: Sāriputtoti mātu nāmavasena katanāmadheyyo thero. Imā gāthāyoti imā sakalā sāriputtattherāpadānagāthāyo
atk-s0510a:1771_3: abhāsi kathesi. Itisaddo parisamāpanatthe nipāto, sakalaṃ sāriputtāpadānaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1774_0: Anomadassī bhagavātyādikaṃ āyasmato moggallānattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayañca thero purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:1774_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:1774_2: bhagavato kāletiādi sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatino vatthumhi vuttameva. Thero
atk-s0510a:1774_3: hi pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0510a:1774_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkamante satthārā “moggallāna, mā tuccho tava
atk-s0510a:1774_5: vāyāmo”tiādinā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā bhagavatā vuccamānaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1774_6: suṇanto eva vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā uparimaggattayaṃ adhigantvā aggaphalakkhaṇe sāvakañāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1775_0: 375. Evaṃ dutiyasāvakabhāvaṃ patvā āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1775_1: saritvā somanassavasena pubbacariyaṃ apadānaṃ pakāsento anomadassī bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1775_2: Tattha na omaṃ alāmakaṃ dassanaṃ passanaṃ assāti anomadassī. Tassa hi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitasarīrattā
atk-s0510a:1775_3: sakalaṃ divasaṃ sakalaṃ māsaṃ sakalaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ saṃvaccharasatasahassampi passantānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1775_4: devamanussānaṃ atittikaraṃ dassananti, anomaṃ alāmakaṃ nibbānaṃ dassanasīloti vā
atk-s0510a:1775_5: “anomadassī”ti laddhanāmo bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā. Lokajeṭṭhoti sakalasattalokassa
atk-s0510a:1775_6: jeṭṭho padhāno. Āsabhasadisattā āsabho, narānaṃ āsabho narāsabho. So lokajeṭṭho narāsabho
atk-s0510a:1775_7: anomadassī bhagavā devasaṅghapurakkhato devasamūhehi parivārito. Himavantamhi vihāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1776_0: 376. Yadā dutiyasāvakabhāvāya dutiyavāre patthanaṃ akāsi, tadā nāmena varuṇo nāma
atk-s0510a:1776_1: ahaṃ nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ahosinti attho. Tena vuttaṃ – “varuṇo nāma nāmena, nāgarājā
atk-s0510a:1776_2: ahaṃ tadā”ti. Kāmarūpīti yadicchitakāmanimmānasīlo. Vikubbāmīti vividhaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1776_3: karomi. Mahodadhinivāsahanti mañjerikā nāgā, bhūmigatā nāgā, pabbataṭṭhā nāgā, gaṅgāvaheyyā
atk-s0510a:1776_4: nāgā, sāmuddikā nāgāti imesaṃ nāgānaṃ antare sāmuddikanāgo ahaṃ mahodadhimhi samudde
atk-s0510a:1777_0: 377. Saṅgaṇiyaṃ gaṇaṃ hitvāti niccaparivārabhūtaṃ sakaparivāraṃ nāgasamūhaṃ hitvā
atk-s0510a:1777_1: vinā hutvā. Tūriyaṃ paṭṭhapesahanti ahaṃ tūriyaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ, vajjāpesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1777_2: Sambuddhaṃ parivāretvāti anomadassisambuddhaṃ samantato sevamānā accharā nāgamāṇavikā
atk-s0510a:1777_3: vādesuṃ dibbavādehi gītā vākyādīhi vādesuṃ laddhānurūpato vajjesuṃ tadāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1778_0: 378. Vajjamānesu tūresūti manussanāgatūriyesu pañcaṅgikesu vajjamānesu. Devā tūrāni
atk-s0510a:1778_1: vajjayunti cātumahārājikā devā dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu vādesunti attho. Ubhinnaṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0510a:1778_2: sutvānāti ubhinnaṃ devamanussānaṃ bherisaddaṃ sutvā. Tilokagarusamānopi buddho sampabujjhatha
atk-s0510a:1779_0: 379. Nimantetvāna sambuddhanti sasāvakasaṅghaṃ sambuddhaṃ svātanāya nimantetvā parivāretvā.
atk-s0510a:1779_1: Sakabhavananti attano nāgabhavanaṃ upāgamiṃ. Gantvā ca āsanaṃ paññapetvānāti rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapasayananisīdanaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0510a:1779_2: paññāpetvā sajjetvāti attho. Kālamārocayiṃ ahanti evaṃ katapubbavidhāno ahaṃ “kālo,
atk-s0510a:1779_3: bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta”nti kālaṃ ārocayiṃ viññāpesiṃ.
atk-s0510a:1780: 380. Khīṇāsavasahassehīti tadā so bhagavā arahantasahassehi parivuto lokanāyako sabbā disā obhāsento me bhavanaṃ upāgami sampattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1781: 381. Attano bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojanākāraṃ dassento upaviṭṭhaṃ mahāvīrantiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1782: 386. Okkākakulasambhavoti okkākarañño paramparāgatarājakule uppanno sakalajambudīpe pākaṭarājakule uppanno vā gottena gottavasena gotamo nāma satthā manussaloke bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:1783_0: 388. So pacchā pabbajitvānāti so nāgarājā pacchā pacchimabhave kusalamūlena puññasambhārena
atk-s0510a:1783_1: codito uyyojito sāsane pabbajitvā gotamassa bhagavato dutiyo aggasāvako hessatīti byākaraṇamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:1784_0: 389. Āraddhavīriyoti ṭhānanisajjādīsu iriyāpathesu vīriyavā. Pahitattoti nibbāne
atk-s0510a:1784_1: pesitacitto. Iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatoti “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1784_3: pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato patto. Sabbāsaveti ā samantato savanato pavattanato “āsavā”ti
atk-s0510a:1784_4: laddhanāme kāmabhavadiṭṭhiavijjādhamme sabbe pariññāya samantato aññāya jānitvā pajahitvā
atk-s0510a:1784_5: anāsavo nikkileso. Nibbāyissatīti kilesakhandhaparinibbānena nibbāyissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1785_0: 390. Evaṃ thero attano puññavasena laddhabyākaraṇaṃ vatvā puna pāpacariyaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:1785_1: pāpamittopanissāyātiādimāha. Tattha pāpamitte pāpake lāmake mitte upanissāya nissaye
atk-s0510a:1786_0: Tatrāyamanupubbī kathā – ekasmiṃ samaye titthiyā sannipatitvā mantesuṃ – “jānāthāvuso,
atk-s0510a:1786_1: kena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa lābhasakkāro mahā hutvā nibbatto”ti? “Na jānāma”.
atk-s0510a:1786_2: “Tumhe pana na jānāthā”ti? “Āma, jānāma” – moggallānaṃ nāma ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nissāya
atk-s0510a:1786_3: uppanno. So hi devalokaṃ gantvā devatāhi katakammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_4: kathesi – “idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhantī”ti. Niraye nibbattānampi kammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_5: pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ kathesi – “idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1786_6: Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhiharanti. Sace taṃ māretuṃ sakkhissāma,
atk-s0510a:1786_7: so lābhasakkāro amhākaṃ nibbattissati, attheso upāyoti sabbe ekacchandā hutvā “yaṃkiñci
atk-s0510a:1786_8: katvā taṃ māressāmā”ti attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā purisaghātake
atk-s0510a:1786_9: core pakkosāpetvā “mahāmoggallānatthero nāma samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako kāḷasilāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_10: vasati, tumhe tattha gantvā taṃ mārethā”ti tesaṃ taṃ sahassaṃ adaṃsu. Corā dhanalābhena
atk-s0510a:1786_11: sampaṭicchitvā “theraṃ māressāmā”ti gantvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parivāresuṃ. Thero
atk-s0510a:1786_12: tehi parikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuñcikacchiddena nikkhamitvā pakkāmi. Corā taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_13: theraṃ adisvā punekadivasaṃ tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhipiṃsu. Thero ñatvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_14: bhinditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Evaṃ te paṭhamamāsepi, majjhimamāsepi theraṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_15: nāsakkhiṃsu. Pacchimamāse pana sampatte thero attanā katakammassa ākaḍḍhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1786_16: ñatvā na apagacchi. Corā taṃ paharantā taṇḍulakamattāni aṭṭhīni karontā bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1786_17: Atha naṃ “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1787_0: Thero, “satthāraṃ passitvā vanditvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ jhānaveṭhanena
atk-s0510a:1787_1: veṭhetvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante, parinibbāyissāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:1787_3: “Kāḷasilāpadesaṃ, bhante”ti. “Tena hi, moggallāna, mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā yāhi.
atk-s0510a:1787_4: Tādisassa hi me sāvakassa na dāni dassanaṃ atthī”ti. So “evaṃ karissāmi, bhante”ti
atk-s0510a:1787_5: satthāraṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā sāriputtatthero viya parinibbānadivase nānappakārā
atk-s0510a:1787_6: iddhiyo katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāpadesaṃ gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0510a:1787_7: “Theraṃ kira corā māresu”nti ayaṃ kathā sakalajambudīpe patthari.
atk-s0510a:1788_0: Rājā ajātasattu core pariyesanatthāya carapurise payojesi. Tesu coresu surāpāne suraṃ
atk-s0510a:1788_1: pivantesu maddesu eko ekassa piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi. So taṃ santajjento “ambho
atk-s0510a:1788_2: dubbinīta tvaṃ, kasmā me piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi, kiṃ pana, are duṭṭhacora, tayā
atk-s0510a:1788_3: mahāmoggallānatthero paṭhamaṃ pahato”ti āha. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ mayā paṭhamaṃ pahatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1788_4: na jānāsī”ti? Evaṃ etesaṃ “mayā pahato, mayā pahato”ti vadantānaṃ sutvā te carapurisā
atk-s0510a:1788_5: sabbe te core gahetvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā te core pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “tumhehi
atk-s0510a:1788_6: thero mārito”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Kehi tumhe uyyojitā”ti? “Naggasamaṇehi, devā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1788_7: Rājā pañcasate naggasamaṇe gāhāpetvā pañcasatehi corehi saddhiṃ rājaṅgaṇe nābhipamāṇesu
atk-s0510a:1788_8: āvāṭesu nikhaṇāpetvā palālehi paṭicchādetvā aggiṃ dāpesi. Atha nesaṃ jhāmabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1788_9: jānitvā ayanaṅgalehi kasāpetvā sabbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ kārāpesi. Tadā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1788_10: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “mahāmoggallānatthero attano ananurūpamaraṇaṃ patto”ti. Satthā
atk-s0510a:1788_11: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāma,
atk-s0510a:1788_12: bhante”ti vutte “moggallānassa, bhikkhave, imasseva attabhāvassa ananurūpaṃ maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1788_13: pubbe pana tena katakammassa anurūpamevā”ti vatvā “kiṃ panassa, bhante, pubbakamma”nti
atk-s0510a:1789_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kulaputto sayameva koṭṭanapacanādīni karonto mātāpitaro
atk-s0510a:1789_1: paṭijaggi. Athassa mātāpitaro “tāta, tvaṃ ekakova gehe ca araññe ca kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:1789_2: kilamasi, ekaṃ te kumārikaṃ ānessāmā”ti vatvā “ammatātā, yāva tumhe jīvatha, tāva
atk-s0510a:1789_3: vo sahatthā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti tena paṭikkhittāpi punappunaṃ yācitvā kumārikaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1789_4: Sā katipāhameva te upaṭṭhahitvā pacchā tesaṃ dassanamapi anicchantī – “na sakkā tava
atk-s0510a:1789_5: mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti ujjhāyitvā tasmiṃ attano kathaṃ aggaṇhante
atk-s0510a:1789_6: tassa bahigatakāle makacivākakhaṇḍāni ca yāgupheṇake ca gahetvā tattha tattha ākiritvā
atk-s0510a:1789_7: tenāgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhā “imesaṃ mahallakaandhānaṃ etaṃ kammaṃ, sabbaṃ gehaṃ
atk-s0510a:1789_8: kiliṭṭhā karontā vicaranti, na sakkā etehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti evaṃ tāya
atk-s0510a:1789_9: punappunaṃ kathiyamānāya evarūpopi pūritapāramī satto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhijji.
atk-s0510a:1789_10: So “hotu, jānissāmi nesaṃ kattabbakamma”nti te bhojetvā “ammatātā, asukaṭṭhāne nāma
atk-s0510a:1789_11: tumhākaṃ ñātakā āgamanaṃ paccāsīsanti, tattha gamissāmā”ti te yānakaṃ āropetvā ādāya
atk-s0510a:1789_12: gacchanto aṭavimajjhaṃ pattakāle “tāta, rasmiyo gaṇhatha, goṇā daṇḍasaññāya gamissanti,
atk-s0510a:1789_13: imasmiṃ ṭhāne corā vasanti, ahaṃ otaritvā carāmī”ti pitu hatthe rasmiyo datvā otaritvā
atk-s0510a:1789_14: gacchanto saddaṃ parivattetvā corānaṃ uṭṭhitasaddamakāsi. Mātāpitaro saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:1789_15: “corā uṭṭhitā”ti saññāya “tāta, corā uṭṭhitā, mahallakā mayaṃ, tvaṃ attānameva rakkhāhī”ti
atk-s0510a:1789_16: āhaṃsu. So mātāpitaro viravantepi corasaddaṃ karonto koṭṭetvā māretvā aṭaviyaṃ khipitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0510a:1790_0: Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā “bhikkhave, moggallāno ettakaṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1790_1: anekavassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tāva pakkāvasesena attabhāvasate evameva
atk-s0510a:1790_2: koṭṭetvā saṃcuṇṇo maraṇaṃ patto, evaṃ moggallānena attano kammānurūpameva maraṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1790_3: laddhaṃ. Pañcahi corasatehi saddhiṃ pañcatitthiyasatānipi mama puttaṃ appaduṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1790_4: dussetvā anurūpameva maraṇaṃ labhiṃsu. Appaduṭṭhesu hi padussanto dasahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0510a:1790_5: anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇātiyevā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1794: Garukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe.
atk-s0510a:1796: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ, bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅgunaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1799_0: 393. Pavivekamanuyuttoti pakārena vivekaṃ ekībhāvaṃ anuyutto yojito yuttappayutto.
atk-s0510a:1799_1: Samādhibhāvanāratoti paṭhamajjhānādibhāvanāya rato allīno ca. Sabbāsave sakalakilese,
atk-s0510a:1799_2: pariññāya jānitvā pajahitvā, anāsavo nikkileso viharāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1800: 394. Idāni attano puññasambhāravasena pubbacaritassa phalaṃ dassento dharaṇimpi sugambhīrantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1801_0: Tatrāyamanupubbīkathā – buddhena coditoti sammāsambuddhena codito uyyojito. Bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:1801_1: pekkhatoti mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa passantassa. Migāramātupāsādaṃ, pādaṅguṭṭhena
atk-s0510a:1801_2: kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassatthambhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ
atk-s0510a:1801_3: attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesiṃ. Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme yathāvuttapāsāde bhagavati
atk-s0510a:1801_4: viharante sambahulā navakatarā bhikkhū uparipāsāde nisinnā satthārampi acintetvā
atk-s0510a:1801_5: tiracchānakathaṃ kathetumāraddhā. Taṃ sutvā bhagavā te saṃvejetvā attano dhammadesanāya
atk-s0510a:1801_6: bhājanabhūte kātukāmo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi – “passasi tvaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1801_7: moggallāna, nave bhikkhū tiracchānakathamanuyutte”ti taṃ sutvā thero satthu ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1801_8: ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “pāsādassa
atk-s0510a:1801_9: patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya pāsādamatthake thupikaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena pahari,
atk-s0510a:1801_10: pāsādo onamitvā ekena passena aṭṭhāsi. Punapi pahari, aparenapi passena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1801_11: Te bhikkhū bhītā saṃviggā pāsādassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvā bhagavato samīpe
atk-s0510a:1801_12: aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ desesi. Taṃ sutvā tesu keci sotāpattiphale
atk-s0510a:1801_13: patiṭṭhahiṃsu, keci sakadāgāmiphale, keci anāgāmiphale, keci arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1802_0: Vejayantapāsādanti so vejayantapāsādo tāvatiṃsabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyūhakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0510a:1802_1: devāsurasaṅgāme asure jinitvā sakke devānaminde nagaramajjhe ṭhite uṭṭhito vijayantena
atk-s0510a:1802_3: tampi ayaṃ thero pādaṅguṭṭhena kampeti. Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavantaṃ pubbārāme viharantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1802_4: sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ pucchi. Tassa bhagavā vissajjesi.
atk-s0510a:1802_5: So taṃ sutvā attamano pamudito abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā attano devalokameva
atk-s0510a:1802_6: gato. Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṃ cintesi – “ayaṃ sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1802_7: evarūpaṃ gambhīranibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavatā ca pañho vissajjito,
atk-s0510a:1802_8: kiṃ nu kho jānitvā gato, udāhu ajānitvā. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ devalokaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ jāneyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:1802_9: So tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ tamatthaṃ pucchi. Sakko
atk-s0510a:1802_10: dibbasampattiyā pamatto hutvā vikkhepaṃ akāsi. Thero tassa saṃvegajananatthaṃ vejayantapāsādaṃ
atk-s0510a:1805_0: Ayaṃ panattho – cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbo. Kampitākāro heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0510a:1805_1: “Sakkaṃ so paripucchatī”ti yathāvuttameva therassa taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttipucchaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0510a:1805_2: vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “apāvuso, jānāsi, taṇhakkhayavimuttiyo”ti? Tassa sakko viyākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1805_3: Idaṃ therena pāsādakampane kate saṃviggahadayena pamādaṃ pahāya yoniso manasi karitvā
atk-s0510a:1805_4: pañhassa byākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satthārā desitaniyāmeneva hi so tadā kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1805_5: Tenāha – “pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātatha”nti. Tattha sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti sakkaṃ devarājaṃ
atk-s0510a:1805_6: mahāmoggallānatthero satthārā desitāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyā sammadeva gahitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1805_7: pucchi. Atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. Apāvuso, jānāsīti āvuso, api jānāsi,
atk-s0510a:1805_8: kiṃ jānāsi? Taṇhakkhayavimuttiyoti taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyo satthārā tuyhaṃ desitā,
atk-s0510a:1805_9: tathā “kiṃ jānāsī”ti pucchati. Taṇhakkhayavimuttiyoti vā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttassa desanaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0510a:1806_0: Brahmānanti mahābrahmānaṃ. Sudhammāyābhito sabhanti sudhammāya sabhāya. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0510a:1806_1: brahmaloke sudhammā sabhā, na tāvatiṃsabhavane. Sudhammāsabhāvirahito devaloko nāma
atk-s0510a:1806_2: natthi. “Ajjāpi te, āvuso, sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahū”ti imaṃ brahmalokaṃ upagantuṃ
atk-s0510a:1806_3: samattho natthi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā. Satthu idhāgamanato pubbe yā tuyhaṃ diṭṭhi
atk-s0510a:1806_4: ahosi, kiṃ ajjāpi idānipi sā diṭṭhi na vigatāti? Passasi vītivattantaṃ brahmaloke
atk-s0510a:1806_5: pabhassaranti brahmaloke vītipatantaṃ mahākappinamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi parivāritassa
atk-s0510a:1806_6: tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa sasāvakassa bhagavato okāsaṃ passasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1806_7: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya sabhāya sannipatitvā sannisinnassa
atk-s0510a:1806_8: “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko, so idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti
atk-s0510a:1806_9: cintentassa brahmuno cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmuno matthake ākāse nisinno tejodhātuṃ
atk-s0510a:1806_10: samāpajjitvā obhāsaṃ muñcanto mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi. Saha cintanena
atk-s0510a:1806_11: tepi tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:1806_12: paccekadisāsu nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjesuṃ. Sakalabrahmaloko ekobhāso ahosi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:1806_13: brahmuno kallacittataṃ ñatvā catusaccapakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0510a:1806_14: anekāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya codento ajjāpi te,
atk-s0510a:1806_15: āvuso, sā diṭṭhīti gāthamāha. Ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1807_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena
atk-s0510a:1807_1: kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti
atk-s0510a:1807_2: – ‘natthi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yo idha āgaccheyyā’ti. Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1807_3: cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0510a:1807_4: pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1807_5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0510a:1808_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa etadahosi ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0510a:1808_1: Addasa kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0510a:1808_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0510a:1808_3: nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
atk-s0510a:1808_4: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0510a:1808_5: puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ
atk-s0510a:1809_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0510a:1809_1: Addasa kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0510a:1809_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0510a:1809_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1809_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena
atk-s0510a:1810_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahākappinassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0510a:1810_1: Addasa kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0510a:1810_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0510a:1810_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1810_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena
atk-s0510a:1811_0: “Atha kho āyasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0510a:1811_1: Addasa kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0510a:1811_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0510a:1811_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1811_4: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena
atk-s0510a:1812: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1813: “Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0510a:1815: “Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0510a:1817: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato”ti.
atk-s0510a:1818_0: “Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva
atk-s0510a:1818_1: tasmiṃ brahmaloke antarahito jetavane pāturahosi. Atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:1818_2: āmantesi – ‘ehi tvaṃ, mārisa, yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1818_3: āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ evaṃ vadehi – “atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi
atk-s0510a:1818_4: tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno
atk-s0510a:1818_5: kassapo kappino anuruddho”ti? ‘Evaṃ, mārisā’ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1818_6: paṭissutvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1818_7: etadavoca – ‘atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā
atk-s0510a:1818_8: evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno kassapo kappino anuruddho’ti? Atha kho
atk-s0510a:1818_9: āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1821_0: “Atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā
atk-s0510a:1821_1: yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca – ‘āyasmā mārisa
atk-s0510a:1824: Idamavoca so brahmapārisajjo. Attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
atk-s0510a:1825: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo”ti.
atk-s0510a:1826_0: Mahāneruno kūṭanti kūṭasīsena sakalameva sinerupabbatarājaṃ vadasi. Vimokkhena apassayīti
atk-s0510a:1826_1: jhānavimokkhena nissayena abhiññāyena passayīti adhippāyo. Vananti jambudīpaṃ. So
atk-s0510a:1826_2: hi vanabāhullatāya “vana”nti vutto. Tenāha “jambumaṇḍassa issaro”ti. Pubbavidehānanti
atk-s0510a:1826_3: pubbavidehaṭṭhānañca pubbavidehanti attho. Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā
atk-s0510a:1826_4: nāma aparagoyānauttarakurukā ca manussā. Te hi gehābhāvato “bhūmisayā”ti vuttā. Tepi
atk-s0510a:1826_5: sabbe apassayīti sambandho. Ayaṃ panattho nandopanandadamanena dīpetabbo – ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1826_6: kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “sve, bhante, pañcahi
atk-s0510a:1826_7: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkāmi. Taṃdivasañca
atk-s0510a:1826_8: bhagavato paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokentassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā
atk-s0510a:1826_9: ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchi. Bhagavā “ayaṃ nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0510a:1826_10: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento saraṇagamanassa upanissayaṃ disvā “ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko
atk-s0510a:1826_11: tīsu ratanesu appasanno, ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko vimoceyyā”ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṃ
atk-s0510a:1826_12: addasa. Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi
atk-s0510a:1826_14: Taṃdivasañca nandopanandassa āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsu. So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena
atk-s0510a:1826_15: setacchattena dhāriyamāno tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto dibbabhājanesu
atk-s0510a:1826_16: upaṭṭhāpitaannapānaṃ olokayamāno nisinno hoti. Atha kho bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati,
atk-s0510a:1826_17: tathā katvā tassa vimānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0510a:1827_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ
atk-s0510a:1827_1: hoti “ime hi nāma muṇḍasamaṇakā amhākaṃ uparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1827_2: pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake pādapaṃsuṃ
atk-s0510a:1827_3: okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0510a:1827_4: sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1828_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “pubbe, bhante, imasmiṃ padese
atk-s0510a:1828_1: ṭhito sineruṃ passāmi, sineruparibhaṇḍaṃ passāmi, tāvatiṃsaṃ passāmi, vejayantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1828_2: passāmi, vejayantassa pāsādassa uparidhajaṃ passāmi. Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo,
atk-s0510a:1828_3: yaṃ etarahi neva sineruṃ passāmi…pe… na vejayantassa pāsādassa uparidhajaṃ passāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1828_4: “Ayaṃ, raṭṭhapāla, nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:1828_5: bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhito”ti. “Damemi
atk-s0510a:1828_6: naṃ, bhante”ti. Na bhagavā naṃ anujāni. Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo, āyasmā rāhuloti
atk-s0510a:1828_7: anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu. Bhagavā anujāni.
atk-s0510a:1829_0: Avasāne mahāmoggallānatthero – “ahaṃ, bhante, damemi na”nti āha. “Damehi, moggallānā”ti
atk-s0510a:1829_1: bhagavā anujāni. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā
atk-s0510a:1829_2: nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1829_3: ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi. Nāgarājā dhūmāyi. Theropi “na tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1829_4: sarīre dhūmo atthi, mayhampi atthī”ti dhūmāyi. Nāgarājassa dhūmo theraṃ na bādhati,
atk-s0510a:1829_5: therassa pana dhūmo nāgarājaṃ bādhati. Tato nāgarājā pajjali, theropi “na tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1829_6: sarīre aggi atthi, mayhampi atthī”ti pajjali. Nāgarājassa tejo theraṃ na bādhati,
atk-s0510a:1829_7: therassa pana tejo nāgarājānaṃ bādhati. Nāgarājā – “ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā
atk-s0510a:1829_8: dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cā”ti cintetvā “bho, tuvaṃ kosī”ti paṭipucchi. “Ahaṃ kho,
atk-s0510a:1830_0: Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena
atk-s0510a:1830_1: nikkhami, vāmakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena nikkhami. Tathā dakkhiṇanāsasotena
atk-s0510a:1830_2: pavisitvā vāmanāsasotena nikkhami, vāmanāsasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇanāsasotena nikkhami.
atk-s0510a:1830_3: Tato nāgarājā mukhaṃ vivari, thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena
atk-s0510a:1830_4: ca caṅkamati. Bhagavā – “moggallāna, manasi karohi, mahiddhiko nāgo”ti āha. Thero
atk-s0510a:1830_5: “mayhaṃ kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā
atk-s0510a:1830_6: paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante, nandopanando, ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1831_0: Nāgarājā cintesi – “pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho, nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhantare
atk-s0510a:1831_1: pakkhipitvā khādissāmī”ti cintetvā “nikkhamatha, bhante, mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ
atk-s0510a:1831_2: caṅkamanto bādhayitthā”ti āha. Thero nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Nāgarājā “ayaṃ so”ti
atk-s0510a:1831_3: disvā nāsavātaṃ vissajji, thero catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji, lomakūpampissa vāto cāletuṃ
atk-s0510a:1831_4: nāsakkhi. Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1831_5: imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ na sakkhissantīti
atk-s0510a:1832_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi, mahiddhiko
atk-s0510a:1832_1: so samaṇo”ti cintesi. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ
atk-s0510a:1832_2: dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi. Nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1832_3: abhinimminitvā “bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0510a:1832_4: Thero “satthā, nanda, āgato, ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1832_5: gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. Nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:1832_6: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti āha. Bhagavā “sukhī hohi, nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0510a:1833_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko “kiṃ, bhante, atidivā āgatatthā”ti āha. “Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa
atk-s0510a:1833_1: ca saṅgāmo ahosī”ti. “Kassa pana, bhante, jayo, kassa parājayo”ti? “Moggallānassa
atk-s0510a:1833_2: jayo, nandassa parājayo”ti. Anāthapiṇḍiko “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sattāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1833_3: ekapaṭipāṭiyā bhattaṃ sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1833_4: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “nandopanandadamanena dīpetabbo”ti.
atk-s0510a:1834: Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritasahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍite pāsāde bhagavati viharante…pe… saṃvejesi ca devatāti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1837: Tattha iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatoti vikubbaniddhiādiiddhiyā pariyosānaṃ gato patto.
atk-s0510a:1838_0: 395. Asmimānanti ahamasmi paññāsīlasamādhisampannotiādi asmimānaṃ na passāmi na akkhāmīti
atk-s0510a:1838_1: attho. Tadeva dīpento māno mayhaṃ na vijjatīti āha. Sāmaṇere upādāyāti sāmaṇere ādiṃ
atk-s0510a:1838_2: katvā sakale bhikkhusaṅghe garucittaṃ gāravacittaṃ ādarabahumānaṃ ahaṃ karomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1839_0: 396. Aparimeyye ito kappeti ito amhākaṃ uppannakappato antarakappādīhi aparimeyye
atk-s0510a:1839_1: ekaasaṅkhyeyyassa upari satasahassakappamatthaketi attho. Yaṃ kammamabhinīharinti
atk-s0510a:1839_2: aggasāvakabhāvassa padaṃ puññasampattiṃ pūresiṃ. Tāhaṃ bhūmimanuppattoti ahaṃ taṃ
atk-s0510a:1839_3: sāvakabhūmiṃ anuppatto āsavakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ patto asmi amhīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1840_0: 397. Atthapaṭisambhidādayo catasso paṭisambhidā sotāpattimaggādayo aṭṭha vimokkhā
atk-s0510a:1840_1: iddhividhādayo cha abhiññāyo me mayā sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā. Buddhassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1840_2: ovādānusāsanīsaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ mayā kataṃ sīlapaṭipattinipphādanavasena pariyosāpitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1841_0: Itthanti iminā pakārena heṭṭhā vuttakkamena. Evaṃ so ekasseva anomadassībuddhassa
atk-s0510a:1841_1: santike dvikkhattuṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhi. Kathaṃ? Heṭṭhā vuttanayena seṭṭhi hutvā tassa
atk-s0510a:1841_2: bhagavato santike laddhabyākaraṇo tato cuto sāmuddike nāgabhavane nibbatto tasseva
atk-s0510a:1841_3: bhagavato santike dīghāyukabhāvena upahāraṃ katvā nimantetvā bhojetvā mahāpūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1841_4: Tadāpi bhagavā byākaraṇaṃ kathesi. Sudanti padapūraṇe nipāto. Āyasmāti piyavacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1841_5: garugāravādhivacanaṃ. Mahāmoggallānatthero imā apadānagāthāyo abhāsittha kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1844_0: Padumuttarassa bhagavatotyādikaṃ āyasmato mahākassapattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:1844_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññasambhārāni upacinanto padumuttarabhagavato
atk-s0510a:1844_2: kāle haṃsavatīnagare vedeho nāma asītikoṭivibhavo kuṭumbiko ahosi. So buddhamāmako,
atk-s0510a:1844_3: dhammamāmako, saṅghamāmako, upāsako hutvā viharanto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātova
atk-s0510a:1844_4: subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1845_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0510a:1845_1: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Upāsako
atk-s0510a:1845_2: taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā “sve,
atk-s0510a:1845_3: bhante, mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti nimantesi. “Mahā kho, upāsaka, bhikkhusaṅgho”ti.
atk-s0510a:1845_5: vihāre asesetvā mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1845_6: ñatvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Satthā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0510a:1845_7: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0510a:1845_8: yāguādīni sampaṭicchanto bhattavissaggaṃ akāsi. Upāsakopi satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1846_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji. Upāsako
atk-s0510a:1846_1: disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante, dethā”ti āha. Thero pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1846_2: adāsi. “Bhante, idheva pavisatha, satthāpi gehe nisinno”ti. “Na vaṭṭissati, upāsakā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1846_3: So therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā adāsi. Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto
atk-s0510a:1846_4: satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “mahānisabhatthero, bhante, ‘satthāpi gehe nisinno’ti
