atk-s0510a:1846_5: vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi. Atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atirekaguṇo”ti? Buddhānañca
atk-s0510a:1846_6: vaṇṇamaccheraṃ nāma natthi, tasmā satthā evamāha – “upāsaka, mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ āgamayamānā
atk-s0510a:1846_7: gehe nisīdāma, so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati. Mayaṃ gāmantasenāsane
atk-s0510a:1846_8: vasāma, so araññeyeva vasati. Mayaṃ channe vasāma, so abbhokāseyeva vasatī”ti bhagavā
atk-s0510a:1846_9: “ayañca ayañcetassa guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya tassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1847_0: Upāsakopi pakatiyā jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi
atk-s0510a:1847_1: – “kiṃ mayhaṃ aññāya sampattiyā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1847_2: aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti. So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena
atk-s0510a:1847_3: satta divase mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:1847_4: ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante, satta divase
atk-s0510a:1847_5: dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1847_6: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi, idaṃ pana
atk-s0510a:1847_7: me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1847_8: pāpuṇanatthāya terasadhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggabhāvassa adhikāro hotū”ti. Satthā “mahantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1847_9: ṭhānaṃ iminā patthitaṃ, samijjhissati nu kho, no”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:1847_10: āha – “manāpaṃ te ṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0510a:1847_11: uppajjissati, tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1847_12: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ
atk-s0510a:1847_13: sampattiṃ amaññittha. So yāvatāyukaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādāya rakkhitvā nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassisammāsambuddhe
atk-s0510a:1848_1: bandhumatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_2: parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame saṃvacchare
atk-s0510a:1848_3: dhammaṃ kathesi, mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ ahosi. Sakalajambudīpe devatā “satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_4: kathessatī”ti ārocesuṃ. Brāhmaṇo taṃ sāsanaṃ assosi. Tassa nivāsanasāṭako ekoyeva,
atk-s0510a:1848_5: tathā brāhmaṇiyā. Pārupanaṃ pana dvinnampi ekameva. So sakalanagare “ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇo”ti
atk-s0510a:1848_6: paññāyi. So brāhmaṇo kenacideva kiccena brāhmaṇānaṃ sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe
atk-s0510a:1848_7: ṭhapetvā sayaṃ taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati, brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe
atk-s0510a:1848_8: acchati, brāhmaṇī taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati. Tasmiṃ pana divase so brāhmaṇiṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_9: āha – “bhoti, kiṃ tvaṃ rattiṃ dhammaṃ suṇissasi, udāhu divā”ti? “Sāmi, ahaṃ mātugāmo
atk-s0510a:1848_10: bhīrukajātikā rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkomi, divā sossāmī”ti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:1848_11: taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_12: nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ agamāsi. Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:1849_0: Tasmiñca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:1849_1: ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sineruṃ manthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmanthento viya ca dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0510a:1849_2: kathesi. Brāhmaṇassa parisapariyantena nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmeyeva
atk-s0510a:1849_3: sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji. So pārutavatthaṃ saṅgharitvā “dasabalassa
atk-s0510a:1849_4: dassāmī”ti cintesi. Athassa ādīnavasahassaṃ dassayamānaṃ maccheraṃ uppajji. So “brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0510a:1849_5: tuyhañca ekameva vatthaṃ, aññaṃ kiñci pārupanaṃ nāma natthi, apārupitvā bahi vicarituṃ
atk-s0510a:1849_6: na sakkomī”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa nikkhante paṭhame majjhimayāmeti
atk-s0510a:1849_7: tatheva pīti uppajji. So tatheva cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa majjhime
atk-s0510a:1849_8: yāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji. Tadā so maccheraṃ jinitvā vatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:1849_9: saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi. Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
atk-s0510a:1849_10: apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ nadi.
atk-s0510a:1850_0: Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumā rājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0510a:1850_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti. Rājā purisaṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha, bhaṇe,
atk-s0510a:1850_2: etaṃ puccha – ‘kiṃ so vadatī”’ti? Brāhmaṇo tenāgantvā pucchito “avasesā hatthiyānādīni
atk-s0510a:1850_3: āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti, na taṃ acchariyaṃ. Ahaṃ pana pacchato
atk-s0510a:1850_4: āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ
atk-s0510a:1850_5: jinitvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ, taṃ me jitaṃ maccheraṃ acchariya”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:1850_6: So āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “amhe, bhaṇe, dasabalassa anurūpaṃ na
atk-s0510a:1850_7: jānāma, brāhmaṇo jānātī”ti tassa pasīditvā vatthayugaṃ pesesi. Taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0510a:1850_8: cintesi – “rājā mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa
atk-s0510a:1850_9: adāsi, satthu guṇe paṭicca idaṃ uppannaṃ, satthuyeva anucchavika”nti tampi vatthayugaṃ
atk-s0510a:1850_10: dasabalassa adāsi. Rājā “kiṃ brāhmaṇena kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ
atk-s0510a:1850_11: tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññānipi dve vatthayugāni pesesi, so tānipi satthu
atk-s0510a:1850_12: adāsi. Puna rājā ‘aññānipi cattārī’ti evaṃ vatvā yāva evaṃ dvattiṃsa vatthayugāni
atk-s0510a:1850_13: pesesi. Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya
atk-s0510a:1850_14: ekaṃ, brāhmaṇiyā ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā, tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1850_15: Tato paṭṭhāya ca so satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0510a:1851_0: Atha taṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1851_1: attano pārutaṃ rattakambalaṃ datvā āha – “ito paṭṭhāya imaṃ pārupitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1851_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1851_3: tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1851_4: gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo
atk-s0510a:1851_5: kambale paṭihaññanti, kambalo ativiya virocittha. Rājā ullokento sañjānitvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1851_6: “amhākaṃ, bhante, esa kambalo, amhehi ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇassa dinno”ti. “Tumhehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1851_7: brāhmaṇo pūjito, brāhmaṇena mayaṃ pūjitā”ti. Rājā “brāhmaṇo yuttaṃ aññāsi, na maya”nti
atk-s0510a:1851_8: pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1851_9: nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti
atk-s0510a:1851_10: catusaṭṭhisalākabhattāni upaṭṭhapetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato
atk-s0510a:1852_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe bhagavato koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kassapassa cāti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1852_1: antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyakule nibbatto. So vaḍḍhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1852_2: araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ vicarati. Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1852_3: karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetumāraddho. So taṃ disvā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1852_4: saṅgharitvā ṭhapethā”ti āha. “Anuvāto nappahotī”ti. “Iminā, bhante, karothā”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1852_5: datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāci hāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1853_0: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1853_1: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya – “evarūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:1853_2: bālaṃ yojanasate parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi. Sā gehaṅgaṇe ṭhitā sutvā “imāya
atk-s0510a:1853_3: dinnabhattaṃ esa mā bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā
atk-s0510a:1853_4: adāsi. Itarā disvā “bāle, maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā, evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0510a:1853_5: pūritapāramissa paccekabuddhassa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0510a:1853_6: āha. Athassa bhariyāya paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppajji. Sā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0510a:1853_7: pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā paṇītabhattassa catumadhurassa ca pūretvā
atk-s0510a:1853_8: upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ pattaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe
atk-s0510a:1853_9: ṭhapetvā “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto, evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1853_10: akāsi. Paccekabuddho anumoditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Tepi dve jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:1853_11: ṭhatvā tato cutā sagge nibbattiṃsu. Puna tato cavitvā upāsako kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0510a:1853_12: bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavasampanne kule nibbatti, itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino
atk-s0510a:1853_13: dhītā hutvā nibbatti, tassa vayappattassa tameva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ ānayiṃsu. Tassā pubbe
atk-s0510a:1853_14: aniṭṭhavipākassa pāpakammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārantarato
atk-s0510a:1853_15: paṭṭhāya sakalaṃ gehaṃ ugghāṭitavaccakūpo viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ. Kumāro “kassāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1853_16: gandho”ti pucchitvā “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharatha na”nti tassāyeva kulagharaṃ
atk-s0510a:1853_17: pesesi. Sā teneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivatti.
atk-s0510a:1854_0: Tena samayena kassapadasabalo parinibbāyi. Tassa satasahasagghanikāhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi
atk-s0510a:1854_1: yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ cetiye kariyamāne sā seṭṭhidhītā cintesi
atk-s0510a:1854_2: – “ahaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattā, kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1854_3: suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthiṇṇaṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ. Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0510a:1854_4: gahetvā aṭṭha uppalapupphahatthake ādāya cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā. Tasmiñca khaṇe
atk-s0510a:1854_5: ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0510a:1854_6: vaḍḍhakiṃ āha “imaṃ me iṭṭhakaṃ ettha ṭhapethā”ti. “Amma bhaddake, kāle āgatāsi,
atk-s0510a:1854_7: sayameva ṭhapehī”ti. Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena
atk-s0510a:1854_8: iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalapupphahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā
atk-s0510a:1854_9: “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu, mukhato uppalagandho”ti patthanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1854_10: katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1855_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā, tassa taṃ ārabbha sati
atk-s0510a:1855_1: udapādi. Nagarepi nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ hoti. So upaṭṭhāke āha “idha ānītā seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0510a:1855_2: kuhi”nti? “Kulagehe, sāmī”ti. “Ānetha naṃ, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti. Te gantvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:1855_3: vanditvā ṭhitā. “Kiṃ, tātā, āgatatthā”ti tāya puṭṭhā tassā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1855_4: “Tātā, mayā ābharaṇabhaṇḍehi cetiyaṃ pūjitaṃ, ābharaṇaṃ me natthī”ti. Te gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0510a:1855_5: ārocesuṃ. “Ānetha naṃ, piḷandhanaṃ labhissatī”ti. Te taṃ ānayiṃsu. Tassā saha gehapavesanena
atk-s0510a:1855_6: sakalagehaṃ candanagandho ceva uppalagandho ca vāyi. Seṭṭhiputto taṃ pucchi – “bhadde,
atk-s0510a:1855_7: tava sarīrato paṭhamaṃ duggandho vāyi, idāni pana te sarīrato candanagandho, mukhato
atk-s0510a:1855_8: uppalagandho vāyati, kimeta”nti? Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attanā katakammaṃ ārocesi. Seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0510a:1855_9: “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena
atk-s0510a:1855_10: paṭicchādetvā tattha tattha rathacakkapamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi alaṅkari. Tesaṃ dvādasahatthā olambakā honti.
atk-s0510a:1856_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto sagge nibbattitvā, puna tato cavitvā bārāṇasito
atk-s0510a:1856_1: yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti. Bhariyā panassa devalokato cavitvā
atk-s0510a:1856_2: rājakule jeṭṭharājadhītā hutvā nibbatti. Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1856_3: saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. So mātaraṃ āha – “amma, sāṭakaṃ me dehi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti. Sā
atk-s0510a:1856_4: dhotavatthaṃ nīharitvā adāsi. “Amma, thūlamida”nti āha. Sā aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1856_5: So tampi paṭikkhipi. Atha naṃ mātā āha – “tāta, yādise gehe mayaṃ jātā, natthi no
atk-s0510a:1856_6: ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti. “Tena hi labhanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmi, ammā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1856_7: “Putta, ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagararajjapaṭilābhaṃ icchāmī”ti. So mātaraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0510a:1856_8: “gacchāmi, ammā”ti. “Gaccha, tātā”ti. So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0510a:1856_9: gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji. So ca bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa
atk-s0510a:1857_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu – “rañño ekā dhītāva
atk-s0510a:1857_1: atthi, putto natthi, arājakaṃ rajjaṃ nassissati, ko rājā bhavituṃ arahatī”ti? “Tvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1857_2: hohi, tvaṃ hohī”ti. Purohito āha – “bahuṃ oloketuṃ na vaṭṭati, phussarathaṃ vissajjessāmā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1857_3: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā pañcavidharājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca
atk-s0510a:1857_4: tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ. Ratho pācīnadvārena
atk-s0510a:1857_5: nikkhamitvā uyyānābhimukho agamāsi. “Paricayena uyyānābhimukho gacchati, nivattemā”ti
atk-s0510a:1857_6: keci āhaṃsu. Purohito “mā nivattayitthā”ti āha. Ratho gantvā kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1857_7: katvā āruhanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento
atk-s0510a:1857_8: “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo, dvisahassaparittadīpavāresu catūsu mahādīpesu esa rajjaṃ kāretuṃ
atk-s0510a:1857_9: yutto”ti vatvā “tūriyāni paggaṇhathā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0510a:1858_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā olokento “kena kammena āgatatthā”ti āha. “Deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:1858_1: rajjaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. “Rājā vo kaha”nti? “Devattaṃ gato, sāmī”ti. “Kati divasā atikkantā”ti?
atk-s0510a:1858_2: “Ajja sattamo divaso”ti. “Putto vā dhītā vā natthī”ti? “Dhītā atthi, deva, putto
atk-s0510a:1858_3: natthī”ti. “Tena hi karissāmi rajja”nti. Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1858_4: sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu. Athassa katābhisekassa
atk-s0510a:1858_5: satasahassagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ upanayiṃsu. So “kimidaṃ, tātā”ti āha. “Nivāsanavatthaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1858_6: devā”ti. “Nanu, tātā, thūla”nti? “Manussaparibhogavatthesu ito mudutaraṃ natthi,
atk-s0510a:1858_7: devā”ti. “Tumhākaṃ rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesī”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:1858_8: rājā”ti “suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āharatha, labhissāmi vattha”nti suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1858_9: uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ gahetvā puratthimadisāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1858_10: abbhukkiri. Ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Puna udakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:1858_11: dakkhiṇapacchimauttaradisāyanti evaṃ catūsu disāsu abbhukkiri. Sabbadisāsu aṭṭhaaṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1858_12: katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0510a:1858_13: “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo ‘mā suttaṃ kantiṃsū’ti evaṃ bheriṃ carāpethā”ti
atk-s0510a:1858_14: vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:1859_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā “aho vata tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1859_1: dassesi. “Kimidaṃ, devī”ti puṭṭhā “atimahatī, deva, te sampatti, atīte buddhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1859_2: saddahitvā katakalyāṇassa phalaṃ, idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ puññaṃ na karothā”ti
atk-s0510a:1859_3: āha. Kassa dassāma, sīlavanto natthīti. “Asuñño, deva, jambudīpo arahantehi; tumhe,
atk-s0510a:1859_4: deva, dānaṃ sajjetha, ahaṃ arahante lacchāmī”ti āha. Punadivase rājā pācīnadvāre
atk-s0510a:1859_5: dānaṃ sajjāpesi. Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā
atk-s0510a:1859_6: urena nipajjitvā “sace etissāya disāya arahanto atthi, sve āgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1859_7: gaṇhantū”ti āha. Tassaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto nāhesuṃ, taṃ sakkāraṃ kapaṇayācakānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1860_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre sajjetvā tatheva dakkhiṇeyyaṃ nālattha, punadivasepi pacchimadvāre
atk-s0510a:1860_1: tatheva. Uttaradvāre sajjitadivasena pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1860_2: padumavatiyā puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho
atk-s0510a:1860_3: bhātike āmantesi – “mārisā, nandarājā tumhe nimanteti, adhivāsetha tassā”ti. Te adhivāsetvā
atk-s0510a:1860_4: punadivase anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsenāgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu. Manussā
atk-s0510a:1860_5: disvā gantvā “pañcasatā, deva, paccekabuddhā āgatā”ti rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1860_6: deviyā gantvā vanditvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tatra nesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0510a:1860_7: rājā saṅghattherassa, devī saṅghanavakassa pādamūle nipatitvā “ayyā, bhante, paccayehi
atk-s0510a:1860_8: na kilamissanti, mayañca puññena na parihāyissāmī, amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya
atk-s0510a:1860_9: paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni, pañca caṅkamanasatānīti
atk-s0510a:1861_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccante kupite rājā “ahaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0510a:1861_1: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjā”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato. Tasmiṃ anāgateyeva paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1861_2: āyusaṅkhārā khīṇā. Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamanasamaye
atk-s0510a:1861_3: ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Etenupāyena
atk-s0510a:1861_4: sesāpīti sabbeva parinibbutā. Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānāni sajjetvā
atk-s0510a:1861_5: pupphāni vikiritvā dhūpaṃ vāsetvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokentī nisinnā āgamanaṃ adisvā
atk-s0510a:1861_6: purise pesesi – “gacchatha, tātā, jānātha kiṃ ayyānaṃ aphāsuka”nti? Te gantvā mahāpadumassa
atk-s0510a:1861_7: paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha taṃ apassantā caṅkamanaṃ gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1861_8: nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā “kālo, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. Parinibbutasarīraṃ kiṃ kathessati,
atk-s0510a:1861_9: te “niddāyati maññe”ti vatvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasitvā pādānaṃ sītalatāya ceva
atk-s0510a:1861_10: thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyassa santikaṃ gantvā tatheva ñatvā puna
atk-s0510a:1861_11: tatiyassāti evaṃ sabbepi parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ āgamiṃsu. “Kahaṃ, tātā,
atk-s0510a:1861_12: paccekabuddhā”ti puṭṭhā “parinibbutā, devī”ti āhaṃsu. Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:1861_13: nāgarehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0510a:1862_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0510a:1862_1: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu na pamajjasi, nirogā ca ayyā”ti? “Parinibbutā, devā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0510a:1862_2: sutvā rājā cintesi – “evarūpānampi paṇḍitānaṃ maraṇaṃ uppajjati, amhākaṃ kuto mokkhā”ti?
atk-s0510a:1862_3: So nagaraṃ apavisitvā uyyānameva gantvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ niyyātetvā
atk-s0510a:1862_4: sayaṃ samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Devīpi “raññe pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti tatheva
atk-s0510a:1862_5: uyyāne pabbaji. Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1863_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0510a:1863_1: rājagahaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthari tattha paṭivasante ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0510a:1863_2: kapilabrāhmaṇassa bhariyāya kucchimhi nibbatto. Ayaṃ bhaddakāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare
atk-s0510a:1863_3: kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa bhariyāya kucchimhi nibbattā. Tesaṃ anukkamena vaḍḍhamānānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1863_4: pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime, bhaddāya soḷasame vaye sampatte mātāpitaro puttaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0510a:1863_5: “tāta, tvaṃ vayappatto, kulavaṃsaṃ patiṭṭhapetuṃ yutto”ti ativiya nippīḷiyiṃsu. Māṇavo
atk-s0510a:1863_6: āha – “mayhaṃ sotapathe evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathayittha, ahaṃ yāva tumhe dharatha,
atk-s0510a:1863_7: tāva paṭijaggissāmi, tumhākaṃ accayena nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti. Te katipāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1863_8: atikkamitvā puna kathayiṃsu. Sopi puna paṭikkhipi. Tato paṭṭhāya mātā nirantaraṃ kathetiyeva.
atk-s0510a:1864_0: Māṇavo “mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi
atk-s0510a:1864_1: itthirūpakaṃ kāretvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0510a:1864_2: suvaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi ceva nānālaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā “amma, evarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1864_3: labhanto gehe vasissāmi, alabhanto na vasissāmī”ti. Paṇḍitā brāhmaṇī cintesi – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1864_4: putto puññavā dinnadāno katābhinīhāro pubbe puññāni karonto na ekakova akāsi, addhā
atk-s0510a:1864_5: etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgā bhavissatī”ti. Aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1864_6: sabbabhogehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathe āropetvā “gacchatha, tātā, yattha amhehi
atk-s0510a:1864_7: jātigottabhogādisamānakule evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ passatha, tattha idameva suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1865_0: Te “amhākaṃ nāma etaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā “kattha labhissāma, maddaraṭṭhaṃ nāma
atk-s0510a:1865_1: itthāgāraṃ, maddaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmā”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu. Attha taṃ
atk-s0510a:1865_2: suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ
atk-s0510a:1865_3: nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sayaṃ nhāyituṃ udakatitthaṃ gantvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ disvā “kissāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1865_4: avinītā idhāgantvā ṭhitā”ti piṭṭhipasse paharitvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ ñatvā “ayyadhītā
atk-s0510a:1865_5: meti saññaṃ uppādesi, ayaṃ pana ayyadhītāya nivāsanapaṭiggahitāyapi asadisā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1865_6: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā “evarūpā kira te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. Sā “imāya suvaṇṇapaṭimāya
atk-s0510a:1865_7: sataguṇena sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ ayyadhītā abhirūpatarā”, tathā hi “appadīpepi dvādasahatthe
atk-s0510a:1865_8: gabbhe nisinnā sarīrobhāsena tamaṃ vidhamatī”ti āha. “Tena hi tassā mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1865_9: gacchāmā”ti suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathe āropetvā taṃ dhātiṃ anugantvā kosiyagottassa gharadvāre
atk-s0510a:1866_0: Brāhmaṇo paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. Te “magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāme
atk-s0510a:1866_1: kapilabrāhmaṇassa gharato iminā nāma kāraṇena āgatamhā”ti āhaṃsu. “Sādhu, tātā, amhehi
atk-s0510a:1866_2: samajātigottavibhavo so brāhmaṇo, dassāma dārika”nti paṇṇākāraṃ gaṇhi. Te kapilabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0510a:1866_3: sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu – “laddhā no bhaddā nāma dārikā, kattabbaṃ jānāthā”ti. Taṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1866_4: sutvā pippalimāṇavassa ārocayiṃsu “laddhā dārikā”ti. Pippalimāṇavo “ahaṃ ‘na labhissantī’ti
atk-s0510a:1866_5: cintesiṃ, ime ‘laddhā’ti pesenti, anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesessāmī”ti rahogato paṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1866_6: likhi “bhaddā attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ patiṃ labhatu, ahaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0510a:1866_7: mā pacchā vippaṭisārinī ahosī”ti. Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira maṃ dātukāmā”ti sutvā rahogatā
atk-s0510a:1866_8: paṇṇaṃ likhi – “ayyaputto attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ dārikaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0510a:1866_9: mā pacchā vippaṭisārī bhavāhī”ti. Dvepi paṇṇāni antarāmagge samāgacchiṃsu. “Idaṃ
atk-s0510a:1866_11: pippalimāṇavassa pahita”nti ca vutte te dvepi vācetvā “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti
atk-s0510a:1866_12: phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ taṃsamānaṃ paṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito etto ca pesesuṃ. Iti
atk-s0510a:1866_13: kumārassa kumārikāya ca sadisaṃ paṇṇaṃ lokassādarahitamevāti anicchamānānampi tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:1867_0: Taṃdivasameva pippalimāṇavopi bhaddaṃ ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ gaṇhāpesi. Bhaddāpi tāni sayanamajjhe
atk-s0510a:1867_1: ṭhapesi. Ubhopi bhuttasāyamāsā sayanaṃ āruhituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tesu māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena
atk-s0510a:1867_2: sayanaṃ āruhi, bhaddā vāmapassena abhiruhitvā āha – “yassa passe pupphāni milāyanti,
atk-s0510a:1867_3: tassa rāgacittaṃ uppannanti vijānissāma, imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ na allīyitabba”nti. Te
atk-s0510a:1867_4: pana aññamaññaṃ sarīrasamphassabhayena sakalarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1867_5: Divā pana hasitamattampi nākaṃsu. Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti,
atk-s0510a:1867_6: tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu. Mahatī māṇavassa sampatti.
atk-s0510a:1867_7: Ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇaṃ eva magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1867_8: laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Yantabaddhāni saṭṭhi mahātaḷākāni, kammanto dvādasayojaniko, anurādhapurappamāṇā
atk-s0510a:1867_9: cuddasagāmā, cuddasa hatthānīkāni, cuddasa assānīkāni, cuddasa rathānīkāni.
atk-s0510a:1868_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataassaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1868_1: ṭhito naṅgalehi chinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādādike pāṇake uddharitvā khādante
atk-s0510a:1868_2: disvā “tātā, ime kiṃ khādantī”ti pucchi. “Gaṇḍuppāde, ayyā”ti. “Etehi katapāpaṃ kassa
atk-s0510a:1868_3: hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, ayyā”ti. So cintesi – “sace etehi katapāpaṃ mayhaṃ hoti, kiṃ
atk-s0510a:1868_4: me karissati sattaasītikoṭidhanaṃ, dvādasayojanakammanto kiṃ karissati, kiṃ yantabaddhāni
atk-s0510a:1868_5: taḷākāni, kiṃ cuddasa gāmāni, sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1869_0: Bhaddā kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe antaravatthusmiṃ tayo tilakumbhe pattharitvā dhātīhi
atk-s0510a:1869_1: parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādamāne disvā “ammā, kiṃ ime khādantī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1869_2: “Pāṇake, ayye”ti. “Akusalaṃ kassa hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, ayye”ti. Sā cintesi – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1869_3: catuhatthaṃ vatthaṃ nāḷikodanamattañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, yadi panetaṃ etehi kataṃ
atk-s0510a:1869_4: akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti, bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā, ayyaputte
atk-s0510a:1869_5: āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1870_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi, athassa cakkavattino
atk-s0510a:1870_1: anucchavikabhojanaṃ upanayiṃsu. Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:1870_2: nisīdiṃsu. Tato māṇavo bhaddaṃ āha – “bhadde, imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ dhanamāharasī”ti?
atk-s0510a:1870_3: “Pañcapaṇṇāsa sakaṭasahassāni, ayyā”ti. “Sabbaṃ taṃ, yā ca imasmiṃ ghare sattāsīti
atk-s0510a:1870_4: koṭiyo yantabaddhāni saṭṭhi taḷākānīti evamādibhedā sampatti atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ tuyheva
atk-s0510a:1870_5: niyyātemī”ti. “Tumhe pana kuhiṃ gacchatha, ayyā”ti? “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti. “Ayya,
atk-s0510a:1870_6: ahampi tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisinnā, ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti. Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi
atk-s0510a:1870_7: viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahanti. Te “pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā antarāpaṇato kāsāyarasapītāni
atk-s0510a:1870_8: cīvarāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohāretvā “ye loke arahanto atthi,
atk-s0510a:1870_9: te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti pabbajitvā thavikāsu patte pakkhipitvā aṃse laggetvā
atk-s0510a:1870_10: pāsādato otariṃsu. Gehe dāsesu ca kammakāresu ca na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0510a:1871_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamitvā dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakutavasena dāsagāmavāsino
atk-s0510a:1871_1: sañjāniṃsu. Te rodantā pādesu patitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha, ayyā”ti āhaṃsu. “Mayaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1871_2: bhaṇe, ‘tayo bhavā ādittapaṇṇasālā viyā’ti pabbajimha, sace tumhesu ekekaṃ bhujissaṃ
atk-s0510a:1871_3: karoma, vassasatampi nappahoti. Tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā hutvā jīvathā”ti
atk-s0510a:1872_0: Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento cintesi – “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā
atk-s0510a:1872_1: itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya
atk-s0510a:1872_2: ‘ime pabbajitāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti, ananucchavikaṃ karontī’ti. Evaṃ koci
atk-s0510a:1872_3: pāpakena manasā padūsetvā apāyapūrako bhaveyya, imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0510a:1872_4: cittaṃ uppādetvā purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi. Bhaddāpi
atk-s0510a:1872_5: āgantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “bhadde, tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ
atk-s0510a:1872_6: disvā ‘ime pabbajitāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano
atk-s0510a:1872_7: apāyapūrako bhaveyya. Imasmiṃ dvedhāpathe tvaṃ etaṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ ekena gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1872_8: “Āma, ayya, mātugāmo ‘pabbajitānaṃ palibodho, pabbajitāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:1872_9: dosaṃ dasseyyu”nti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0510a:1872_11: kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjati, tumheva dakkhiṇā nāma, tumhākaṃ dakkhiṇamaggo vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:1872_12: mayaṃ mātugāmā nāma vāmajātikā, amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0510a:1872_13: Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷasinerupabbatādayo dhāretuṃ
atk-s0510a:1872_14: sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ guṇe dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampittha.
atk-s0510a:1872_15: Ākāse asanisaddo viya pavatti, cakkavāḷapabbato unnādi.
atk-s0510a:1873_0: Sammāsambuddhopi veḷuvanamahāvihāre kuṭiyaṃ nisinno pathavīkampanasaddaṃ sutvā “kissa
atk-s0510a:1873_1: nu kho pathavī kampatī”ti āvajjento “pippalimāṇavo ca bhaddā ca kāpilānī maṃ uddissa
atk-s0510a:1873_2: appameyyaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ viyogaṭṭhāne ubhinnaṃ guṇabalena ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1873_3: pathavīkampo jāto, mayāpi etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0510a:1873_4: sayameva pattacīvaramādāya asītimahātheresu kañci anāpucchā tigāvutamaggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1873_5: katvā rājagahassa ca nālandāya ca antare bahuputtanigrodhamūle pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0510a:1873_6: nisīdi. Nisinno pana aññatarapaṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ gahetvā asītihatthā
atk-s0510a:1873_7: buddharaṃsiyo vissajjento nisīdi. Iti tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇacchattasakaṭacakkakūṭāgārādippamāṇā
atk-s0510a:1873_8: buddharaṃsiyo ito cito ca vippharantiyo vidhāvantiyo candasahassasūriyasahassauggamanakālaṃ
atk-s0510a:1873_9: viya kurumānā taṃ vanantaraṃ ekobhāsaṃ akaṃsu. Dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā
atk-s0510a:1873_10: samujjalatārāgaṇena viya gaganaṃ, supupphitakamalakuvalayena viya salilaṃ vanantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1873_11: virocittha. Nigrodharukkhassa khandho pakatiyā seto hoti, pattāni nīlāni pakkāni
atk-s0510a:1873_12: rattāni. Tasmiṃ pana divase sabbo nigrodho suvaṇṇavaṇṇova ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1874_0: Mahākassapatthero taṃ disvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ satthā bhavissati, imaṃ ahaṃ uddissa pabbajito”ti
atk-s0510a:1874_1: diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onato gantvā tīsu ṭhānesu vanditvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0510a:1874_2: sāvakohamasmi, satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0510a:1874_3: āha – “kassapa, sace tvaṃ imaṃ nipaccakāraṃ mahāpathaviyā kareyyāsi, sāpi dhāretuṃ
atk-s0510a:1874_4: na sakkuṇeyya. Tathāgatassa pana evaṃ guṇamahantataṃ jānatā tayā kato nipaccakāro
atk-s0510a:1874_5: mayhaṃ lomampi cāletuṃ na sakkoti. Nisīda, kassapa, dāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti. Athassa
atk-s0510a:1874_6: bhagavā tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ adāsi. Datvā ca bahuputtanigrodhamūlato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:1874_7: theraṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Satthu sarīraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇavicittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1874_9: viya satthu padānupadikaṃ anugañchi. Satthā thokaṃ maggaṃ gantvā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1874_10: rukkhamūle nisajjākāraṃ dassesi. Thero “satthā nisīditukāmo”ti ñatvā attano paṭapilotikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1875_0: Satthā tattha nisīditvā hatthena cīvaraṃ parimajjanto “mudukā kho tyāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:1875_1: paṭapilotikā saṅghāṭī”ti āha. So “satthā me saṅghāṭiyā mudubhāvaṃ kathesi, pārupitukāmo
atk-s0510a:1875_2: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “pārupatu, bhante, bhagavā saṅghāṭi”nti āha. “Kiṃ tvaṃ pārupissasi,
atk-s0510a:1875_3: kassapā”ti? “Tumhākaṃ nivāsanaṃ labhanto pārupissāmi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1875_4: kassapa, imaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ sakkhissasi, mayā hi imassa paṃsukūlassa
atk-s0510a:1875_5: gahitadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi, imaṃ buddhaparibhogajiṇṇacīvaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1875_6: nāma na sakkā parittaguṇena dhāretuṃ, paṭibalenevidaṃ paṭipattipūraṇasamatthena jātipaṃsukūlikena
atk-s0510a:1875_7: dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0510a:1876_0: Evaṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā therassa cīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi, satthu cīvaraṃ thero.
atk-s0510a:1876_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe acetanāpi ayaṃ mahāpathavī “dukkaraṃ, bhante, akattha, attano pārutacīvaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1876_2: sāvakena parivattitapubbaṃ nāma nāhosi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti
atk-s0510a:1876_3: vadantī viya udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampi. Theropi “laddhaṃ me buddhānaṃ paribhogacīvaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:1876_4: kiṃ me idāni uttari kattabba”nti unnatiṃ akatvā satthu santikeyeva terasa dhutaguṇe
atk-s0510a:1876_5: samādāya sattadivasamattaṃ puthujjano ahosi. Aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1876_6: pāpuṇi. Atha naṃ satthā “kassapo, bhikkhave, candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati, apakasseva
atk-s0510a:1876_7: kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādinā pasaṃsitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:1876_8: ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1877_0: 398. Evaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito āyasmā mahākassapo mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:1877_1: attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasenaṃ pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:1877_2: bhagavatotiādimāha. Tattha padumuttarassāti tassa kira bhagavato mātukucchito nikkhamanakālato
atk-s0510a:1877_3: paṭṭhāya pādānaṃ nikkhepanasamaye akkantakkantapāde satasahassapattā padumā pathaviṃ
atk-s0510a:1877_4: bhinditvā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tasmāssa taṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. Sakalasattanikāyesu ekekena satasatapuññe
atk-s0510a:1877_5: kate tassa puññassa sataguṇapuññānaṃ katattā bhagavatoti attho. Lokajeṭṭhassa tādinoti
atk-s0510a:1877_6: sattalokassa padhānabhūtassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyabhāvaṃ pattattā tādino. Nibbute
atk-s0510a:1877_7: lokanāthamhīti sattalokassa paṭisaraṇabhūte bhagavati khandhaparinibbānena parinibbute,
atk-s0510a:1877_8: adassanaṃ gateti attho. Pūjaṃ kubbanti santhunoti sadevakassa lokassa sāsanato “satthā”ti
atk-s0510a:1877_9: laddhanāmassa bhagavato sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷantā pūjaṃ karontīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1878_0: 399. Aggiṃ cinantī janatāti janasamūhā āḷāhanatthāya aggiṃ cinantā rāsiṃ karontā
atk-s0510a:1878_1: āsamantato moditā santuṭṭhā pakārena moditā santuṭṭhā pūjaṃ karontīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1878_2: Tesu saṃvegajātesūti tesu janasamūhesu saṃvegappattesu utrāsaṃ labhantesu me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1879_0: 400. Ñātimitte samānetvāti mama bandhusahāye samānetvā rāsiṃ katvā. Mahāvīro bhagavā
atk-s0510a:1879_1: parinibbuto adassanaṃ agamāsīti idaṃ vacanaṃ abraviṃ kathesinti sambandho. Handa
atk-s0510a:1879_2: pūjaṃ karomaseti handāti vossaggatthe nipāto, tena kāraṇena mayaṃ sabbe samāgatā
atk-s0510a:1880_0: 401. Sādhūti te paṭissutvāti te mama ñātimittā sādhu iti sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ iti paṭisuṇitvā
atk-s0510a:1880_1: mama vacanaṃ sampaṭichitvā me mayhaṃ bhiyyo atirekaṃ hāsaṃ pītiṃ janiṃsu uppādesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1881_0: 402. Tato attano katapuññasañcayaṃ dassento buddhasmiṃ lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Satahatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:1881_1: uggataṃ ubbiddhaṃ diyaḍḍhahatthasataṃ vitthataṃ, vimānaṃ nabhasi ākāse uggataṃ agghiyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1881_2: sukataṃ sundarākārena kataṃ, katvā kāretvā ca puññasañcayaṃ puññarāsiṃ kāhāsiṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1882_0: 403. Katvāna agghiyaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ cetiyapūjanaṭṭhāne tālapantīhi tālapāḷīhi cittitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1882_1: sobhitaṃ agghiyaṃ katvāna kāretvā ca sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādetvā cetiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1882_2: pūjayuttamanti uttamaṃ buddhadhātunidhāpitaṃ cetiyaṃ pūjayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1883_0: 404. Tassa cetiyassa mahimaṃ dassento aggikkhandhovātiādimāha. Tattha aggikkhandhovāti
atk-s0510a:1883_1: ākāse jalamāno aggikkhandhova aggirāsi iva taṃ cetiyaṃ sattahi ratanehi jalati phullito
atk-s0510a:1883_2: vikasitapuppho sālarukkharājā iva ākāse indalaṭṭhīva indadhanu iva ca catuddisā catūsu
atk-s0510a:1884_0: 405. Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvāti tasmiṃ jotamānadhātugabbhamhi cittaṃ manaṃ pasādetvā
atk-s0510a:1884_1: somanassaṃ katvā tena cittappasādena bahuṃ anekappakāraṃ kusalaṃ puññaṃ katvāna “dhātugabbhe
atk-s0510a:1884_2: ca sāsane ca ettakāni puññāni mayā katānī”ti evaṃ puññakammaṃ saritvāna kālaṃkatvā
atk-s0510a:1884_3: tidasaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ suttappabuddho viya ahaṃ upapajjiṃ jātoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1885_0: 406. Attano uppannadevaloke laddhasampattiṃ dassento sahassayuttantiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1885_1: hayavāhiṃ sindhavasahassayojitaṃ dibbarathaṃ adhiṭṭhito. Sattahi bhūmīhi saṃ suṭṭhu
atk-s0510a:1885_2: uggataṃ ubbiddhaṃ uccaṃ mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ vimānaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1886_0: 407. Tasmiṃ vimāne sabbasovaṇṇamayā sakalasovaṇṇamayāni kūṭāgārasahassāni ahuṃ ahesunti
atk-s0510a:1886_1: attho. Sakatejena attano ānubhāvena sabbā dasa disā pabhāsayaṃ obhāsentāni jalanti
atk-s0510a:1887_0: 408. Tasmiṃ mayhaṃ pātubhūtavimāne aññepi niyyūhā pamukhasālāyo santi vijjanti. Kiṃ
atk-s0510a:1887_1: bhūtā? Lohitaṅgamayā rattamaṇimayā tadā tepi niyyūhā catasso disā ābhāya pabhāya
atk-s0510a:1888: 410. Sabbe deve sakalachadevaloke deve abhibhomi abhibhavāmi. Kassa phalanti ce? Mayā katassa puññakammassa idaṃ phalanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1889_0: 411. Tato manussasampattiṃ dassento saṭṭhikappasahassamhītiādimāha. Tattha ito kappato
atk-s0510a:1889_1: heṭṭhā saṭṭhisahassakappamatthake cāturanto catumahādīpavanto vijitāvī sabbaṃ paccatthikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1889_2: vijitavanto ahaṃ ubbiddho nāma cakkavattī rājā hutvā pathaviṃ āvasiṃ rajjaṃ kāresinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1890_0: 412-4. Tatheva bhaddake kappeti pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddake nāma kappe. Tiṃsakkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:1890_1: tiṃsajātiyā catudīpamhi issaro padhāno cakkaratanādīhi sattahi ratanehi sampanno
atk-s0510a:1890_2: samaṅgībhūto sakakammābhiraddho attano kamme dasa rājadhamme abhiraddho allīno cakkavattī
atk-s0510a:1890_3: rājā amhī ahosinti sambandho. Attano cakkavattikāle anubhūtasampattiṃ dassento “tatthāpi
atk-s0510a:1890_4: bhavanaṃ mayha”ntiādimāha. Tattha tasmiṃ cakkavattirajjamhi mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ mama
atk-s0510a:1890_5: pāsādaṃ indalaṭṭhīva uggataṃ ākāse ṭhitavijjotamānā vijjullatā iva uggataṃ sattabhūmikādibhedehi
atk-s0510a:1890_6: uccaṃ āyāmato dīghato ca uccato ca catuvīsatiyojanaṃ vitthārato dvādasayojanaṃ ahosīti
atk-s0510a:1890_7: sambandho. Sabbesaṃ janānaṃ manaṃ allīnabhāvena rammaṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1890_8: Daḷhehi dvādasahatthehi vā tiṃsahatthehi vā uccehi pākāratoraṇehi sampannanti dasseti.
atk-s0510a:1891_0: 415-20. Tadaḍḍhakaṃ tato aḍḍhakaṃ aḍḍhatiyasatayojananti attho. Pakkhittā paṇṇavīsatīti
atk-s0510a:1894_0: Sumedhaṃ bhagavantāhantiādikaṃ āyasmato anuruddhattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:1894_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:1894_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kuṭumbikakule nibbatti. Vayappatto ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_3: gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:1894_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ dānaṃ patthetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1894_5: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uttamāni
atk-s0510a:1894_6: vatthāni datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:1894_7: “anāgate gotamassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1894_8: Sopi tattha puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute sattayojanike kanakathūpe bahukaṃsapātiyo
atk-s0510a:1894_9: dīparukkhehi dīpakapallikāhi ca “dibbacakkhuñāṇassa upanissayo hotū”ti uḷāraṃ dīpapūjaṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_10: akāsi. Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:1894_11: kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite
atk-s0510a:1894_12: yojanike kanakathūpe bahukaṃsapātiyo sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā majjhe ca ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_13: ṭhapetvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpesi. Attanā gahitakaṃsapātiṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_14: sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā sīse ṭhapetvā sabbarattiṃ cetiyaṃ anupariyāyi.
atk-s0510a:1895_0: Evaṃ tasmimpi attabhāve yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:1895_1: ṭhatvā tato cuto anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃyeva duggatakule nibbatti, “annabhāro”tissa
atk-s0510a:1895_2: nāmaṃ ahosi. So sumanaseṭṭhissa nāma gehe kammaṃ karonto jīvati. Ekadivasaṃ so upariṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1895_3: nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhamādanapabbatato ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0510a:1895_4: bārāṇasīnagaradvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:1895_5: pattaṃ gahetvā attano atthāya ṭhapitaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ patte pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0510a:1895_6: dātukāmo ārabhi. Bhariyāpissa attano bhāgabhattañca tattheva pakkhipi. So taṃ netvā
atk-s0510a:1895_7: paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapesi. Paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:1895_8: Taṃ divasaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā – “aho dānaṃ, paramadānaṃ, upariṭṭhe
atk-s0510a:1895_9: suppatiṭṭhita”nti mahāsaddena anumodi. Taṃ sutvā sumanaseṭṭhi – “evaṃ devatāya anumoditaṃ
atk-s0510a:1895_10: idameva uttamadāna”nti cintetvā tattha pattiṃ yāci. Annabhāro pana tassa pattiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1895_11: Tena pasannacitto sumanaseṭṭhi tassa sahassaṃ datvā “ito paṭṭhāya tuyhaṃ sahatthena
atk-s0510a:1895_12: kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi, patirūpaṃ gehaṃ katvā niccaṃ vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1896_0: Yasmā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa paccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto taṃ divasameva
atk-s0510a:1896_1: uḷāravipāko hoti, tasmā sumanaseṭṭhi rañño santikaṃ gacchanto taṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1896_2: Rājā pana taṃ ādaravasena olokesi. Seṭṭhi – “mahārāja, ayaṃ oloketabbayuttoyevā”ti
atk-s0510a:1896_3: vatvā tadā tena katakammaṃ attanāpissa sahassadinnabhāvañca kathesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā
atk-s0510a:1896_4: tassa tussitvā sahassaṃ datvā “asukasmiṃ ṭhāne gehaṃ katvā vasāhī”ti gehaṭṭhānamassa
atk-s0510a:1896_5: āṇāpesi. Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhāpentassa mahantā mahantā nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1896_6: So tā disvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ uddharāpetvā rāsikataṃ disvā – “ettakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1896_7: dhanaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kassa gehe atthī”ti pucchi. “Na kassaci, devā”ti. “Tena hi
atk-s0510a:1896_8: ayaṃ annabhāro imasmiṃ nagare mahādhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū”ti taṃ divasameva tassa seṭṭhichattaṃ ussāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1897_0: So seṭṭhi hutvā yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto, dīgharattaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:1897_1: saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato uppajjanakakāle kapilavatthunagare sukkodanasakkassa
atk-s0510a:1897_2: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa jātassa anuruddhoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So mahānāmasakkassa
atk-s0510a:1897_3: kaniṭṭhabhātā bhagavato cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi. Suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1897_4: cassa bhattaṃ uppajji. Athassa mātā ekadivasaṃ “mama putto natthīti padaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0510a:1897_5: taṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ tucchakaṃyeva aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0510a:1897_6: pidahitvā tassa pesesi, antarāmagge devatā taṃ, dibbapūvehi pūresuṃ. Evaṃ mahāpuñño
atk-s0510a:1897_7: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi parivuto devo viya
atk-s0510a:1898_0: Amhākampi bodhisatto tasmiṃ samaye tusitapurā cavitvā suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā
atk-s0510a:1898_1: kucchimhi nibbattitvā anukkamena vuddhippatto ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasitvā
atk-s0510a:1898_2: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_3: vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_4: gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi. Tadā suddhodanamahārājā – “putto kira me rājagahaṃ anuppatto;
atk-s0510a:1898_5: gacchatha, bhaṇe, mama puttaṃ ānethā”ti sahassasahassaparivāre dasa amacce pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1898_6: Te sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajiṃsu. Tesu udāyittherena cārikāgamanaṃ āyācito
atk-s0510a:1898_7: bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1898_8: ñātisamāgame anekāni pāṭihāriyāni dassetvā pāṭihāriyavicittaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0510a:1898_9: mahājanaṃ amatapānaṃ pāyetvā dutiyadivase pattacīvaramādāya nagaradvāre ṭhatvā “kiṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_10: nu kho kulanagaraṃ āgatānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti āvajjamāno “sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0510a:1898_11: caraṇaṃ āciṇṇa”nti ñatvā sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya carati. Rājā “putto te piṇḍāya caratī”ti
atk-s0510a:1898_12: sutvā turitaturito āgantvā antaravīthiyaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā attano nivesanaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0510a:1898_13: mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā tattha kattabbaṃ ñātisaṅgahaṃ katvā rāhulakumāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_14: pabbājetvā nacirasseva kapilavatthunagarato mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno anupiyambavanaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1899_0: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā sākiyagaṇaṃ sannipātetvā āha – “sace mama putto
atk-s0510a:1899_1: agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, rājā abhavissa cakkavattī sattaratanasampanno khattiyagaṇaparivāro,
atk-s0510a:1899_2: nattāpi me rāhulakumāro khattiyagaṇena saddhiṃ taṃ parivāretvā acarissa, tumhepi
atk-s0510a:1899_3: etamatthaṃ jānātha. Idāni pana mama putto buddho jāto, khattiyāvāssa parivārā hontu,
atk-s0510a:1899_4: tumhe ekekakulato ekekaṃ dārakaṃ dethā”ti. Evaṃ vutte ekappahāreneva dveasītisahassakhattiyakumārā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1900_0: Tasmiṃ samaye mahānāmo sakko kuṭumbasāmiko, so attano kaniṭṭhaṃ anuruddhaṃ sakkaṃ
atk-s0510a:1900_1: upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – “etarahi, tāta anuruddha, abhiññātā abhiññātā sakyakumārā
atk-s0510a:1900_2: bhagavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ anupabbajanti, amhākañca kulā natthi koci agārasmā anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1900_3: pabbajito, tena hi tvaṃ vā pabbajāhi, ahaṃ vā pabbajissāmī”ti. Taṃ sutvā anuruddho
atk-s0510a:1900_4: gharāvāse ruciṃ akatvā attasattamo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito. Tassa pabbajjānukkamo
atk-s0510a:1900_5: saṅghabhedakakkhandhake āgatoyeva. Evaṃ anupiyaṃ gantvā pabbajitesu pana tesu tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0510a:1900_6: antovasse bhaddiyatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, anuruddhatthero dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattesi,
atk-s0510a:1900_7: devadatto aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi, ānandatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, bhagutthero
atk-s0510a:1900_8: ca kimilatthero ca pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ sabbesampi therānaṃ attano attano
atk-s0510a:1900_9: āgataṭṭhānesu pubbapatthanābhinīhāro āvi bhavissati. Ayaṃ anuruddhatthero dhammasenāpatissa
atk-s0510a:1900_10: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:1900_11: satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesi, aṭṭhame kilamati. Satthā “anuruddho aṭṭhame mahāpurisavitakke
atk-s0510a:1900_12: kilamatī”ti ñatvā “tassa saṅkappaṃ pūressāmī”ti tattha gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0510a:1900_14: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā ākāse uppatitvā bhesakalāvanameva gato.
atk-s0510a:1901_0: Thero tathāgate gatamatteyeva tevijjo mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā “satthā mayhaṃ manaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0510a:1901_1: āgantvā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā adāsi, so ca me manoratho matthakaṃ patto”ti
atk-s0510a:1901_2: buddhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ attano ca paṭivedhadhammaṃ ārabbha imā udānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1904: “Yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0510a:1907: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. ;
atk-s0510a:1908: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavane mahāvihāre viharanto “dibbacakkhukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuruddho aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1909_0: 421. Evaṃ so bhagavato santikā dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1909_1: saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sumedhaṃ bhagavantāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1909_2: Tattha sundarā upaṭṭhāpanapaññā maggaphalapaññā vipassanāpaññā catupaṭisambhidādisaṅkhātā
atk-s0510a:1909_3: medhā yassa bhagavato so sumedho, taṃ sumedhaṃ bhāgyasampannattā bhagavantaṃ lokassa
atk-s0510a:1909_4: jeṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ saṃsārato paṭhamaṃ niggataṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ purecārikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1909_5: vūpakaṭṭhaṃ vivekabhūtaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmato apagataṃ viharantaṃ ahaṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1910: 422. Sabbadhammānaṃ sayameva buddhattā sambuddhaṃ, upagantvāna samīpaṃ gantvāti attho. Añjaliṃ paggahetvānāti dasaṅgulipuṭaṃ muddhani katvāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1911: 430. Divā rattiñca passāmīti tadā devaloke ca manussaloke ca uppannakāle maṃsacakkhunā samantato yojanaṃ passāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1912_0: 431. Sahassalokaṃ ñāṇenāti paññācakkhunā sahassacakkavāḷaṃ passāmīti attho. Satthu
atk-s0510a:1912_1: sāsaneti idāni gotamassa bhagavato sāsane. Dīpadānassa dīpapūjāya idaṃ phalaṃ, iminā
atk-s0510a:1912_2: phalena dibbacakkhuṃ anuppatto paṭiladdho uppādesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1915_0: Ajjhāyako mantadharotiādikaṃ āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:1915_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:1915_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0510a:1915_3: nibbattitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto. Aparabhāge padumuttare bhagavati uppajjitvā
atk-s0510a:1915_4: bodhaneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desente heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1915_5: parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1915_6: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:1915_7: desanāvasāne uṭṭhitāya parisāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0510a:1915_8: mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ evamāha – “bhante, ahaṃ iminā adhikārena na aññaṃ
atk-s0510a:1915_9: sampattiṃ patthemi, yathā paneso bhikkhu sattamadivasamatthake tumhehi dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1915_10: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1915_11: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1915_12: disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane
atk-s0510a:1915_13: pabbajitvā tvaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1916_0: So yāvatāyukaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṃ puññasambhāraṃ sambharanto
atk-s0510a:1916_1: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake
atk-s0510a:1916_2: brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1916_3: Tassa puṇṇoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0510a:1916_4: anukkamena rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante aññāsikoṇḍaññassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0510a:1916_5: padhānamanuyuñjanto sabbaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā “dasabalassa santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1916_6: gamissāmī”ti mātulattherena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ āgantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva
atk-s0510a:1916_7: ohiyitvā yoniso manasikāre kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1917_0: Tassa pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ. Thero te
atk-s0510a:1917_1: dasakathāvatthūhi ovadi. Tepi sabbe dasakathāvatthūhi ovaditā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0510a:1917_2: arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1917_3: āhaṃsu – “bhante, mayaṃ pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ pattā, dasannañca kathāvatthūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_4: lābhino, samayo dāni no dasabalaṃ passitu”nti, thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi
atk-s0510a:1917_5: – “mayhaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhitaṃ satthā jānāti. Ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasakathāvatthūni
atk-s0510a:1917_6: amuñcitvāva desemi, mayi ca gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṃ parivāretvā gacchissanti,
atk-s0510a:1917_7: evaṃ me gaṇena saddhiṃ gantvā ayuttaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ, ime tāva dasabalaṃ passituṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_8: gacchantū”ti. Atha te evamāha – “āvuso, tumhe purato gantvā dasabalaṃ passatha, mama
atk-s0510a:1917_9: vacanena tathāgatassa pāde vandatha, ahampi tumhākaṃ gatamaggena āgacchissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1917_10: Tepi therā sabbe dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino
atk-s0510a:1917_11: upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ acchinditvā theraṃ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_12: atikkamma rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_13: nisīdiṃsu. Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_14: paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ “kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0510a:1917_15: madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā puna
atk-s0510a:1917_16: tehi “jātibhūmito”ti vutte “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1917_17: sabrahmacārīnaṃ evaṃ sambhāvito ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”’ti
atk-s0510a:1917_18: dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi. Tepi “puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto”ti ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1918_0: Tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto theraṃ dassanakāmo ahosi. Atha satthā rājagahato
atk-s0510a:1918_1: sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Puṇṇattheropi dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1918_2: passissāmī”ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva tathāgataṃ sampāpuṇi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1918_3: desesi. Thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1918_4: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi. Sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:1918_5: sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1918_6: therena saddhiṃ sammoditvā taṃ visuddhikkamaṃ pucchi. Sopissa pucchitapucchitaṃ byākaronto
atk-s0510a:1918_7: rathavinītūpamāya ativiya cittaṃ ārādhesi. Te aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ samanumodiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1919_0: 434. Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno theraṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1919_1: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1919_2: So pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ vibhāvento ajjhāyakotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1919_3: Tattha ajjhāyakoti anekabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācetā sikkhāpetā. Mantadharoti mantānaṃ dhāretāti
atk-s0510a:1919_4: attho, vedasaṅkhātassa catutthavedassa sajjhāyanasavanadānānaṃ vasena dhāretāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:1919_5: hoti. Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ ñāṇena dhāretabbatā
atk-s0510a:1919_6: “vedo”ti laddhanāmesu tīsu vedaganthesu pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gatoti attho. Purakkhatomhi
atk-s0510a:1919_7: sissehīti mama niccaparivārabhūtehi sissehi parivuto ahaṃ amhi. Upagacchiṃ naruttamanti
atk-s0510a:1919_8: narānaṃ uttamaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ, samīpaṃ gatoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1920_0: 438. Abhidhammanayaññūhanti ahaṃ tadā tassa buddhassa kāle abhidhammanayakovidoti
atk-s0510a:1920_1: attho. Kathāvatthuvisuddhiyāti kathāvatthuppakaraṇe visuddhiyā cheko, appicchasantuṭṭhikathādīsu
atk-s0510a:1920_2: dasasu kathāvatthūsu vā cheko, tāya kathāvatthuvisuddhiyā sabbesaṃ yatijanānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1920_3: viññāpetvāna bodhetvāna anāsavo nikkileso viharāmi vāsaṃ kappemi.
atk-s0510a:1921_0: 439. Ito pañcasate kappeti ito pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitato bhaddakappato pañcasate kappe
atk-s0510a:1921_1: suppakāsakā suṭṭhu pākaṭā cakkaratanādi sattahi ratanehi sampannā jambudīpādicatudīpamhi
atk-s0510a:1921_2: issarā padhānā caturo cattāro cakkavattirājāno ahesunti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0510a:1924_0: Nagare haṃsavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato upālittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:1924_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:1924_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanne brāhmaṇakule nibbatto. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:1924_3: satthu santike dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:1924_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:1925_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe
atk-s0510a:1925_1: nibbatto. Upālītissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1925_2: piyasahāyo hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajjāya nikkhamantehi chahi
atk-s0510a:1925_3: khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
atk-s0510a:1925_4: So pabbajitvā upasampanno hutvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1925_5: araññavāsaṃ anujānāthā”ti āha. “Bhikkhu araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0510a:1925_6: mayhaṃ pana santike vasantassa vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca paripūressatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1925_7: So satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1925_8: pāpuṇi. Satthāpi naṃ sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So aparabhāge bhārukacchavatthuṃ
atk-s0510a:1925_9: ajjukavatthuṃ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchini. Satthā ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1925_10: vinicchaye sādhukāraṃ datvā tayo vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1926_0: 441. Evaṃ so etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassappatto taṃ
atk-s0510a:1926_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare haṃsavatiyātiādimāha. Tattha haṃsavatiyāti haṃsāvaṭṭaākārena
atk-s0510a:1926_2: vati pākāraparikkhepo yasmiṃ nagare, taṃ nagaraṃ haṃsavatī. Atha vā anekasaṅkhā haṃsā
atk-s0510a:1926_3: taḷākapokkharaṇīsarapallalādīsu nivasantā ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vasanti etthāti
atk-s0510a:1926_4: haṃsavatī, tassā haṃsavatiyā. Sujāto nāma brāhmaṇoti suṭṭhu jātoti sujāto, “akkhitto
atk-s0510a:1926_5: anupakuṭṭho”ti vacanato agarahito hutvā jātoti attho. Asītikoṭinicayoti asītikoṭidhanarāsiko
atk-s0510a:1926_6: pahūtadhanadhaññavā asaṅkhyeyyadhanadhaññavā brāhmaṇo sujāto nāma ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1927_0: 442. Punapi tasseva mahantabhāvaṃ dassento ajjhāyakotiādimāha. Tattha ajjhāyakoti
atk-s0510a:1927_1: paresaṃ vedattayādiṃ vācetā. Mantadharoti mantā vuccati paññā, athabbanavedabyākaraṇādijānanapaññavāti
atk-s0510a:1927_2: attho. Tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragūti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1927_4: hatthapādādīsu dissamānalakkhaṇapakāsanakaganthe cāti attho. Itihāseti “itiha āsa
atk-s0510a:1927_5: itiha āsā”ti porāṇakathāppakāsake ganthe. Sadhammeti sakadhamme brāhmaṇadhamme pāramiṃ
atk-s0510a:1927_6: gato pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato pattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1928: 443. Paribbājāti ye nigaṇṭhasāvakā, te sabbe nānādiṭṭhikā tadā mahiyā pathavītale carantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1929: 445. Yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ jino nuppajjati, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ buddhoti vacanaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1930: 446. Accayena ahorattanti aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, bahūnaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ atikkamenāti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1931: 454. Mantāṇiputtoti mantāṇīnāmāya kappakadhītuyā putto, māsapuṇṇatāya divasapuṇṇatāya puṇṇoti laddhanāmoti attho. Tassa satthussa sāvako hessati bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1932_0: 455. Evaṃ kittayi so buddhoti so padumuttaro bhagavā evaṃ iminā pakārena sunandaṃ
atk-s0510a:1932_1: sundarākārena somanassadāyakaṃ kittayi byākaraṇamadāsīti attho. Sabbaṃ janaṃ sakalajanasamūhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1932_2: sādhukaṃ hāsayanto somanassaṃ karonto sakaṃ balaṃ attano balaṃ dassayanto pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:1933_0: 456. Tato anantaraṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ aññāpadesena dassento katañjalītiādimāha. Tadā
atk-s0510a:1933_1: tasmiṃ buddhuppādato purimakāle sunandaṃ tāpasaṃ katañjalipuṭā sabbe janā namassantīti
atk-s0510a:1933_2: sambandho. Buddhe kāraṃ karitvānāti evaṃ so sabbajanapūjitopi samāno “pūjitomhī”ti
atk-s0510a:1933_3: mānaṃ akatvā buddhasāsane adhikaṃ kiccaṃ katvā attano gatiṃ jātiṃ sodhesi parisuddhamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1934_0: 457. Sutvāna munino vacanti tassa sammāsambuddhassa vācaṃ, gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:1934_1: ā-kārassa rassaṃ katvā “vaca”nti vuttaṃ. “Anāgatamhi addhāne gotamo nāma nāmena satthā
atk-s0510a:1934_2: loke bhavissatī”ti imaṃ munino vacanaṃ sutvā yathā yena pakārena gotamaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1934_3: passāmi, tathā tena pakārena kāraṃ adhikakiccaṃ puññasambhāraṃ kassāmi karissāmīti
atk-s0510a:1934_4: me mayhaṃ saṅkappo cetanāmanasikāro ahu ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1935_0: 458. Evāhaṃ cintayitvānāti “ahaṃ kāraṃ karissāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā. Kiriyaṃ cintayiṃ
atk-s0510a:1935_1: mamāti “mayā kīdisaṃ puññaṃ kattabbaṃ nu kho”ti kiriyaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ cintayinti
atk-s0510a:1935_2: attho. Kyāhaṃ kammaṃ ācarāmīti ahaṃ kīdisaṃ puññakammaṃ ācarāmi pūremi nu khoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1935_3: Puññakkhette anuttareti uttaravirahite sakalapuññassa bhājanabhūte ratanattayeti attho.
atk-s0510a:1936_0: 459. Ayañca pāṭhiko bhikkhūti ayaṃ bhikkhu sarabhaññavasena ganthapāṭhapaṭhanato
atk-s0510a:1936_1: vācanato “pāṭhiko”ti laddhanāmo bhikkhu. Buddhasāsane sabbesaṃ pāṭhīnaṃ pāṭhakavācakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1936_2: antare vinaye ca agganikkhitto aggo iti ṭhapito. Taṃ ṭhānaṃ tena bhikkhunā pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1937_0: 460. Tato paraṃ attano puññakaraṇūpāyaṃ dassento idaṃ me amitaṃ bhogantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1937_1: Me mayhaṃ amitaṃ pamāṇavirahitaṃ bhogarāsiṃ akkhobhaṃ khobhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ sāgarūpamaṃ
atk-s0510a:1937_2: sāgarasadisaṃ tena bhogena tādisena dhanena buddhassa ārāmaṃ māpayeti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1938: 474. Bhikkhusaṅghe nisīditvā sambuddho tena suṭṭhu māpitaṃ kāritaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā tassārāmassānisaṃsadīpakaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ abravi kathesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1939_0: 475. Kathaṃ? Yo soti yo saṅghārāmadāyako tāpaso sumāpitaṃ kuṭileṇamaṇḍapapāsādahammiyapākārādinā
atk-s0510a:1939_1: suṭṭhu sajjitaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ buddhassa pādāsi pa-kārena somanassasampayuttacittena
atk-s0510a:1939_2: adāsi. Tamahaṃ kittayissāmīti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmi, uttāniṃ karissāmīti
atk-s0510a:1939_3: attho. Suṇātha mama bhāsatoti bhāsantassa mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇātha, ohitasotā avikkhittacittā
atk-s0510a:1940: 476. Tena dinnārāmassa phalaṃ dassento hatthī assā rathā pattītiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1941: 477. Saṅghārāmassidaṃ phalanti idaṃ āyatiṃ anubhavitabbasampattisaṅkhātaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ saṅghārāmadānassa phalaṃ vipākanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1942_0: 478. Chaḷāsītisahassānīti chasahassāni asītisahassāni samalaṅkatā suṭṭhu alaṅkatā
atk-s0510a:1942_1: sajjitā nāriyo itthiyo vicittavatthābharaṇāti vicittehi anekarūpehi vatthehi ābharaṇehi
atk-s0510a:1943_0: 479. Tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ rūpasobhātisayaṃ vaṇṇento āḷārapamhātiādimāha. Tattha āḷārāni
atk-s0510a:1943_1: mahantāni akkhīni maṇiguḷasadisāni yāsaṃ itthīnaṃ tā āḷārapamhā bhamarānamiva mandalocanāti
atk-s0510a:1943_2: attho. Hasulā hāsapakati, līlāvilāsāti attho. Susaññāti sundarasaññitabbasarīrāvayavā.
atk-s0510a:1944_0: 484. Tassa dhammesu dāyādoti tassa gotamassa bhagavato dhammesu dāyādo dhammakoṭṭhāsabhāgī.
atk-s0510a:1944_2: ghaṭṭetvā desitadhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattimaggādimaggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā
atk-s0510a:1944_3: arahatte ṭhitabhāvena urasi jātaputtoti attho. Dhammanimmitoti dhammena samena adaṇḍena
atk-s0510a:1944_4: asatthena nimmito pākaṭo bhavissasīti attho. Upāli nāma nāmenāti kiñcāpi so mātu
atk-s0510a:1944_5: nāmena mantāṇiputtanāmo, anuruddhādīhi pana saha gantvā pabbajitattā khattiyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1944_6: upasamīpe allīno yutto kāyacittehi samaṅgībhūtoti upālīti nāmena satthu sāvako hessati bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1945_0: 485. Vinaye pāramiṃ patvāti vinayapiṭake koṭiṃ pariyosānaṃ patvā pāpuṇitvā. Ṭhānāṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:1945_1: ca kovidoti kāraṇākāraṇe ca dakkho chekoti attho. Jinasāsanaṃ dhārentoti jinena vuttānusāsaniṃ
atk-s0510a:1945_3: attho. Viharissatināsavoti nikkileso catūhi iriyāpathehi aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1946_0: 487. Aparimeyyupādāyāti anekasatasahasse ādiṃ katvā. Patthemi tava sāsananti “gotamassa
atk-s0510a:1946_1: bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti tuyhaṃ sāsanaṃ patthemi icchāmīti
atk-s0510a:1946_2: attho. So me atthoti so etadaggaṭṭhānantarasaṅkhāto attho me mayā anuppattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1946_3: Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayoti sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayo mayā anuppattoti sambandho, nibbānaṃ adhigatanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1947: 488. Rājadaṇḍena tajjito pīḷito sūlāvuto sūle āvuto āvuṇito poso puriso sūle sātaṃ madhurasukhaṃ avindanto nānubhavanto parimuttiṃva parimocanameva icchati yathāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1948_0: 489-90. Mahāvīra vīrānamantare vīruttama ahaṃ bhavadaṇḍena jātidaṇḍena, tajjito pīḷito
atk-s0510a:1948_1: kammasūlāvuto kusalākusalakammasūlasmiṃ āvuto santo saṃvijjamāno, pipāsāvedanāya
atk-s0510a:1948_2: pipāsāturabhāvena aṭṭito abhibhūto dukkhāpito bhave sātaṃ saṃsāre madhuraṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1948_4: vā tīhi aggīhi ḍayhanto parimuttiṃ parimuccanupāyaṃ gavesāmi pariyesāmi tathevāti
atk-s0510a:1948_5: sambandho. Yathā rājadaṇḍaṃ ito gato patto parimuttiṃ gavesati, tathā ahaṃ bhavadaṇḍappatto
atk-s0510a:1949_0: 491-2. Puna saṃsārato mocanaṃ upamopameyyavasena dassento yathā visādotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1949_1: Tattha visena sappavisena ā samantato daṃsīyittha daṭṭho hotīti visādo, sappadaṭṭhoti
atk-s0510a:1949_2: attho. Atha vā visaṃ halāhalavisaṃ adati gilatīti visādo, visakhādakoti attho. Yo
atk-s0510a:1949_3: puriso visādo, tena tādisena visena paripīḷito, tassa visassa vighātāya vināsāya
atk-s0510a:1949_4: upāyanaṃ upāyabhūtaṃ agadaṃ osadhaṃ gaveseyya pariyeseyya, taṃ gavesamāno visaghātakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1949_5: visanāsakaṃ agadaṃ osadhaṃ passeyya dakkheyya. So taṃ attano diṭṭhaṃ osadhaṃ pivitvā
atk-s0510a:1949_6: visamhā visato parimuttiyā parimocanakāraṇā sukhī assa bhaveyya yathāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1950_0: 493. Tathevāhanti yathā yena pakārena so naro visahato, savisena sappena daṭṭho visakhādako
atk-s0510a:1950_1: vā osadhaṃ pivitvā sukhī bhaveyya, tatheva tena pakārena ahaṃ avijjāya mohena saṃ
atk-s0510a:1950_2: suṭṭhu pīḷito. Saddhammāgadamesahanti ahaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ osadhaṃ esaṃ pariyesantoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1951_0: 494-5. Dhammāgadaṃ gavesantoti saṃsāradukkhavisassa vināsāya dhammosadhaṃ gavesanto.
atk-s0510a:1951_1: Addakkhiṃ sakyasāsananti sakyavaṃsapabhavassa gotamassa sāsanaṃ saddakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1951_2: Aggaṃ sabbosadhānaṃ tanti sabbesaṃ osadhānaṃ antare taṃ sakyasāsanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammosadhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1951_3: aggaṃ uttamanti attho. Sabbasallavinodananti rāgasallādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ sallānaṃ vinodanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1951_4: vūpasamakaraṃ dhammosadhaṃ dhammasaṅkhātaṃ osadhaṃ pivitvā sabbaṃ visaṃ sakalasaṃsāradukkhavisaṃ
atk-s0510a:1951_5: samūhaniṃ nāsesinti sambandho. Ajarāmaranti taṃ dukkhavisaṃ samūhanitvā ajaraṃ jarāvirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1951_6: amaraṃ maraṇavirahitaṃ sītibhāvaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivirahitattā sītalabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1952_0: 496. Puna kilesatamassa upamaṃ dassento yathā bhūtaṭṭitotiādimāha. Tattha yathā yena
atk-s0510a:1952_1: pakārena bhūtaṭṭito bhūtena yakkhena aṭṭito pīḷito poso puriso bhūtaggāhena yakkhaggāhena
atk-s0510a:1952_2: pīḷito dukkhito bhūtasmā yakkhaggāhato parimuttiyā mocanatthāya bhūtavejjaṃ gaveseyya.
atk-s0510a:1953_0: 497. Taṃ gavesamāno ca bhūtavijjāya suṭṭhu kovidaṃ chekaṃ bhūtavejjaṃ passeyya, so
atk-s0510a:1953_1: bhūtavejjo tassa yakkhaggahitassa purisassa āvesabhūtaṃ vihane vināseyya, samūlañca
atk-s0510a:1953_2: mūlena saha āyatiṃ anāsevakaṃ katvā vināsaye viddhaṃseyyāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1954_0: 498. Mahāvīra vīruttama tamaggāhena kilesandhakāraggāhena pīḷito ahaṃ tatheva tena
atk-s0510a:1954_1: pakāreneva tamato kilesandhakārato parimuttiyā mocanatthāya ñāṇālokaṃ paññāālokaṃ
atk-s0510a:1955_0: 499. Atha tadanantaraṃ kilesatamasodhanaṃ kilesandhakāranāsakaṃ sakyamuniṃ addasanti
atk-s0510a:1955_1: attho. So sakyamuni me mayhaṃ tamaṃ andhakāraṃ kilesatimiraṃ bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1955_2: yakkhaggahitaṃ iva vinodesi dūrī akāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1956_0: 500. So ahaṃ evaṃ vimutto saṃsārasotaṃ saṃsārapavāhaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu chindiṃ chedesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1956_1: taṇhāsotaṃ taṇhāmahoghaṃ nivārayiṃ niravasesaṃ appavattiṃ akāsinti attho. Bhavaṃ
atk-s0510a:1956_2: ugghāṭayiṃ sabbanti kāmabhavādikaṃ sabbaṃ navabhavaṃ ugghāṭayiṃ vināsesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1956_3: Mūlato vināsento bhūtavejjo iva mūlato ugghāṭayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1957_0: 501. Tato nibbānapariyesanāya upamaṃ dassento yathātiādimāha. Tattha garuṃ bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1957_1: nāgaṃ gilatīti garuḷo. Garuṃ vā nāgaṃ lāti ādadātīti garuḷo, garuḷarājā. Attano bhakkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1957_2: sakagocaraṃ pannagaṃ pakārena parahatthaṃ na gacchatīti pannagoti laddhanāmaṃ nāgaṃ
atk-s0510a:1957_3: gahaṇatthāya opatati avapatati, samantā samantato yojanasataṃ satayojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1957_4: mahāsaraṃ mahāsamuddaṃ attano pakkhavātehi vikkhobheti āloḷeti yathāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1958_0: 502. So supaṇṇo vihaṅgamo vehāsagamanasīlo pannagaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā adhosīsaṃ olambetvā
atk-s0510a:1958_1: viheṭhayaṃ tattha tattha vividhena heṭhanena heṭhento ādāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā yena kāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:1958_2: yattha gantukāmo, tattha pakkamati gacchatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1959_0: 503. Bhante mahāvīra, yathā garuḷo balī balavā pannagaṃ gahetvā pakkamati, tathā
atk-s0510a:1959_1: eva ahaṃ asaṅkhataṃ paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ gavesanto paṭipattipūraṇavasena pariyesanto
atk-s0510a:1959_2: dose sakaladiyaḍḍhakilesasahasse vikkhālayiṃ visesena samucchedappahānena sodhesiṃ ahanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1960_0: 504. Yathā garuḷo pannagaṃ gahetvā bhuñjitvā viharati, tathā ahaṃ dhammavaraṃ uttamadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1960_1: diṭṭho passanto etaṃ santipadaṃ nibbānapadaṃ anuttaraṃ uttaravirahitaṃ maggaphalehi
atk-s0510a:1961_0: 505. Idāni nibbānassa dullabhabhāvaṃ dassento āsāvatī nāma latātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1961_1: sabbesaṃ devānaṃ āsā icchā etissaṃ latāyaṃ atthīti āsāvatī nāma latā, cittalatāvane
atk-s0510a:1961_2: anekavicittāhi latāhi gahanībhūte vane uyyāne jātā nibbattāti attho. Tassā latāya
atk-s0510a:1961_3: vassasahassena vassasahassaccayena ekaṃ phalaṃ nibbattate ekaṃ phalaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0510a:1962_0: 506. Taṃ devāti taṃ āsāvatiṃ lataṃ tāva dūraphalaṃ tattakaṃ cirakālaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1962_1: phalaṃ gaṇhantaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ devā tāvatiṃsadevatā payirupāsanti bhajanti, sā āsāvatī
atk-s0510a:1962_2: nāma latuttamā latānaṃ antare uttamalatā evaṃ devānaṃ piyā ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1963_0: 507. Satasahassupādāyāti satasahassasaṃvaccharaṃ ādiṃ katvā. Tāhaṃ paricare munīti
atk-s0510a:1963_1: monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, bhante, muni ñāṇavanta sabbaññu, ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ paricare
atk-s0510a:1963_2: payirupāsāmi. Sāyaṃpātaṃ namassāmīti sāyanhasamayañca pubbaṇhasamayañcāti dvikkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:1963_3: namassāmi paṇāmaṃ karomi. Yathā devā tāvatiṃsā devā viya āsāvatīlataṃ sāyaṃpātañca
atk-s0510a:1964_0: 508. Avañjhā pāricariyāti yasmā buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatti ahosi, tasmā buddhapāricariyā
atk-s0510a:1964_1: vattapaṭipattikiriyā avañjhā atucchā namassanā paṇāmakiriyā ca amoghā atucchā. Tathā
atk-s0510a:1964_2: hi dūrāgataṃ dūrato saṃsāraddhānato āgatampi, santaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ khaṇoyaṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1964_3: buddhuppādakkhaṇo na virādhayi nātikkami, maṃ atikkamitvā na gatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1965_0: 509. Buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatto ahaṃ āyatiṃ uppajjanakabhave mama paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1965_1: vicinanto upaparikkhanto na passāmīti sambandho. Nirūpadhi khandhūpadhikilesūpadhīhi
atk-s0510a:1965_2: virahito vippamutto sabbakilesehi vinābhūto upasanto kilesapariḷāhābhāvena santamānaso
atk-s0510a:1966_0: 510. Puna attano buddhadassanāya upamaṃ dassento yathāpi padumaṃ nāmātiādimāha. Sūriyaraṃsena
atk-s0510a:1966_1: sūriyaraṃsisamphassena yathā padumaṃ nāma api pupphati vikasati mahāvīra vīruttama
atk-s0510a:1966_2: ahaṃ tathā eva buddharaṃsena buddhena bhagavatā desitadhammaraṃsippabhāvena pupphitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1967_0: 511-12. Puna buddhadassanena nibbānadassanaṃ dīpento yathā balākātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1967_1: balākayonimhi balākajātiyaṃ sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle pumā puriso yathā na vijjati. Pume
atk-s0510a:1967_2: avijjamāne kathaṃ balākānaṃ gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti ce? Meghesu gajjamānesu saddaṃ
atk-s0510a:1967_3: karontesu meghagajjanaṃ sutvā tā balākiniyo sadā sabbakāle gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti aṇḍaṃ
atk-s0510a:1967_4: dhārentīti attho. Yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ megho na gajjati megho saddaṃ na karoti, tāva
atk-s0510a:1967_5: tattakaṃ kālaṃ ciraṃ cirakālena gabbhaṃ aṇḍaṃ dhārenti. Yadā yasmiṃ kāle megho pavassati
atk-s0510a:1967_6: pakārena gajjitvā vassati vuṭṭhidhāraṃ paggharati, tadā tasmiṃ kāle bhārato gabbhadhāraṇato
atk-s0510a:1968_0: 513. Tato paraṃ upameyyasampadaṃ dassento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha. Padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:1968_2: desentassa dhammameghassa saddena ghosānusārena ahaṃ tadā dhammagabbhaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1969_0: 514. Satasahassupādāya kappasatasahassaṃ ādiṃ katvā puññagabbhaṃ dānasīlādipuññasambhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1969_1: ahaṃ dharemi pūremi. Yāva dhammamegho dhammadesanā na gajjati buddhena na desīyati,
atk-s0510a:1969_2: tāva ahaṃ bhārato saṃsāragabbhabhārato nappamuccāmi na mocemi na visuṃ bhavāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1970_0: 515. Bhante, sakyamuni sakyavaṃsappabhava yadā yasmiṃ kāle suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0510a:1970_1: tava pitu ramme ramaṇīye kapilavatthave kapilavatthunāmake nagare tuvaṃ dhammameghena
atk-s0510a:1970_2: gajjati ghoseti, tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ bhārato saṃsāragabbhabhārato parimucciṃ mutto ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1971_0: 516. Tato paraṃ attanā adhigate maggaphale dassento suññatantiādimāha. Tattha attaattaniyādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1971_1: abhāvato suññataṃ vimokkhañca rāgadosamohasabbakilesanimittānaṃ abhāvato, animittaṃ
atk-s0510a:1971_2: vimokkhañca taṇhāpaṇidhissa abhāvato, appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhañca ariyamaggaṃ adhigañchiṃ
atk-s0510a:1971_3: bhāvesinti sambandho. Caturo ca phale sabbeti cattāri sāmaññaphalāni sabbāni sacchi
atk-s0510a:1971_4: akāsinti attho. Dhammevaṃ vijaṭayiṃ ahanti ahaṃ evaṃ sabbadhamme jaṭaṃ gahanaṃ vijaṭayiṃ
atk-s0510a:1973_0: 517. Tato paraṃ attanā adhigatavisesameva dassento aparimeyyupādāyātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1973_1: na parimeyyoti aparimeyyo, saṃvaccharagaṇanavasena pametuṃ saṅkhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti
atk-s0510a:1973_2: attho. Taṃ aparimeyyaṃ kappaṃ upādāya ādiṃ katvā tava sāsanaṃ tuyhaṃ sāsanaṃ “anāgate
atk-s0510a:1973_3: gotamassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti evaṃ patthemi. Atītatthe
atk-s0510a:1973_4: vattamānavacanaṃ, patthesinti attho. So me atthoti so patthanāsaṅkhāto attho me mayā
atk-s0510a:1973_5: anuppatto nipphāditoti attho. Anuttaraṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ anuppattaṃ adhigatanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1974_0: 518. So ahaṃ adhigatattā vinaye vinayapiṭake pāramiṃ patto pariyosānappatto. Yathāpi
atk-s0510a:1974_1: pāṭhiko isīti yathā padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo isi bhikkhu
atk-s0510a:1974_2: pāṭhiko pākaṭo ahosi, tathevāhanti attho. Na me samasamo atthīti vinayadhāritāya
atk-s0510a:1974_3: me mayā samasamo samāno añño na atthīti attho. Sāsanaṃ ovādānusāsanīsaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1975_0: 519. Punapi attano visesaṃ dassento vinaye khandhake cāpītiādimāha. Tattha vinayeti
atk-s0510a:1975_1: ubhatovibhaṅge. Khandhaketi mahāvaggacūḷavagge. Tikacchede cāti tikasaṅghādisesatikapācittiyādike
atk-s0510a:1975_2: ca. Pañcameti parivāre ca. Ettha etasmiṃ sakale vinayapiṭake mayhaṃ vimati dveḷhakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1975_3: natthi na saṃvijjati. Akkhareti vinayapiṭakapariyāpanne a-kārādike akkhare. Byañjaneti
atk-s0510a:1975_4: ka-kārādike byañjane vā me vimati saṃsayo natthīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1976_0: 520. Niggahe paṭikamme cāti pāpabhikkhūnaṃ niggahe ca sāpattikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parivāsadānādike
atk-s0510a:1976_1: paṭikamme ca ṭhānāṭṭhāne ca kāraṇe ca akāraṇe ca kovido chekoti attho. Osāraṇe ca
atk-s0510a:1976_2: tajjanīyādikammassa paṭippassaddhivasena osāraṇe pavesane ca. Vuṭṭhāpane ca āpattito
atk-s0510a:1976_3: vuṭṭhāpane nirāpattikaraṇe ca chekoti sambandho. Sabbattha pāramiṃ gatoti sabbasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:1976_4: vinayakamme pariyosānaṃ patto, dakkho chekoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1977_0: 521. Vinaye khandhake cāpīti vuttappakāre vinaye ca khandhake ca, padaṃ suttapadaṃ
atk-s0510a:1977_1: nikkhipitvā paṭṭhapetvā. Ubhato viniveṭhetvāti vinayato khandhakato cāti ubhayato
atk-s0510a:1977_2: nibbattetvā vijaṭetvā nayaṃ āharitvā. Rasatoti kiccato. Osareyyaṃ osāraṇaṃ karomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1978_0: 522. Niruttiyā ca kusaloti “rukkho paṭo kumbho mālā citta”ntiādīsu vohāresu cheko.
atk-s0510a:1978_1: Atthānatthe ca kovidoti atthe vaḍḍhiyaṃ anatthe hāniyañca kovido dakkhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1978_2: Anaññātaṃ mayā natthīti vinayapiṭake sakale vā piṭakattaye mayā anaññātaṃ aviditaṃ
atk-s0510a:1978_3: apākaṭaṃ kiñci natthīti attho. Ekaggo satthu sāsaneti buddhasāsane ahameva eko vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1979_0: 523. Rūpadakkhe ahaṃ ajjāti ajja etarahi kāle sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane pāvacane
atk-s0510a:1979_1: ahaṃ rūpadakkhe rūpadassane vinayavinicchayadassane sabbaṃ kaṅkhaṃ sakalaṃ saṃsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1979_2: vinodemi vināsemīti sambandho. Chindāmi sabbasaṃsayanti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1979_3: kālattayaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ sabbaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindāmi vūpasamemi sabbaso
atk-s0510a:1980_0: 524. Padaṃ anupadañcāpīti padaṃ pubbapadañca anupadaṃ parapadañca akkharaṃ ekekamakkharañca
atk-s0510a:1980_1: byañjanaṃ sithiladhanitādidasavidhaṃ byañjanavidhānañca. Nidāneti tena samayenātiādike
atk-s0510a:1980_2: nidāne ca. Pariyosāneti nigamane. Sabbattha kovidoti sabbesu chasu ṭhānesu chekoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1981_0: 525. Tato paraṃ bhagavatoyeva guṇe pakāsento yathāpi rājā balavātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:1981_1: yathā balavā thāmabalasampanno senābalasampanno vā rājā, paraṃ paresaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1981_2: senaṃ niggaṇhitvā nissesato gahetvā palāpetvā vā, tape tapeyya santapeyya dukkhāpeyya.
atk-s0510a:1981_3: Vijinitvāna saṅgāmanti saṅgāmaṃ parasenāya samāgamaṃ yuddhaṃ vijinitvā visesena jinitvā
atk-s0510a:1981_4: jayaṃ patvā. Nagaraṃ tattha māpayeti tattha tasmiṃ vijitaṭṭhāne nagaraṃ pāsādahammiyādivibhūsitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1982_0: 526. Pākāraṃ parikhañcāpīti tattha māpitanagare pākāraṃ sudhādhavalaiṭṭhakāmayapākārañca
atk-s0510a:1982_1: kārayeti sambandho. Parikhañcāpi kaddamaparikhaṃ, udakaparikhaṃ, sukkhaparikhañca
atk-s0510a:1982_2: api kāraye. Esikaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakanti nagarasobhanatthaṃ ussāpitaesikāthambhañca mahantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1982_3: koṭṭhakañca catubhūmakādidvārakoṭṭhakañca kāraye. Aṭṭālake ca vividheti catubhūmakādibhede
atk-s0510a:1982_4: atiuccaaṭṭālake ca vividhe nānappakārake bahū kāraye kārāpeyyāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1983_0: 527. Siṅghāṭakaṃ caccarañcāti na kevalaṃ pākārādayo kāraye, siṅghāṭakaṃ catumaggasandhiñca
atk-s0510a:1983_1: caccaraṃ antarāvīthiñca kārayeti sambandho. Suvibhattantarāpaṇanti suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1983_2: vibhāgato koṭṭhāsavantaṃ antarāpaṇaṃ anekāpaṇasahassaṃ kārāpeyyāti attho. Kārayeyya
atk-s0510a:1983_3: sabhaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ māpitanagare sabhaṃ dhammādhikaraṇasālaṃ kāraye. Atthānatthavinicchayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1983_4: vaḍḍhiñca avaḍḍhiñca vinicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vinicchayasālaṃ kārayeti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1984_0: 528. Nigghātatthaṃ amittānanti paṭirājūnaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ. Chiddāchiddañca jānitunti
atk-s0510a:1984_1: dosañca adosañca jānituṃ. Balakāyassa rakkhāyāti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātassa
atk-s0510a:1984_2: balakāyassa senāsamūhassa ārakkhaṇatthāya so nagarasāmiko rājā, senāpaccaṃ senāpatiṃ
atk-s0510a:1984_3: senānāyakaṃ mahāmattaṃ ṭhapeti ṭhānantare patiṭṭhapetīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1985_1: samantato gopanatthāya me mayhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ mā vinassīti nidhānakusalaṃ rakkhaṇe kusalaṃ
