atk-s0510a:1985_2: chekaṃ naraṃ purisaṃ bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ bhaṇḍarakkhantaṃ so rājā bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapetīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1986_0: 530. Mamatto hoti yo raññoti yo paṇḍito rañño mamatto māmako pakkhapāto hoti. Vuddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1986_1: yassa ca icchatīti assa rañño vuddhiñca virūḷhiṃ yo icchati kāmeti, tassa itthambhūtassa
atk-s0510a:1986_2: paṇḍitassa rājā adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchayādhipaccaṃ deti mittassa mittabhāvassa paṭipajjitunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1987_1: nimittaṃ subhaṃ, idaṃ nimittaṃ asubha”nti evaṃ nimittajānanasatthesu ca. Lakkhaṇesu
atk-s0510a:1987_2: cāti itthipurisānaṃ hatthapādalakkhaṇajānanasatthesu ca kovidaṃ chekaṃ ajjhāyakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1987_3: anekesaṃ sissānaṃ byākaraṇavācakaṃ mantadharaṃ vedattayasaṅkhātamantadhārakaṃ paṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1987_4: so rājā porohicce purohitaṭṭhānantare ṭhapetīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1988_0: 532. Etehaṅgehi sampannoti etehi vuttappakārehi aṅgehi avayavehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto
atk-s0510a:1988_1: so rājā “khattiyo”ti pavuccati kathīyatīti sambandho. Sadā rakkhanti rājānanti ete
atk-s0510a:1988_2: senāpaccādayo amaccā sadā sabbakālaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ rakkhanti gopenti. Kimiva? Cakkavākova
atk-s0510a:1988_3: dukkhitaṃ dukkhappattaṃ sakañātiṃ rakkhanto cakkavāko pakkhī ivāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1989_0: 533. Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīrāti vīruttama, yathā so rājā senāpaccādiaṅgasampanno nagaradvāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1989_1: thaketvā paṭivasati, tatheva tuvaṃ hatāmitto nihatapaccatthiko khattiyo iva sadevakassa
atk-s0510a:1989_2: lokassa saha devehi pavattamānassa lokassa dhammarājā dhammena samena rājā dasapāramitādhammaparipūraṇena

atk-s0510a:2030_1: api sayambhū paccekabuddho pariḷāhaṃ āsādanahetu uppannaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ vinodesi
atk-s0510a:2030_2: dūrīakāsi. Ḍayhamānaṃ tato eva pacchānutāpena kukkuccena ḍayhamānaṃ santapantaṃ maṃ
atk-s0510a:2030_3: susaṇṭhitaṃ dosaṃ dosato dassane suṭṭhu saṇṭhitaṃ disvā khamāpayi taṃ aparādhaṃ adhivāsesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2031_0: 575. Ajjāpi maṃ mahāvīrāti vīruttama, ajjāpi tuyhaṃ samāgamakāle api, tihaggībhi
atk-s0510a:2031_1: rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi vā nirayaggipetaggisaṃsāraggisaṅkhātehi vā tīhi aggīhi
atk-s0510a:2031_2: ḍayhamānaṃ dukkhamanubhavantaṃ maṃ bhagavā sītibhāvaṃ domanassavināsena santakāyacittasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2031_3: sītibhāvaṃ nibbānameva vā apāpayi sampāpesi. Tayo aggī vuttappakāre te tayo aggī
atk-s0510a:2032_0: 576. Evaṃ attano hīnāpadānaṃ bhagavato dassetvā idāni aññepi tassa savane niyojetvā
atk-s0510a:2032_1: ovadanto “yesaṃ sotāvadhānatthī”tiādimāha. Tattha yesaṃ tumhākaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ sotassa
atk-s0510a:2032_2: avadhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ atthi vijjati, te tumhe bhāsato sāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇātha
atk-s0510a:2032_3: manasi karotha. Atthaṃ tumhaṃ pavakkhāmīti yathā yena pakārena mama mayā diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2032_4: padaṃ nibbānaṃ, tathā tena pakārena nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ tumhākaṃ pavakkhāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2033_0: 577. Taṃ dassento sayambhuṃ taṃ vimānetvātiādimāha. Tattha sayambhuṃ sayameva bhūtaṃ
atk-s0510a:2033_1: ariyāya jātiyā jātaṃ santacittaṃ samāhitaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vimānetvā anādaraṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2033_2: tena kammena katenākusalena ajja imasmiṃ vattamānakāle ahaṃ nīcayoniyaṃ parāyattajātiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2034_0: 578. Mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhethāti buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ vo tumhe mā virādhetha gaḷitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2034_1: mā karotha, hi saccaṃ khaṇātītā buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ atītā atikkantā sattā socare socanti,
atk-s0510a:2034_2: “mayaṃ alakkhikā dummedhā bhavāmā”ti evaṃ socantīti attho. Sadatthe attano atthe
atk-s0510a:2034_3: vuḍḍhiyaṃ vāyameyyātha vīriyaṃ karotha. Vo tumhehi khaṇo buddhuppādakkhaṇo samayo
atk-s0510a:2035_0: 579. Tato paraṃ saṃsāragatānaṃ ādīnavaṃ upamāupameyyavasena dassento ekaccānañca
atk-s0510a:2035_1: vamanantiādimāha. Ekaccānaṃ kesañci puggalānaṃ vamanaṃ uddhaṃ uggiraṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2035_2: virecanaṃ adhopaggharaṇaṃ eke ekaccānaṃ halāhalaṃ visaṃ mucchākaraṇavisaṃ, ekaccānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2035_3: puggalānaṃ osadhaṃ rakkhanupāyaṃ bhagavā evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā akkhāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2036_0: 580. Vamanaṃ paṭipannānanti paṭipannānaṃ maggasamaṅgīnaṃ vamanaṃ saṃsārachaḍḍanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2036_1: saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavā akkhāsīti sambandho. Phalaṭṭhānaṃ phale ṭhitānaṃ virecanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2036_2: saṃsārapaggharaṇaṃ akkhāsi. Phalalābhīnaṃ phalaṃ labhitvā ṭhitānaṃ nibbānaosadhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2036_3: akkhāsi. Gavesīnaṃ manussadevanibbānasampattiṃ gavesīnaṃ pariyesantānaṃ puññakhettabhūtaṃ
atk-s0510a:2037_0: 581. Sāsanena viruddhānanti sāsanassa paṭipakkhānaṃ halāhalaṃ kutūhalaṃ pāpaṃ akusalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2037_1: akkhāsīti sambandho. Yathā āsīvisoti assaddhānaṃ katapāpānaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃsāre dukkhāvahanato
atk-s0510a:2037_2: āsīvisasadisaṃ yathā āsīviso diṭṭhamattena bhasmakaraṇato diṭṭhaviso sappo attanā
atk-s0510a:2037_3: daṭṭhaṃ naraṃ jhāpeti ḍayhati dukkhāpeti. Taṃ naraṃ taṃ assaddhaṃ katapāpaṃ naraṃ
atk-s0510a:2037_4: halāhalavisaṃ evaṃ jhāpeti catūsu apāyesu ḍayhati sosesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2038_0: 582. Sakiṃ pītaṃ halāhalanti visaṃ halāhalaṃ pītaṃ sakiṃ ekavāraṃ jīvitaṃ uparundhati
atk-s0510a:2038_1: nāseti. Sāsanena sāsanamhi virajjhitvā aparādhaṃ katvā puggalo kappakoṭimhi koṭisaṅkhye
atk-s0510a:2039_0: 583. Evaṃ assaddhānaṃ puggalānaṃ phalavipākaṃ dassetvā idāni buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2039_1: dassento khantiyātiādimāha. Tattha yo buddho vamanādīni akkhāsi, so buddho khantiyā
atk-s0510a:2039_2: khamanena ca avihiṃsāya sattānaṃ avihiṃsanena ca mettacittavatāya ca mettacittavantabhāvena
atk-s0510a:2039_3: ca sadevakaṃ saha devehi vattamānaṃ lokaṃ tāreti atikkamāpeti nibbāpeti, tasmā kāraṇā
atk-s0510a:2039_4: buddhā vo tumhehi avirādhiyā virujjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyā, buddhasāsane paṭipajjeyyāthāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2040_0: 584. Lābhe ca alābhe ca na sajjanti na bhajanti na lagganti. Sammānane ādarakaraṇe
atk-s0510a:2040_1: ca vimānane anādarakaraṇe ca acalā pathavīsadisā buddhā bhavanti, tasmā kāraṇā te
atk-s0510a:2040_2: buddhā tumhehi na virodhiyā na virodhetabbā virujjhituṃ asakkuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2041: 585. Buddhānaṃ majjhattataṃ dassento devadattetiādimāha. Tattha vadhakāvadhakesu sabbesu sattesu samako samamānaso muni buddhamunīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2042_0: 586. Etesaṃ paṭigho natthīti etesaṃ buddhānaṃ paṭigho caṇḍikkaṃ dosacittataṃ natthi
atk-s0510a:2042_1: na saṃvijjati. Rāgomesaṃ na vijjatīti imesaṃ buddhānaṃ rāgopi rajjanaṃ allīyanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2042_2: na vijjati, na upalabbhati, tasmā kāraṇā, vadhakassa ca orasassa cāti sabbesaṃ samako
atk-s0510a:2043_0: 587. Punapi buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvaṃ dassento panthe disvāna kāsāvantiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:2043_1: mīḷhamakkhitaṃ gūthasammissaṃ kāsāvaṃ kasāvena rajitaṃ cīvaraṃ isiddhajaṃ ariyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2043_2: dhajaṃ parikkhāraṃ, panthe magge chaḍḍitaṃ disvāna passitvā añjaliṃ katvā dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2043_3: añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi katvā sirasā sirena vanditabbaṃ isiddhajaṃ arahattaddhajaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakadīpakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2044_0: 588. Abbhatītāti abhi atthaṅgatā nibbutā. Ye ca buddhā vattamānā idāni jātā ca ye
atk-s0510a:2044_1: buddhā anāgatā ajātā abhūtā anibbattā apātubhūtā ca ye buddhā. Dhajenānena sujjhantīti
atk-s0510a:2044_2: anena isiddhajena cīvarena ete buddhā sujjhanti visuddhā bhavanti sobhanti. Tasmā
atk-s0510a:2044_3: tena kāraṇena ete buddhā namassiyā namassitabbā vanditabbāti attho. “Etaṃ namassiya”ntipi
atk-s0510a:2044_4: pāṭho, tassa etaṃ isiddhajaṃ namassitabbanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2045_0: 589. Tato paraṃ attano guṇaṃ dassento satthukappantiādimāha. Tattha satthukappaṃ
atk-s0510a:2045_1: buddhasadisaṃ suvinayaṃ sundaravinayaṃ sundarākārena dvārattayadamanaṃ hadayena cittena
atk-s0510a:2045_2: ahaṃ dhāremi savanadhāraṇādinā paccavekkhāmīti attho. Vinayaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ namassamāno
atk-s0510a:2045_3: vandamāno vinaye ādaraṃ kurumāno viharissāmi sabbadā sabbasmiṃ kāle vāsaṃ kappemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2046_0: 590. Vinayo āsayo mayhanti vinayapiṭakaṃ mayhaṃ okāsabhūtaṃ savanadhāraṇamanasikaraṇauggahaparipucchāpavattanavasena
atk-s0510a:2046_1: okāsabhūtaṃ gehabhūtanti attho. Vinayo ṭhānacaṅkamanti vinayo mayhaṃ savanādikiccakaraṇena
atk-s0510a:2046_2: ṭhitaṭṭhānañca caṅkamanaṭṭhānañca. Kappemi vinaye vāsanti vinayapiṭake vinayatantiyā
atk-s0510a:2046_3: savanadhāraṇapavattanavasena vāsaṃ sayanaṃ kappemi karomi. Vinayo mama gocaroti vinayapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2046_4: mayhaṃ gocaro āhāro bhojanaṃ niccaṃ dhāraṇamanasikaraṇavasenāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2047_0: 591. Vinaye pāramippattoti sakale vinayapiṭake pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ patto. Samathe
atk-s0510a:2047_1: cāpi kovidoti pārājikādisattāpattikkhandhānaṃ samathe vūpasame ca vuṭṭhāne ca kovido
atk-s0510a:2053_0: Evaṃ vuttesu ca sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu atikovido chekoti attho. Upāli taṃ mahāvīrāti
atk-s0510a:2053_1: bhante mahāvīra, catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu kappasatasahassesu sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya
atk-s0510a:2053_2: vīriyavanta satthuno devamanussānaṃ anusāsakassa taṃ tava pāde pādayuge upāli bhikkhu
atk-s0510a:2054_0: 592. So ahaṃ pabbajitvā sambuddhaṃ namassamāno paṇāmaṃ kurumāno dhammassa ca tena
atk-s0510a:2054_1: bhagavatā desitassa navalokuttaradhammassa sudhammataṃ sundaradhammabhāvaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0510a:2054_2: dhammañca namassamāno gāmato gāmaṃ purato punaṃ nagarato nagaraṃ vicarissāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2055_0: 593. Kilesā jhāpitā mayhanti mayā paṭividdhaarahattamaggañāṇena mayhaṃ cittasantānagatā
atk-s0510a:2055_1: sabbe diyaḍḍhasahassasaṅkhā kilesā jhāpitā sositā visositā viddhaṃsitā. Bhavā sabbe
atk-s0510a:2055_2: samūhatāti kāmabhavādayo sabbe nava bhavā mayā samūhatā saṃ suṭṭhu ūhatā khepitā
atk-s0510a:2055_3: viddhaṃsitā. Sabbāsavā parikkhīṇāti kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavoti
atk-s0510a:2055_4: sabbe cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā parisamantato khayaṃ pāpitā. Idāni imasmiṃ arahattappattakāle
atk-s0510a:2055_5: punabbhavo punuppattisaṅkhāto bhavo bhavanaṃ jāti natthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2056_0: 594. Uttari somanassavasena udānaṃ udānento svāgatantiādimāha. Tattha buddhaseṭṭhassa
atk-s0510a:2056_1: uttamabuddhassa santike samīpe ekanagare vā mama āgamanaṃ svāgataṃ suṭṭhu āgamanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2056_2: sundarāgamanaṃ vata ekantena āsi ahosīti sambandho. Tisso vijjāti pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuāsavakkhayavijjā
atk-s0510a:2056_3: anuppattā sampattā, paccakkhaṃ katāti attho. Kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti buddhena bhagavatā
atk-s0510a:2056_4: desitaṃ anusiṭṭhi sāsanaṃ kataṃ nipphāditaṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2057_0: 595. Paṭisambhidā catassoti atthapaṭisambhidādayo catasso paññāyo sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2057_1: katā. Vimokkhāpi ca aṭṭhimeti cattāri maggañāṇāni cattāri phalañāṇānīti ime aṭṭha
atk-s0510a:2057_2: vimokkhā saṃsārato muccanūpāyā sacchikatāti sambandho. Chaḷabhiññā sacchikatāti –
atk-s0510a:2060: Imā cha abhiññā sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā. Imesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ sacchikaraṇena buddhassa sāsanaṃ katanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2061_0: Itthanti iminā heṭṭhā vuttappakārena. Sudanti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Āyasmā upāli
atk-s0510a:2061_1: theroti thirasīlādiguṇayutto sāvako imā pubbacaritāpadānadīpikā gāthāyo abhāsittha
atk-s0510a:2064_0: Padumuttarasambuddhantiādikaṃ āyasmato aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0510a:2064_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2064_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2064_3: patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano sāsane
atk-s0510a:2064_4: paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2064_5: patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2064_6: akāsi. Satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi. So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni
atk-s0510a:2064_7: karonto satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kārāpesi,
atk-s0510a:2065_0: So evaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2065_1: kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitasālitaṇḍulehi
atk-s0510a:2065_2: asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ sampādetvā tattha madhusappisakkarādayo pakkhipitvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:2065_3: saṅghassa adāsi. Sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati. Puthukakāle
atk-s0510a:2065_4: puthukaggaṃ nāma adāsi. Lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ, kalāpādikaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2065_5: khalaggaṃ, bhaṇḍaggaṃ, minaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2066_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca
atk-s0510a:2066_1: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre
atk-s0510a:2066_2: doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa koṇḍaññoti gottato
atk-s0510a:2066_3: āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2066_4: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0510a:2066_5: gehe nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha
atk-s0510a:2066_6: brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā. So tesu sabbanavako hutvā mahāpurisassa
atk-s0510a:2066_7: lakkhaṇanipphattiṃ disvā “ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0510a:2067_0: Bodhisattopi kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ
atk-s0510a:2067_1: gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2067_2: anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi. Tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2067_3: sutvā lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi saddhiṃ attapañcamo
atk-s0510a:2067_4: pabbajitvā anukkamena bodhisattassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto
atk-s0510a:2067_5: tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi. Atha kho bodhisatto
atk-s0510a:2067_7: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā abhisambuddho hutvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva
atk-s0510a:2067_8: vītināmetvā pañcavaggiyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2067_9: tesaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0510a:2067_10: brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya
atk-s0510a:2068_0: 596. Evaṃ so arahattaṃ patvā “kiṃ kammaṃ katvā ahaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ adhigatomhī”ti
atk-s0510a:2068_1: upadhārento attano pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2068_2: udānavasena dassento padumuttarasambuddhantiādimāha. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0510a:2068_3: Lokajeṭṭhaṃ vināyakanti sakalassa sattalokassa jeṭṭhaṃ padhānanti attho. Visesena
atk-s0510a:2068_4: veneyyasatte saṃsārasāgarassa paratīraṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ neti sampāpetīti vināyako,
atk-s0510a:2068_5: taṃ vināyakaṃ. Buddhabhūmimanuppattanti buddhassa bhūmi patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti buddhabhūmi,
atk-s0510a:2068_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, taṃ anuppatto paṭividdhoti buddhabhūmimanuppatto, taṃ buddhabhūmimanuppattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2068_7: sabbaññutappattaṃ buddhabhūtanti attho. Paṭhamaṃ addasaṃ ahanti paṭhamaṃ vesākhapuṇṇamiyā
atk-s0510a:2068_8: rattiyā paccūsasamaye buddhabhūtaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ ahaṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2069_0: 597. Yāvatā bodhiyā mūleti yattakā bodhirukkhasamīpe yakkhā samāgatā rāsibhūtā sambuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2069_1: buddhabhūtaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ pañjalīkatā dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2070_0: 598. Sabbe devā tuṭṭhamanāti buddhabhūtaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā te sabbe devā tuṭṭhacittā ākāse
atk-s0510a:2070_1: sañcarantīti sambandho. Andhakāratamonudoti ativiya andhakāraṃ mohaṃ nudo khepano
atk-s0510a:2071_0: 599. Tesaṃ hāsaparetānanti hāsehi pītisomanassehi samannāgatānaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ mahānādo
atk-s0510a:2071_1: mahāghoso avattatha pavattati, sammāsambuddhasāsane kilese saṃkilese dhamme jhāpayissāmāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2072_0: 600. Devānaṃ giramaññāyāti vācāya thutivacanena saha udīritaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0510a:2072_1: haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena somanassasahagatena cittena ādibhikkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ āhāraṃ buddhabhūtassa
atk-s0510a:2073_0: 602. Sattāhaṃ abhinikkhammāti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sattāhaṃ padhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2073_2: ahanti attho. Idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhattanti idaṃ bhattaṃ sarīrayāpanaṃ brahmacārissa
atk-s0510a:2073_3: uttamacārissa me mayhaṃ iminā devaputtena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2074_0: 603. Tusitā hi idhāgantvāti tusitabhavanato idha manussaloke āgantvā yo devaputto
atk-s0510a:2074_1: me mama bhikkhaṃ upānayi adāsi, taṃ devaputtaṃ kittayissāmi kathessāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0510a:2074_2: Bhāsato bhāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti sambandho. Ito paraṃ anuttānapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0510a:2075: 607. Tidasāti tāvatiṃsabhavanā. Agārāti attano uppannabrāhmaṇagehato nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā cha saṃvaccharāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontena bodhisattena saha vasissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2076_0: 608. Tato sattamake vasseti tato pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sattame saṃvacchare. Buddho
atk-s0510a:2076_1: saccaṃ kathessatīti chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā sattamasaṃvacchare buddho hutvā
atk-s0510a:2076_3: catusaccaṃ kathessatīti attho. Koṇḍañño nāma nāmenāti nāmena gottanāmavasena koṇḍañño
atk-s0510a:2076_4: nāma. Paṭhamaṃ sacchikāhitīti pañcavaggiyānamantare paṭhamaṃ ādito eva sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:2077_0: 609. Nikkhantenānupabbajinti nikkhantena bodhisattena saha nikkhamitvā anupabbajinti
atk-s0510a:2077_1: attho. Tathā anupabbajitvā mayā padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ sukataṃ suṭṭhu kataṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2077_2: katanti attho. Kilese jhāpanatthāyāti kilese sosanatthāya viddhaṃsanatthāya anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2077_3: agārassa ahitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ sāsanaṃ pabbajiṃ paṭipajjinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2078_1: ñeyyaṃ vā jānanto devehi saha vattamāne satta loke buddho migāraññaṃ migadāya vihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2078_2: abhigantvā upasaṅkamitvā me mayā sacchikatena iminā sotāpattimaggañāṇena amatabheriṃ
atk-s0510a:2079_0: 611. So dānīti so ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ sotāpanno idāni arahattamaggañāṇena amataṃ santaṃ
atk-s0510a:2079_1: vūpasantasabhāvaṃ padaṃ pajjitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ, anuttaraṃ uttaravirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2079_2: patto adhigatoti attho. Sabbāsave pariññāyāti kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsave pariññāya
atk-s0510a:2079_3: pahānapariññāya pajahitvā anāsavo nikkileso viharāmi iriyāpathavihārena vāsaṃ kappemi.
atk-s0510a:2080_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0510a:2080_1: nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2080_2: bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. So dvīhi aggasāvakehi
atk-s0510a:2080_3: attani kariyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ, gāmantasenāsane ākiṇṇavihārañca pariharitukāmo,
atk-s0510a:2080_4: vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi
atk-s0510a:2080_5: papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno
atk-s0510a:2080_6: chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasi. Evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko
atk-s0510a:2080_7: devarājā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha “sādhu me, bhante, ayyo dhammaṃ desetū”ti.
atk-s0510a:2080_8: Thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2080_9: amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi. Taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento –
atk-s0510a:2083: Thutiṃ akāsi. Thero chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0510a:2086_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2086_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2086_2: bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pabbatapāde guhāyaṃ vihāsi. Bhagavā tassa
atk-s0510a:2086_3: anuggahaṃ kātuṃ gocarāya pakkantakāle tassa sayanaguhaṃ pavisitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:2086_4: nisīdi. Sīho gocaraṃ gahetvā nivatto guhadvāre ṭhatvā bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2086_5: jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhaṇatthāya aññe
atk-s0510a:2086_6: vāḷamige apanetuṃ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṃ nadanto buddhagatāya satiyā aṭṭhāsi. Yathā
atk-s0510a:2086_7: paṭhamadivase, evaṃ sattāhaṃ pūjesi. Bhagavā “sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0510a:2086_8: vaṭṭissati imassa ettako upanissayo”ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ pakkhanditvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0510a:2087_0: Sīho buddhaviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule
atk-s0510a:2087_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2087_2: pasanno sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2087_3: puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2087_4: rañño udenassa purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Bhāradvājotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So
atk-s0510a:2087_5: vayappato tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena
atk-s0510a:2087_6: ananurūpācārattā tehi pariccatto rājagahaṃ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2087_7: disvā sāsane pabbajitvā bhojane amattaññū hutvā viharati. Satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya
atk-s0510a:2087_8: patiṭṭhāpento vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Chaḷabhiñño pana
atk-s0510a:2087_9: hutvā bhagavato sammukhā “yaṃ sāvakehi pattabbaṃ, taṃ mayā anuppatta”nti, bhikkhusaṅghe
atk-s0510a:2087_10: ca “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ nadi. Tena
atk-s0510a:2087_11: taṃ bhagavā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0510a:2088_0: 613. Evaṃ etadaggaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā pubbe katapuññasambhāraṃ saritvā somanassavasena
atk-s0510a:2088_1: attano puññakammāpadānaṃ vibhāvento padumuttarotiādimāha. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova.
atk-s0510a:2088_2: Purato himavantassāti himālayapabbatato pubbadisābhāgeti attho. Cittakūṭe vasī tadāti
atk-s0510a:2088_3: yadā ahaṃ sīho migarājā hutvā himavantapabbatasamīpe vasāmi, tadā padumuttaro nāma
atk-s0510a:2088_4: satthā anekehi ca osadhehi, anekehi ca ratanehi cittavicittatāya cittakūṭe cittapabbatasikhare vasīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2089_0: 614. Abhītarūpo tatthāsinti abhītasabhāvo nibbhayasabhāvo migarājā tattha āsiṃ ahosinti
atk-s0510a:2089_1: attho. Catukkamoti catūhi disāhi kamo gantuṃ samattho. Yassa saddaṃ suṇitvānāti yassa
atk-s0510a:2089_2: migarañño sīhanādaṃ sutvā bahujjanā bahusattā vikkhambhanti visesena khambhanti bhāyanti.
atk-s0510a:2090_0: 615. Suphullaṃ padumaṃ gayhāti bhagavati pasādena supupphitapadumapupphaṃ ḍaṃsitvā.
atk-s0510a:2090_1: Narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ sambuddhaṃ upagacchiṃ, samīpaṃ agaminti
atk-s0510a:2090_2: attho. Vuṭṭhitassa samādhimhāti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa buddhassa taṃ pupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2091: 616. Catuddisaṃ namassitvāti catūsu disāsu namassitvā sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādetvā ādarena patiṭṭhapetvā sīhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ anadiṃ ghosesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2092: 617. Tato buddhena dinnabyākaraṇaṃ pakāsento padumuttarotiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2093_0: 618. Vadataṃ seṭṭhoti “mayaṃ buddhā, mayaṃ buddhā”ti vadantānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ seṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2093_1: uttamo buddho āgatoti sambandho. Tassa āgatassa bhagavato taṃ dhammaṃ sossāma suṇissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2094_0: 619. Tesaṃ hāsaparetānanti hāsehi somanassehi paretānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2094_1: tesaṃ devamanussānaṃ. Lokanāyakoti lokassa nāyako saggamokkhasampāpako mama saddaṃ
atk-s0510a:2094_2: mayhaṃ sīhanādaṃ pakittesi pakāsesi kathesi, dīghadassī anāgatakāladassī mahāmuni
atk-s0510a:2095: 622. Nāmena padumo nāma cakkavattī hutvā catusaṭṭhiyā jātiyā issariyaṃ issarabhāvaṃ rajjaṃ kārayissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2096: 623. Kappasatasahassamhīti sāmyatthe bhummavacanaṃ, kappasatasahassānaṃ pariyosāneti attho.
atk-s0510a:2097_0: 624. Pakāsite pāvacaneti tena gotamena bhagavatā piṭakattaye pakāsite desiteti attho.
atk-s0510a:2097_1: Brahmabandhu bhavissatīti tadā gotamassa bhagavato kāle ayaṃ sīho migarājā brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:2097_2: nibbattissatīti attho. Brahmaññā abhinikkhammāti brāhmaṇakulato nikkhamitvā tassa
atk-s0510a:2098_1: abhāvena nirupadhi. Kilesadarathānaṃ abhāvena upasanto. Sabbāsave sakalāsave pariññāya
atk-s0510a:2098_2: pahāya anāsavo nikkileso nibbāyissati khandhaparinibbānena nibbuto bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2099: 626. Vijane pantaseyyamhīti janasambādharahite dūrāraññasenāsaneti attho. Vāḷamigasamākuleti kāḷasīhādīhi caṇḍamigasaṅgehi ākule saṃkiṇṇeti attho. Sesaṃ vuttatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2102_0: Gaṅgā bhāgīrathī nāmātiādikaṃ āyasmato khadiravaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2102_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2102_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare titthanāvikakule nibbattitvā mahāgaṅgāya payāgatitthe
atk-s0510a:2102_3: titthanāvāya kammaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagataṃ
atk-s0510a:2102_4: disvā pasannamānaso nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ yojetvā mahantena pūjāsakkārena paratīraṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2102_5: aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ satthārā āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2102_6: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2102_7: akāsi. Bhagavā tassa patthanāya avañjhabhāvaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2103_0: So tato paṭṭhāya puññāni upacinanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2103_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0510a:2103_2: nibbatti. Taṃ vayappattaṃ mātāpitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā hutvā tassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2103_3: So sāriputtattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā ayyo upatisso imaṃ
atk-s0510a:2103_4: vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito, tena vantaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ kathāhaṃ anubhavissāmī”ti jātasaṃvego
atk-s0510a:2103_5: pāsaṃ anupagacchamānamigo viya ñātake vañcetvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2103_6: santikaṃ gantvā dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhāvaṃ nivedetvā attano pabbajjāya chandaṃ
atk-s0510a:2103_7: ārocesi. Bhikkhū taṃ pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2103_8: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā khadiravanaṃ pavisitvā vissamanto ghaṭento vāyamanto ñāṇassa
atk-s0510a:2103_9: paripākaṃ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño arahā ahosi. So arahā hutvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca
atk-s0510a:2103_10: vandituṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0510a:2103_11: patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vanditvā katipāhaṃ jetavane
atk-s0510a:2103_12: vihāsi. Atha naṃ satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2103_13: ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āraññakānaṃ yadidaṃ revato”ti.
atk-s0510a:2104_0: 628. Evaṃ etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_1: pakāsento gaṅgā bhāgīrathītiādimāha. Tattha gaṅgāti gāyamānā ghosaṃ kurumānā gacchatīti
atk-s0510a:2104_2: gaṅgā. Atha vā go vuccati pathavī, tasmiṃ gatā pavattāti gaṅgā. Anotattadahaṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_3: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvaṭṭagaṅgāti ca pabbatamatthakena gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti
atk-s0510a:2104_4: ca tiracchānapabbataṃ vijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne umaṅgagaṅgāti ca tato bahalapabbataṃ paharitvā
atk-s0510a:2104_5: pañcayojanaṃ ākāsena gataṭṭhāne ākāsagaṅgāti ca tassā patitaṭṭhānaṃ bhinditvā jātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_6: pañca yojanaṃ pokkharaṇīkūlaṃ bhinditvā tattha pana pañcaṅguli viya pañca dhārā hutvā
atk-s0510a:2104_7: gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū mahī aciravatīti pañca nāmā hutvā jambudīpaṃ pañca bhāgaṃ pañca
atk-s0510a:2104_8: koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā pañca bhāge pañca koṭṭhāse itā gatā pavattāti bhāgīrathī. Gaṅgā ca
atk-s0510a:2104_9: sā bhāgīrathī ceti gaṅgābhāgīrathī. “Bhāgīrathī gaṅgā”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_10: pubbacariyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Himavantā pabhāvitāti satte hiṃsati sītena
atk-s0510a:2104_11: hanati matheti āloḷetīti himo, himo assa atthīti himavā, tato himavantato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:2104_12: pabhāvitā pavattā sandamānāti himavantapabhāvitā. Kutitthe nāviko āsinti tassā gaṅgāya
atk-s0510a:2104_13: caṇḍasotasamāpanne visamatitthe kevaṭṭakule uppanno nāviko āsiṃ ahosinti attho. Orime
atk-s0510a:2104_14: ca tariṃ ahanti sampattasampattamanusse pārimā tīrā orimaṃ tīraṃ ahaṃ tariṃ tāresinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2105_0: 629. Padumuttaro nāyakoti dvipadānaṃ uttamo satte nibbānaṃ nāyako pāpanako padumuttarabuddho
atk-s0510a:2105_1: mama puññasampattiṃ nipphādento. Vasīsatasahassehi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi gaṅgāsotaṃ
atk-s0510a:2106_0: 630. Bahū nāvā samānetvāti sampattaṃ taṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā vaḍḍhakīhi suṭṭhu
atk-s0510a:2106_1: saṅkhataṃ kataṃ nipphāditaṃ bahū nāvāyo samānetvā dve dve nāvāyo ekato katvā tassā
atk-s0510a:2106_2: nāvāya upari maṇḍapachadanaṃ katvā narāsabhaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ paṭimāniṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2107_0: 631. Āgantvāna ca sambuddhoti evaṃ saṅghaṭitāya nāvāya tattha āgantvāna tañca nāvakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2107_1: nāvamuttamaṃ āruhīti sambandho. Vārimajjhe ṭhito satthāti nāvamārūḷho satthā gaṅgājalamajjhe
atk-s0510a:2107_2: ṭhito samāno imā somanassapaṭisaṃyuttagāthā abhāsatha kathesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2108_0: 632. Yo so tāresi sambuddhanti yo so nāviko gaṅgāsotāya sambuddhaṃ atāresi. Saṅghañcāpi
atk-s0510a:2108_1: anāsavanti na kevalameva sambuddhaṃ tāresi, anāsavaṃ nikkilesaṃ saṅghañcāpi tāresīti
atk-s0510a:2108_2: attho. Tena cittapasādenāti tena nāvāpājanakāle uppannena somanassasahagatacittapasādena
atk-s0510a:2108_3: devaloke chasu kāmasaggesu ramissati dibbasampattiṃ anubhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2109_0: 633. Nibbattissati te byamhanti devaloke uppannassa te tuyhaṃ byamhaṃ vimānaṃ sukataṃ
atk-s0510a:2109_1: suṭṭhu nibbattaṃ nāvasaṇṭhitaṃ nāvāsaṇṭhānaṃ nibbattissati pātubhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2109_2: Ākāse pupphachadananti nāvāya uparimaṇḍapakatakammassa nissandena sabbadā gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2110_0: 634. Aṭṭhapaññāsakappamhīti ito puññakaraṇakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaṇṇāsakappaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2110_1: nāmena tārako nāma cakkavattī khattiyo cāturanto catūsu dīpesu issaro vijitāvī jitavanto
atk-s0510a:2111: 637. Revato nāma nāmenāti revatīnakkhattena jātattā “revato”ti laddhanāmo brahmabandhu brāhmaṇaputtabhūto bhavissati brāhmaṇakule uppajjissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2113_0: 640. Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti evaṃ padumuttarena bhagavatā byākato ahaṃ kamena
atk-s0510a:2113_1: pāramitākoṭiṃ patvā me mayhaṃ vīriyaṃ asithilavīriyaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ dhuravāhaṃ dhurādhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2113_2: yogehi khemassa nibbhayassa nibbānassa adhivāhanaṃ āvahanaṃ ahosīti attho. Dhāremi
atk-s0510a:2113_3: antimaṃ dehanti idānāhaṃ sammāsambuddhasāsane pariyosānasarīraṃ dhāremīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2114_0: So aparabhāge attano jātagāmaṃ gantvā “cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālā”ti tissannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2114_1: putte “cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālā”ti tayo bhāgineyye ānetvā pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2115_0: Tasmiñca samaye therassa kocideva ābādho uppanno, taṃ sutvā sāriputtatthero – “revatassa
atk-s0510a:2115_1: gilānapucchanaṃ adhigamapucchanañca karissāmī”ti upagañchi. Revatatthero dhammasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0510a:2115_2: dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ satuppādavasena ovadiyamāno cāletigāthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2115_3: abhāsittha. Tattha cāle upacāle sīsūpacāleti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ. Cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālāti
atk-s0510a:2115_4: hi itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmā tayo dārakā pabbajitāpi tathā vohariyyanti. “Cālī,
atk-s0510a:2115_5: upacālī, sīsūpacālīti tesaṃ nāmānī”ti ca vadanti. Yadatthaṃ “cāle”tiādinā āmantanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2115_6: kataṃ, taṃ dassento “patissatā nu kho viharathā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ āha – “āgato
atk-s0510a:2115_7: vo vālaṃ viya vedhī”ti. Patissatāti patissatikā. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Āgatoti āgañchi.
atk-s0510a:2115_8: Voti tumhākaṃ. Vālaṃ viya vedhīti vālavedhi viya. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – tikkhajavananibbedhikapaññatāya
atk-s0510a:2115_9: vālavedhirūpo satthukappo tumhākaṃ mātulatthero āgato, tasmā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2115_10: satisampajaññayuttā eva hutvā viharatha, yathādhigate vihāre appamattā bhavathāti.
atk-s0510a:2116_0: Taṃ sutvā te sāmaṇerā dhammasenāpatissa paccuggamanādivattaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ mātulattherānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2116_1: paṭisanthāravelāyaṃ nātidūre samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdiṃsu. Dhammasenāpati revatattherena
atk-s0510a:2116_2: saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā te sāmaṇere upasaṅkami. Te tathā kālaparicchedassa
atk-s0510a:2116_3: katattā there upasaṅkamante uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero – “katarakataravihārena
atk-s0510a:2116_4: viharathā”ti pucchitvā tehi “imāya imāyā”ti vutte dārakepi evaṃ vinento – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2116_5: bhātiko saccavādī vata dhammassa anudhammacāri”nti theraṃ pasaṃsanto pakkāmi. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2119_0: Ārāmadvārā nikkhammātiādikaṃ āyasmato ānandattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2119_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2119_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare satthu vemātikabhātā hutvā nibbatti. Sumanotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:2119_3: ahosi. Pitā panassa nandarājā nāma. So attano puttassa sumanakumārassa vayappattassa
atk-s0510a:2119_4: haṃsavatīnagarato vīsayojanasate ṭhāne bhoganagaraṃ adāsi. So kadāci kadāci āgantvā
atk-s0510a:2119_5: satthārañca pitarañca passati. Tadā rājā satthārañca satasahassaparimāṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0510a:2119_6: sayameva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi, aññesaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ na deti.
atk-s0510a:2120_0: Tena samayena paccanto kupito ahosi. Kumāro tassa kupitabhāvaṃ rañño anārocetvā sayameva
atk-s0510a:2120_1: taṃ vūpasamesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso “varaṃ te tāva dammi, gaṇhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2120_2: Kumāro “satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca temāsaṃ upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ icchāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:2120_3: āha. “Etaṃ na sakkā, aññaṃ vadehī”ti. “Deva, khattiyānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthi, etaṃ
atk-s0510a:2120_4: me dehi, na mayhaṃ aññenattho, sace satthā anujānāti, dinnamevā”ti. So “satthu cittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2120_5: jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato. Tena ca samayena bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti. So
atk-s0510a:2120_6: bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgato, dassetha ma”nti.
atk-s0510a:2120_7: Bhikkhū “sumano nāma thero satthu upaṭṭhāko, tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti āhaṃsu. So
atk-s0510a:2120_8: therassa santikaṃ gantvā “satthāraṃ, bhante, dassethā”ti āha. Atha thero tassa passantasseva
atk-s0510a:2120_9: pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “rājaputto, bhante, tumhākaṃ dassanāya
atk-s0510a:2120_10: āgato”ti āha. “Tena hi bhikkhu bahi āsanaṃ paññapehī”ti. Thero punapi buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2120_11: gahetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nimujjitvā tassa passantassa bahipariveṇe pātubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2120_12: gandhakuṭipariveṇe āsanaṃ paññāpesi. Kumāro taṃ disvā “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0510a:2121_0: Bhagavāpi gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paññattāsane nisīdi. Rājaputto satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0510a:2121_1: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “ayaṃ, bhante, thero tumhākaṃ sāsane vallabho maññe”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0510a:2121_2: kumāra, vallabho”ti. “Kiṃ katvā, bhante, esa vallabho”ti? “Dānādīni puññāni katvā”ti.
atk-s0510a:2121_3: “Bhagavā, ahampi ayaṃ thero viya anāgate buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo”ti so buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:2121_4: saṅghassa sattāhaṃ khandhāvāre bhattaṃ datvā sattame divase, “bhante, mayā pitu santikā
atk-s0510a:2121_5: tumhākaṃ temāsaṃ paṭijagganavaro laddho, temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethā”ti vatvā
atk-s0510a:2121_6: satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ gahetvā yojane yojane satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2121_7: ca vasanānucchavike vihāre kāretvā tattha tattha vasāpento attano vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe
atk-s0510a:2121_8: satasahassena kīte sobhananāmake uyyāne satasahassena kāritaṃ vihāraṃ pavesāpetvā –
atk-s0510a:2124_0: Udakaṃ pātesi. So vassūpanāyikadivase satthu mahādānaṃ pavattetvā “iminā nīhārena
atk-s0510a:2124_1: dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti puttadāre amacce ca dāne kiccakaraṇe ca niyojetvā sayaṃ sumanattherassa
atk-s0510a:2124_2: vasanaṭṭhānasamīpeyeva vasanto evaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāne satthāraṃ temāsaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0510a:2124_3: Upakaṭṭhāya pana pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame
atk-s0510a:2124_4: divase satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pādamūle ticīvare ṭhapetvā vanditvā “bhante, yadetaṃ
atk-s0510a:2124_5: mayā khandhāvārato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ, na taṃ sakkasampattiādīnaṃ atthāya kataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2124_6: atha kho ahampi sumanatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko vallabho bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0510a:2124_7: patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2125_0: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ puññāni katvā tato parampi tattha tattha
atk-s0510a:2125_1: bhave uḷārāni puññakammāni upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:2125_2: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā ekassa therassa piṇḍāya carato pattaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2125_3: uttarasāṭakaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā
atk-s0510a:2125_4: aṭṭha paccekabuddhe disvā te bhojetvā attano maṅgaluyyāne aṭṭha paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā
atk-s0510a:2125_5: tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya aṭṭha sabbaratanamayapīṭhe ceva maṇiādhārake ca paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0510a:2126_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto amhākaṃ bodhisattena
atk-s0510a:2126_1: saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbattitvā sabbe
atk-s0510a:2126_2: ñātake ānandite karonto jātoti ānandotveva nāmaṃ labhi. So anukkamena vayappatto
atk-s0510a:2126_3: katābhinikkhamane sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke paṭhamaṃ kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0510a:2126_4: gantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati tassa parivāratthaṃ pabbajituṃ nikkhamantehi bhaddiyādīhi
atk-s0510a:2126_5: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa
atk-s0510a:2127_0: Tena ca samayena bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2127_1: Ekadā nāgasamālo pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarati, ekadā nāgito, ekadā upavāno, ekadā
atk-s0510a:2127_2: sunakkhatto, ekadā cundo samaṇuddeso, ekadā sāgato, ekadā meghiyo, te yebhuyyena
atk-s0510a:2127_3: satthu cittaṃ nārādhayiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0510a:2127_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi – “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, idāni mahallako
atk-s0510a:2127_5: ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmī’ti vutte aññena maggena gacchanti, ekacce
atk-s0510a:2127_6: mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:2127_7: vijānathā”ti. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasaṃvego udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:2127_8: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhe upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0510a:2127_9: Etenupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe mahāsāvakā “ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2127_10: upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti uṭṭhahiṃsu ṭhapetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ. Tepi bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0510a:2128_0: Ānando pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tvampi satthu upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2128_1: yācāhī”ti. “Yācitvā laddhupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kīdisaṃ hoti? Sace ruccati, satthā sayameva
atk-s0510a:2128_2: vakkhatī”ti. Atha bhagavā – “na, bhikkhave, ānando aññehi ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā
atk-s0510a:2128_3: maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti āha. Tato bhikkhū “uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, satthāraṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2128_4: yācāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero uṭṭhahitvā “sace me, bhante, bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ
atk-s0510a:2128_5: cīvaraṃ na dassati, paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati,
atk-s0510a:2128_6: nimantanaṃ gahetvā na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. “Ettake
atk-s0510a:2128_7: guṇe labhato satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ ko bhāro”ti upavādamocanatthaṃ ime cattāro paṭikkhepā,
atk-s0510a:2128_8: “sace, bhante, bhagavā mayā gahitaṃ nimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ desantarato āgatāgate
atk-s0510a:2128_9: tāvadeva dassetuṃ labhāmi, yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tāvadeva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2128_10: pucchituṃ labhāmi, sace bhagavā parammukhā desitaṃ dhammaṃ puna mayhaṃ byākarissasi,
atk-s0510a:2128_11: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi”. “Ettakampi satthu santike anuggahaṃ na labhatī”ti
atk-s0510a:2128_13: ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0510a:2129_0: So upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ duvidhena udakena tividhena
atk-s0510a:2129_2: evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto – “imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:2129_3: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti divasabhāgaṃ santikāvacaro hutvā rattibhāge mahantaṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2129_4: gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ navavāre anupariyāyati satthari pakkosante paṭivacanadānāya,
atk-s0510a:2129_5: thinamiddhavinodanatthaṃ. Atha naṃ satthā jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno anekapariyāyena
atk-s0510a:2129_6: pasaṃsitvā bahussutānaṃ satimantānaṃ gatimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ upaṭṭhākānañca bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2130_0: Evaṃ satthārā pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapito catūhi acchariyabbhūtadhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0510a:2130_1: satthu dhammakosārakkho ayaṃ mahāthero sekhova samāno satthari parinibbute heṭṭhā
atk-s0510a:2130_2: vuttanayena bhikkhūhi samuttejito devatāya ca saṃvejito “sveyeva ca dāni dhammasaṅgīti
atk-s0510a:2130_3: kātabbā, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāyaṃ sekho sakaraṇīyo asekhehi therehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2130_4: dhammaṃ gāyituṃ sannipātaṃ gantu”nti sañjātussāho vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bahudeva
atk-s0510a:2130_5: rattiṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto caṅkame vīriyasamataṃ alabhitvā tato vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:2130_6: sayane nisīditvā sayitukāmo kāyaṃ āvaṭṭesi. Apattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ, pādā ca bhūmito
atk-s0510a:2130_7: muttamattā, ekasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci, chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2131_0: 644. Evaṃ chaḷabhiññādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍito upaṭṭhākādiguṇehi etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patto attano
atk-s0510a:2131_1: pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento ārāmadvārā nikkhammātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2131_2: Tattha ārāmadvārāti sabbasattānaṃ dhammadesanatthāya vihāradvārato nikkhamitvā bahidvārasamīpe
atk-s0510a:2131_3: katamaṇḍapamajjhe supaññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno padumuttaro nāma mahāmuni sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0510a:2131_4: Vassanto amataṃ vuṭṭhinti dhammadesanāmahāamatadhārāhi dhammavassaṃ vassanto. Nibbāpesi
atk-s0510a:2131_5: mahājananti mahājanassa cittasantānagatakilesaggiṃ nibbāpesi vūpasamesi, mahājanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2132_0: 645. Satasahassaṃ te dhīrāti parivārasampattiṃ dassento āha. Chahi abhiññāhi iddhividhādiñāṇakoṭṭhāsehi
atk-s0510a:2132_1: samannāgatā anekasatasahassacakkavāḷesu khaṇena gantuṃ samatthāhi iddhīhi samannāgatattā
atk-s0510a:2132_2: mahiddhikāte dhīrā satasahassakhīṇāsavā chāyāva anapāyinīti katthaci anapagatā chāyā
atk-s0510a:2132_3: iva taṃ sambuddhaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ parivārenti parivāretvā dhammaṃ suṇantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2133_0: 646. Hatthikkhandhagato āsinti tadā bhagavato dhammadesanāsamaye ahaṃ hatthipiṭṭhe
atk-s0510a:2133_1: nisinno āsiṃ ahosinti attho. Setacchattaṃ varuttamanti patthetabbaṃ uttamaṃ setacchattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2133_2: mama matthake dhārayanto hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnoti sambandho. Sucārurūpaṃ disvānāti
atk-s0510a:2133_3: sundaraṃ cāruṃ manohararūpavantaṃ dhammaṃ desiyamānaṃ sambuddhaṃ disvā me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2133_4: vitti santuṭṭhi somanassaṃ udapajjatha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2134_0: 647. Oruyha hatthikkhandhamhāti taṃ bhagavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā hatthipiṭṭhito oruyha
atk-s0510a:2134_1: orohitvā narāsabhaṃ naravasabhaṃ upagacchiṃ samīpaṃ gatoti attho. Ratanamayachattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2134_2: meti ratanabhūsitaṃ me mayhaṃ chattaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassa matthake dhārayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2135_0: 648. Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti mayhaṃ pasādena uppannaṃ saṅkappaṃ ñatvā isīnaṃ antare
atk-s0510a:2135_1: mahantabhūto so padumuttaro bhagavā. Taṃ kathaṃ ṭhapayitvānāti taṃ attanā desiyamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2135_2: dhammakathaṃ ṭhapetvā mama byākaraṇatthāya imā gāthā abhāsatha kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2136_0: 649. Kathanti ce? Yo sotiādimāha. Soṇṇālaṅkārabhūsitaṃ chattaṃ yo so rājakumāro me
atk-s0510a:2136_1: matthake dhāresīti sambandho. Tamahaṃ kittayissāmīti taṃ rājakumāraṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi
atk-s0510a:2136_2: pākaṭaṃ karissāmi. Suṇotha mama bhāsatoti bhāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇotha ohitasotā
atk-s0510a:2137_0: 650. Ito gantvā ayaṃ posoti ayaṃ rājakumāro ito manussalokato cuto tusitaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2137_1: āvasissati tattha viharissati. Tattha accharāhi purakkhato parivārito tusitabhavanasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2138_0: 651. Catuttiṃsakkhattunti tusitabhavanato cavitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane uppanno catuttiṃsavāre
atk-s0510a:2138_1: devindo devarajjaṃ karissatīti sambandho. Balādhipo aṭṭhasatanti tāvatiṃsabhavanato
atk-s0510a:2138_2: cuto manussaloke uppanno balādhipo caturaṅginiyā senāya adhipo padhāno aṭṭhasatajātīsu
atk-s0510a:2138_3: padesarājā hutvā vasudhaṃ anekaratanavaraṃ pathaviṃ āvasissati puthabyaṃ viharissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2139: 652. Aṭṭhapaññāsakkhattunti aṭṭhapaññāsajātīsu cakkavattī rājā bhavissatīti attho. Mahiyā sakalajambudīpapathaviyā vipulaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ padesarajjaṃ kārayissati.
atk-s0510a:2140: 654. Sakyānaṃ kulaketussāti sakyarājūnaṃ kulassa dhajabhūtassa buddhassa ñātako bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2141_0: 655. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. Nipakoti nepakkasaṅkhātāya paññāya samannāgato. Bāhusaccesu
atk-s0510a:2141_1: bahussutabhāvesu piṭakattayadhāraṇesu kovido cheko. Nivātavutti anavaññattiko athaddho
atk-s0510a:2142_0: 656. Padhānapahitatto soti so ānandatthero vīriyakaraṇāya pesitacitto. Upasanto nirūpadhīti
atk-s0510a:2143_0: 657. Santi āraññakāti araññe bhavā mahāvane jātā. Saṭṭhihāyanāti saṭṭhivassakāle
atk-s0510a:2143_1: hāyanabalā. Tidhā pabhinnāti akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātehi tīhi ṭhānehi bhinnamadā. Mātaṅgāti
atk-s0510a:2143_2: mātaṅgahatthikule jātā. Īsādantāti rathīsāsadisadantā. Urūḷhavā rājavāhanā. Kuñjarasaṅkhātā
atk-s0510a:2143_3: nāgā hatthirājāno santi saṃvijjanti yathā, tathā satasahassasaṅkhyā khīṇāsavasaṅkhātā
atk-s0510a:2143_4: paṇḍitā mahiddhikā arahantanāgā santi, sabbe te arahantanāgā buddhanāgarājassa. Na
atk-s0510a:2143_5: honti paṇidhimhi teti te paṇidhimhi tādisā na honti, kiṃ sabbe te bhayabhītā sakabhāvena
atk-s0510a:2143_6: saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthāti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2154_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato sīhāsanadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2154_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2154_2: saddhāsampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto, dharamāne bhagavati devaloke vasitvā nibbute
atk-s0510a:2154_3: bhagavati uppannattā viññutaṃ patto bhagavato sārīrikacetiyaṃ disvā “aho me alābhā,
atk-s0510a:2154_4: bhagavato dharamāne kāle asampatto”ti cintetvā cetiye cittaṃ pasādetvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2154_5: sabbaratanamayaṃ devatānimmitasadisaṃ dhammāsane sīhāsanaṃ kāretvā jīvamānakabuddhassa
atk-s0510a:2154_6: viya pūjesi. Tassupari gehampi dibbavimānamiva kāresi, pādaṭṭhapanapādapīṭhampi kāresi.
atk-s0510a:2154_7: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ dīpadhūpapupphagandhādīhi anekavidhaṃ pūjaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke
atk-s0510a:2154_8: nibbatto cha kāmasagge aparāparaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2154_9: anekakkhattuṃ anubhavitvā saṅkhyātikkantaṃ padesarajjasampattiñca anubhavitvā kassapassa
atk-s0510a:2154_10: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ katvā etthantare devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2154_11: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu
atk-s0510a:2154_12: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2155_0: 1. Evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassaṃ uppādetvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2155_1: pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Tattha lokassa nātho padhānoti lokanātho,
atk-s0510a:2155_2: lokattayasāmīti attho. Lokanāthe siddhatthamhi nibbuteti sambandho. Vitthārite pāvacaneti
atk-s0510a:2155_3: pāvacane piṭakattaye vitthārite patthaṭe pākaṭeti attho. Bāhujaññamhi sāsaneti sikkhattayasaṅgahite
atk-s0510a:2155_4: buddhasāsane anekasatasahassakoṭikhīṇāsavasaṅkhātehi bahujanehi ñāte adhigateti attho.
atk-s0510a:2156_0: 2-3. Pasannacitto sumanoti tadā ahaṃ buddhassa dharamānakāle asampatto nibbute tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2156_1: devalokā cavitvā manussalokaṃ upapanno tassa bhagavato sārīrikadhātucetiyaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2156_2: pasannacitto saddhāsampayuttamano sundaramano “aho mamāgamanaṃ svāgamana”nti sañjātapasādabahumāno
atk-s0510a:2156_3: “mayā nibbānādhigamāya ekaṃ puññaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā bhagavato cetiyasamīpe
atk-s0510a:2156_4: bhagavantaṃ uddissa hiraññasuvaṇṇaratanādīhi alaṅkaritvāva sīhāsanaṃ akāsi. Tatra
atk-s0510a:2156_5: nisinnassa pādaṭṭhapanatthāya pādapīṭhañca kāresi. Sīhāsanassa atemanatthāya tassupari
atk-s0510a:2156_6: gharañca kāresi. Tena vuttaṃ – “sīhāsanamakāsahaṃ…pe… gharaṃ tattha akāsaha”nti.
atk-s0510a:2156_7: Tena cittappasādenāti dharamānassa viya bhagavato sīhāsanaṃ mayā kataṃ, tena cittappasādena.
atk-s0510a:2157_0: 4. Āyāmena catubbīsāti tatrupapannassa devabhūtassa sato mayhaṃ sukataṃ puññena nibbattitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2157_1: pātubhūtaṃ āyāmena uccato catubbīsayojanaṃ vitthārena tiriyato catuddasayojanaṃ tāvadeva
atk-s0510a:2157_2: nibbattikkhaṇeyeva āsi ahosīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:2158: 9. Catunnavute ito kappeti ito kappato catunavute kappe yaṃ kammaṃ akariṃ akāsiṃ, tadā tato paṭṭhāya puññabalena kañci duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi, na anubhūtapubbā kāci duggatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2159_0: 10. Tesattatimhito kappeti ito kappato tesattatikappe. Indanāmā tayo janāti indanāmakā
atk-s0510a:2159_1: tayo cakkavattirājāno ekasmiṃ kappe tīsu jātīsu indo nāma cakkavattī rājā ahosinti
atk-s0510a:2159_2: attho. Dvesattatimhito kappeti ito dvesattatikappe. Sumananāmakā tayo janā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:2160_0: 11. Samasattatito kappeti ito kappato anūnādhike sattatime kappe varuṇanāmakā varuṇo
atk-s0510a:2160_1: cakkavattīti evaṃnāmakā tayo cakkavattirājāno cakkaratanasampannā catudīpamhi issarā
atk-s0510a:2163_0: Siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato ekatthambhadāyakatherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2163_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2163_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle vanakammiko hutvā ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2163_3: Tasmiṃ samaye sabbe saddhā pasannā upāsakā ekacchandā “bhagavato upaṭṭhānasālaṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0510a:2163_4: dabbasambhāratthāya vanaṃ pavisitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ ekaṃ thambhaṃ dethā”ti
atk-s0510a:2163_5: yāciṃsu. So taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti te sabbe uyyojetvā ekaṃ sāramayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_6: thambhaṃ gahetvā satthu dassetvā tesaṃyeva adāsi. So teneva somanassajāto tadeva
atk-s0510a:2163_7: mūlaṃ katvā aññāni dānādīni puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_8: chasu kāmāvacaresu dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca aggacakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_9: anekavāraṃ anubhavitvā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ padesarajjasampattiñca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2163_10: saddhāsampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhagavato santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_11: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikaronto
atk-s0510a:2164_0: 13. So evaṃ pattaarahatto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2164_1: pakāsento siddhatthassātiādimāha. Tattha siddhatthassa bhagavato bhagyasampannassa
atk-s0510a:2164_2: sammāsambuddhassa. Mahāpūgagaṇoti mahāupāsakasamūho ahu ahosīti attho. Saraṇaṃ gatā
atk-s0510a:2164_3: ca te buddhanti “buddhaṃ saraṇa”nti gatā bhajiṃsu jāniṃsu vā te upāsakā. Tathāgataṃ
atk-s0510a:2164_4: saddahanti buddhaguṇaṃ attano cittasantāne ṭhapentīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2165_0: 14. Sabbe saṅgamma mantetvāti sabbe samāgamma sannipatitvā mantetvā aññamaññaṃ saññāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2165_1: ekacchandā hutvā māḷaṃ upaṭṭhānasālaṃ satthuno atthāya kubbanti karontīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2165_2: Dabbasambhāresu ekatthambhaṃ alabhantā brahāvane mahāvane vicinantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2166_0: 15. Tehaṃ araññe disvānāti ahaṃ te upāsake araññe disvāna gaṇaṃ samūhaṃ upagamma
atk-s0510a:2166_1: samīpaṃ gantvā añjaliṃ paggahetvāna dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2166_2: gaṇaṃ upāsakasamūhaṃ “tumhe imaṃ vanaṃ kimatthaṃ āgatatthā”ti tadā tasmiṃ kāle paripucchinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2167: 16. Te sīlavanto upāsakā me mayā puṭṭhā “māḷaṃ mayaṃ kattukāmā hutvā ekatthambho amhehi na labbhatī”ti viyākaṃsu visesena kathayiṃsūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2168: 17. Mamaṃ mayhaṃ ekatthambhaṃ detha, ahaṃ taṃ dassāmi satthuno santikaṃ ahaṃ thambhaṃ āharissāmi, te bhavanto thambhaharaṇe appossukkā ussāharahitā bhavantūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2169_0: 24. Yaṃ yaṃ yonupapajjāmīti yaṃ yaṃ yoniṃ devattaṃ atha mānusaṃ upagacchāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2169_1: Bhummatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ devaloke vā manussaloke vāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2172_0: Padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato nandattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2172_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2172_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2172_3: santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2172_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjāsakkārabahulaṃ
atk-s0510a:2172_5: mahādānaṃ pavattetvā “ahaṃ, bhante, anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa evarūpo sāvako
atk-s0510a:2173_0: So tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṃsaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle dhammatāya
atk-s0510a:2173_1: nāma nadiyā mahanto kacchapo hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nadiṃ tarituṃ tīre
atk-s0510a:2173_2: ṭhitaṃ disvā sayaṃ bhagavantaṃ tāretukāmo satthu pādamūle nipajji. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2173_3: ñatvā piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi. So haṭṭhatuṭṭho vegena sotaṃ chindanto sīghataraṃ paratīraṃ
atk-s0510a:2173_4: pāpesi. Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṃ vadanto bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ kathetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2174_0: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2174_1: suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā kucchimhi nibbatto, tassa
atk-s0510a:2174_2: nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṃ nandayanto jātoti “nando”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassa
atk-s0510a:2174_3: vayappattakāle bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto anukkamena kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0510a:2174_4: gantvā ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0510a:2174_5: dutiyadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-s0510a:2174_6: patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā “dhammañcare sucarita”nti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-s0510a:2174_7: rājānaṃ sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā tatiyadivase nandakumārassa abhisekagehapavesanaāvāhamaṅgalesu
atk-s0510a:2174_8: vattamānesu piṇḍāya pāvisi. Satthā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā
atk-s0510a:2174_9: tassa hatthato pattaṃ aggahetvāva vihāraṃ gato, taṃ pattahatthaṃ vihāraṃ āgataṃ anicchamānaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:2174_10: pabbājetvā tathāpabbājitattāyeva anabhiratiyā pīḷitaṃ ñatvā upāyena tassa taṃ anabhiratiṃ
atk-s0510a:2174_11: vinodesi. So yoniso paṭisaṅkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2174_12: Thero puna divase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo
atk-s0510a:2174_13: pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ, muñcāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2174_14: etasmā paṭissavā”ti. Bhagavāpi “yadeva te, nanda, anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2174_15: tadāhaṃ mutto etasmā paṭissavā”ti āha. Athassa bhagavā savisesaṃ indriyesu guttadvārataṃ
atk-s0510a:2174_16: ñatvā taṃ guṇaṃ vibhāvento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu
atk-s0510a:2174_17: guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti indriyesu guttadvārabhāvena naṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2174_18: Thero hi “indriyāsaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto, tamahaṃ suṭṭhu niggaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:2174_19: ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2175_0: 27. Evaṃ so etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassappatto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2175_1: pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Vatthaṃ khomaṃ mayā dinnanti khomaraṭṭhe
atk-s0510a:2175_2: jātaṃ vatthaṃ bhagavati cittappasādena gāravabahumānena mayā paramasukhumaṃ khomavatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2175_3: dinnanti attho. Sayambhussāti sayameva bhūtassa jātassa ariyāya jātiyā nibbattassa.
atk-s0510a:2175_5: mahesi, tassa mahesino sayambhussa cīvaratthāya khomavatthaṃ mayā dinnanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2176_0: 28. Taṃ me buddho viyākāsīti ettha tanti sāmyatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tassa vatthadāyakassa
atk-s0510a:2176_1: me dānaphalaṃ visesena akāsi kathesi buddhoti attho. Jalajuttamanāmakoti padumuttaranāmako.
atk-s0510a:2176_2: “Jalaruttamanāyako”tipi pāṭho, tassa jalamānānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ uttamanāyako padhānoti
atk-s0510a:2176_3: attho. Iminā vatthadānenāti iminā vatthadānassa nissandena tvaṃ anāgate hemavaṇṇo
atk-s0510a:2177_0: 29. Dve sampattiṃ anubhotvāti dibbamanussasaṅkhātā dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā. Kusalamūlehi
atk-s0510a:2177_1: coditoti kusalāvayavehi kusalakoṭṭhāsehi codito pesito, “tvaṃ iminā puññena satthu
atk-s0510a:2177_2: kulaṃ pasavāhī”ti pesito viyāti attho. “Gotamassa bhagavato kaniṭṭho tvaṃ bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0510a:2178_0: 30. Rāgaratto sukhasīloti kilesakāmehi ratto allīno kāyasukhacittasukhānubhavanasabhāvo.
atk-s0510a:2178_1: Kāmesu gedhamāyutoti vatthukāmesu gedhasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya āyuto yojitoti attho. Buddhena
atk-s0510a:2178_2: codito santo, tadā tvanti yasmā kāmesu gedhito, tadā tasmā tvaṃ attano bhātukena
atk-s0510a:2178_3: gotamabuddhena codito pabbajjāya uyyojito tassa santike pabbajissasīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2179_0: 31. Pabbajitvāna tvaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ gotamassa bhagavato sāsane tvaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2179_1: kusalamūlena mūlabhūtena puññasambhārena codito bhāvanāyaṃ niyojito sabbāsave sakalāsave
atk-s0510a:2179_2: pariññāya jānitvā pajahitvā anāmayo niddukkho nibbāyissasi adassanaṃ pāpessasi, apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gamissasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2180_0: 32. Satakappasahassamhīti ito kappato pubbe satakappādhike sahassame kappamhi ceḷanāmakā
atk-s0510a:2180_1: cattāro cakkavattirājāno ahesunti attho. Saṭṭhi kappasahassānīti kappasahassāni saṭṭhi
atk-s0510a:2180_2: ca atikkamitvā heṭṭhā ekasmiṃ kappe cattāro janā upaceḷā nāma cakkavattirājāno catūsu
atk-s0510a:2181_0: 33. Pañcakappasahassamhīti pañcakappādhike sahassame kappamhi ceḷā nāma cattāro janā
atk-s0510a:2181_2: catudīpamhi issarā padhānā visuṃ ahesunti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2184_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato cūḷapanthakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2184_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2184_2: bhagavato kāle yadettha aṭṭhuppattivasena vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakanipāte mahāpanthakavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2184_3: vuttameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – mahāpanthakatthero arahattaṃ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0510a:2184_4: vītināmento cintesi – “kathaṃ nu kho sakkā cūḷapanthakampi imasmiṃ sukhe patiṭṭhāpetu”nti.
atk-s0510a:2184_5: So attano ayyakaṃ dhanaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “sace, mahāseṭṭhi, anujānātha,
atk-s0510a:2184_6: ahaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ pabbājeyya”nti. “Pabbājetha, bhante”ti. Thero taṃ pabbājesi. So
atk-s0510a:2185: “Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2187_0: Gāthaṃ uggaṇhanto catūhi māsehi uggahetuṃ nāsakkhi, gahitampi hadaye na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0510a:2187_1: Atha naṃ mahāpanthako, “cūḷapanthaka, tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane abhabbo, catūhi māsehi
atk-s0510a:2187_2: ekaṃ gāthampi gahetuṃ na sakkosi, pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi,
atk-s0510a:2187_3: nikkhama ito”ti so therena paṇāmiko dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2188_0: Tena ca samayena satthā jīvakambavane viharati. Atha jīvako purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha,
atk-s0510a:2188_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantehī”ti. Tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāpanthako
atk-s0510a:2188_2: bhattuddesako hoti. So “pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭicchathā”ti vutto “cūḷapanthakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2188_3: ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ paṭicchāmī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā cūḷapanthako bhiyyosomattāya domanassappatto
atk-s0510a:2188_4: ahosi. Satthā tassa cittakkhedaṃ ñatvā “cūḷapanthako mayā katena upāyena bujjhissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:2188_5: tassa avidūraṭṭhāne attānaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ, panthaka, rodasī”ti pucchi. “Bhātā maṃ,
atk-s0510a:2188_6: bhante, paṇāmetī”ti āha. “Panthaka, mā cintayi, mama sāsane tuyhaṃ pabbajjā, ehi
atk-s0510a:2188_7: imaṃ gahetvā ‘rajoharaṇaṃ, rajoharaṇa’nti manasi karohī”ti iddhiyā suddhaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0510a:2188_8: abhisaṅkharitvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ, rajoharaṇa”nti
atk-s0510a:2188_9: hatthena parimajjanto nisīdi. Tassa taṃ parimajjantassa kiliṭṭhadhātukaṃ jātaṃ, puna
atk-s0510a:2188_10: parimajjantassa ukkhaliparipuñchanasadisaṃ jātaṃ. So ñāṇaparipākattā evaṃ cintesi
atk-s0510a:2188_11: – “idaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ pakatiyā parisuddhaṃ, imaṃ upādiṇṇakasarīraṃ nissāya kiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2188_12: aññathā jātaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ yathāpetaṃ, evaṃ cittampī”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2188_13: tasmiṃyeva nimitte jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2188_14: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattapattassevassa tepiṭakaṃ pañcābhiññā ca āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2189_0: Satthā ekūnehi pañcabhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gantvā jīvakassa nivesane paññatte āsane
atk-s0510a:2189_1: nisīdi. Cūḷapanthako pana attano bhikkhāya appaṭicchitattā eva na gato. Jīvako yāguṃ
atk-s0510a:2189_2: dātuṃ ārabhi. Satthā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. “Kasmā, bhante, na gaṇhathā”ti vutte
atk-s0510a:2189_3: “vihāre eko bhikkhu atthi, jīvakā”ti. So purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, bhaṇe, vihāre
atk-s0510a:2189_4: nisinnaṃ ayyaṃ gahetvā ehī”ti. Cūḷapanthakattheropi rūpena kiriyāya ca ekampi ekena
atk-s0510a:2189_5: asadisaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ nimminitvā nisīdi. So puriso vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2189_6: disvā gantvā jīvakassa kathesi – “imasmā bhikkhusaṅghā vihāre bhikkhusaṅgho bahutaro,
atk-s0510a:2189_7: pakkositabbaṃ ayyaṃ na jānāmī”ti. Jīvako satthāraṃ pucchi – “ko nāmo, bhante, vihāre
atk-s0510a:2189_9: nāma kataro’ti pucchitvā taṃ ānehī”ti. So vihāraṃ gantvā “cūḷapanthako nāma kataro,
atk-s0510a:2189_10: bhante”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ cūḷapanthako, ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti ekappahārena bhikkhusahassampi
atk-s0510a:2189_11: kathesi. So punāgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ jīvakassa ārocesi jīvako paṭividdhasaccattā “iddhimā
atk-s0510a:2189_12: maññe, ayyo”ti nayato ñatvā “gaccha, bhaṇe, paṭhamaṃ kathentaṃ ayyameva ‘tumhe satthā
atk-s0510a:2189_13: pakkosatī’ti vatvā cīvarakaṇṇe gaṇhāhī”ti āha. So vihāraṃ gantvā tathā akāsi. Tāvadeva
atk-s0510a:2189_14: nimmitabhikkhū antaradhāyiṃsu. So theraṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2190_0: Satthā tasmiṃ khaṇe yāguñca khajjakādibhedañca paṭiggaṇhi. Katabhattakicco bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2190_1: āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ āṇāpesi “anumodanaṃ karohī”ti. So pabhinnapaṭisambhido sineruṃ
atk-s0510a:2190_2: gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ manthento viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṅkhobhento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2190_3: gaṇhanto anumodanaṃ akāsi. Dasabale bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gate dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2190_4: kathā udapādi ‘aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma cattāro māse ekagāthaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0510a:2190_5: asakkontampi lahukena khaṇeneva evaṃ mahiddhikaṃ akaṃsū’ti, tathā hi jīvakassa nivesane
atk-s0510a:2190_6: nisinno bhagavā ‘evaṃ cūḷapanthakassa cittaṃ samāhitaṃ, vīthipaṭipannā vipassanā’ti
atk-s0510a:2190_7: ñatvā yathānisinnoyeva attānaṃ dassetvā, ‘panthaka, nevāyaṃ pilotikā kiliṭṭhā rajānukiṇṇā,
atk-s0510a:2190_8: ito pana aññopi ariyassa vinaye saṃkileso rajo’ti dassento –
atk-s0510a:2191: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0510a:2192: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0510a:2195_0: Imā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne cūḷapanthako sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2195_1: pāpuṇīti. Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā āgantvā buddhāsane nisīditvā
atk-s0510a:2195_2: “kiṃ vadetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā “imaṃ nāma, bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhave, cūḷapanthakena
atk-s0510a:2195_3: idāni mayhaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā lokuttharadāyajjaṃ laddhaṃ, pubbe pana lokiyadāyajjaṃ laddha”nti
atk-s0510a:2195_4: vatvā tehi yācito cūḷaseṭṭhijātakaṃ kathesi. Aparabhāge naṃ satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0510a:2195_5: dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2196_0: 35. Evaṃ so pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2196_1: pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Tattha purimapadadvayaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2196_2: Gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho soti so padumuttaro nāma satthā gaṇamhā mahatā bhikkhusamūhato
atk-s0510a:2196_3: vūpakaṭṭho visuṃ bhūto vivekaṃ upagato. Tadā mama tāpasakāle himavante himālayapabbatasamīpe
atk-s0510a:2196_4: vasi vāsaṃ kappesi, catūhi iriyāpathehi vihāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2197_0: 36. Ahampi…pe… tadāti yadā so bhagavā himavantaṃ upagantvā vasi, tadā ahampi himavantasamīpe
atk-s0510a:2197_1: kataassame ā samantato kāyacittapīḷāsaṅkhātā parissayā samanti etthāti assamoti laddhanāme
atk-s0510a:2197_2: araññāvāse vasāmīti sambandho. Acirāgataṃ mahāvīranti aciraṃ āgataṃ mahāvīriyavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2197_3: lokanāyakaṃ padhānaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ upesinti sambandho, āgatakkhaṇeyeva upāgaminti attho.
atk-s0510a:2198_0: 37. Pupphacchattaṃ gahetvānāti evaṃ upagacchanto ca padumuppalapupphādīhi chāditaṃ
atk-s0510a:2198_1: pupphamayaṃ chattaṃ gahetvā narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ bhagavantaṃ chādento upagacchiṃ
atk-s0510a:2198_2: samīpaṃ gatosmīti attho. Samādhiṃ samāpajjantanti rūpāvacarasamādhijjhānaṃ samāpajjantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2198_3: appetvā nisinnassa antarāyaṃ ahaṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2199_0: 38. Ubho hatthehi paggayhāti taṃ susajjitaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dvīhi hatthehi ukkhipitvā
atk-s0510a:2199_1: ahaṃ bhagavato adāsinti sambandho. Paṭiggahesīti taṃ mayā dinnaṃ pupphacchattaṃ padumuttaro
atk-s0510a:2200_0: 41. Satapattachattaṃ paggayhāti ekekasmiṃ padumapupphe satasatapattānaṃ vasena satapattehi
atk-s0510a:2200_1: padumapupphehi chāditaṃ pupphacchattaṃ pakārena ādarena gahetvā tāpaso mama adāsīti
atk-s0510a:2200_2: attho. Tamahaṃ kittayissāmīti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2200_3: Mama bhāsato bhāsamānassa vacanaṃ suṇotha manasi karotha.
atk-s0510a:2201_1: sakko hutvā devarajjaṃ karissatīti sambandho. Catuttiṃsatikkhattuñcāti catuttiṃsativāre
atk-s0510a:2202_0: 43. Yaṃ yaṃ yoninti manussayoniādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jātiṃ saṃsarati gacchati upapajjati.
atk-s0510a:2202_1: Tattha tattha yoniyaṃ abbhokāse suññaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhantaṃ nisinnaṃ ṭhitaṃ vā padumaṃ
atk-s0510a:2203_0: 45. Pakāsite pāvacaneti tena bhagavato sakalapiṭakattaye pakāsite dīpite manussattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2203_1: manussajātiṃ labhissati upapajjissati. Manomayamhi kāyamhīti manena jhānacittena
atk-s0510a:2203_2: nibbattoti manomayo, yathā cittaṃ pavattati, tathā kāyaṃ pavatteti cittagatikaṃ karotīti
atk-s0510a:2203_3: attho. Tamhi manomaye kāyamhi so tāpaso cūḷapanthako nāma hutvā uttamo aggo bhavissatīti
atk-s0510a:2203_4: attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttattā uttānattā ca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:2204_0: 52. Sariṃ kokanadaṃ ahanti ahaṃ bhagavato nimmitacoḷakaṃ parimajjanto kokanadaṃ padumaṃ
atk-s0510a:2204_1: sarinti attho. Tattha cittaṃ vimucci meti tasmiṃ kokanade padume mayhaṃ cittaṃ adhimucci
atk-s0510a:2204_2: allīno, tato ahaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2205: 53. Ahaṃ manomayesu cittagatikesu kāyesu sabbattha sabbesu pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato pattoti sambandho. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2208_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2208_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2208_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayena satthu santike
atk-s0510a:2208_3: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0510a:2208_4: disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2208_5: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto. Parinibbute bhagavati tassa thūpaṃ pūjetvā
atk-s0510a:2208_6: saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2208_7: anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṃ pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saggaparāyanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2208_8: akāsi. So anuppanneyeva amhākaṃ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, pilindotissa
atk-s0510a:2208_9: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Vacchoti gottaṃ. So aparabhāge pilindavacchoti paññāyittha. Saṃsāre
atk-s0510a:2208_10: pana saṃvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṃ nāma vijjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2208_11: sādhetvā tāya vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggapatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2209_0: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ upagato. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:2209_1: buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati, attano kiccaṃ na sādheti. So cintesi
atk-s0510a:2209_2: – “sutaṃ kho panetaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā dharati,
atk-s0510a:2209_3: tattha cūḷagandhāravijjā na sampajjatī’ti samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:2209_4: nāyaṃ mama vijjā sampajjati, nissaṃsayaṃ samaṇo gotamo mahāgandhāravijjaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0510a:2209_5: yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṃ vijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2209_6: upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – “ahaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, tava santike ekaṃ vijjaṃ pariyāpuṇitukāmo,
atk-s0510a:2209_7: okāsaṃ me karohī”ti. “Tena hi mama santike pabbajāhī”ti āha. So “vijjāya parikammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2209_8: pabbajjā”ti maññamāno pabbaji. Tassa bhagavā dhammaṃ kathetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2209_9: adāsi. So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2210_0: 55. Yā pana purimajātiyaṃ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā, tā kataññutaṃ nissāya
atk-s0510a:2210_1: tasmiṃ sañjātabahumānā sāyaṃ pātaṃ theraṃ payirupāsitvā gacchanti. Tasmā naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2210_2: devatānaṃ ativiya piyamanāpabhāvena aggabhāve ṭhapesi “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0510a:2210_3: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ yadidaṃ pilindavaccho”ti. Evaṃ so pattaaggaṭṭhāno
atk-s0510a:2210_4: attano pubbakammaṃ anussaritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute
atk-s0510a:2211_0: Tattha kāmarūpārūpalokassa nātho padhānoti lokanātho. Medhā vuccanti sabbaññutaññāṇaanāvaraṇañāṇādayo,
atk-s0510a:2211_1: sundarā, pasaṭṭhā vā medhā yassa so sumedho, aggo ca so puggalo cāti aggapuggalo,
atk-s0510a:2211_2: tasmiṃ sumedhe lokanāyake aggapuggale khandhaparinibbānena nibbute satīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2211_3: Pasannacitto sumanoti saddhāya pasāditacitto somanassena sundaramano ahaṃ tassa sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:2212_0: 56. Ye ca khīṇāsavā tatthāti tasmiṃ samāgame ye ca khīṇāsavā pahīnakilesā chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0510a:2212_1: chahi abhiññāhi samannāgatā mahiddhikā mahantehi iddhīhi samannāgatā santi, te sabbe
atk-s0510a:2212_2: khīṇāsave ahaṃ tattha samānetvā suṭṭhu ādarena ānetvā saṅghabhattaṃ sakalasaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2213_0: 57. Upaṭṭhāko tadā ahūti tadā mama saṅghabhattadānakāle sumedhassa bhagavato nāmena
atk-s0510a:2213_1: sumedho nāma upaṭṭhākasāvako ahu ahosīti attho. So sāvako mayhaṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ anumodittha
atk-s0510a:2214_0: 58. Tena cittappasādenāti tena thūpapūjākaraṇavasena uppannena cittappasādena devaloke
atk-s0510a:2214_1: dibbavimānaṃ upapajjiṃ upagato asmīti attho, tattha nibbattomhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Chaḷāsītisahassānīti
atk-s0510a:2214_2: tasmiṃ vimāne cha asītisahassāni devaccharāyo me mayhaṃ cittaṃ ramiṃsu ramāpesunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2215_0: 59. Mameva anuvattantīti tā accharāyo sabbakāmehi dibbehi rūpādivatthukāmehi upaṭṭhahantiyo
atk-s0510a:2215_1: mamaṃ eva anuvattanti mama vacanaṃ anukaronti sadā niccakālanti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2218_0: Padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato rāhulattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi āyasmā
atk-s0510a:2218_1: purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2218_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0510a:2218_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento senāsanavisodhanavijjotanādikaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ katvā paṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_5: akāsi. So tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_6: buddhuppāde amhākaṃ bodhisattaṃ paṭicca yasodharāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:2218_7: rāhuloti laddhanāmo mahatā khattiyaparivārena vaḍḍhi. Tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ khandhake
atk-s0510a:2218_8: āgatameva. So pabbajitvā satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovādo paripakkañāṇo
atk-s0510a:2218_9: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahā pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0510a:2220: Yañcamhi putto buddhassa, yañca dhammesu cakkhumā.
atk-s0510a:2221: “Yañca me āsavā khīṇā, yañca natthi punabbhavo;
atk-s0510a:2227_0: Catasso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha ubhayeneva sampannoti jātisampadā paṭipattisampadāti
atk-s0510a:2227_1: ubhayasampattiyāpi sampanno samannāgato. Rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidūti “rāhulabhaddo”ti
atk-s0510a:2227_2: maṃ sabrahmacārino sañjānanti. Tassa hi jātasāsanaṃ sutvā bodhisattena, “rāhu, jāto,
atk-s0510a:2227_3: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttavacanaṃ upādāya suddhodanamahārājā “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2227_4: Tattha ādito pitarā vuttapariyāyameva gahetvā āha – “rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidū”ti.
atk-s0510a:2227_5: Bhaddoti pasaṃsāvacanameva. Aparabhāge satthā taṃ sikkhākāmabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi
atk-s0510a:2227_6: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ yadidaṃ rāhulo”ti.
atk-s0510a:2228_0: 68. Evaṃ so pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2228_1: pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Sattabhūmimhi pāsādeti pasādaṃ somanassaṃ
atk-s0510a:2228_2: janetīti pāsādo. Uparūpari ṭhitā satta bhūmiyo yasmiṃ pāsāde soyaṃ sattabhūmi, tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2228_3: sattabhūmimhi pāsāde. Ādāsaṃ santhariṃ ahanti ādāsatalaṃ nipphādetvā lokajeṭṭhassa
atk-s0510a:2228_4: bhagavato tādino ahaṃ santharaṃ adāsiṃ, santharitvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2229: 69. Khīṇāsavasahassehīti arahantasahassehi parikiṇṇo parivuto. Dvipadindo dvipadānaṃ indo sāmi narāsabho mahāmuni gandhakuṭiṃ tehi saha upāgami pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2230_0: 70. Virocento gandhakuṭinti taṃ gandhakuṭiṃ sobhayamāno devānaṃ devo devadevo narānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2230_1: āsabho narāsabho jeṭṭho satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisīditvā imā byākaraṇagāthāyo
atk-s0510a:2231_0: 71. Yenāyaṃ jotitā seyyāti yena upāsakena ayaṃ pāsādasaṅkhātā seyyā jotitā pabhāsitā
atk-s0510a:2231_1: pajjalitā. Ādāsova kaṃsalohamayaṃ ādāsatalaṃ iva suṭṭhu samaṃ katvā santhatā. Taṃ
atk-s0510a:2231_2: upāsakaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:2232: 81. Aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ tādīti yaṃ yena kāraṇena tādī iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvattā tādī agāre gharāvāse ratiṃ allīnabhāvaṃ ajjhagā pāpuṇi, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2233_0: 82. Nikkhamitvā agārasmāti gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā taṃ tiṇadalamiva pariccajitvā
atk-s0510a:2233_1: subbato susikkhito pabbajissati. Rāhulo nāma nāmenāti suddhodanamahārājena pesitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2233_2: kumārassa jātasāsanaṃ sutvā pitarā siddhatthena, “rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttanāmattā
atk-s0510a:2233_3: rāhulo nāmāti attho. “Yathā candasūriyānaṃ vimānapabhāya kiliṭṭhakaraṇena rāhu asurindo
atk-s0510a:2233_4: upeti gacchati, evamevāyaṃ mama abhinikkhamanapabbajjādīnaṃ antarāyaṃ karontoriva
atk-s0510a:2233_5: jāto”ti adhippāyena, “rāhu jātoti āhā”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Arahā so bhavissatīti so tādiso
atk-s0510a:2233_6: upanissayasampanno vipassanāyaṃ yuttappayutto arahā khīṇāsavo bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2234_0: 83. Kikīva aṇḍaṃ rakkheyyāti aṇḍaṃ bījaṃ rakkhamānā kikī sakuṇī iva appamatto sīlaṃ
atk-s0510a:2234_1: rakkheyya, cāmarī viya vāladhinti vālaṃ rakkhamānā kaṇḍakesu vāle laggante bhindanabhayena
atk-s0510a:2234_2: anākaḍḍhitvā maramānā cāmarī viya jīvitampi pariccajitvā sīlaṃ abhinditvā rakkheyya.
atk-s0510a:2234_3: Nipako sīlasampannoti nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tena nepakkena samannāgato nipako khaṇḍachiddādibhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2234_4: apāpetvā rakkhaṇato sīlasampanno bhavissatīti evaṃ so bhagavā byākaraṇamakāsi. So
atk-s0510a:2234_5: evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo ekadivasaṃ vivekaṭṭhāne nisinno somanassavasena evaṃ rakkhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2237_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:2237_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0510a:2237_3: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2237_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā
atk-s0510a:2237_5: yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme rūpasārī
atk-s0510a:2237_6: brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, upasenotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto tayo vede
atk-s0510a:2237_7: uggaṇhitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadāya
atk-s0510a:2237_8: ekavassiko “ariyagabbhaṃ vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṃ kulaputtaṃ attano santike upasampādetvā
atk-s0510a:2237_9: tena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gato. Satthārā cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2237_10: sutvā “atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bāhullāya āvatto”ti garahito “idānāhaṃ yadi
atk-s0510a:2237_11: parisaṃ nissāya satthārā garahito, parisaṃyeva pana nissāya satthu pasādaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:2237_12: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahā pana hutvā sayampi
atk-s0510a:2237_13: sabbe dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati, aññepi tadatthāya samādapesi, tena naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2237_14: samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So aparena samayena kosambiyaṃ kalahe uppanne
atk-s0510a:2237_15: bhikkhusaṅghe ca dvidhābhūte ekena bhikkhunā taṃ kalahaṃ parivajjitukāmena “etarahi
atk-s0510a:2237_16: kho kalaho uppanno, bhikkhusaṅgho ca dvidhābhūto, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabba”nti
atk-s0510a:2237_17: puṭṭho vivekavāsato paṭṭhāya tassa paṭipattiṃ kathesi. Evaṃ thero tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0510a:2237_18: ovādadānāpadesena attano tathā paṭipannabhāvaṃ dīpento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2238_0: 86. So evaṃ pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2238_1: pakāsento padumuttaraṃ bhagavantantiādimāha. Pabbhāramhi nisīdantanti purato bhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2238_2: namitaṃ onamitanti pabbhāraṃ vivekakāmaṃ vanamajjhe sayaṃjātapabbatapabbhāre nisinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2238_3: naruttamaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahaṃ upagacchiṃ samīpaṃ gatoti attho.
