atk-s0510a:2239_0: 87. Kaṇikārapuppha disvāti tathā upagacchanto tasmiṃ padese supupphitaṃ kaṇikāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2239_1: disvā. Vaṇṭe chetvānahaṃ tadāti tasmiṃ tathāgatassa diṭṭhakāle taṃ pupphaṃ vaṇṭe
atk-s0510a:2239_2: vaṇṭasmiṃ chetvāna chinditvāna. Alaṅkaritvā chattamhīti tena pupphena chattaṃ chādetvā.
atk-s0510a:2239_3: Buddhassa abhiropayinti pabbhāre nisinnassa buddhassa muddhani akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2240_0: 88. Piṇḍapātañca pādāsinti tasmiṃyeva nisinnassa bhagavato piṇḍapātaṃ pakārena adāsiṃ
atk-s0510a:2240_1: bhojesinti attho. Paramannaṃ subhojananti sundarabhojanasaṅkhātaṃ paramannaṃ uttamāhāraṃ.
atk-s0510a:2240_2: Buddhena navame tatthāti tasmiṃ vivekaṭṭhāne buddhena saha navame aṭṭha samaṇe samitapāpe
atk-s0510a:2241_0: Yaṃ vadanti sumedhoti yaṃ gotamasammāsambuddhaṃ bhūripaññaṃ pathavisamānaṃ paññaṃ
atk-s0510a:2241_1: sumedhaṃ sundaraṃ sabbaññutādipaññavantaṃ. Sumedho iti sundarapañño iti vadanti paṇḍitā
atk-s0510a:2241_2: ito kappato satasahasse kappe eso gotamo sammāsambuddho bhavissatīti sambandho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2244_0: Padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā
atk-s0510a:2244_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2244_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0510a:2244_3: nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena
atk-s0510a:2244_4: dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ vaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ pituayyakapayyakādayo
atk-s0510a:2244_5: attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:2244_6: kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tena
atk-s0510a:2244_7: devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:2244_8: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke bhinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2244_9: raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti. Tena samayena
atk-s0510a:2244_10: padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2244_11: khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi. Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2244_12: upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannacitto parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2245_0: Tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2245_1: So taṃ disvā pasannamānaso satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2245_2: datvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthesi. Satthā anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ anāgate
atk-s0510a:2245_3: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2245_4: So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni
atk-s0510a:2245_5: katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2245_6: kāle satthu vemātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṃ puññakiriyāsu
atk-s0510a:2245_7: sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0510a:2245_8: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe thullakoṭṭhikanigame raṭṭhapālaseṭṭhino
atk-s0510a:2245_9: gehe nibbatti, tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthakule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti
atk-s0510a:2245_10: vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi. So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanappatto
atk-s0510a:2245_11: mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojito mahante ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisasampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0510a:2246_0: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2246_1: raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2246_2: pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2246_3: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2246_4: yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2246_5: pana patvā satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṃ thullakoṭṭhikaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0510a:2246_6: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ amataṃ
atk-s0510a:2246_7: viya paribhuñjanto pitarā nimantito svātanāya adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase pitu nivesane
atk-s0510a:2246_8: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane upagantvā “kīdisā nāma tā,
atk-s0510a:2246_9: ayyaputta, accharāyo, yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī”tiādīni vatvā palobhanakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2246_10: kātuṃ āraddhe tassādhippāyaṃ viparivattetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0510a:2248: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0510a:2250: Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atk-s0510a:2252: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0510a:2254: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.

atk-s0510a:2261_0: Imā gāthāyo abhāsi. Imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migājinavanuyyāne
atk-s0510a:2261_1: maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi. Therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2261_2: malle āṇāpesi “nikkhamituṃ mā detha, kāsāyāni apanetvā setakāni nivāsāpethā”ti. Tasmā
atk-s0510a:2261_3: thero ākāsena agamāsi. Atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:2261_4: upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā “idha, bho raṭṭhapāla, pabbajanto
atk-s0510a:2261_5: byādhipārijuññaṃ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṃ vā patto pabbajati, tvaṃ pana kiñcipi
atk-s0510a:2261_6: pārijuññaṃ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajasī”ti pucchi. Athassa thero “upaniyyati loko
atk-s0510a:2261_7: addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, asaraṇo loko sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto
atk-s0510a:2261_8: taṇhādāso”ti imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ attanā viditabhāvaṃ kathetvā tassā desanāya anugītiṃ kathento –
atk-s0510a:2262: “Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā;
atk-s0510a:2263: Luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
atk-s0510a:2265: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0510a:2266: “Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti;
atk-s0510a:2267: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
atk-s0510a:2268: “Kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, ‘aho vatā no amarā’ti cāhu;
atk-s0510a:2269: Vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
atk-s0510a:2270: “So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge;
atk-s0510a:2271: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
atk-s0510a:2272: “Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yena kammaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2273: Na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2274: “Na dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti;
atk-s0510a:2275: Appaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2276: “Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
atk-s0510a:2277: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
atk-s0510a:2278: “Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
atk-s0510a:2279: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
atk-s0510a:2281: Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2282: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0510a:2283: Evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
atk-s0510a:2284: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2285: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0510a:2286: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0510a:2287: Etampi disvāna pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo.
atk-s0510a:2289: Avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2293: Sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2298: Imā gāthā avoca. Evaṃ thero rañño korabyassa dhammaṃ desetvā satthu santikameva gato. Satthā ca aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2299_0: 97-8. Evaṃ so thero pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2299_1: pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Varanāgo mayā dinnoti tassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2299_2: rūpakāye pasīditvā varo uttamo seṭṭho īsādanto rathīsāsadisadanto urūḷhavā bhāravaho
atk-s0510a:2299_3: rājāraho vā. Setacchattopasobhitoti hatthikkhandhe ussāpitasetacchattena upasevito
atk-s0510a:2299_4: sobhamāno. Punapi kiṃ visiṭṭho varanāgo? Sakappano hatthālaṅkārasahito. Saṅghārāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:2299_5: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanatthāya ārāmaṃ vihāraṃ akārayiṃ kāresiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2300_0: 99. Catupaññāsasahassānīti tasmiṃ kārāpite vihārabbhantare catupaññāsasahassāni pāsādāni
atk-s0510a:2300_1: ca ahaṃ akārayiṃ kāresinti attho. Mahoghadānaṃ karitvānāti sabbaparikkhārasahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2300_2: mahoghasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ sajjetvā mahesino munino niyyādesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2301_1: vīriyena mahāvīro sayambhū sayameva bhūto jāto laddhasabbaññutaññāṇo aggo seṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2301_2: puggalo anumodi vihārānumodanaṃ akāsi. Sabbe jane hāsayantoti sakalānantāparimāṇe
atk-s0510a:2301_3: devamanusse hāsayanto santuṭṭhe kurumāno amatanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ catusaccadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2301_4: desesi pakāsesi vivari vibhaji uttānī akāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2302_0: 101. Taṃ me viyākāsīti taṃ mayhaṃ katapuññaṃ balaṃ visesena pākaṭaṃ akāsi. Jalajuttamanāmakoti
atk-s0510a:2302_1: jale jātaṃ jalajaṃ padumaṃ, padumuttaranāmakoti attho. “Jalanuttamanāyako”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0510a:2302_2: Tattha attano pabhāya jalantīti jalanā, candimasūriyadevabrahmāno, tesaṃ jalanānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2302_3: uttamoti jalanuttamo. Sabbasattānaṃ nāyako uttamoti nāyako, sambhāravante satte nibbānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2302_4: neti pāpetīti vā nāyako, jalanuttamo ca so nāyako cāti jalanuttamanāyako. Bhikkhusaṅghe
atk-s0510a:2302_5: nisīditvāti bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno imā gāthā abhāsatha pākaṭaṃ katvā kathesīti
atk-s0510a:2305_0: Pabbhāraṃ sodhayantassātiādikaṃ āyasmato sopākattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2305_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2305_2: bhagavato kāle aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2305_3: disvā bījapūraphalāni satthu upanesi, paribhuñji bhagavā tassānukampaṃ upādāya. So
atk-s0510a:2305_4: bhikkhu satthari saṅghe ca abhippasanno salākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅghuddesavasena
atk-s0510a:2305_5: tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ khīrabhattaṃ adāsi. So tehi puññehi aparāparaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2305_6: sampattiyo anubhavanto ekadā manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2306_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde purimakammanissandena
atk-s0510a:2306_1: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarāya duggatitthiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Sā taṃ dasamāse
atk-s0510a:2306_2: kucchinā pariharitvā paripakke gabbhe vijāyanakāle vijāyituṃ asakkontī mucchaṃ āpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:2306_3: bahuvelaṃ matā viya nipajji. Ñātakā “matā”ti saññāya susānaṃ netvā citakaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0510a:2306_4: devatānubhāvena vātavuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhitāya aggiṃ adatvā pakkamiṃsu. Dārako pacchimabhavikattā
atk-s0510a:2306_5: devatānubhāveneva arogo hutvā mātukucchito nikkhami. Mātā pana kālamakāsi. Devatā
atk-s0510a:2306_6: manussarūpenupagamma taṃ gahetvā susānagopakassa gehe ṭhapetvā katipāhaṃ kālaṃ patirūpena
atk-s0510a:2306_7: āhārena posesi. Tato paraṃ susānagopako attano puttaṃ katvā vaḍḍhesi. So tathā vaḍḍhento
atk-s0510a:2306_8: tassa puttena suppiyena nāma dārakena saddhiṃ kīḷanto vicari. Tassa susāne jātasaṃvaḍḍhabhāvato
atk-s0510a:2307_0: Athekadivasaṃ sattavassikaṃ taṃ bhagavā paccūsavelāyaṃ ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā veneyyabandhave
atk-s0510a:2307_1: olokento ñāṇajālassa antogataṃ disvā susānaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Dārako pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0510a:2307_2: pasannamānaso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2307_3: So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pitarā “anuññātosī”ti vutto pitaraṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2307_4: ānesi. Tassa pitā satthāraṃ vanditvā “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājetha, bhante”ti anujāni,
atk-s0510a:2307_5: taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavā mettābhāvanāya niyojesi. So mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā susāne
atk-s0510a:2307_6: viharanto nacirasseva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2307_7: Arahā hutvāpi aññesaṃ sosānikabhikkhūnaṃ mettābhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento “yathāpi ekaputtasmi”nti
atk-s0510a:2307_8: gāthaṃ abhāsi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ekaputtake piye manāpe mātā pitā ca kusalī
atk-s0510a:2307_9: ekantahitesī bhaveyya, evaṃ puratthimādibhedāsu sabbāsu disāsu kāmabhavādibhedesu
atk-s0510a:2307_10: vā sabbesu bhavesu daharādibhedāsu sabbāsu avatthāsupi ṭhitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitāya
atk-s0510a:2307_11: kusalī bhaveyya “mitto, udāsino, paccatthiko”ti sīmaṃ akatvā sīmāya sambhedavasena
atk-s0510a:2307_12: sabbattha ekarasaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyāti imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā “sace tumhe āyasmanto
atk-s0510a:2307_13: evaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyātha, ye te bhagavatā ‘sukhaṃ supatī’tiādinā ekādasa mettānisaṃsā
atk-s0510a:2307_14: ca vuttā, ekaṃsena tesaṃ bhāgino bhavathā”ti ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2308_0: 112. Evaṃ so pattaphalādhigamo attano katapuññaṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso
atk-s0510a:2308_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento pabbhāraṃ sodhayantassātiādimāha. Tattha pabbhāranti
atk-s0510a:2308_2: silāpabbatassa vivekaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ pabbajitānurūpattā iṭṭhakapākāraṃ katvā dvārakavāṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:2308_3: yojetvā bhikkhūnaṃ vasanatthāya adāsi, pakārena bharo patthetabboti pabbhāro, taṃ
atk-s0510a:2308_4: sodhayantassa mama santikaṃ siddhattho nāma bhagavā āgacchi pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2309_0: 113. Buddhaṃ upagataṃ disvāti evaṃ mama santikaṃ āgataṃ disvā tādino iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
atk-s0510a:2309_1: akampiyasabhāvattā tādiguṇayuttassa lokajeṭṭhassa buddhassa santharaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādisantharaṃ
atk-s0510a:2309_2: kaṭṭhattharaṃ paññāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā pupphāsanaṃ pupphamayaṃ āsanaṃ ahaṃ adāsiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2310_0: 114. Pupphāsane nisīditvāti tasmiṃ paññatte pupphāsane nisīditvā lokanāyako siddhattho
atk-s0510a:2310_1: bhagavā. Mamañca gatimaññāyāti mayhaṃ gatiṃ āyatiṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ aññāya jānitvā
atk-s0510a:2311_0: 115. Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti vata ekantena saṅkhārā paccayehi samecca samāgantvā karīyamānā
atk-s0510a:2311_1: sabbe sappaccayadhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. Uppādavayadhamminoti uppajjitvā
atk-s0510a:2311_2: vinassanasabhāvā uppajjitvā pātubhavitvā ete saṅkhārā nirujjhanti vinassantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2311_3: Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ visesena upasamo sukho, tesaṃ vūpasamakaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2312_0: 116. Idaṃ vatvāna sabbaññūti sabbadhammajānanako bhagavā lokānaṃ jeṭṭho vuḍḍho narānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2312_1: āsabho padhāno vīro idaṃ aniccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vatvāna kathetvā ambare
atk-s0510a:2312_2: ākāse haṃsarājā iva nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ abbhuggamīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2313_0: 117. Sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ attano laddhiṃ khantiṃ ruciṃ ajjhāsayaṃ jahitvāna pahāya. Bhāvayāniccasaññahanti
atk-s0510a:2313_1: anicce aniccanti pavattasaññaṃ ahaṃ bhāvayiṃ vaḍḍhesiṃ manasi akāsiṃ. Tattha kālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2313_2: kato ahanti tattha tissaṃ jātiyaṃ tato jātito ahaṃ kālaṃ kato mato.
atk-s0510a:2314_0: 118. Dve sampattī anubhotvāti manussasampattidibbasampattisaṅkhātā dve sampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2314_1: anubhavitvā. Sukkamūlena coditoti purāṇakusalamūlena, mūlabhūtena kusalena vā codito
atk-s0510a:2314_2: sañcodito. Pacchime bhave sampatteti pariyosāne bhave sampatte pāpuṇite. Sapākayonupāgaminti
atk-s0510a:2314_3: sakaṃ pacitabhattaṃ sapākaṃ yoniṃ upāgamiṃ. Yassa kulassa attano pacitabhattaṃ aññehi
atk-s0510a:2314_4: abhuñjanīyaṃ, tasmiṃ caṇḍālakule nibbattosmīti attho. Atha vā sā vuccati sunakho,
atk-s0510a:2317_0: Āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmotiādikaṃ āyasmato sumaṅgalattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2317_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0510a:2317_2: bhagavato kāle rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti. So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nhatvā ekacīvaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_3: ṭhitaṃ disvā somanassappatto apphoṭesi. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2317_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake tādisena kammanissandena
atk-s0510a:2317_5: daliddakule nibbatti, tassa sumaṅgaloti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto khujjakāsitanaṅgalakuddālaparikkhāro
atk-s0510a:2317_6: hutvā kasiyā jīvikaṃ kappesi. So ekadivasaṃ raññā pasenadinā kosalena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2317_7: ca mahādāne pavattiyamāne dānūpakaraṇāni gahetvā āgacchantehi manussehi saddhiṃ dadhighaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_8: gahetvā āgato bhikkhūnaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ disvā “ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhumavatthanivatthā
atk-s0510a:2317_9: subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti, yaṃnūnāhampi pabbajeyya”nti
atk-s0510a:2317_10: cintetvā aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano pabbajādhippāyaṃ nivedesi. So
atk-s0510a:2317_11: taṃ karuṇāyanto pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. So araññe viharanto ekakavihāre
atk-s0510a:2317_12: nibbinno ukkaṇṭhito hutvā vibbhamitukāmo ñātigāmaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kacchaṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_13: bandhitvā khettaṃ kasante kiliṭṭhavatthanivatthe samantato rajokiṇṇasarīre vātātapena
atk-s0510a:2317_14: sussante khettaṃ kassake manusse disvā “mahantaṃ vatime sattā jīvikanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_15: paccanubhavantī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi. Ñāṇassa paripākagatattā cassa yathāgahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_16: kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā vivekaṃ labhitvā yonisomanasikaronto
atk-s0510a:2318_0: 124. Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2318_1: pakāsento āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmohantiādimāha. Tattha āhutinti annapānādianekavidhaṃ pūjāsakkārūpakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2318_2: Yiṭṭhukāmoti yajitukāmo, dānaṃ dātukāmo ahaṃ. Paṭiyādetvāna bhojananti āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0510a:2318_3: nipphādetvā. Brāhmaṇe paṭimānentoti paṭiggāhake suddhapabbajite pariyesanto. Visāle
atk-s0510a:2318_4: māḷake ṭhitoti parisuddhapaṇḍarapulinatalābhirāme vipule māḷake ṭhito.
atk-s0510a:2319_0: 125-7. Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhantiādīsu mahāyasaṃ mahāparivāraṃ sabbalokaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_1: vinetānaṃ visesena netāraṃ nibbānasampāpakaṃ sayambhuṃ sayameva bhūtaṃ anācariyakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_2: aggapuggalaṃ seṭṭhapuggalaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhagyavantādiguṇayuttaṃ jutimantaṃ nīlapītādipabhāsampannaṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_3: sāvakehi purakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ ādiccamiva sūriyamiva rocantaṃ sobhamānaṃ rathiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_4: vīthiyaṃ paṭipannakaṃ gacchantaṃ piyadassiṃ nāma sambuddhaṃ addasinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2319_5: Añjaliṃ paggahetvānāti bandhañjalipuṭaṃ sirasi katvā sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādayiṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_6: itthambhūtassa bhagavato guṇe pasādesiṃ pasannamakāsinti attho. Manasāva nimantesinti
atk-s0510a:2319_7: cittena pavāresiṃ. Āgacchatu mahāmunīti mahito pūjāraho muni bhagavā mama nivesanaṃ āgacchatu.
atk-s0510a:2320_0: 128. Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti mayhaṃ cittasaṅkappaṃ ñatvā loke sattaloke anuttaro uttaravirahito
atk-s0510a:2320_1: satthā khīṇāsavasahassehi arahantasahassehi parivuto mama dvāraṃ mayhaṃ gehadvāraṃ upāgami sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2321_0: 129. Tassa sampattassa satthuno evaṃ namakkāramakāsiṃ. Purisājañña purisānaṃ ājañña,
atk-s0510a:2321_1: seṭṭha, mama namakkāro te tuyhaṃ atthu bhavatu. Purisuttama purisānaṃ uttama adhikaguṇavisiṭṭha
atk-s0510a:2321_2: te tuyhaṃ mama namakkāro atthu. Pāsādaṃ pasādajanakaṃ mama nivesanaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0510a:2322_0: 130. Danto dantaparivāroti sayaṃ dvārattayena danto tathā dantāhi bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakaupāsikāsaṅkhātāhi
atk-s0510a:2322_1: catūhi parisāhi parivārito. Tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varoti sayaṃ tiṇṇo saṃsārato uttiṇṇo
atk-s0510a:2322_2: nikkhanto tārayataṃ tārayantānaṃ visiṭṭhapuggalānaṃ varo uttamo bhagavā mamārādhanena
atk-s0510a:2322_3: pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pavarāsane uttamāsane nisīdi nisajjaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2323_0: 131. Yaṃ me atthi sake geheti attano gehe yaṃ āmisaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ sampāditaṃ rāsikataṃ
atk-s0510a:2323_1: atthi. Tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsinti buddhassa buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa taṃ āmisaṃ
atk-s0510a:2323_2: pādāsiṃ pa-kārena ādarena vā adāsinti attho. Pasanno sehi pāṇibhīti attano dvīhi
atk-s0510a:2324_0: 132. Pasannacitto pasāditamanasaṅkappo sumano sundaramano. Vedajāto jātavedo uppannasomanasso
atk-s0510a:2324_1: katañjalī sirasi ṭhapitaañjalipuṭo buddhaseṭṭhaṃ namassāmi seṭṭhassa buddhassa paṇāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:2324_2: karomīti attho. Aho buddhassuḷāratāti paṭividdhacatusaccassa satthuno uḷāratā mahantabhāvo
atk-s0510a:2325_0: 133. Aṭṭhannaṃ payirūpāsatanti payirupāsantānaṃ bhuñjaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2325_1: antare khīṇāsavā arahantova bahūti attho. Tuyheveso ānubhāvoti eso ākāsacaraṇaummujjananimujjanādiānubhāvo
atk-s0510a:2325_2: tuyheva tuyhaṃ eva ānubhāvo, nāññesaṃ. Saraṇaṃ taṃ upemahanti taṃ itthambhūtaṃ tuvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2325_3: saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyananti upemi gacchāmi jānāmi vāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2326: 134. Lokajeṭṭho narāsabho piyadassī bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisīditvā imā byākaraṇagāthā abhāsatha kathesīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2331_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato subhūtittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2331_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0510a:2331_2: anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṃsavatīnagare aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa
atk-s0510a:2331_3: ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti, tassa nandamāṇavoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede
atk-s0510a:2331_4: uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya māṇavasahassehi
atk-s0510a:2331_5: saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0510a:2331_6: Antevāsikānampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. Tepi nacirasseva jhānalābhino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2332_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-s0510a:2332_1: viharanto ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_2: arahattūpanissayaṃ, nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa
atk-s0510a:2332_3: patthanaṃ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0510a:2332_4: aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0510a:2332_5: gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_6: patiṭṭhāsi. Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante
atk-s0510a:2332_7: sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato nāma agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0510a:2332_8: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchedo sabbaññū buddho hoti, ayaṃ purisājānīyo nissaṃsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_9: buddho”ti ñatvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2332_10: adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2332_11: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni
atk-s0510a:2332_12: phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṃ sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnākāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_13: oloketvā āhaṃsu – “ācariya, mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0510a:2332_14: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti. Nandatāpaso – “tātā, kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0510a:2332_15: tumhe sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ upametuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0510a:2332_16: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mā maṃ upamitthā”ti āha. Atha te tāpasā – “sace ayaṃ orako
atk-s0510a:2332_17: abhavissa, na amhākaṃ ācariyo evaṃ upamaṃ āhareyya. Yāva mahāvatāyaṃ purisājānīyo”ti
atk-s0510a:2332_18: pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu. Atha te ācariyo āha – “tātā, amhākaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_19: anucchaviko deyyadhammo natthi, bhagavā ca bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ idhāgato, tasmā mayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_20: yathābalaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dassāma, tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_21: taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā sahattheneva dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:2332_22: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Tāpaso udakampi
atk-s0510a:2332_23: sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe
atk-s0510a:2332_24: antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. Satthā “bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0510a:2332_25: āgacchatū”ti cintesi. Satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_0: Atha nandatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, buddhānaṃ nisinnāsanampi nīcaṃ, samaṇasatasahassassapi
atk-s0510a:2333_1: āsanaṃ natthi. Tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:2333_2: pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharathā”ti āha. Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa
atk-s0510a:2333_3: te muhutteneva vaṇṇagandharasasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:2333_4: pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanādibhedaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2333_5: saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa
atk-s0510a:2333_6: purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante, amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2333_7: āruyha nisīdathā”ti āha. Nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane. Evaṃ nisinne satthari satthu
atk-s0510a:2333_8: ākāraṃ ñatvā bhikkhū attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu. Nandatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2333_9: gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “tāpasānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo
atk-s0510a:2333_10: hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji. Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2333_11: samāpajjiṃsu. Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle
atk-s0510a:2333_12: sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_13: Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ dhārentoyeva sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmesi.
atk-s0510a:2334_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_1: ekaṃ sāvakaṃ “isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti āṇāpesi. So cakkavattirañño
atk-s0510a:2334_2: santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_3: buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā anumodanamakāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_4: desesi. Satthu desanāvasāne sabbepi catucattālīsasahassatāpasā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2334_5: Satthā – “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Tesaṃ tāvadeva kesamassū antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2334_6: Aṭṭha parikkhārā sarīre paṭimukkāva ahesuṃ. Te saṭṭhivassikattherā viya satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_7: parivārayiṃsu. Nandatāpaso pana vikkhittacittatāya visesaṃ nādhigañchi. Tassa kira
atk-s0510a:2334_8: araṇavihārittherassa dhammaṃ sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya – “aho vatāhampi anāgate
atk-s0510a:2334_9: ekassa buddhassa sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhaguṇaṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ udapādi. So
atk-s0510a:2334_10: tena vitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_11: paggayha sammukhe ṭhito evamāha – “bhante, yena bhikkhunā isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanā
atk-s0510a:2334_12: katā, ko nāmāyaṃ tumhākaṃ sāsane”ti? “Araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena ca etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_13: patto eso bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante, yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro
atk-s0510a:2334_14: kato, tena adhikārena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0510a:2334_15: sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi samannāgato sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2335_0: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0510a:2335_1: olokento kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṃ disvā, “tāpasa, na te ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2335_2: patthanā moghaṃ bhavissati, anāgate kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0510a:2335_3: uppajjissati, tassa santike samijjhissatī”ti dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0510a:2335_4: ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Nandatāpaso yāva cakkhupathaṃ na samatikkamati, tāva satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2335_5: ca añjaliṃ paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. So aparabhāge kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2335_6: dhammaṃ suṇitvā aparihīnajjhānova kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto. Tato pana cuto
atk-s0510a:2335_7: aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññakova ahosi, kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi
atk-s0510a:2335_8: pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā
atk-s0510a:2335_9: mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi, gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pana āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0510a:2335_10: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2336_0: Evaṃ so tāvatiṃsabhavane aparāparaṃ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato
atk-s0510a:2336_1: cuto manussaloke anekasatakkhattuṃ cakkavattirājā padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṃ manussasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2336_2: anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato uppannakāle sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0510a:2336_3: kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti. Subhūtītissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2337_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0510a:2337_1: rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0510a:2337_2: sītavane vihāsi. Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2337_3: attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gehaṃ gantvā buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ sītavane
atk-s0510a:2337_4: viharantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_5: āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0510a:2337_6: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṃ aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetassa kumārassa uyyānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_7: koṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi. Vihāramahadivase ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_8: subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0510a:2337_9: pabbaji. So upasampanno dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_10: karonto mettājhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2338_0: So dhammaṃ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṃ katvā deseti, tasmā
atk-s0510a:2338_1: araṇavihārīnaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Yasmā ca piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:2338_2: vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti “evaṃ dāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti, tasmā dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2338_3: aggo nāma jāto. Tena naṃ bhagavā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2338_4: araṇavihārīnaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānañca yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti dvayaṅgasamannāgate aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2338_5: ṭhapesi. Evamayaṃ mahāthero attanā pūritapāramīnaṃ phalassa matthakaṃ arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:2338_6: loke abhiññāto abhilakkhito hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2339_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha,
atk-s0510a:2339_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vo karissāmī”ti vatvā pakkanto vissari. Thero senāsanaṃ alabhanto abbhokāse
atk-s0510a:2339_2: vītināmesi. Therassānubhāvena devo na vassati. Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā rañño
atk-s0510a:2339_3: nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu. Rājā “kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī”ti vīmaṃsanto
atk-s0510a:2339_4: “therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī”ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2339_5: “imissaṃ, bhante, paṇṇakuṭiyaṃ vasathā”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Thero kuṭiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:2339_6: tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi. Tadā devo thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyati, na sammādhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2339_7: anupavecchati. Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṃ vidhamitukāmo attano ajjhattikabāhiravatthukassa
atk-s0510a:2339_8: parissayassa abhāvaṃ pavedento “channā me kuṭikā”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho theragāthāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
atk-s0510a:2340_0: Kasmā panete mahātherā attano guṇe pakāsentīti? Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṃ
atk-s0510a:2340_1: paramagambhīraṃ ativiya santaṃ paṇītaṃ attanā adhigatalokuttaradhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0510a:2340_3: ariyā attano guṇe pakāsenti. Yathā taṃ lokanātho bodhaneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “dasabalasamannāgato,
atk-s0510a:2340_4: bhikkhave, tathāgato catuvesārajjavisārado”tiādinā attano guṇe pakāseti. Evamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2341_0: 1. Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno ca attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2341_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha. Tattha himavantassāti himālayapabbatassa
atk-s0510a:2341_2: avidūre āsanne samīpe pabbatapāde manussānaṃ gamanāgamanasampanne sañcaraṇaṭṭhāneti
atk-s0510a:2341_3: attho. Nisabho nāma pabbatoti pabbatānaṃ jeṭṭhattā nāmena nisabho nāma selamayapabbato
atk-s0510a:2341_4: ahosīti sambandho. Assamo sukato mayhanti tattha pabbate mayhaṃ vasanatthāya assamo
atk-s0510a:2341_6: katoti attho. Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇehi chāditā sālā mayhaṃ nivāsanatthāya suṭṭhu
atk-s0510a:2342_0: 2. Kosiyo nāma nāmenāti mātāpitūhi katanāmadheyyena kosiyo nāma. Uggatāpano pākaṭatapo
atk-s0510a:2342_1: ghoratapo. Ekākiyo aññesaṃ abhāvā ahaṃ eva eko. Adutiyo dutiyatāpasarahito jaṭilo
atk-s0510a:2342_2: jaṭādhārī tāpaso tadā tasmiṃ kāle nisabhe pabbate vasāmi viharāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2343_0: 3. Phalaṃ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṃ tadāti tadā tasmiṃ nisabhapabbate vasanakāle
atk-s0510a:2343_1: tiṇḍukādiphalaṃ muḷālādimūlaṃ, kārapaṇṇādipaṇṇañca rukkhato ocinitvā na bhuñjāmīti
atk-s0510a:2343_2: attho. Evaṃ sati kathaṃ jīvatīti taṃ dassento pavattaṃva supātāhanti āha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:2343_3: pavattaṃ sayameva jātaṃ supātaṃ attano dhammatāya patitaṃ paṇṇādikaṃ nissāya āhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2343_4: katvā ahaṃ tāvade tasmiṃ kāle jīvāmi jīvikaṃ kappemīti sambandho. “Pavattapaṇḍupaṇṇānī”ti
atk-s0510a:2343_5: vā pāṭho, tassa sayameva patitāni paṇḍupaṇṇāni rukkhapattāni upanissāya jīvāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2344_0: 4. Nāhaṃ kopemi ājīvanti ahaṃ jīvitaṃ cajamānopi pariccāgaṃ kurumānopi taṇhāvasena
atk-s0510a:2344_1: phalamūlādiāhārapariyesanāya sammā ājīvaṃ na kopemi na nāsemīti sambandho. Ārādhemi
atk-s0510a:2344_2: sakaṃ cittanti sakaṃ cittaṃ attano manaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā ca ārādhemi pasādemi.
atk-s0510a:2344_3: Vivajjemi anesananti vejjakammadūtakammādivasena anesanaṃ ayuttapariyesanaṃ vivajjemi dūraṃ karomi.
atk-s0510a:2345_0: 5. Rāgūpasaṃhitaṃ cittanti yadā yasmiṃ kāle mama rāgena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0510a:2345_1: tadā sayameva attanāyeva paccavekkhāmi ñāṇena paṭivekkhitvā vinodemi. Ekaggo taṃ
atk-s0510a:2345_2: damemahanti ahaṃ ekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe aggo samāhito taṃ rāgacittaṃ damemi damanaṃ karomi.
atk-s0510a:2346_0: 6. Rajjase rajjanīye cāti rajjanīye allīyitabbe rūpārammaṇādivatthusmiṃ rajjase allīno
atk-s0510a:2346_1: asi bhavasi. Dussanīye ca dussaseti dūsitabbe dosakaraṇavatthusmiṃ dūsako asi. Muyhase
atk-s0510a:2346_2: mohanīye cāti mohitabbe mohakaraṇavatthusmiṃ moyhasi mūḷho asi bhavasi. Tasmā tuvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2346_3: vanā vanato araññavāsato nikkhamassu apagacchāhīti evaṃ attānaṃ damemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2347: 24. Timbarūsakavaṇṇābhoti suvaṇṇatimbarūsakavaṇṇābho, jambonadasuvaṇṇavaṇṇoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2350_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato upavānattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2350_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2350_2: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa
atk-s0510a:2350_4: thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarasāṭakaṃ veḷagge laggetvā ābandhitvā dhajaṃ
atk-s0510a:2350_5: katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2350_6: ṭhapito adissamānakāyo taṃ ākāse dhārento cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0510a:2350_7: taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso hutvā tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2350_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā upavānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0510a:2350_9: jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0510a:2350_10: kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Yadā bhagavato aphāsu ahosi, tadā
atk-s0510a:2350_11: thero uṇhodakaṃ tathārūpaṃ pānakañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi. Tenassa satthuno
atk-s0510a:2350_12: rogo vūpasami. Tassa bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2351_0: 52. Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo adhigataetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:2351_1: somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0510a:2351_2: sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ pāragū pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ gato patto padumuttaro
atk-s0510a:2351_3: nāma jino jitapañcamāro bhagavā aggikkhandho iva chabbaṇṇā buddharaṃsiyo jalitvā
atk-s0510a:2351_4: sabbalokaṃ dhammapajjotena obhāsetvā sambuddho suṭṭhu buddho avijjāniddūpagatāya
atk-s0510a:2351_5: pajāya savāsanāya kilesaniddāya paṭibuddho vikasitanettapaṅkajo parinibbuto khandhaparinibbānena
atk-s0510a:2352: 57. Jaṅghāti cetiyakaraṇakāle upacinitabbānaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ ṭhapanatthāya, nibandhiyamānasopānapanti.
atk-s0510a:2353_0: 88. Sudhotaṃ rajakenāhanti vatthadhovakena purisena suṭṭhu dhovitaṃ suvisuddhakataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2353_1: uttareyyapaṭaṃ mama uttarasāṭakaṃ ahaṃ veḷagge laggitvā dhajaṃ katvā ukkhipiṃ, ambare
atk-s0510a:2356_0: Nagare bandhumatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato tisaraṇagamaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2356_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2356_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā andhamātāpitaro upaṭṭhāsi. So
atk-s0510a:2356_3: ekadivasaṃ cintesi – “ahaṃ mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanto pabbajituṃ na labhāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2356_4: tīṇi saraṇāni gaṇhissāmi, evaṃ duggatito mocessāmī”ti nisabhaṃ nāma vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2356_5: aggasāvakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tīṇi saraṇāni gaṇhi. So tāni vassasatasahassāni rakkhitvā
atk-s0510a:2356_6: teneva kammena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto, tato paraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2356_7: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare mahāsālakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2356_8: sattavassikova dārakehi parivuto ekaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ agamāsi. Tattha eko khīṇāsavatthero
atk-s0510a:2356_9: tassa dhammaṃ desetvā saraṇāni adāsi. So tāni gahetvā pubbe attano rakkhitāni saraṇāni
atk-s0510a:2356_10: saritvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ arahattappattaṃ bhagavā upasampādesi.
atk-s0510a:2357_0: 106. So arahattappatto upasampanno hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena
atk-s0510a:2357_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha. Tattha mātu upaṭṭhāko
atk-s0510a:2357_2: ahunti ahaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhāko bharako bandhumatīnagare ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2358: 108. Tamandhakārapihitāti mohandhakārena pihitā chāditā. Tividhaggīhi ḍayhareti rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi tīhi aggīhi ḍayhare ḍayhanti sabbe sattāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2359: 114. Aṭṭha hetū labhāmahanti aṭṭha kāraṇāni sukhassa paccayabhūtāni kāraṇāni labhāmi ahanti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2362_0: Nagare candavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcasīlasamādāniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2362_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2362_2: anomadassissa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto purimabhave katākusalakammānurūpena
atk-s0510a:2362_3: daliddo hutvā appannapānabhojano paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvanto saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0510a:2362_4: pabbajitukāmopi pabbajjaṃ alabhamāno anomadassissa bhagavato sāvakassa nisabhattherassa
atk-s0510a:2362_5: santike pañca sikkhāpadāni samādiyi. Dīghāyukakāle uppannattā vassasatasahassāni
atk-s0510a:2362_6: sīlaṃ paripālesi. Tena kammena so devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2362_7: mahābhogakule nibbatto. Mātāpitaro sīlaṃ samādiyante disvā attano sīlaṃ saritvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2363_0: 134. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto udānavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2363_1: nagare candavatiyātiādimāha. Bhatako āsahaṃ tadāti tadā mama puññakaraṇakāle ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2363_2: bhatako bhatiyā kammakārako āsiṃ ahosiṃ. Parakammāyane yuttoti bhatiyā paresaṃ kammakaraṇe
atk-s0510a:2363_3: āyutto yojito okāsābhāvena saṃsārato muccanatthāya ahaṃ pabbajjaṃ na labhāmi.
atk-s0510a:2364_0: 135. Mahandhakārapihitāti mahantehi kilesandhakārehi pihitā saṃvutā thakitā. Tividhaggīhi
atk-s0510a:2364_1: ḍayhareti narakaggipetaggisaṃsāraggisaṅkhātehi tīhi aggīhi ḍayhanti. Ahaṃ pana kena
atk-s0510a:2364_2: upāyena kena kāraṇena visaṃyutto bhaveyyanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2365_0: 136. Deyyadhammo annapānādidātabbayuttakaṃ vatthu mayhaṃ natthi, tassābhāvena ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2365_1: varāko dukkhito bhatako bhatiyā jīvanako yaṃnūnāhaṃ pañcasīlaṃ rakkheyyaṃ paripūrayanti
atk-s0510a:2365_2: pañcasīlaṃ samādiyitvā paripūrento yaṃnūna rakkheyyaṃ sādhukaṃ bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2366_0: 148. Svāhaṃ yasamanubhavinti so ahaṃ devamanussesu mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhaviṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:2366_1: sīlānaṃ vāhasā ānubhāvenāti attho. Kappakoṭimpi tesaṃ sīlānaṃ phalaṃ kittento ekakoṭṭhāsameva
atk-s0510a:2366_2: kittaye pākaṭaṃ kareyyanti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2369_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādikaṃ āyasmato annasaṃsāvakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2369_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2369_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto piṇḍāya carantaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇabyāmappabhāmaṇḍalopasobhitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2369_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā gehaṃ netvā varaannapānena
atk-s0510a:2369_4: santappetvā sampavāretvā bhojesi. So teneva cittappasādena tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:2369_5: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā manussaloke nibbattitvā manussasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2369_6: anubhavitvā tato aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2369_7: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2369_8: pāpuṇi. So pubbe katapuññanāmavasena annasaṃsāvakattheroti pākaṭanāmo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2370_0: 155-6. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto “evaṃ mayā iminā puññasambhārānubhāvena
atk-s0510a:2370_1: pattaṃ arahatta”nti attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2370_2: Tattha suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa bhagavato soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, taṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:2370_3: sambuddhaṃ siddhatthanti attho. Gacchantaṃ antarāpaṇeti vessānaṃ āpaṇapantīnaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2370_5: sampannaṃ lokapajjotaṃ sakalalokadīpabhūtaṃ appameyyaṃ pamāṇavirahitaṃ anopamaṃ upamāvirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2370_6: jutindharaṃ pabhādhāraṃ nīlapītādichabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo dhārakaṃ siddhatthaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2370_7: paramaṃ uttamaṃ pītiṃ alatthaṃ alabhinti sambandho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2373_0: Siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato dhūpadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2373_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2373_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto siddhatthe bhagavati cittaṃ pasādetvā tassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2373_3: gandhakuṭiyaṃ candanāgarukāḷānusāriādinā katehi anekehi dhūpehi dhūpapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2373_4: So tena puññena devesu ca manussesu ca ubhayasampattiyo anubhavanto nibbattanibbattabhave
atk-s0510a:2373_5: pūjanīyo hutvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto puññasambhārānubhāvena
atk-s0510a:2373_6: sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā katadhūpapūjāpuññattā nāmena
atk-s0510a:2373_7: dhūpadāyakattheroti sabbattha pākaṭo. So pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:2373_8: somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Siddho
atk-s0510a:2373_9: paripuṇṇo sabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇasaṅkhāto attho payojanaṃ yassa bhagavato soyaṃ siddhattho,
atk-s0510a:2373_10: tassa siddhatthassa bhagavato bhagyādiguṇavantassa lokajeṭṭhassa sakalalokuttamassa
atk-s0510a:2373_11: tādino iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādisassa acalasabhāvassāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2376_0: Vipassissa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato pulinapūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2376_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2376_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasannacitto cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu
atk-s0510a:2376_3: purāṇavālukaṃ apanetvā navaṃ muttādalasadisapaṇḍarapulinaṃ okiritvā māḷakaṃ alaṅkari.
atk-s0510a:2376_4: Tena kammena so devaloke nibbatto tattha dibbehi ratanehi vijjotamāne anekayojane
atk-s0510a:2376_5: kanakavimāne dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto manussaloke sattaratanasampanno
atk-s0510a:2376_6: cakkavattī rājā hutvā manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2376_7: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2376_8: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So attano katapuññanāmasadisena nāmena pulinapūjakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2377_0: 165. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2377_1: bhagavatotiādimāha. Tattha vividhaṃ passatīti vipassī, vivicca passatīti vā vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2377_2: vividhe attatthaparatthādibhede atthe passatīti vā vipassī, vividhe vohāraparamatthādibhede
atk-s0510a:2377_3: passatīti vā vipassī, tassa vipassissa bodhiyā pādaputtame uttame bodhirukkhamaṇḍalamāḷake
atk-s0510a:2377_4: purāṇapulinaṃ vālukaṃ chaḍḍetvā suddhaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pulinaṃ ākiriṃ santhariṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2380_0: Candabhāgānadītīretiādikaṃ āyasmato uttiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2380_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2380_2: bhagavato kāle candabhāgānadiyaṃ susumāro hutvā nibbatto nadītīraṃ upagataṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2380_3: disvā pasannacitto pāraṃ netukāmo tīrasamīpeyeva nipajji. Bhagavā tassa anukampāya
atk-s0510a:2380_4: piṭṭhiyaṃ pāde ṭhapesi. So tuṭṭho udaggo pītivegena mahussāho hutvā sotaṃ chindanto
atk-s0510a:2380_5: sīghena javena bhagavantaṃ paratīraṃ nesi. Bhagavā tassa cittappasādaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2380_6: ito cuto devaloke nibbattissati, tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto ito catunnavutikappe
atk-s0510a:2381_0: So tathā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0510a:2381_1: putto hutvā nibbatti, uttiyotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto “amataṃ pariyesissāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:2381_2: paribbājako hutvā ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2381_3: paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā sāsane pabbajitvā sīladiṭṭhīnaṃ avisodhitattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0510a:2381_4: asakkonto aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ visesaṃ nibbattetvā aññaṃ byākarontaṃ disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2381_5: saṅkhepena ovādaṃ yāci. Satthāpi tassa, “tasmātiha tvaṃ, uttiya, ādimeva visodhehī”tiādinā
atk-s0510a:2381_6: saṅkhepeneva ovādaṃ adāsi. So satthu ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi. Tassa āraddhavipassakassa
atk-s0510a:2381_7: ābādho uppajji. Uppanne ābādhe jātasaṃvego vīriyārambhavatthuṃ ñatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2382_0: 169. Evaṃ so katasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2382_3: candappabhākiraṇasassirīkābhā nadamānā saddaṃ kurumānā gacchatīti candabhāgānadī,
atk-s0510a:2382_4: tassā candabhāgānadiyā tīre susumāro ahosinti sambandho. Tattha susumāroti khuddakamacchagumbe
atk-s0510a:2382_5: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karonto māretīti susumāro, caṇḍamaccho kumbhīloti attho. Sabhojanapasutohanti
atk-s0510a:2382_6: ahaṃ sabhojane sakagocare pasuto byāvaṭo. Nadītitthaṃ agacchahanti bhagavato āgamanakāle
atk-s0510a:2383_0: 170. Siddhattho tamhi samayeti tasmiṃ mama titthagamanakāle siddhattho bhagavā aggapuggalo
atk-s0510a:2383_1: sabbasattesu jeṭṭho seṭṭho sayambhū sayameva bhūto jāto buddhabhūto so bhagavā nadiṃ
atk-s0510a:2384: 172. Pettikaṃ visayaṃ mayhanti mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādīhi paramparānītaṃ, yadidaṃ sampattasampattamahānubhāvānaṃ taraṇanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2385: 173. Mama uggajjanaṃ sutvāti mayhaṃ uggajjanaṃ ārādhanaṃ sutvā mahāmuni bhagavā abhiruhīti sambandho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2388_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇantiādikaṃ āyasmato ekañjalikattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2388_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2388_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno piṇḍāya
atk-s0510a:2388_3: carantaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. So
atk-s0510a:2388_4: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjanīyo hutvā ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2388_5: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā sāsane pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2388_6: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Pubbe katapuññavasena ekañjalikattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2389_0: 180. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya disvā udānavasena
atk-s0510a:2389_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇantiādimāha. Vipassiṃ satthavāhagganti vāṇije
atk-s0510a:2389_2: kantārā vahati tāretīti satthavāho. Vāḷakantārā coḷakantārā dubbhikkhakantārā nirudakakantārā
atk-s0510a:2389_3: yakkhakantārā appabhakkhakantārā ca tāreti uttāreti patāreti nittāreti khemantabhūmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2389_4: pāpetīti attho. Ko so? Vāṇijajeṭṭhako. Satthavāhasadisattā ayampi bhagavā satthavāho.
atk-s0510a:2389_5: Tathā hi so tividhaṃ bodhiṃ patthayante katapuññasambhāre satte jātikantārā jarākantārā
atk-s0510a:2389_7: saṃsārakantārā ca tāreti uttāreti patāreti nittāreti nibbānathalaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2389_8: Satthavāho ca so aggo seṭṭho padhāno cāti satthavāhaggo, taṃ satthavāhaggaṃ vipassiṃ
atk-s0510a:2389_9: sambuddhanti sambandho. Naravaraṃ vināyakanti narānaṃ antare asithilaparakkamoti
atk-s0510a:2389_10: naravīro, taṃ. Visesena katapuññasambhāre satte neti nibbānapuraṃ pāpetīti vināyako, taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2390_1: adante satte dametīti adantadamano, taṃ. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyatādiguṇayuttoti tādī,
atk-s0510a:2390_2: taṃ. Mahāvādiṃ mahāmatinti sakasamayaparasamayavādīnaṃ antare attanā samadhikapuggalavirahitattā
atk-s0510a:2390_3: mahāvādī, mahatī pathavisamānā merusamānā ca mati yassa so mahāmati, taṃ mahāvādiṃ
atk-s0510a:2390_4: mahāmatiṃ sambuddhanti iminā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2393_0: Nagare bandhumatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato khomadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2393_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2393_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto sāsane abhippasanno ratanattayamāmako
atk-s0510a:2393_3: vipassissa bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso khomadussena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2393_4: So tadeva mūlaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato devaloke nibbatto. Chasu devesu
atk-s0510a:2393_5: aparāparaṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā manussaloke cakkavattiādianekavidhamanussasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2393_6: anubhavitvā paripākagate puññasambhāre imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto
atk-s0510a:2393_7: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2394_0: 184. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento nagare
atk-s0510a:2394_1: bandhumatiyātiādimāha. Tattha bandhu vuccati ñātako, te bandhū yasmiṃ nagare aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0510a:2394_2: saṅghaṭitā vasanti, taṃ nagaraṃ “bandhumatī”ti vuccati. Ropemi bījasampadanti dānasīlādipuññabījasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2400_0: Sattāhaṃ paṭisallīnantiādikaṃ āyasmato kuṇḍadhānattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2400_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2400_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto vuttanayena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2400_3: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0510a:2400_4: disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā tadanurūpaṃ puññaṃ karonto vicari. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2400_5: padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya nisinnassa manosilācuṇṇapiñjaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2400_6: mahantaṃ kadaliphalakaṇṇikaṃ upanesi, taṃ bhagavā paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji. So tena
atk-s0510a:2400_7: puññakammena ekādasakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ kāresi. Catuvīsativāre ca rājā ahosi cakkavattī.
atk-s0510a:2401_0: So evaṃ aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhummadevatā
atk-s0510a:2401_1: hutvā nibbatti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti. Tathā
atk-s0510a:2401_2: hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi, kassapadasabalo
atk-s0510a:2401_3: pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṃ osāresi, tassa pātimokkhassa osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā
atk-s0510a:2401_4: dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti gacchanti. Ayaṃ bhummadevatā cintesi
atk-s0510a:2401_5: – “imesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ metti ativiya daḷhā, kiṃ nu kho bhedake sati bhijjeyya,
atk-s0510a:2401_6: na bhijjeyyā”ti. Tesaṃ okāsaṃ olokayamānā tesaṃ avidūre gacchati.
atk-s0510a:2402_0: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2402_1: gantvā dhotahatthapādo hutvā gumbasamīpato nikkhamati. Bhummadevatā tassa therassa
atk-s0510a:2402_2: pacchato pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā saṃvidhāya bandhantī viya
atk-s0510a:2402_3: piṭṭhiyaṃ paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca hutvā therassa
atk-s0510a:2402_4: padānupadikā hutvā gumbato nikkhantā. Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva
atk-s0510a:2402_5: domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho, sacāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2402_6: evaṃvidhabhāvaṃ jāneyyaṃ, ettakaṃ kālaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:2402_7: āgacchantaṃyeva naṃ “gaṇhāhāvuso, tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ, tādisena pāpena saddhiṃ ekamaggena
atk-s0510a:2402_8: na gacchāmī”ti āha. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2402_9: viddhaṃ viya ahosi. Tato naṃ āha – “āvuso, kinnāmetaṃ vadasi, ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2402_10: dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṃ na jānāmi, tvaṃ pana maṃ ajja ‘pāpo’ti vadasi, kiṃ te diṭṭhanti,
atk-s0510a:2402_11: kiṃ aññena diṭṭhena, kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2402_12: ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhanto”ti? “Natthetaṃ, āvuso, mayhaṃ, nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:2402_13: passāmī”ti tassa yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā attanā
atk-s0510a:2402_14: diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva bhūtattaṃ katvā gaṇhanto tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena
atk-s0510a:2402_15: maggena satthu santikaṃ gato. Itaropi bhikkhu aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0510a:2403_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge
atk-s0510a:2403_1: disvā sañjānitvā “imasmiṃ uposathagge evarūpo nāma pāpabhikkhu atthi, nāhaṃ tena
atk-s0510a:2403_2: saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2403_3: mayā kammaṃ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā – “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2403_4: ayyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito”ti āha. “Upāsaka, imaṃ uposathaggaṃ eko pāpabhikkhu paviṭṭho,
atk-s0510a:2403_5: ‘ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ na karomī’ti bahi ṭhitomhī”ti. “Bhante, mā evaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0510a:2403_6: parisuddhasīlo esa bhikkhu, tumhehi diṭṭhamātugāmo nāma ahaṃ. Mayā tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya
atk-s0510a:2403_7: ‘daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti, no daḷhā’ti bhijjanābhijjanabhāvaṃ olokentena
atk-s0510a:2403_8: taṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. “Ko pana tvaṃ, sappurisā”ti? “Ahaṃ ekā bhummadevatā, bhante”ti.
atk-s0510a:2403_9: Devaputto kathentoyeva dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādamūle patitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2403_10: khamatha, therassa eso doso natthi, uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ
atk-s0510a:2403_11: pavesesi. So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi. Mittasanthavavasena pana puna
atk-s0510a:2403_12: tena saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne vasi. Imassa therassa dosaṃ na kathesi. Aparabhāge cuditakatthero
atk-s0510a:2403_13: pana vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2404_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyato na muccittha. Sace
atk-s0510a:2404_1: pana kālena kālaṃ manussattaṃ āgacchati, aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari
atk-s0510a:2404_2: patati. So amhākaṃ bhagavato uppannakāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, dhānamāṇavotissa
atk-s0510a:2404_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2404_4: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbaji. Tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā
atk-s0510a:2404_5: itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva pavisati, nikkhamante nikkhamati, vihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2404_6: pavisantepi saddhiṃ pavisati, tiṭṭhantepi tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ niccānubandhā paññāyati.
atk-s0510a:2404_7: Thero taṃ na passati. Tassa pana purimakammassa nissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2405_0: Gāme yāgubhikkhaṃ dadamānā itthiyo, “bhante, ayaṃ eko yāguuḷuṅko tumhākaṃ, eko imissā
atk-s0510a:2405_1: amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti. Therassa mahatī vihesā hoti. Vihāragatampi
atk-s0510a:2405_2: naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0510a:2405_3: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhāno theroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ. So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi
atk-s0510a:2405_4: kariyamānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā, tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0510a:2405_5: koṇḍo, ācariyo koṇḍo”ti vadati. Atha naṃ satthu ārocesuṃ – “kuṇḍadhāno, bhante, daharasāmaṇerehi
atk-s0510a:2405_6: saddhiṃ evaṃ pharusavācaṃ vadatī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, dhāna,
atk-s0510a:2405_7: daharasāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ pharusavācaṃ vadasī”ti pucchi. Tena “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte
atk-s0510a:2405_8: – “kasmā evaṃ vadasī”ti āha. “Bhante, nibaddhaṃ vihesaṃ sahituṃ asakkonto evaṃ kathemī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2405_9: “Tvaṃ pubbe katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi, puna evaṃ pharusavācaṃ
atk-s0510a:2407: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2409: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0510a:2410_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2410_1: Rājā “gacchatha, bhaṇe, naṃ vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2410_2: therassa santikaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2410_3: karonto nisinno hoti. Sāpi itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0510a:2411_0: Rājā taṃ disvā “atthi taṃ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante
atk-s0510a:2411_1: therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi. Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃ eva paṇṇasālāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2411_2: pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo, therassa eko kammavipāko”ti
atk-s0510a:2411_3: saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa kāraṇassa
atk-s0510a:2411_4: abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinno “kacci,
atk-s0510a:2411_5: bhante, piṇḍakena na kilamathā”ti pucchi. Thero “vaṭṭati, mahārājā”ti āha. “Jānāmahaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2411_6: bhante, ayyassa kathaṃ, evarūpenupakkilesena saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma
atk-s0510a:2411_7: pasīdissanti, ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ natthi. Ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi
atk-s0510a:2411_8: upaṭṭhahissāmi, tumhe yonisomanasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti vatvā nibaddhabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2411_9: Thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2411_10: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tato paṭṭhāya sā itthī antaradhāyi.
atk-s0510a:2412_0: Tadā mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti
atk-s0510a:2412_1: uposathaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni
atk-s0510a:2412_2: antare aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhantu, dasabalo imāya saññāya
atk-s0510a:2412_3: sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha
atk-s0510a:2412_4: sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi. Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake
atk-s0510a:2412_5: vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya
atk-s0510a:2412_6: bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, mayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_7: ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissāma, puthujjanānaṃ adatvā ariyānaṃyeva salākaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2412_8: Thero bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi – “āvuso, satthā ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati. Puthujjanā
atk-s0510a:2412_9: mā gaṇhantu, ariyāva salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti. Kuṇḍadhānatthero – “āharāvuso, salāka”nti
atk-s0510a:2412_10: paṭhamaṃyeva hatthaṃ pasāresi. Ānando “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti,
atk-s0510a:2412_11: ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi. Satthā “āharāpentassa
atk-s0510a:2412_12: salākaṃ dehī”ti āha. Thero cintesi – “sace kuṇḍadhānassa salākā dātuṃ na yuttā, atha
atk-s0510a:2412_13: satthā paṭibāheyya, bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti “kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:2412_14: gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Kuṇḍadhāno tassa purāgamanā eva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_15: samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso ānanda, satthā maṃ jānāti, mādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_16: paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā vāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ gaṇhi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:2412_17: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2412_18: ṭhapesi. Yasmā ayaṃ thero rājānaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvā sappāyāhārapaṭilābhena samāhitacitto
atk-s0510a:2412_19: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto upanissayasampannatāya chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Evaṃbhūtassāpi
atk-s0510a:2412_20: imassa therassa guṇe ajānantā ye puthujjanā bhikkhū “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhati,
atk-s0510a:2412_21: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vimatiṃ uppādenti. Tesaṃ taṃ vimatividhamanatthaṃ thero ākāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_22: abbhuggantvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “pañca chinde”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2413_0: 1. Evaṃ so pūritapuññasambhārānurūpena arahā hutvā pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2413_1: saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sattāhaṃ paṭisallīnantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2413_2: Tattha satthāhaṃ sattadivasaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārena paṭisallīnaṃ vivekabhūtanti
atk-s0510a:2416_0: Sobhito nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato sāgatattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2416_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2416_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto nāmena
atk-s0510a:2416_3: sobhito nāma hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_4: itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_6: gacchantaṃ disvā atīva pasannamānaso anekehi upāyehi anekehi guṇavaṇṇehi thomanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_7: akāsi. Bhagavā tassa thomanaṃ sutvā “anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane sāgato nāma
atk-s0510a:2416_8: sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākaraṇaṃ adāsi. So tato paṭṭhāya puññāni karonto yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_9: ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto. Kappasatasahassadevamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2416_10: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto. Tassa mātāpitaro somanassaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_11: vaḍḍhento sujāto āgatoti sāgatoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2417_0: 17. Evaṃ so puññasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2417_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sobhito nāma nāmenātiādimāha. Tattha tadā puññasambhārassa
atk-s0510a:2417_2: paripūraṇasamaye nāmena sobhito nāma brāhmaṇo ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2418_0: 21. Vipathā uddharitvānāti viruddhapathā kumaggā, uppathā vā uddharitvā apanetvā.
atk-s0510a:2418_1: Pathaṃ ācikkhaseti, bhante, sabbaññu tuvaṃ pathaṃ sappurisamaggaṃ nibbānādhigamanupāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2418_2: ācikkhase kathesi desesi vibhaji uttāniṃ akāsīti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2421_0: Padumuttaranāthassātiādikaṃ āyasmato kaccānattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2421_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2421_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakulagehe nibbattetvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ satthu
atk-s0510a:2421_3: santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena
atk-s0510a:2421_4: atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento
atk-s0510a:2421_5: dānādīni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo
atk-s0510a:2421_6: hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṃ ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2422_0: So tena puññakammena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattetvā kassapadasabalassa kāle
atk-s0510a:2422_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2422_2: dasasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2422_3: sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti pattharaṃ akāsi. Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ
atk-s0510a:2422_4: buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa
atk-s0510a:2422_5: purohitassa gehe nibbatti, tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo
atk-s0510a:2422_6: attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2422_7: tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. So gottavasena kaccānoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0510a:2423_0: Rājā caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā, “ācariya, tvaṃ tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānehī”ti
atk-s0510a:2423_1: pesesi. So attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ upagato. Tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0510a:2423_2: so sattahi janehi saddhiṃ sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Atha satthā “etha,
atk-s0510a:2423_3: bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassukā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0510a:2423_4: vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Evaṃ thero sadatthaṃ nipphādetvā, “bhante, rājā
atk-s0510a:2423_5: pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī”ti satthu ārocesi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:2423_6: “tvaṃyeva bhikkhu tattha gaccha, tayi gatepi rājā pasīdissatī”ti āha. Thero attaṭṭhamo
atk-s0510a:2423_7: tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva gato.
atk-s0510a:2424_0: 31. Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ saṃkhittena
atk-s0510a:2424_1: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2424_2: patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaranāthassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2424_3: Tattha padumaṃ nāma cetiyanti padumehi chāditattā vā padumākārehi katattā vā bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2424_5: vutte tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ nivasanaṭṭhānaṃ pūjanīyaṭṭhānattā cetiyanti vuccati, evamidaṃ
atk-s0510a:2424_6: bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ cetiyanti vuccati, na dhātunidhāyakacetiyanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2424_7: Na hi aparinibbutassa bhagavato sarīradhātūnaṃ abhāvā dhātucetiyaṃ akari. Silāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2424_8: kārayitvāti tassā padumanāmikāya gandhakuṭiyā pupphādhāratthāya heṭṭhā phalikamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2424_9: silāsanaṃ kāretvā. Suvaṇṇenābhilepayinti taṃ silāsanaṃ jambonadasuvaṇṇena abhivisesena
atk-s0510a:2425_0: 32. Ratanāmayaṃ sattahi ratanehi kataṃ chattaṃ paggayha muddhani dhāretvā vāḷabījaniñca
atk-s0510a:2425_1: setapavaracāmariñca paggayha buddhassa abhiropayiṃ. Lokabandhussa tādinoti sakalalokabandhusadisassa
atk-s0510a:2425_2: tādiguṇasamaṅgissa buddhassa dhāresinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2428_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato kāḷudāyittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2428_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2428_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2428_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ abhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2429_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2429_1: paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase kapilavatthusmiṃyeva amaccagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, bodhisattena
atk-s0510a:2429_2: saddhiṃ ekadivasaṃyeva jātoti taṃ divasaṃyeva naṃ dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0510a:2429_3: upaṭṭhānatthāya nayiṃsu. Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho, rāhulamātā, cattāro
atk-s0510a:2429_4: nidhī, ārohanahatthī, assakaṇḍako, ānando, channo, kāḷudāyīti ime satta ekadivase
atk-s0510a:2429_5: jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase
atk-s0510a:2429_6: jātattā udāyitveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyīti paññāyittha.
atk-s0510a:2429_7: So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2430_0: Aparabhāge lokanāthe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:2430_1: pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0510a:2430_2: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ “puttaṃ me idhānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2430_3: So dhammadesanāvelāyaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2430_4: saparivāro arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha ne satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0510a:2430_5: Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Arahattappattito
atk-s0510a:2430_6: paṭṭhāya pana ariyā majjhattāva honti. Tasmā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2430_7: Rājā “neva gato āgacchati, na sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti aparaṃ amaccaṃ purisasahassehi pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2430_8: Tasmimpi tathā paṭipanne aparampi pesesīti evaṃ navahi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ nava
atk-s0510a:2430_9: amacce pesesi. Sabbe arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2431_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya
atk-s0510a:2431_1: na kiñci kathayiṃsu, ayaṃ kho udāyi dasabalena samavayo, sahapaṃsukīḷiko, mayi ca
atk-s0510a:2431_2: sineho atthi, imaṃ pesessāmī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, tvaṃ purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0510a:2431_3: rājagahaṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ idhānehī”ti vatvā pesesi. So pana gacchanto “sacāhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2431_4: deva, pabbajituṃ labhissāmi, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ idhānessāmī”ti vatvā “yaṃ kiñci katvā
atk-s0510a:2431_5: mama puttaṃ dassehī”ti vutto rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanavelāyaṃ parisapariyante
atk-s0510a:2431_6: ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi. Arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2431_7: pana patvā “na tāvāyaṃ dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ kālo, vasante pana upagate
atk-s0510a:2431_8: pupphite vanasaṇḍe haritatiṇasañchannāya bhūmiyā gamanakālo bhavissatī”ti kālaṃ paṭimānento
atk-s0510a:2431_9: vasante sampatte satthu kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ gamanamaggavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇento –
atk-s0510a:2432: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0510a:2433: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra bhāgī rathānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2435: Pattaṃ pahāya phalamāsasānā, kālo ito pakkamanāya vīra.
atk-s0510a:2436: “Nevātisītaṃ na panātiuṇhaṃ, sukhā utu addhaniyā bhadante;
atk-s0510a:2437: Passantu taṃ sākiyā koḷiyā ca, pacchāmukhaṃ rohiniyaṃ tarantaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2440: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu. ;
atk-s0510a:2442: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmuni. ;
atk-s0510a:2444: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2446: Punappunaṃ dānappatī daditvā, punappunaṃ saggamupenti ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2447: “Vīro have sattayugaṃ puneti, yasmiṃ kule jāyati bhūripañño;
atk-s0510a:2448: Maññāmahaṃ sakkati devadevo, tayā hi jāto muni saccanāmo.
atk-s0510a:2449: “Suddhodano nāma pitā mahesino, buddhassa mātā pana māyanāmā;
atk-s0510a:2450: Yā bodhisattaṃ parihariya kucchinā, kāyassa bhedā tidivamhi modati.
atk-s0510a:2451: “Sā gotamī kālakatā ito cutā, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūtā;
atk-s0510a:2452: Sā modati kāmaguṇehi pañcahi, parivāritā devagaṇehi tehī”ti. ;
atk-s0510a:2453_0: Imā gāthā abhāsi. Tattha aṅgārinoti aṅgārāni viyāti aṅgārāni. Aṅgārāni rattapavāḷavaṇṇāni
atk-s0510a:2453_1: rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalāni, tāni etesaṃ santīti aṅgārino, abhilohitakusumakisalayehi
atk-s0510a:2453_2: aṅgāravuṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viyāti attho. Dānīti imasmiṃ kāle. Dumāti rukkhā. Bhadanteti
atk-s0510a:2453_3: bhaddaṃ ante etassāti, “bhadante”ti ekassa da-kārassa lopaṃ katvā vuccati. Guṇavisesayutto,
atk-s0510a:2453_4: guṇavisesayuttānañca aggabhūto satthā. Tasmā, bhadanteti satthu ālapanameva, paccattavacanañcetaṃ
atk-s0510a:2453_5: ekārantaṃ “sugate paṭikamme sukhe dukkhe jīve”tiādīsu viya. Idha pana sambodhanaṭṭhe
atk-s0510a:2453_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ, “bhadanteti ālapana”nti. “Bhaddasaddena samānatthaṃ padantarameka”nti
atk-s0510a:2453_7: keci. Phalāni esantīti phalesino. Acetanepi hi sacetanakiriyaṃ āha. Evaṃ therena
atk-s0510a:2453_8: yācito bhagavā tattha gamane bahūnaṃ visesādhigamanaṃ disvā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0510a:2453_9: rājagahato aturitacārikāvasena kapilavatthugāmimaggaṃ paṭipajji. Thero iddhiyā kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0510a:2453_10: gantvā rañño purato ākāse ṭhitova adiṭṭhapubbavesaṃ disvā raññā “kosi tva”nti pucchito
atk-s0510a:2453_11: “amaccaputtaṃ tayā bhagavato santikaṃ pesitaṃ maṃ na jānāsi, tvaṃ evaṃ pana jānāhī”ti dassento –
atk-s0510a:2455: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosī”ti. –
atk-s0510a:2457_0: Tattha buddhassa puttomhīti sabbaññubuddhassa orassa putto amhi. Asayhasāhinoti abhisambodhito
atk-s0510a:2457_1: pubbe ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhassa sakalassa
atk-s0510a:2457_2: bodhisambhārassa mahākāruṇikādhikārassa ca sahanato vahanato, tato parampi aññehi
atk-s0510a:2457_3: sahituṃ abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ sahanato abhibhavanato,
atk-s0510a:2457_5: anusāsanīsaṅkhātassa aññehi asayhassa buddhakiccassa sahanato, tattha vā sādhukāribhāvato
atk-s0510a:2457_7: apare. Keci pana “aṅgīraso, siddhatthoti dve nāmāni pitarāyeva gahitānī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0510a:2457_8: Appaṭimassāti anūpamassa. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādino. Pitupitā mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2457_9: tuvaṃsīti ariyajātivasena mayhaṃ pitu sammāsambuddhassa lokavohārena tvaṃ pitā asi.
atk-s0510a:2457_10: Sakkāti jātivasena rājānaṃ ālapati. Dhammenāti sabhāvena ariyajāti lokiyajātīti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2457_11: jātīnaṃ sabhāvasamodhānena. Gotamāti rājānaṃ gottena ālapati. Ayyakosīti pitāmaho
atk-s0510a:2457_12: asi. Ettha ca “buddhassa puttomhī”tiādiṃ vadanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2458_0: Evaṃ pana attānaṃ jānāpetvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano
atk-s0510a:2458_1: paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā dinne gamanākāraṃ dassesi. “Kasmā,
atk-s0510a:2458_2: bhante, gantukāmattha, bhuñjathā”ti ca vutte, “satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhuñjissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2458_4: paṭipanno”ti. “Tumhe imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjatha, aññaṃ bhagavato harissatha. Yāva
atk-s0510a:2458_5: ca mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇāti, tāvassa ito piṇḍapātaṃ harathā”ti vutte thero
atk-s0510a:2458_6: bhattakiccaṃ katvā rañño parisāya ca dhammaṃ kathetvā satthu āgamanato puretarameva
atk-s0510a:2458_7: sakalarājanivesanaṃ ratanattaye abhippasannaṃ karonto sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva satthu
atk-s0510a:2458_8: āharitabbabhattapuṇṇaṃ pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2458_9: upanāmetvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi. Satthā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji. Evaṃ saṭṭhiyojanamagge
atk-s0510a:2458_10: divase divase yojanaṃ gacchantassa bhagavato rājagehatoyeva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2458_11: Atha naṃ bhagavā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ pituno sakalanivesanaṃ pasādetī”ti “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0510a:2458_12: mama sāvakānaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2459_0: 48-9. Evaṃ so katapuññasambhārānurūpena arahattaṃ patvā pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano
atk-s0510a:2459_1: pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa buddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2459_2: Addhānaṃ paṭipannassāti apararaṭṭhaṃ gamanatthāya dūramaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa. Carato
atk-s0510a:2459_3: cārikaṃ tadāti antomaṇḍalaṃ majjhemaṇḍalaṃ bahimaṇḍalanti tīṇi maṇḍalāni tadā cārikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2459_4: carato carantassa padumuttarabuddhassa bhagavato suphullaṃ suṭṭhu phullaṃ pabodhitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2459_5: gayha gahetvā na kevalameva padumaṃ, uppalañca mallikaṃ vikasitaṃ ahaṃ gayha ubhohi
atk-s0510a:2459_6: hatthehi gahetvā pūresinti sambandho. Paramannaṃ gahetvānāti paramaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2459_7: madhuraṃ sabbasupakkaṃ sāliodanaṃ gahetvā satthuno adāsiṃ bhojesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2460_1: nandaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ janento uppādento. Ñātibandhu bhavissatīti ñāto pākaṭo bandhu bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:2463_0: Atthadassī tu bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato mogharājattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2463_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2463_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_4: ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2463_5: bhagavato kāle puna brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_6: gato ekadivasaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ rathiyaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_7: disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā “yāvatā rūpino
atk-s0510a:2463_8: satthā”tiādīhi chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā bhājanaṃ pūretvā madhuṃ upanesi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:2463_9: taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2463_10: kassapabhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa nāma rañño amacco hutvā nibbatto tena satthu
atk-s0510a:2463_11: ānayanatthāya pesito satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2463_12: vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0510a:2463_13: parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo
atk-s0510a:2463_14: bāvarīyabrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo saṃvegajāto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2463_15: tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pesito tesaṃ pannarasamo
atk-s0510a:2463_16: hutvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattaṃ pana patvā
