atk-s0510a:2463_17: satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_18: paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi. Tena naṃ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2464: 64. Evaṃ so paṇidhānānurūpena arahattaphalaṃ patvā attano pubbasambhāraṃ disvā pubbakammāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassī tu bhagavātiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2465_0: 73. Puṭakaṃ pūrayitvānāti puṭakaṃ vuccati vārakaṃ, ghaṭaṃ vā. Aneḷakaṃ niddosaṃ makkhikaṇḍavirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2465_1: khuddamadhunā ghaṭaṃ pūretvā taṃ ubhohi hatthehi paggayha pakārena ādarena gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2465_2: mahesino bhagavato upanesinti sambandho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2468_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato adhimuttattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2468_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassimhi
atk-s0510a:2468_2: lokanāthe parinibbute ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto ratanattaye pasanno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0510a:2468_3: nimantetvā ucchūhi maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā pariyosāne santipadaṃ paṇidhesi.
atk-s0510a:2468_4: So tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2468_5: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sāsane pasīditvā saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā adhimuttattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2469: 84. Evaṃ katasambhāravasena arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2472_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato lasuṇadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Esopāyasmā purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2472_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2472_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2472_3: gehaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaṃ nissāya vane vasanto bahūni lasuṇāni
atk-s0510a:2472_4: ropetvā tadeva vanamūlaphalañca khādanto vihāsi. So bahūni lasuṇāni kājenādāya manussapathaṃ
atk-s0510a:2472_5: āharitvā pasanno dānaṃ datvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhesajjatthāya datvā
atk-s0510a:2472_6: gacchati. Evaṃ so yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā teneva puññabalena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2472_7: ubhayasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde uppanno paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2472_8: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto pubbakammavasena lasuṇadāyakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2473_0: 89. Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2473_1: Tattha himālayapabbatassa pariyosāne manussānaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne yadā vipassī bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2473_2: udapādi, tadā ahaṃ tāpaso ahosinti sambandho. Lasuṇaṃ upajīvāmīti rattalasuṇaṃ ropetvā
atk-s0510a:2473_3: tadeva gocaraṃ katvā jīvikaṃ kappemīti attho. Tena vuttaṃ “lasuṇaṃ mayhabhojana”nti.
atk-s0510a:2474_0: 90. Khāriyo pūrayitvānāti tāpasabhājanāni lasuṇena pūrayitvā kājenādāya saṅghārāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:2474_1: saṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hemantādīsu tīsu kālesu saṅghassa catūhi iriyāpathehi vasanavihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2474_2: agacchiṃ agamāsinti attho. Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittenāti ahaṃ santuṭṭho somanassayuttacittena
atk-s0510a:2475_0: 91. Vipassissa…pe… niratassahanti narānaṃ aggassa seṭṭhassa assa vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2475_1: sāsane nirato nissesena rato ahanti sambandho. Saṅghassa…pe… modahanti ahaṃ saṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2475_2: lasuṇadānaṃ datvā saggamhi suṭṭhu aggasmiṃ devaloke āyukappaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0510a:2475_3: modiṃ, santuṭṭho bhavāmīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2478_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato āyāgadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2478_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2478_2: parinibbutakāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sāsane pasanno vaḍḍhakīnaṃ mūlaṃ datvā
atk-s0510a:2478_3: atimanoharaṃ dīghaṃ bhojanasālaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā paṇītenāhārena
atk-s0510a:2478_4: bhojetvā mahādānaṃ datvā cittaṃ pasādesi. So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesuyeva
atk-s0510a:2478_5: saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2478_6: pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2479_0: 94. Evaṃ so katapuññasambhāravasena arahattaṃ patvā attanā pubbe katakusalakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2479_1: saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2479_2: Tattha nibbuteti vadataṃ “mayaṃ buddhā”ti vadantānaṃ antare vare uttame sikhimhi
atk-s0510a:2479_3: bhagavati parinibbuteti attho. Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittenāti saddhatāya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2479_4: somanassayuttacittatāya pahaṭṭhena cittena uttamaṃ thūpaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cetiyaṃ avandiṃ paṇāmayinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2480_0: 95. Vaḍḍhakīhi kathāpetvāti “bhojanasālāya pamāṇaṃ kittaka”nti pamāṇaṃ kathāpetvāti
atk-s0510a:2480_1: attho. Mūlaṃ datvānahaṃ tadāti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ kammakaraṇatthāya tesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2480_2: mūlaṃ datvā āyāgaṃ āyataṃ dīghaṃ bhojanasālaṃ ahaṃ santuṭṭho somanassacittena kārapesahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2481: 97. Āyāgassa idaṃ phalanti bhojanasāladānassa idaṃ vipākanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2484_0: Siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato dhammacakkikattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2484_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2484_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto puttadārehi vaḍḍhito
atk-s0510a:2484_3: vibhavasampanno mahābhogo, so ratanattaye pasanno saddhājāto dhammasabhāyaṃ dhammāsanassa
atk-s0510a:2484_4: piṭṭhito ratanamayaṃ dhammacakkaṃ kāretvā pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2484_5: nibbattaṭṭhānesu sakkasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiñca anubhavitvā kamena imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2484_6: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe uppanno vibhavasampanno sañjātasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2484_7: vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katakusalanāmasadisanāmena dhammacakkikattheroti pākaṭo jāto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2485_0: 102. So puññasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā jātasomanasso
atk-s0510a:2485_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Sīhāsanassa sammukhāti
atk-s0510a:2485_2: sīhassa bhagavato nisinnassa sammukhā buddhāsanassa abhimukhaṭṭhāneti attho, dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0510a:2485_3: me ṭhapitanti mayā dhammacakkākārena ubhato sīharūpaṃ dassetvā majjhe ādāsasadisaṃ
atk-s0510a:2485_4: kāretvā kataṃ dhammacakkaṃ ṭhapitaṃ pūjitaṃ. Kiṃ bhūtaṃ? Viññūhi medhāvīhi “atīva
atk-s0510a:2485_5: sundara”nti vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ sukataṃ dhammacakkanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2486_0: 103. Cāruvaṇṇova sobhāmīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo iva sobhāmi virocāmīti attho. “Catuvaṇṇehi
atk-s0510a:2486_1: sobhāmī”tipi pāṭho, tassa khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddajātisaṅkhātehi catūhi vaṇṇehi
atk-s0510a:2486_2: sobhāmi virocāmīti attho. Sayoggabalavāhanoti suvaṇṇasivikādīhi yoggehi ca senāpatimahāmattādīhi
atk-s0510a:2486_3: sevakehi balehi ca hatthiassarathasaṅkhātehi vāhanehi ca sahitoti attho. Bahujjanā
atk-s0510a:2486_4: bahavo manussā anuyantā mamānuvattantā niccaṃ niccakālaṃ parivārentīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2489_0: Siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato kapparukkhiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2489_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tesu tesu bhavesu nibbānādhigamūpāyabhūtāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2489_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo
atk-s0510a:2489_3: satthari pasanno sattahi ratanehi vicittaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ kapparukkhaṃ kāretvā siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2489_4: bhagavato cetiyassa sammukhe ṭhapetvā pūjesi. So evarūpaṃ puññaṃ katvā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:2489_5: ṭhatvā tato cuto sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2489_6: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ratanattaye pasanno dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2489_7: paṭiladdhasaddho satthu ārādhetvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katakusalanāmena
atk-s0510a:2490_0: 108. So evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2490_1: pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Thūpaseṭṭhassa sammukhāti seṭṭhassa uttamassa
atk-s0510a:2490_2: dhātunihitathūpassa cetiyassa sammukhaṭṭhāne vicittadusse anekavaṇṇehi visamena visadisena
atk-s0510a:2490_3: cittena manohare cinapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭādike dusse. Lagetvā olaggetvā kapparukkhaṃ ṭhapesiṃ
atk-s0510a:2495_1: Eso hi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa

atk-s0510a:2495_14: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayapañhe tikhiṇapaññānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2496_0: 1. So evaṃ etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ

atk-s0510a:2496_4: lokanāyako lokassa nibbānapāpanako vivekaṃ anuyutto paṭisallituṃ ekībhavituṃ gacchateti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2497_0: 2. Ajinena nivatthohanti ahaṃ ajinamigacammena paṭicchanno, ajinacammavasanoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2497_1: Tidaṇḍaparidhārakoti kuṇḍikaṭṭhapanatthāya tidaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dhārentoti attho. Bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a:2497_2: paribyūḷhaṃ parivāritaṃ lokanāyakaṃ addasanti sambandho. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2500_0: Anomadassissa muninotiādikaṃ āyasmato koḷivisattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2500_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2500_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto puttadārehi vaḍḍhito vibhavasampanno
atk-s0510a:2500_3: bhagavato caṅkamanatthāya sobhanaṃ caṅkamaṃ kāretvā sudhāparikammaṃ kāretvā ādāsatalamiva
atk-s0510a:2500_4: samaṃ vijjotamānaṃ katvā dīpadhūpapupphādīhi sajjetvā bhagavato niyyādetvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2500_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītenāhārena pūjesi. So evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0510a:2500_6: devaloke nibbatto. Tattha pāḷiyā vuttanayena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā antarā okkākakulappasutoti
atk-s0510a:2500_7: taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷiyā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ. Pacchimabhave pana koliyarājavaṃse jāto
atk-s0510a:2500_8: vayappatto koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāritattā koṭikaṇṇoti, kuṭikaṇṇoti
atk-s0510a:2500_9: ca pākaṭo ahosi. So bhagavati pasanno dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2501_0: 25. So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2501_1: anomadassissa muninotiādimāha. Tattha anomadassissāti anomaṃ alāmakaṃ sundaraṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2501_3: samannāgatattā ca dassanīyaṃ sarīraṃ yassa bhagavato so anomadassī, tassa anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2501_4: muninoti attho. Tādinoti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvassa. Sudhāya lepanaṃ katvāti
atk-s0510a:2501_5: sudhāya avalittaṃ katvā dīpadhūpapupphadhajapaṭākādīhi ca alaṅkataṃ caṅkamaṃ kārayiṃ
atk-s0510a:2501_6: akāsinti attho. Sesagāthānaṃ attho pāḷiyā anusārena suviññeyyova.
atk-s0510a:2502: 35. Parivārasampattidhanasampattisaṅkhātaṃ yasaṃ dhāretīti yasodharo, sabbe ete sattasattaticakkavattirājāno yasodharanāmena ekanāmakāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2503_0: 52. Aṅgīrasoti aṅgato sarīrato niggatā rasmi yassa so aṅgīraso, chandadosamohabhayāgatīhi
atk-s0510a:2503_1: vā pāpācāravasena vā caturāpāyaṃ na gacchatīti nāgo, mahanto pūjito ca so nāgo ceti
atk-s0510a:2506_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:2506_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:2506_3: puttadārehi vaḍḍhito nagaravāsino puññāni karonte disvā sayampi puññāni kātukāmo
atk-s0510a:2506_4: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā thūlapaṭalikādianekāni mahārahāni sayanāni
atk-s0510a:2506_5: paññāpetvā tattha nisinne bhagavati sasaṅghe paṇītenāhārena bhojetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2506_6: So evaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:2506_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kāḷigodhāya nāma deviyā putto hutvā nibbatti. So viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2506_8: ārohapariṇāhahatthapādarūpasampattiyā bhaddattā ca kāḷigodhāya deviyā puttattā ca
atk-s0510a:2506_9: bhaddiyo kāḷigodhāputtoti pākaṭo. Satthari pasīditvā mātāpitaro ārādhetvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2507_0: 54. So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2507_1: padumuttarasambuddhantiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Mettacittanti mijjati sinehati
atk-s0510a:2507_2: nandati sabbasatteti mettā, mettāya sahagataṃ cittaṃ mettacittaṃ, taṃ yassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2507_3: atthīti mettacitto, taṃ mettacittaṃ. Mahāmuninti sakalabhikkhūnaṃ mahantattā mahāmuni,
atk-s0510a:2507_4: taṃ padumuttaraṃ sambuddhanti sambandho. Janatā sabbāti sabbo janakāyo, sabbanagaravāsinoti
atk-s0510a:2507_5: attho. Sabbalokagganāyakanti sakalalokassa aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nibbānassa nayanato pāpanato
atk-s0510a:2507_6: nāyakaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ janatā upeti samīpaṃ gacchatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2508_0: 55. Sattukañca baddhakañcāti baddhasattuabaddhasattusaṅkhātaṃ āmisaṃ. Atha vā bhattapūpakhajjabhojjayāguādayo
atk-s0510a:2508_1: yāvakālikattā āmisaṃ pānabhojanañca gahetvā puññakkhette anuttare satthuno dadantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2509: 58. Āsanaṃ buddhayuttakanti buddhayoggaṃ buddhārahaṃ buddhānucchavikaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ āsananti attho. Sesaṃ nayānuyogena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2512_0: Araññe kuṭikaṃ katvātiādikaṃ āyasmato sanniṭṭhāpakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2512_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2512_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharabandhanena baddho gharāvāse
atk-s0510a:2512_3: ādīnavaṃ disvā vatthukāmakilesakāme pahāya himavantassa avidūre pabbatantare araññavāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2512_4: kappesi. Tasmiṃ kāle padumuttaro bhagavā vivekakāmatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha so
atk-s0510a:2512_5: tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā nisīdanatthāya tiṇasantharaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2512_6: adāsi. Tattha nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ anekehi madhurehi tiṇḍukādīhi phalāphalehi santappesi.
atk-s0510a:2512_7: So tena puññakammena tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto dve sampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2512_8: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhāsampanno pabbajito
atk-s0510a:2512_9: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi. Khuragge arahattaphalappattiyaṃ viya
atk-s0510a:2512_10: nirussāheneva santipadasaṅkhāte nibbāne suṭṭhu ṭhitattā sanniṭṭhāpakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2513_0: 70. Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2513_1: pakāsento araññe kuṭikaṃ katvātiādimāha. Tattha araññeti sīhabyagghādīnaṃ bhayena
atk-s0510a:2513_2: manussā ettha na rajjanti na ramanti na allīyantīti araññaṃ, tasmiṃ araññe. Kuṭikanti
atk-s0510a:2513_3: tiṇacchadanakuṭikaṃ katvā pabbatantare vasāmi vāsaṃ kappesinti attho. Lābhena ca
atk-s0510a:2513_4: alābhena ca yasena ca ayasena ca santuṭṭho vihāsinti sambandho.

atk-s0510a:2517_0: Sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcahatthiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu

atk-s0510a:2518_0: 77. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā paccakkhato paññāya diṭṭhapubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2518_1: sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādimāha. Tattha sumedhoti sundarā medhā catusaccapaṭivedhapaṭisambhidādayo

atk-s0510a:2518_3: Okkhittacakkhūti adhokhittacakkhu. Mitabhāṇīti pamāṇaṃ ñatvā bhaṇanasīlo, pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:2518_4: jānitvā dhammaṃ desesīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.

atk-s0510a:2533_8: ahosi. Imasmiṃ pana buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2533_9: patto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvāpi yāva buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānakālo tāva aladdhabuddhadassano
atk-s0510a:2533_10: bhagavato parinibbānamañce nipannakāleyeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Pubbe katapuññanāmena
atk-s0510a:2534_0: 101. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro
atk-s0510a:2534_1: lokavidūtiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva. Suṇātha mama bhāsato…pe… nibbāyissatināsavoti
atk-s0510a:2534_2: idaṃ parinibbānamañce nipannova padumuttaro bhagavā byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2536_0: 115. So attano paṭipattiṃ dassento pubbakammena saṃyuttotiādimāha. Ekaggoti ekaggacitto.
atk-s0510a:2536_1: Susamāhitoti suṭṭhu samāhito, santakāyacittoti attho. Buddhassa oraso puttoti buddhassa
atk-s0510a:2536_2: urasā hadayena niggataovādānusāsaniṃ sutvā pattaarahattaphaloti attho. Dhammajomhi
atk-s0510a:2536_3: sunimmitoti dhammato kammaṭṭhānadhammato jāto ariyāya jātiyā sunimmito suṭṭhu nipphāditasabbakicco
atk-s0510a:2537_0: 116. Dhammarājaṃ upagammāti dhammena sabbasattānaṃ rājānaṃ issarabhūtaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2537_1: upagantvā samīpaṃ gantvāti attho. Apucchiṃ pañhamuttamanti uttamaṃ khandhāyatanadhātusaccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:2537_2: pañhaṃ apucchinti attho. Kathayanto ca me pañhanti eso amhākaṃ bhagavā me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2537_3: pañhaṃ kathayanto byākaronto. Dhammasotaṃ upānayīti anupādisesanibbānadhātusaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2538_0: 118. Jalajuttamanāyakoti padumuttaranāmako ma-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā katavohāro.
atk-s0510a:2538_1: Nibbāyi anupādānoti upādāne pañcakkhandhe aggahetvā nibbāyi na paññāyi adassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2538_2: agamāsi, manussalokādīsu katthacipi apatiṭṭhitoti attho. Dīpova telasaṅkhayāti vaṭṭitelānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2538_3: saṅkhayā abhāvā padīpo iva nibbāyīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2539_0: 119. Sattayojanikaṃ āsīti tassa parinibbutassa padumuttarassa bhagavato ratanamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2539_1: thūpaṃ sattayojanubbedhaṃ āsi ahosīti attho. Dhajaṃ tattha apūjesinti tattha tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2539_2: cetiye sabbabhaddaṃ sabbato bhaddaṃ sabbaso manoramaṃ dhajaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2540_0: 120. Kassapassa ca buddhassāti padumuttarassa bhagavato kālato paṭṭhāya āgatassa
atk-s0510a:2540_1: devamanussesu saṃsarato me mayhaṃ oraso putto tisso nāma kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0510a:2540_2: aggasāvako jinasāsane buddhasāsane dāyādo āsi ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2541_0: 121. Tassa hīnena manasāti tassa mama puttassa tissassa aggasāvakassa hīnena lāmakena
atk-s0510a:2541_1: manasā cittena abhaddakaṃ asundaraṃ ayuttakaṃ “antako pacchimo”ti vācaṃ vacanaṃ abhāsiṃ
atk-s0510a:2541_2: kathesinti attho. Tena kammavipākenāti tena arahantabhakkhānasaṅkhātassa akusalakammassa
atk-s0510a:2541_3: vipākena. Pacchime addasaṃ jinanti pacchime pariyosāne parinibbānakāle mallānaṃ upavattane
atk-s0510a:2541_4: sālavane parinibbānamañce nipannaṃ jinaṃ jitasabbamāraṃ amhākaṃ gotamasammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2541_5: addasaṃ ahanti attho. “Pacchā me āsi bhaddaka”ntipi pāṭho. Tassa pacchā tassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2541_6: avasānakāle nibbānāsannakāle me mayhaṃ bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ catusaccapaṭivijjhanaṃ āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2542: 122. Pabbājesi mahāvīroti mahāvīriyo sabbasattahito karuṇāyutto jitamāro muni mallānaṃ upavattane sālavane pacchime sayane parinibbānamañce sayitova maṃ pabbājesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2543_0: 123. Ajjeva dāni pabbajjāti ajja eva bhagavato parinibbānadivaseyeva mama pabbajjā,
atk-s0510a:2543_1: tathā ajja eva upasampadā, ajja eva dvipaduttamassa sammukhā parinibbānaṃ ahosīti
atk-s0510a:2546_0: Siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato cundattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2546_1: katapuññasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2546_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasīditvā sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2546_3: suvaṇṇagghiyaṃ kāretvā sumanapupphehi chādetvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. Tāni pupphāni
atk-s0510a:2546_4: ākāsaṃ samuggantvā vitānākārena aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha naṃ bhagavā “anāgate gotamassa nāma
atk-s0510a:2546_5: bhagavato sāsane cundo nāma sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. So tena puññakammena tato
atk-s0510a:2546_6: cuto devaloke upapanno kamena chasu kāmāvacaradevesu sukhaṃ anubhavitvā manussesu
atk-s0510a:2546_7: cakkavattiādisampattiyo ca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule rūpasāriyā
atk-s0510a:2546_8: putto sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti. Tassa viññutaṃ pattassa ārohapariṇāharūpavayānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2546_9: sundaratāya sakārassa cakāraṃ katvā cundoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vayappatto gharāvāse
atk-s0510a:2546_10: ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā bhātuttherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2547_0: 125. So pattaarahattaphalo ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2547_1: pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Agghiyantiādayopi uttānatthāyeva.
atk-s0510a:2548_0: 128. Vitiṇṇakaṅkho sambuddhoti visesena maggādhigamena vicikicchāya khepitattā vitiṇṇakaṅkho
atk-s0510a:2548_1: asaṃsayo sambuddho. Tiṇṇoghehi purakkhatoti kāmoghādīnaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā
atk-s0510a:2548_2: atikkantattā oghatiṇṇehi khīṇāsavehi purakkhato parivāritoti attho. Byākaraṇagāthā uttānatthāyeva.
atk-s0510a:2549_0: 139. Upaṭṭhahiṃ mahāvīranti uttamatthassa nibbānassa pattiyā pāpuṇanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikesu
atk-s0510a:2549_1: caturāsaṅkhyeyyesu kappesu pāramiyo pūrentena katavīriyattā mahāvīraṃ buddhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃ
atk-s0510a:2549_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsinti attho. Aññe ca pesale bahūti na kevalameva buddhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2549_3: pesale piyasīle sīlavante aññe ca bahuaggappatte sāvake, me mayhaṃ bhātaraṃ sāriputtattherañca
atk-s0510a:2550_0: 140. Bhātaraṃ me upaṭṭhahitvāti mayhaṃ bhātaraṃ upaṭṭhahitvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2550_1: tassa parinibbutakāle bhagavato paṭhamaṃ parinibbutattā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā pattamhi
atk-s0510a:2550_2: okiritvā lokajeṭṭhassa narānaṃ āsabhassa buddhassa upanāmesiṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2551_0: 141. Ubho hatthehi paggayhāti taṃ mahā dinnaṃ dhātuṃ so bhagavā attano ubhohi hatthehi
atk-s0510a:2551_1: pakārena gahetvā taṃ dhātuṃ saṃsuṭṭhu dassayanto aggasāvakaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ kittayi
atk-s0510a:2556_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato vidhūpanadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:2556_1: pūritapuññasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2556_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto vibhavasampanno saddhājāto
atk-s0510a:2556_3: bhagavati pasanno gimhakāle suvaṇṇarajatamuttāmaṇimayaṃ bījaniṃ kāretvā bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2556_4: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2556_5: imassa amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhassa uppannakāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto gharabandhanena
atk-s0510a:2556_6: bandhitvā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajjāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā saddhāsampanno sāsane
atk-s0510a:2556_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2557_0: 1. So “kena mayā puññakammena ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā”ti attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2557_1: anussaranto taṃ paccakkhato ñatvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2557_2: Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Bījanikā mayā dinnāti visesena santāpayantānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2557_3: santāpaṃ nibbāpenti sītalaṃ vātaṃ janetīti bījanī, bījanīyeva bījanikā, sā sattaratanamayā
atk-s0510a:2557_4: vijjotamānā bījanikā mayā kārāpetvā dinnāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2560_0: Ucciyaṃ selamāruyhātiādikaṃ āyasmato sataraṃsittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2560_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2560_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto sakkaṭabyākaraṇe vedattaye ca
atk-s0510a:2560_3: pāraṅgato gharāvāsaṃ pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2560_4: kappesi. Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā vivekakāmatāya uccaṃ ekaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha
atk-s0510a:2560_5: jalitaggikkhanto viya nisīdi. Taṃ tathānisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tāpaso somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2560_6: añjaliṃ paggayha anekehi kāraṇehi thomesi. So tena puññakammena tato cuto chasu kāmāvacaradevesu
atk-s0510a:2560_7: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato manussaloke sataraṃsī nāma cakkavattī rājā hutvā
atk-s0510a:2560_8: nibbatti. Tampi sampattiṃ anekakkhattuṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2560_9: nibbatto pubbapuññasambhāravasena ñāṇassa paripakkattā sattavassikova pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2561_0: 8-9. So “ahaṃ kena kammena sattavassikova santipadaṃ anuppattosmī”ti saramāno pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_1: ñāṇena paccakkhato disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento ucciyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_2: selamāruyhātiādimāha. Tattha ucciyanti uccaṃ selamayaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha nisīdi padumuttaroti
atk-s0510a:2561_3: sambandho. Pabbatassāvidūramhīti bhagavato nisinnassa pabbatassa āsannaṭṭhāneti attho.
atk-s0510a:2561_4: Brāhmaṇo mantapāragūti mantasaṅkhātassa vedattayassa pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato
atk-s0510a:2561_5: eko brāhmaṇoti attho, aññaṃ viya attānaṃ niddisati ayaṃ mantapāragūti. Upaviṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_6: mahāvīranti tasmiṃ pabbate nisinnaṃ vīravantaṃ jinaṃ, kiṃ visiṭṭhaṃ? Devadevaṃ sakalachakāmāvacarabrahmadevānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_7: atidevaṃ narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsataṃ seṭṭhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ nayantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_8: nibbānaṃ pāpentaṃ ahaṃ añjaliṃ dasanakhasamodhānañjalipuṭaṃ sirasi muddhani paggahetvāna
atk-s0510a:2562: 12. Abhāsathāti “yenāyaṃ añjalī dinno…pe… arahā so bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2565_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato sayanadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2565_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2565_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā sukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0510a:2565_3: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthari pasanno dantasuvaṇṇarajatamuttamaṇimayaṃ mahārahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2565_4: mañcaṃ kārāpetvā cīnapaṭṭakambalādīni attharitvā sayanatthāya bhagavato adāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2565_5: tassa anuggahaṃ karonto tattha sayi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2565_6: tadanurūpaṃ ākāsagamanasukhaseyyādisukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2565_7: ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2566: 20. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2567_0: 21. Sukhette bījasampadāti yathā tiṇakacavararahite kaddamādisampanne sukhette vuttabījāni
atk-s0510a:2567_2: suddhasantāne puññakkhette vuttadānāni appānipi samānāni mahapphalāni hontīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2570_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato gandhodakiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimamunivaresu
atk-s0510a:2570_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2570_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto parinibbute bhagavati nagaravāsino bodhipūjaṃ kurumāne
atk-s0510a:2570_4: abhisiñci. Tasmiṃ khaṇe devo mahādhārāhi pavassi. Tadā so asanivegena kālaṃ kato.
atk-s0510a:2570_5: Teneva puññakammena devaloke nibbatti, tattheva ṭhito “aho buddho, aho dhammo”tiādigāthāyo
atk-s0510a:2570_6: abhāsi. Evaṃ so devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbapariḷāhavippamutto nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2570_7: sītibhāvamupagato sukhito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0510a:2570_8: pasanno pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ārabhitvā vipassanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2571_0: 25. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2571_1: padumutarassātiādimāha. Taṃ vuttatthameva. Mahābodhimaho ahūti mahābodhirukkhassa
atk-s0510a:2571_2: pūjā ahosīti attho. Vicittaṃ ghaṭamādāyāti anekehi cittakammasuvaṇṇakammehi vicittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2571_3: sobhamānaṃ gandhodakapuṇṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ gahetvāti attho. Gandhodakamadāsahanti gandhodakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2572: 26. Nhānakāle ca bodhiyāti bodhiyā pūjākaraṇasamayeti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2575_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato opavayhattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2575_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarajinādicce
atk-s0510a:2575_2: loke pātubhūte ekasmiṃ vibhavasampannakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya mahaddhano mahābhogo
atk-s0510a:2575_3: gharāvāsaṃ vasamāno sāsane pasanno satthari pasādabahumāno ājānīyena sindhavena pūjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2575_4: akāsi, pūjetvā ca pana “buddhādīnaṃ samaṇānaṃ hatthiassādayo na kappanti, kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0510a:2575_5: dassāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ agghāpetvā tadagghanakena kahāpaṇena kappiyaṃ kappāsikakambalakojavādikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2575_6: cīvaraṃ kappūratakkolādikaṃ bhesajjaparikkhārañca adāsi. So tena puññakammena yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:2575_7: ṭhatvā tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca hatthiassādianekavāhanasampanno sukhaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2575_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhāsampanno sāsane
atk-s0510a:2575_9: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:2576_0: 33. So “kena nu kho kāraṇena idaṃ mayā santipadaṃ adhigata”nti upadhārento pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2576_1: ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2576_2: Taṃ vuttatthameva. Ājānīyamadāsahanti ājānīyaṃ uttamajātisindhavaṃ ahaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2577: 35. Sapattabhāroti sassa attano pattāni aṭṭha parikkhārāni bhārāni yassa so sapattabhāro, aṭṭhaparikkhārayuttoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2579: 40. Carimoti pariyosāno koṭippatto bhavoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.

atk-s0510a:2582_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2582_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto sāsane pasanno
atk-s0510a:2582_3: dānaphalaṃ saddahanto nānaggarasabhojanena bhagavato piṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, datvā ca pana
atk-s0510a:2582_4: bhojanasālāyaṃ bhojanatthāya nisinnāsanaṃ jātisumanamallikādīhi alaṅkari. Bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2582_5: ca bhattānumodanamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekavidhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2582_6: sampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2582_7: saddho pasanno pabbajitvā na cirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2583_0: 43. So evaṃ pattasantipado “kena nu kho puññena idaṃ santipadaṃ anuppatta”nti ñāṇena
atk-s0510a:2583_1: upadhārento pubbakammaṃ disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2583_2: Taṃ vuttatthameva. Piṇḍapātaṃ adāsahanti tattha tattha laddhānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ kabaḷaṃ
atk-s0510a:2583_3: kabaḷaṃ katvā pātabbato khāditabbato āhāro piṇḍapāto, taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhagavato adāsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2584: 44. Akittayi piṇḍapātanti mayā dinnapiṇḍapātassa guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2585_0: 48. Saṃvuto pātimokkhasminti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvuto pihito paṭicchannoti
atk-s0510a:2585_1: attho. Indriyesu ca pañcasūti cakkhundriyādīsu pañcasu indriyesu rūpādīhi gopito
atk-s0510a:2588_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcadīpakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2588_1: katādhikāro uppannuppannabhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2588_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāse vasanto bhagavato dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2588_3: sutvā sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ patiṭṭhito saddho pasanno mahājanehi bodhipūjaṃ kayiramānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2588_4: disvā sayampi bodhiṃ parivāretvā dīpaṃ jāletvā pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2588_5: saṃsaranto cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā sabbattheva uppannabhave jalamāno
atk-s0510a:2588_6: jotisampannavimānādīsu vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2588_7: nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi, dīpapūjānissandena
atk-s0510a:2589_0: 50. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2589_1: padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha. Taṃ vuttatthameva. Ujudiṭṭhi ahosahanti vaṅkaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2589_2: chaḍḍetvā uju avaṅkaṃ nibbānābhimukhaṃ pāpuṇanasammādiṭṭhi ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2590: 51. Padīpadānaṃ pādāsinti ettha pakārena dibbati jotatīti padīpo, tassa dānaṃ padīpadānaṃ, taṃ adāsiṃ padīpapūjaṃ akāsinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2593_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato dhajadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2593_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2593_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā sundarehi
atk-s0510a:2593_3: anekehi vatthehi dhajaṃ kārāpetvā dhajapūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena uppannuppannabhave
atk-s0510a:2593_4: uccakule nibbatto pūjaniyo ahosi. Aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2593_5: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya puttadārehi vaḍḍhitvā mahābhogo yasavā saddhājāto satthari
atk-s0510a:2593_6: pasanno gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2594_0: 57. So pattaarahattaphalo pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2594_1: pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha. Tassattho pubbe vuttoyeva. Haṭṭho haṭṭhena
atk-s0510a:2594_3: haṭṭhena cittena santuṭṭhena cittenāti attho. Dhajamāropayiṃ ahanti dhunāti kampati
atk-s0510a:2594_4: calatīti dhajaṃ, taṃ dhajaṃ āropayiṃ veḷagge laggetvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2595_0: 58-9. Patitapattāni gaṇhitvāti patitāni bodhipattāni gahetvā ahaṃ bahi chaḍḍesinti
atk-s0510a:2595_1: attho. Antosuddhaṃ bahisuddhanti anto cittasantānanāmakāyato ca bahi cakkhusotādirūpakāyato
atk-s0510a:2595_2: ca suddhiṃ adhi visesena muttaṃ kilesato vimuttaṃ anāsavaṃ sambuddhaṃ viya sammukhā
atk-s0510a:2595_3: uttamaṃ bodhiṃ avandiṃ paṇāmamakāsinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2598_0: Catusaccaṃ pakāsentotiādikaṃ āyasmato padumattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2598_1: katakusalasambhāro padumuttaramuninā dhammapajjote jotamāne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2598_2: gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bhogasampannoti pākaṭo. So satthari pasīditvā mahājanena saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:2598_3: dhammaṃ suṇanto dhajena saha padumakalāpaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi, sadhajaṃ taṃ padumakalāpaṃ
atk-s0510a:2598_4: ākāsamukkhipiṃ, taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā ativiya somanassajāto ahosi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2598_5: katvā jīvitapariyosāne sagge nibbatto dhajamiva chakāmāvacare pākaṭo pūjito ca dibbasampattimanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2598_6: manussesu ca cakkavattisampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne saddhāsampanne
atk-s0510a:2598_7: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto pañcavassikova pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2599_0: 67. Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento catusaccaṃ
atk-s0510a:2599_1: pakāsentotiādimāha. Tattha saccanti tathaṃ avitathaṃ aviparītaṃ saccaṃ, dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggavasena
atk-s0510a:2599_2: cattāri saccāni samāhaṭānīti catusaccaṃ, taṃ catusaccaṃ pakāsento loke pākaṭaṃ karontoti
atk-s0510a:2599_3: attho. Varadhammappavattakoti uttamadhammappavattako pakāsakoti attho. Amataṃ vuṭṭhinti
atk-s0510a:2599_4: amatamahānibbānavuṭṭhidhāraṃ pavassanto paggharanto sadevakaṃ lokaṃ temento sabbakilesapariḷāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2600_0: 68. Sadhajaṃ padumaṃ gayhāti dhajena saha ekato katvā padumaṃ padumakalāpaṃ gahetvāti
atk-s0510a:2600_1: attho. Aḍḍhakose ṭhito ahanti ubho ukkhipitvā ṭhito ahanti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2603_0: Jātiyā sattavassohantiādikaṃ āyasmato asanabodhiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2603_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2603_2: kāle aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto sukhappatto sāsane pasanno asanabodhito
atk-s0510a:2603_3: phalaṃ gahetvā tato vuṭṭhitabodhitaruṇe gahetvā bodhiṃ ropesi, yathā na vinassati
atk-s0510a:2603_4: tathā udakāsiñcanādikammena rakkhitvā pūjesi. So tena puññena devamanussesu sampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2603_5: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto paripakkasambhārattā sattavassikova
atk-s0510a:2603_6: samāno pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, purākatapuññanāmena asanabodhiyattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2604_0: 78. So pubbasambhāramanussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jātiyā
atk-s0510a:2604_1: sattavassohantiādimāha. Tattha jātiyāti mātugabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2604_2: Sattavasso paripuṇṇasarado ahaṃ lokanāyakaṃ tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2604_3: Pasannacitto sumanoti pakārena pasannaanāluḷitaavikampitacitto, sumano sundaramano
atk-s0510a:2605_0: 79. Tissassāhaṃ bhagavatoti tikkhattuṃ jātoti tisso, so mātugabbhato, manussajātito,
atk-s0510a:2605_1: pañcakkhandhato ca mutto hutvā jāto nibbatto buddho jātoti attho. Tassa tissassa
atk-s0510a:2605_2: bhagavato tādino, lokajeṭṭhassa asanabodhiṃ uttamaṃ ropayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2606_0: 80. Asano nāmadheyyenāti nāmapaññattiyā nāmasaññāya asano nāma asanarukkho bodhi
atk-s0510a:2606_1: ahosīti attho. Dharaṇīruhapādapoti vallirukkhapabbatagaṅgāsāgarādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī,
atk-s0510a:2606_2: kā sā? Pathavī, tassaṃ ruhati patiṭṭhahatīti dharaṇīruho, pādena pivatīti pādapo,
atk-s0510a:2606_3: pādasaṅkhātena mūlena siñcitodakaṃ pivati āporasaṃ sinehaṃ dhāretīti attho. Dharaṇīruho
atk-s0510a:2606_4: ca so pādapo cāti dharaṇīruhapādapo, taṃ uttamaṃ asanaṃ bodhiṃ pañca vassāni paricariṃ posesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2607_0: 81. Pupphitaṃ pādapaṃ disvāti taṃ mayā positaṃ asanabodhirukkhaṃ pupphitaṃ accharayoggabhūtapupphattā
atk-s0510a:2607_1: abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsakaraṇaṃ disvā sakaṃ kammaṃ attano kammaṃ pakittento pakārena kathayanto
atk-s0510a:2607_2: buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2612_0: Pavanaṃ kānanaṃ disvātiādikaṃ āyasmato sakacintaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2612_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2612_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya tassa bhagavato āyupariyosāne
atk-s0510a:2612_3: uppanno dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ apāpuṇitvā parinibbutakāle isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2612_4: himavante vasanto vivekaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ekaṃ vanaṃ patvā tatthevekāya kandarāya pulinacetiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2612_5: katvā bhagavati saññaṃ katvā sadhātukasaññañca katvā vanapupphehi pūjetvā namassamāno
atk-s0510a:2612_6: paricari. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto dvīsu aggaṃ aggasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2612_7: aggañca cakkavattisampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2612_8: vibhavasampanno saddhāsampanno satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā arahā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2613_0: 1. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2613_1: kānanaṃ disvātiādimāha. Tattha pavananti pakārena vanaṃ patthaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ gahanabhūtanti
atk-s0510a:2613_2: pavanaṃ. Kānanaṃ avakucchitaṃ ānanaṃ avahanaṃ satataṃ sīhabyagghayakkharakkhasamaddahatthiassasupaṇṇauragehi
atk-s0510a:2613_3: vihaṅgagaṇasaddakukkuṭakokilehi vā bahalanti kānanaṃ, taṃ kānanasaṅkhātaṃ pavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2613_4: manussasaddavirahitattā appasaddaṃ nissaddanti attho. Anāvilanti na āvilaṃ upaddavarahitanti
atk-s0510a:2613_6: anuciṇṇaṃ nisevitanti attho. Āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahanti āhunaṃ vuccati pūjāsakkāraṃ paṭiggahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2614_0: 2. Thūpaṃ katvāna veḷunāti veḷupesikāhi cetiyaṃ katvāti attho. Nānāpupphaṃ samokirinti
atk-s0510a:2614_1: campakādīhi anekehi pupphehi samokiriṃ pūjesinti attho. Sammukhā viya sambuddhanti
atk-s0510a:2614_2: sajīvamānassa sambuddhassa sammukhā iva nimmitaṃ uppāditaṃ cetiyaṃ ahaṃ abhi visesena
atk-s0510a:2617_0: Vihārā abhinikkhammātiādikaṃ āyasmato avopupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2617_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2617_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhāsampanno dhammaṃ sutvā somanassappatto
atk-s0510a:2617_3: nānāpupphāni ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā buddhassa upari abbhukkiri. So tena puññena
atk-s0510a:2617_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto saggasampattiñca cakkavattisampattiñca anubhavitvā sabbattha
atk-s0510a:2617_5: pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbato vuddhippatto sāsane pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2617_6: pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi. Ā samantato kāsati dippatīti ākāso, tasmiṃ ākāse
atk-s0510a:2618_0: 7. Evaṃ pattasantipado attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2618_1: pakāsento vihārā abhinikkhammātiādimāha. Tattha vihārāti visesena harati catūhi iriyāpathehi
atk-s0510a:2618_2: apatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ āharati pavatteti etthāti vihāro, tasmā vihārā abhi visesena
atk-s0510a:2618_3: nikkhamma nikkhamitvā. Abbhuṭṭhāsi ca caṅkameti caṅkamanatthāya saṭṭhiratane caṅkame
atk-s0510a:2618_4: abhivisesena uṭṭhāsi, abhiruhīti attho. Catusaccaṃ pakāsentoti tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamanto
atk-s0510a:2618_5: dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggasaccasaṅkhātaṃ catusaccaṃ pakāsento pākaṭaṃ karonto amataṃ
atk-s0510a:2618_6: padaṃ nibbānaṃ desento vibhajanto uttānīkaronto tasmiṃ caṅkameti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2619_0: 8. Sikhissa giramaññāya, buddhaseṭṭhassa tādinoti seṭṭhassa tādiguṇasamaṅgissa sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2619_1: buddhassa giraṃ saddaṃ ghosaṃ aññāya jānitvā. Nānāpupphaṃ gahetvānāti nāgapunnāgādianekāni
atk-s0510a:2619_2: pupphāni gahetvā āharitvā. Ākāsamhi samokirinti caṅkamantassa bhagavato muddhani
atk-s0510a:2620_0: 9. Tena kammena dvipadindāti dvipadānaṃ devabrahmamanussānaṃ inda padhānabhūta. Narāsabha
atk-s0510a:2620_1: narānaṃ āsabhabhūta. Pattomhi acalaṃ ṭhānanti tumhākaṃ santike pabbajitvā acalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2620_2: ṭhānaṃ nibbānaṃ patto amhi bhavāmi. Hitvā jayaparājayanti dibbamanussasampattisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:2620_3: jayañca caturāpāyadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ parājayañca hitvā chaḍḍetvā nibbānaṃ pattosmīti
atk-s0510a:2623_0: Sindhuyā nadiyā tīretiādikaṃ āyasmato paccāgamaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2623_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2623_2: bhagavato kāle sindhuyā gaṅgāya samīpe cakkavākayoniyaṃ nibbatto pubbasambhārayuttattā
atk-s0510a:2623_3: pāṇino akhādanto sevālameva bhakkhayanto carati. Tasmiṃ samaye vipassibhagavā sattānuggahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2623_4: karonto tattha agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so cakkavāko vijjotamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2623_5: pasannamānaso tuṇḍena sālarukkhato sālapupphaṃ chinditvā āgamma pūjesi. So teneva
atk-s0510a:2623_6: cittappasādena tato cuto devaloke uppanno aparāparaṃ chakāmāvacarasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2623_7: tato cuto manussaloke uppajjitvā cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2623_8: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pubbacaritavasena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2623_9: nacirasseva arahā ahosi, cakkavāko hutvā bhagavantaṃ disvā katthaci gantvā pupphamāharitvā
atk-s0510a:2624_0: 13. Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sindhuyā
atk-s0510a:2624_1: nadiyā tīretiādimāha. Sīti saddaṃ kurumānā dhunāti kampatīti sindhu, nadati saddaṃ
atk-s0510a:2624_2: karonto gacchatīti nadi. Cakkavāko ahaṃ tadāti cakkaṃ sīghaṃ gacchantaṃ iva udake
atk-s0510a:2624_3: vā thale vā ākāse vā sīghaṃ vāti gacchatīti cakkavāko. Tadā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2624_4: dassanakāle ahaṃ cakkavāko ahosinti attho. Suddhasevālabhakkhohanti aññagocaraamissattā
atk-s0510a:2624_5: suddhasevālameva khādanto ahaṃ vasāmi. Pāpesu ca susaññatoti pubbavāsanāvasena pāpakaraṇe
atk-s0510a:2624_6: suṭṭhu saññato tīhi dvārehi saññato susikkhito.
atk-s0510a:2625_0: 14. Addasaṃ virajaṃ buddhanti rāgadosamohavirahitattā virajaṃ nikkilesaṃ buddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2625_1: addasaṃ addakkhiṃ. Gacchantaṃ anilañjaseti anilañjase ākāsapathe gacchantaṃ buddhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2625_2: Tuṇḍena mayhaṃ mukhatuṇḍena tālaṃ sālapupphaṃ paggayha paggahetvā vipassissābhiropayiṃ
atk-s0510a:2625_3: vipassissa bhagavato pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2628_0: Usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīrantiādikaṃ āyasmato parappasādakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2628_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2628_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako
atk-s0510a:2628_4: anavayo nāmena selabrāhmaṇoti pākaṭo siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
atk-s0510a:2628_5: asītianubyañjanehi cāti sayaṃ sobhamānaṃ disvā pasannamānaso anekehi kāraṇehi anekāhi
atk-s0510a:2628_6: upamāhi thomanaṃ pakāsesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke sakkamārādayo cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2628_7: anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattisampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2628_8: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīdisvā pabbajito nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2628_9: catupaṭisambhidāchaḷabhiññappatto mahākhīṇāsavo ahosi, buddhassa thutiyā sattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2629_0: 20. Ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2629_1: usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīrantiādimāha. Tattha usabhanti vasabho nisabho visabho āsabhoti
atk-s0510a:2629_2: cattāro jeṭṭhapuṅgavā. Tattha gavasatajeṭṭhako vasabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako nisabho,
atk-s0510a:2629_3: gavasatasahassajeṭṭhako visabho, gavakoṭisatasahassajeṭṭhako āsabhoti ca yassa kassaci
atk-s0510a:2629_4: thutiṃ karontā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā bahussutā attano attano paññāvasena thutiṃ karonti,
atk-s0510a:2629_5: buddhānaṃ pana sabbākārena thutiṃ kātuṃ samattho ekopi natthi. Appameyyo hi buddho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0510a:2630: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0510a:2631: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:2632_0: Ādikaṃ. Ayampi brāhmaṇo mukhārūḷhavasena ekapasīdanavasena “āsabha”nti vattabbe “usabha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2632_1: Varitabbo patthetabboti varo. Anekesu kappasatasahassesu katavīriyattā vīro. Mahantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2632_2: sīlakkhandhādikaṃ esati gavesatīti mahesī, taṃ mahesiṃ buddhaṃ. Visesena kilesakhandhamārādayo
atk-s0510a:2632_3: māre jitavāti vijitāvī, taṃ vijitāvinaṃ sambuddhaṃ. Suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo iva vaṇṇo yassa
atk-s0510a:2632_4: sambuddhassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, taṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhaṃ disvā ko nāma satto nappasīdatīti.
atk-s0510a:2635_0: Vessabhū nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato bhisadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2635_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:2635_2: bhagavato kāle himavantasmiṃ hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbatto tasmiṃ paṭivasati. Tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0510a:2635_3: vessabhū bhagavā vivekakāmo himavantamagamāsi. Taṃ disvā so hatthināgo pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2635_4: bhisamuḷālaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ bhojesi. So tena puññakammena hatthiyonito cuto
atk-s0510a:2635_5: devaloke uppajjitvā tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussattamāgato
atk-s0510a:2635_6: manussesu cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mahābhoge aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2635_7: kule nibbatto pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2636_0: 29. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento vessabhū nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2636_1: Tattha vessabhūti vessaṃ bhunāti atikkamatīti vessabhū. Atha vā vesse vāṇijakamme
atk-s0510a:2636_2: vā kāmarāgādike vā kusalādikamme vā vatthukāmakilesakāme vā bhunāti abhibhavatīti
atk-s0510a:2636_3: vessabhū, so nāmena vessabhū nāma bhagavā. Isīnaṃ tatiyo ahūti kusaladhamme esati
atk-s0510a:2636_4: gavesatīti isi, “vipassī, sikhī, vessabhū”ti vuttattā tatiyo isi tatiyo bhagavā ahu
atk-s0510a:2636_5: ahosīti attho. Kānanaṃ vanamoggayhāti kānanasaṅkhātaṃ vanaṃ ogayha ogahetvā pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2637: 30. Bhisamuḷālaṃ gaṇhitvāti dvipadacatuppadānaṃ chātakaṃ bhisati hiṃsati vināsetīti bhisaṃ, ko so? Padumakando, bhisañca muḷālañca bhisamuḷālaṃ, taṃ bhisamuḷālaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2638_0: 31. Karena ca parāmaṭṭhoti taṃ mayā dinnadānaṃ, vessabhūvarabuddhinā uttamabuddhinā
atk-s0510a:2638_1: vessabhunā karena hatthatalena parāmaṭṭho katasamphasso ahosi. Sukhāhaṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0510a:2638_2: samaṃ tena kutottarinti tena sukhena samaṃ sukhaṃ nābhijānāmi, tato uttariṃ tato
atk-s0510a:2638_3: paraṃ tato adhikaṃ sukhaṃ kutoti attho. Sesaṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyanti.
atk-s0510a:2641_0: Giriduggacaro āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato sucintitattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2641_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2641_2: bhagavato kāle himavantappadese nesādakule uppanno migasūkarādayo vadhitvā khādanto
atk-s0510a:2641_3: viharati. Tadā lokanātho lokānuggahaṃ sattānuddayatañca paṭicca himavantamagamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2641_4: Tadā so nesādo bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano khādanatthāya ānītaṃ varamadhuramaṃsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2641_5: adāsi. Paṭiggahesi bhagavā tassānukampāya, taṃ bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2641_6: So teneva puññena teneva somanassena tato cuto sugatīsu saṃsaranto cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2641_7: anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2641_8: nibbatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2642_0: 36. Catupaṭisambhidāpañcābhiññādibhedaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2642_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento giriduggacaro āsintiādimāha. Girati saddaṃ karotīti
atk-s0510a:2642_2: giri, ko so? Silāpaṃsumayapabbato, duṭṭhu dukkhena gamanīyaṃ duggaṃ, girīhi duggaṃ
atk-s0510a:2642_3: giriduggaṃ, duggamoti attho. Tasmiṃ giridugge pabbatantare caro caraṇasīlo āsiṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2642_4: Abhijātova kesarīti abhi visesena jāto nibbatto kesarīva kesarasīho iva giriduggasmiṃ carāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2643: 40. Giriduggaṃ pavisiṃ ahanti ahaṃ tadā tena maṃsadānena pītisomanassajāto pabbatantaraṃ pāvisiṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2646_0: Pakkhijāto tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato vatthadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2646_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2646_2: bhagavato kāle supaṇṇayoniyaṃ nibbatto gandhamādanapabbataṃ gacchantaṃ atthadassiṃ
atk-s0510a:2646_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā
atk-s0510a:2646_4: mahagghaṃ dibbavatthaṃ ādāya bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. Sopi bhagavā paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2646_5: vatvā pakkāmi. So teneva somanassena vītināmetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke
atk-s0510a:2646_6: nibbatto tattha aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto puññāni anubhavitvā tato manussesu manussasampattinti
atk-s0510a:2646_7: sabbattha mahagghaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ laddhaṃ, tato uppannuppannabhave vatthacchāyāya
atk-s0510a:2646_8: gatagataṭṭhāne vasanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2646_9: satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva chaḷabhiññappattakhīṇāsavo ahosi, pubbe
atk-s0510a:2647_0: 45. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pakkhijāto
atk-s0510a:2647_1: tadā āsintiādimāha. Tattha pakkhijātoti pakkhandati upalavati sakuṇo etenāti pakkhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2647_2: pakkhamassa atthīti pakkhī, pakkhiyoniyaṃ jāto nibbattoti attho. Supaṇṇoti sundaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2647_3: paṇṇaṃ pattaṃ yassa so supaṇṇo, vātaggāhasuvaṇṇavaṇṇajalamānapattamahābhāroti attho.
atk-s0510a:2647_4: Garuḷādhipoti nāge gaṇhanatthāya garuṃ bhāraṃ pāsāṇaṃ giḷantīti garuḷā, garuḷānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2647_5: adhipo rājāti garuḷādhipo, virajaṃ buddhaṃ addasāhanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2650_0: Anomadassī bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato ambadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2650_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2650_2: bhagavato kāle vānarayoniyaṃ nibbatto himavante kapirājā hutvā paṭivasati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2650_3: samaye anomadassī bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantamagamāsi. Atha so kapirājā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2650_4: disvā pasannamānaso sumadhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ khuddamadhunā adāsi. Atha bhagavā tassa
atk-s0510a:2650_5: passantasseva taṃ sabbaṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. Atha so somanassasampannahadayo
atk-s0510a:2650_6: teneva pītisomanassena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0510a:2650_7: tattha dibbasukhamanubhavitvā manussesu ca manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2650_8: vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2651_0: 53. So aparabhāge attanā katakusalabījaṃ disvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2651_1: pakāsento anomadassī bhagavātiādimāha. Mettāya aphari loke, appamāṇe nirūpadhīti
atk-s0510a:2651_2: so bhagavā sabbaloke appamāṇe satte “sukhī hontū”tiādinā nirupadhi upadhivirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2651_3: katvā mettāya mettacittena aphari patthari vaḍḍhesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2652: 54. Kapi ahaṃ tadā āsinti tadā tassāgamanakāle kapirājā ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2655_0: Sumano nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato sumanattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2655_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2655_2: kāle mālākārassa kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto bhagavati pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2655_3: sumanamālāmuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ubhohi hatthehi pūjesi. So tena puññena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2655_4: dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2655_5: puttadārehi vaḍḍhitvā sumananāmena pākaṭo satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2656_0: 62. So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2656_1: pakāsento sumano nāma nāmenātiādimāha. Sundaraṃ manaṃ cittaṃ yassa so sumano. Saddhāpasādabahumānena
atk-s0510a:2656_2: yutto nāmena sumano nāma mālākāro tadā ahaṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2657_0: 63. Sikhino lokabandhunoti sikhā muddhā kāsatīti sikhī. Atha vā sampayuttasampayoge
atk-s0510a:2657_1: khādati viddhaṃsetīti sikhī, kā sā? Aggisikhā, aggisikhā viya sikhāya dippanato sikhī.
atk-s0510a:2657_2: Yathā aggisikhā jotati pākaṭā hoti, sikhī pattatiṇakaṭṭhapalāsādike dahati, evamayampi
atk-s0510a:2657_3: bhagavā nīlapītādiraṃsīhi jotati sakalalokasannivāse pākaṭo hoti. Sakasantānagatasabbakilese
atk-s0510a:2657_4: soseti viddhaṃseti jhāpetīti vohāranāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ, tassa sikhino. Sakalalokassa
atk-s0510a:2657_5: bandhuñātakoti lokabandhu, tassa sikhino lokabandhuno bhagavato sumanapupphaṃ abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2660_0: Abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ vātiādikaṃ āyasmato pupphacaṅkoṭiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2660_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2660_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahāvibhavasampanno satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2660_3: pasannākāraṃ dassento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ anojapupphamocinitvā caṅkoṭakaṃ pūretvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2660_4: pūjetvā “bhagavā, imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇavaṇṇo pūjanīyo
atk-s0510a:2660_5: hutvā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti patthanamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2660_6: sabbattha pūjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo abhirūpo ahosi. So aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2660_7: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:2661_0: 68-9. So pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_1: pakāsento abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ vātiādimāha. Tattha sīhanti dvipadacatuppadādayo satte
atk-s0510a:2661_2: abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti sīho, abhītarūpo abhītasabhāvo, taṃ abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_3: iva nisinnaṃ pūjesinti sambandho. Pakkhīnaṃ aggaṃ garuḷarājaṃ iva pavaraṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_4: byaggharājaṃ iva abhi visesena jātaṃ sabbasīhānaṃ visesaṃ kesarasīhaṃ iva tilokassa
atk-s0510a:2661_5: saraṇaṃ sikhiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ. Kiṃ bhūtaṃ? Anejaṃ nikkilesaṃ khandhamārādīhi aparājitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_6: nisinnaṃ sikhinti sambandho. Māraṇānagganti sabbakilesānaṃ māraṇe sosane viddhaṃsane
atk-s0510a:2661_7: aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ kilese mārentānaṃ paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vijjamānānampi tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_8: agganti attho. Bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ parivāretvā nisinnaṃ sikhinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2662: 70. Caṅkoṭake ṭhapetvānāti uttamaṃ anojapupphaṃ karaṇḍake pūretvā sikhīsambuddhaṃ seṭṭhaṃ samokiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2667_0: Āpāṭaliṃ ahaṃ pupphantiādikaṃ āyasmato nāgasamālattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2667_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2667_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tathārūpasajjanasaṃsaggassa
atk-s0510a:2667_3: alābhena satthari dharamānakāle dassanasavanapūjākammamakaritvā parinibbutakāle tassa
atk-s0510a:2667_4: bhagavato sārīrikadhātuṃ nidahitvā katacetiyamhi cittaṃ pasādetvā pāṭalipupphaṃ pūjetvā
atk-s0510a:2667_5: somanassaṃ uppādetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā teneva somanassena tato kālaṃ kato tusitādīsu
atk-s0510a:2667_6: chasu devalokesu sukhamanubhavitvā aparabhāge manussesu manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2667_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nāgarukkhapallavakomaḷasadisasarīrattā
atk-s0510a:2667_8: nāgasamāloti mātāpitūhi katanāmadheyyo bhagavati pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2668_0: 1. So pacchā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2668_1: āpāṭaliṃ ahaṃ pupphantiādimāha. Tattha āpāṭalinti ā samantato, ādarena vā pāṭalipupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2668_2: gahetvā ahaṃ thūpamhi abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho. Ujjhitaṃ sumahāpatheti sabbanagaravāsīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2668_3: vandanapūjanatthāya mahāpathe nagaramajjhe vīthiyaṃ ujjhitaṃ uṭṭhāpitaṃ, iṭṭhakakammasudhākammādīhi
atk-s0510a:2668_4: nipphāditanti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2671_0: Akkantañca padaṃ disvātiādikaṃ āyasmato padasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2671_1: katādhikāro uppannuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2671_2: kāle ekasmiṃ saddhāsampanne upāsakagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno
atk-s0510a:2671_3: bhagavatā tassa anukampāya dassitaṃ padacetiyaṃ disvā pasanno lomahaṭṭhajāto vandanapūjanādibahumānamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2671_4: So teneva sukhette sukatena puññena tato cuto sagge nibbatto tattha dibbasukhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2671_5: aparabhāge manussesu jāto manussasampattiṃ sabbamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2671_6: vibhavasampannakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā
atk-s0510a:2672_0: 5. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento akkantañca
atk-s0510a:2672_1: padaṃ disvātiādimāha. Tattha akkantanti akkamitaṃ dassitaṃ. Sabbabuddhānaṃ sabbadā
atk-s0510a:2672_2: caturaṅgulopariyeva gamanaṃ, ayaṃ pana tassa saddhāsampannataṃ ñatvā “eso imaṃ passatū”ti
atk-s0510a:2672_3: padacetiyaṃ dassesi, tasmā so tasmiṃ pasīditvā vandanapūjanādisakkāramakāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2675_0: Dumagge paṃsukūlikantiādikaṃ āyasmato buddhasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2675_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2675_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto dumagge laggitaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2675_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussasampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2675_5: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2676_0: 9. So pattaarahattādhigamo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2676_1: pakāsento dumagge paṃsukūlikantiādimāha. Tattha dhunāti kampatīti dumo. Duhati pūreti
atk-s0510a:2676_2: ākāsatalanti vā dumo, dumassa aggo koṭīti dumaggo, tasmiṃ dumagge. Paṃsumiva paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2676_3: amanuññabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsukūlameva paṃsukūlikaṃ, satthuno
atk-s0510a:2676_4: paṃsukūlaṃ dumagge laggitaṃ disvā ahaṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā taṃ paṃsukūlaṃ avandiṃ
atk-s0510a:2676_5: paṇāmamakāsinti attho. Tanti nipātamattaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2679_0: Kānanaṃ vanamoggayhātiādikaṃ āyasmato bhisāluvadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2679_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2679_2: bhagavato kāle himavantassa samīpe araññāvāse vasanto vanamūlaphalāhāro vivekavasenāgataṃ
atk-s0510a:2679_3: vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcabhisāluve adāsi. Bhagavā tassa cittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2679_4: pasādetuṃ passantasseva paribhuñji. So tena cittappasādena kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu
atk-s0510a:2679_5: sampattimanubhavitvā pacchā manussasampattiñca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2679_6: kulagehe nibbatto vibhavasampattiṃ patto taṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajito nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2680_0: 13. So tato attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2680_1: kānanaṃ vanamoggayhātiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Vasāmi vipine ahanti vivekavāso
atk-s0510a:2684_0: Khaṇḍo nāmāsi nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato ekasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2684_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2684_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasannamānaso tassa satthuno
atk-s0510a:2684_3: khaṇḍaṃ nāma aggasāvakaṃ bhikkhāya caramānaṃ disvā saddahitvā piṇḍapātamadāsi. So
atk-s0510a:2684_4: tena puññakammena devamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2684_5: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2684_6: pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ piṇḍapātassa saññaṃ manasikaritvā
atk-s0510a:2685_0: 18. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2685_1: khaṇḍo nāmāsi nāmenātiādimāha. Tattha tassa aggasāvakattherassa kilesānaṃ khaṇḍitattā
atk-s0510a:2688_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2688_2: tissassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto buddhuppādato pageva uppannattā
atk-s0510a:2688_3: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre ekaṃ saraṃ nissāya
atk-s0510a:2688_4: paṭivasati. Tasmiṃ samaye tisso bhagavā tassānukampāya ākāsena agamāsi. Atha kho
atk-s0510a:2688_5: so tāpaso ākāsato oruyha ṭhitaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇaṃ lāyitvā
atk-s0510a:2688_6: tiṇasantharaṃ katvā nisīdāpetvā bahumānādarena pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā paṭikuṭiko
atk-s0510a:2688_7: hutvā pakkāmi. So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekavidhasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2688_8: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2689_0: 22. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2689_1: himavantassāvidūretiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Mahājātassaroti ettha pana
atk-s0510a:2689_2: saranti ettha pānīyatthikā dvipadacatuppadādayo sattāti saraṃ, atha vā saranti ettha
atk-s0510a:2689_3: nadīkandarādayoti saraṃ, mahanto ca so sayameva jātattā saro ceti mahājātassaro.
atk-s0510a:2689_5: Satapattehi sañchannoti ekekasmiṃ pupphe satasatapattānaṃ vasena satapatto, satapattasetapadumehi
atk-s0510a:2689_6: sañchanno gahanībhūtoti attho. Nānāsakuṇamālayoti aneke haṃsakukkuṭakukkuhadeṇḍibhādayo
atk-s0510a:2689_7: ekato kuṇanti saddaṃ karontīti sakuṇāti laddhanāmānaṃ pakkhīnaṃ ālayo ādhārabhūtoti
atk-s0510a:2692_0: Tiṃsakappasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato sūcidāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:2692_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:2692_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0510a:2692_3: pañca sūciyo adāsi. So tena puññena devamanussesu puññamanubhavitvā vicaranto uppannuppannabhave
atk-s0510a:2692_4: tikkhapañño hutvā pākaṭo imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2692_5: satthari pasīditvā pabbajanto tikkhapaññatāya khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2693: 30. So aparabhāge puññaṃ paccavekkhanto taṃ disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tiṃsakappasahassamhītiādimāha. Antarantaraṃ panettha suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:2694: 31. Pañcasūcī mayā dinnāti ettha sūcati chiddaṃ karoti vijjhatīti sūci, pañcamattā sūcī pañcasūcī mayā dinnāti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2697_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādikaṃ āyasmato pāṭalipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2697_1: purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2697_2: tissassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:2697_3: kusalākusalaññū satthari pasīditvā pāṭalipupphaṃ gahetvā satthu pūjesi. So tena puññena
atk-s0510a:2697_4: bahudhā sukhasampattiyo anubhavanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2697_5: kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2698_0: 36. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2698_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādimāha. Tattha antarāpaṇeti ā samantato hiraññasuvaṇṇādikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2698_2: bhaṇḍaṃ paṇenti vikkiṇanti pattharanti etthāti āpaṇaṃ, āpaṇassa antaraṃ vīthīti antarāpaṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2698_3: tasmiṃ antarāpaṇe. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kañcanagghiyasaṃkāsaṃ dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇaṃ sambuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2698_4: disvā pāṭalipupphaṃ pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2701_0: Migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato ṭhitañjaliyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2701_1: katādhikāro tattha tatthuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2701_2: bhagavato kāle purākatena ekena kammacchiddena nesādayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2701_3: patto migasūkarādayo māretvā nesādakammena araññe vāsaṃ kappesi. Tasmiṃ samaye tisso
atk-s0510a:2701_4: bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇehi asītānubyañjanabyāmappabhāhi
atk-s0510a:2701_5: ca jalamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā somanassajāto paṇāmaṃ katvā gantvā paṇṇasanthare nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2701_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe devo gajjanto asani pati, tato maraṇasamaye buddhamanussaritvā punañjalimakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2701_7: So tena puññena sukhette katakusalattā akusalavipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sagge nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2701_8: kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu manussasampattiyo ca anubhavitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:2701_9: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya purākatavāsanāya satthari
atk-s0510a:2702_0: 42. So tato paraṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2702_1: migaluddo pure āsintiādimāha. Tattha migaluddoti migānaṃ māraṇaṃ upagacchatīti migaluddo.
atk-s0510a:2702_2: Miganti sīghaṃ vātavegena gacchanti dhāvantīti migā, tesaṃ migānaṃ māraṇe luddo dāruṇo
atk-s0510a:2702_3: lobhīti migaluddo. So ahaṃ pure bhagavato dassanasamaye migaluddo āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2702_4: Araññe kānaneti arati gacchati migasamūho etthāti araññaṃ, atha vā ā samantato rajjanti
atk-s0510a:2702_5: tattha vivekābhiratā buddhapaccekabuddhādayo mahāsārappattā sappurisāti araññaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2702_6: Kā kucchitākārena vā bhayānakākārena vā nadanti saddaṃ karonti, ānanti vindantīti
atk-s0510a:2702_7: vā kānanaṃ, tasmiṃ araññe kānane migaluddo pure āsinti sambandho. Tattha addasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2702_8: sambuddhanti tattha tasmiṃ araññe upagataṃ sambuddhaṃ addasaṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2702_9: Dassanaṃ pure ahosi avidūre, tasmā manodvārānusārena cakkhuviññāṇaṃ purecārikaṃ kāyaviññāṇasamaṅgiṃ
atk-s0510a:2703: 44. Tato me asanīpātoti ā samantato sananto gajjanto patatīti asani, asaniyā pāto patanaṃ asanīpāto, devadaṇḍoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2706_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato tipadumiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2706_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2706_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatiyaṃ mālākārakulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto mālākārakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2706_3: katvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ anekavidhāni jalajathalajapupphāni gahetvā rañño santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2706_4: gantukāmo evaṃ cintesi – “rājā imāni tāva pupphāni disvā pasanno sahassaṃ vā dhanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2706_5: gāmādikaṃ vā dadeyya, lokanāthaṃ pana pūjetvā nibbānāmatadhanaṃ labhāmi, kiṃ me etesu
atk-s0510a:2706_6: sundara”nti tena “bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā saggamokkhasampattiyo nipphādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0510a:2706_7: cintetvā vaṇṇavantaṃ atīva rattapupphattayaṃ gahetvā pūjesi. Tāni gantvā ākāsaṃ chādetvā
atk-s0510a:2706_8: pattharitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Nagaravāsino acchariyabbhutacittajātā celukkhepasahassāni pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2706_9: Taṃ disvā bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsi. So tena puññena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2706_10: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2706_11: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2707_0: 48. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro
atk-s0510a:2707_1: nāma jinotiādimāha. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. Sabbadhammāna pāragūti sabbesaṃ navalokuttaradhammānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2707_2: pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato paccakkhaṃ katoti attho. Danto dantaparivutoti sayaṃ kāyavācādīhi
atk-s0510a:2707_3: danto etadagge ṭhapitehi sāvakehi parivutoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha sambandhavasena uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2712_0: Candabhāgānadītīretiādikaṃ āyasmato timirapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0510a:2712_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:2712_2: upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2712_3: saṇṭhapetvā vasanto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2712_4: candabhāgāya nadiyā samīpe vasati, vivekakāmatāya himavantaṃ gantvā nisinnaṃ siddhatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2712_5: bhagavantaṃ disvā vanditvā tassa guṇaṃ pasīditvā timirapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesi. So
atk-s0510a:2712_6: tena puññena devesu ca manussesu ca sampattimanubhavanto saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2712_7: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2713_0: 1. So aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento candabhāgānadītīretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2713_1: Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. Anubhotaṃ vajāmahanti gaṅgāya āsanne vasanabhāvena sabbattha
atk-s0510a:2713_2: rammabhāvena gaṅgāto heṭṭhā sotānusārena ahaṃ vajāmi gacchāmi tattha tattha vasāmīti
atk-s0510a:2713_3: attho. Nisinnaṃ samaṇaṃ disvāti samitapāpattā sositapāpattā samaṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2714: 2. Evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadāti ayaṃ bhagavā sayaṃ tiṇṇo sabbasatte tārayissati saṃsārato uttāreti sayaṃ kāyadvārādīhi damito ayaṃ bhagavā pare dameti.
atk-s0510a:2715_0: 3. Sayaṃ assattho assāsampatto, kilesapariḷāhato mutto sabbasatte assāseti, santabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2715_1: āpāpeti. Sayaṃ santo santakāyacitto paresaṃ santakāyacittaṃ pāpeti. Sayaṃ mutto saṃsārato
atk-s0510a:2715_2: muccito pare saṃsārato mocayissati. So ayaṃ bhagavā sayaṃ nibbuto kilesaggīhi nibbuto
atk-s0510a:2715_3: paresampi kilesaggīhi nibbāpessatīti ahaṃ tadā evaṃ cintesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2716_0: 4. Gahetvā timirapupphanti sakalaṃ vanantaṃ nīlakāḷaraṃsīhi andhakāraṃ viya kurumānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2716_1: khāyatīti timiraṃ pupphaṃ taṃ gahetvā kaṇṇikāvaṇṭaṃ gahetvā matthake sīsassa upari
atk-s0510a:2716_2: ākāse okiriṃ pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2719_0: Jātiyā sattavassohantiādikaṃ āyasmato gatasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2719_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2719_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto purākatavāsanāvasena saddhājāto sattavassikakāleyeva
atk-s0510a:2719_3: pabbajito bhagavato paṇāmakaraṇeneva pākaṭo ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ atīva nīlamaṇippabhāni

atk-s0510a:2751_1: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassissa bhagavatotiādimāha. Tattha visesaṃ paramatthaṃ

atk-s0510a:2853_0: Atthadassī jinavarotiādikaṃ āyasmato sumaṅgalattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2853_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa

atk-s0510a:2853_4: jalamāno brahmā viya sūriyo viya suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi. Atha so devaputto somanassajāto

atk-s0510a:2853_6: devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2853_7: viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2854_0: 11. So pacchā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassī
atk-s0510a:2854_1: jinavarotiādimāha. Tattha paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ dakkhati passatīti atthadassī, atha
atk-s0510a:2854_2: vā sabbasattānaṃ caturāriyasaccasaṅkhātaṃ atthapayojanaṃ dassanasīloti atthadassī,
atk-s0510a:2854_3: kilese ajini jināti jinissatīti jino. Varitabbo patthetabbo sabbasattehīti varo,
atk-s0510a:2854_4: atthadassī jino ca so varo cāti atthadassī jinavaro. Lokajeṭṭhoti lujjati palujjatīti
atk-s0510a:2854_5: loko, lokīyati passīyati buddhādīhi pārappattoti vā loko, loko ca loko ca loko cāti

atk-s0510a:2854_7: so lokajeṭṭho narāsabhoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.

atk-s0510a:2857_6: Tadā te sabbe phalakāvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavantaṃ gāravabahumānena vanditvā saraṇamagamaṃsu.

atk-s0510a:2874_0: 49. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2874_1: vasāmi rājāyatanetiādimāha. Rājāyataneti devarājūnaṃ āyatanaṃ rājāyatanaṃ, tassa
atk-s0510a:2874_2: rukkhassa nāmadheyyo vā. Parinibbute bhagavatīti parisamantato kiñci anavasesetvā
atk-s0510a:2874_3: khandhaparinibbānakāle parinibbānasamaye parinibbānappattassa sikhino lokabandhunoti sambandho.
