atk-s0510a:2875_2: samīpaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho. Tattha gantvā katakiccaṃ dassento tūriyaṃ tattha vādetvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2878_0: Yadā vipassī lokaggotiādikaṃ āyasmato buddhasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2878_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2878_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ bhūmaṭṭhakavimāne devaputto hutvā nibbatti. Tadā vipassī bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2878_3: āyusaṅkhāraṃ vossajji. Atha sakaladasasahassilokadhātu sasāgarapabbatā pakampittha.
atk-s0510a:2878_4: Tadā tassa devaputtassa bhavanampi kampittha. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so devaputto saṃsayajāto
atk-s0510a:2878_5: – “kiṃ nu kho pathavīkampāya nibbattī”ti cintetvā buddhassa āyusaṅkhāravossajjabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2878_6: ñatvā mahāsokaṃ domanassaṃ uppādesi. Tadā vessavaṇo mahārājā āgantvā “mā cintayitthā”ti
atk-s0510a:2878_7: assāsesi. So devaputto tato cuto tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2878_8: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2879_0: 57. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2879_1: yadā vipassī lokaggotiādimāha. Āyusaṅkhāramossajjīti ā samantato yunoti pāleti satteti
atk-s0510a:2879_2: āyu, āyussa saṅkhāro rāsibhāvo āyusaṅkhāro, taṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji pariccaji jahāsīti
atk-s0510a:2880_0: 58. Otataṃ vitthataṃ mayhanti mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ otataṃ vitthataṃ cittaṃ vicittaṃ suci
atk-s0510a:2880_1: suparisuddhaṃ cittaṃ anekehi sattahi ratanehi vicittaṃ sobhamānaṃ pakampittha pakārena
atk-s0510a:2883_0: Padumuttarabuddhassātiādikaṃ āyasmato maggasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2883_1: katādhikāro tato oraṃ tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2883_2: bhagavato kāle himavante devaputto hutvā nibbatto araññaṃ gantvā maggamūḷhānaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0510a:2883_3: gavesantānaṃ tassa sāvakānaṃ bhojetvā maggaṃ ācikkhi. So tena puññena devamanussasampattimanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2883_4: uppannuppannabhave sabbattha amūḷho saññavā ahosi. Atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2883_5: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāse anallīno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2884_0: 66. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2884_1: padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha. Sāvakā vanacārinoti bhagavato vuttavacanaṃ sammā ādarena
atk-s0510a:2884_2: suṇantīti sāvakā, atha vā bhagavato desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saddhammaṃ suṇantīti
atk-s0510a:2884_3: sāvakā. Vanacārino vane vicaraṇakā sāvakā vippanaṭṭhā maggamūḷhā mahāaraññe andhāva
atk-s0510a:2884_4: cakkhuvirahitāva anusuyyare vicarantīti sambandho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2887_0: Atthadassimhi sugatetiādikaṃ āyasmato paccupaṭṭhānasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2887_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2887_2: atthadassissa bhagavato kāle yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto bhagavati dharamāne dassanassa
atk-s0510a:2887_3: aladdhattā pacchā parinibbute mahāsokappatto vihāsi. Tadā hissa bhagavato sāgato
atk-s0510a:2887_4: nāma aggasāvako anusāsanto bhagavato sārīrikadhātupūjā bhagavati dharamāne katapūjā
atk-s0510a:2887_5: viya cittappasādavasā mahapphalaṃ bhavatī”ti vatvā “thūpaṃ karohī”ti niyojito thūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:2887_6: kāresi, taṃ pūjetvā tato cuto devamanussesu sakkacakkavattisampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2887_7: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2888_0: 72. So aparabhāge attano puññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2888_1: atthadassimhi sugatetiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Yakkhayoniṃ upapajjinti ettha
atk-s0510a:2888_2: pana attano sakāsaṃ sampattasampatte khādantā yanti gacchantīti yakkhā, yakkhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2888_3: yoni jātīti yakkhayoni, yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2889_0: 73. Dulladdhaṃ vata me āsīti me mayā laddhayasaṃ dulladdhaṃ, buddhabhūtassa satthuno
atk-s0510a:2889_1: sakkāraṃ akatattā virādhetvā laddhanti attho. Duppabhātanti duṭṭhu pabhātaṃ rattiyā
atk-s0510a:2889_2: pabhātakaraṇaṃ, mayhaṃ na suṭṭhuṃ pabhātanti attho. Duruṭṭhitanti duuṭṭhitaṃ, sūriyassa
atk-s0510a:2889_3: uggamanaṃ mayhaṃ duuggamananti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2892_0: Jāyaṃ tassa vipassissātiādikaṃ āyasmato jātipūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2892_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2892_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nakkhattapāṭhakehi vipassibodhisattassa
atk-s0510a:2892_3: vuttalakkhaṇanimittaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ kira kumāro buddho hutvā sakalalokassa aggo seṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2892_4: sutvā sabbasatte saṃsārato uddharissatī”ti sutvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ kumārakāleyeva buddhassa
atk-s0510a:2892_5: viya mahāpūjamakāsi. Pacchā kamena kumārakālaṃ rājakumārakālaṃ rajjakālanti kālattayamatikkamma
atk-s0510a:2892_6: buddhe jātepi mahāpūjaṃ katvā tato cuto tusitādīsu nibbatto dibbasukhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2892_7: pacchā manussesu cakkavattādimanussasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2892_8: nibbatto sattaṭṭhavassakāleyeva bhagavati pasanno pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:2893: 82. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jāyaṃ tassa vipassissātiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2894_0: 84. Nemittānaṃ suṇitvānāti ettha nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sukhadukkhappattihetuṃ jānantīti
atk-s0510a:2894_1: nemittā, tesaṃ nemittānaṃ nakkhattapāṭhakānaṃ vacanaṃ suṇitvāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2899_0: Ajjhāyako mantadharotiādikaṃ āyasmato sereyyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:2899_1: katādhikāro tato paresu attabhāvasahassesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2899_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2899_3: gantvā itihāsādisakalabrāhmaṇadhammesu koṭippatto ekasmiṃ divase abbhokāse saparivāro
atk-s0510a:2899_4: ṭhito bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sereyyapupphaṃ gahetvā ākāse khipanto pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2899_5: Tāni pupphāni ākāse vitānaṃ hutvā sattāhaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā antaradhāyiṃsu. So taṃ acchariyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2899_6: disvā atīva pasannamānaso teneva pītisomanassena kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2899_7: tattha dibbasukhamanubhavitvā tato manussasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2899_8: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2900: 1. So aparabhāge purākatakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ajjhāyako mantadharotiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2901_0: 3. Sereyyakaṃ gahetvānāti sirise bhavaṃ jātipupphaṃ sereyyaṃ, sereyyameva sereyyakaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2901_1: taṃ sereyyakaṃ gahetvānāti sambandho. Bhagavati pasanno jātisumanamakuḷacampakādīni
atk-s0510a:2901_2: pupphāni patiṭṭhapetvā pūjetuṃ kālaṃ natthitāya tattha sampattaṃ taṃ sereyyakaṃ pupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2901_3: gahetvā pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2904_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato pupphathūpiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2904_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassibuddhassa
atk-s0510a:2904_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippe nipphattiṃ patto tattha
atk-s0510a:2904_3: sāraṃ apassanto gehaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā attanā sahagatehi pañcasissasahassehi
atk-s0510a:2904_4: saddhiṃ pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā kukkuranāmapabbatasamīpe paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2904_5: kāretvā paṭivasati. Tadā buddhuppādabhāvaṃ sutvā sissehi saha buddhassa santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2904_6: gantukāmo kenaci byādhinā pīḷito paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā sissasantikā buddhassānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2904_7: lakkhaṇañca sutvā pasannamānaso himavantato campakāsokatilakakeṭakādyaneke pupphe
atk-s0510a:2904_8: āharāpetvā thūpaṃ katvā buddhaṃ viya pūjetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmalokūpago ahosi. Atha
atk-s0510a:2904_9: te sissā tassa āḷahanaṃ katvā buddhasantikaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2904_10: buddhacakkhunā oloketvā anāgataṃsañāṇena pākaṭīkaraṇamakāsi. So aparabhāge imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2904_11: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pubbavāsanābalena satthari
atk-s0510a:2905_0: 10. Atha so attano pubbakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2905_1: himavantassāvidūretiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Kukkuro nāma pabbatoti pabbatassa
atk-s0510a:2905_2: sikharaṃ kukkurākārena sunakhākārena saṇṭhitattā “kukkurapabbato”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:2905_3: tassa samīpe paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcatāpasasahassehi saha vasamānoti attho. Nayānusārena
atk-s0510a:2908_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato pāyasadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2908_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2908_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2908_4: saddahitvā sahassamattā suvaṇṇapātiyo kāretvā tasmiṃ khīrapāyasasahassassa pūretvā
atk-s0510a:2908_5: tā sabbā gāhāpetvā simbalivanaṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye vipassī bhagavā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
atk-s0510a:2908_6: vissajjetvā ākāse caṅkamaṃ māpetvā caṅkamati. So pana seṭṭhi taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2908_7: atīva pasanno pātiyo ṭhapetvā vanditvā ārocesi paṭiggahaṇāya. Atha bhagavā anukampaṃ
atk-s0510a:2908_8: upādāya paṭiggahesi, paṭiggahetvā ca pana tassa somanussuppādanatthaṃ sahassamattehi
atk-s0510a:2908_9: bhikkhusaṅghehi saddhiṃ paribhuñji, tadavasesaṃ anekasahassabhikkhū paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2908_10: So tena puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2908_11: patto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2909: 26. So aparabhāge attano kusalaṃ paccavekkhamāno taṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sambuddhotiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
atk-s0510a:2910_0: 28. Caṅkamaṃ susamārūḷhoti cadinanto padavikkhepaṃ karonto kamati gacchatīti caṅkamaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2910_1: caṅkamassa padavikkhepassa ādhārabhūtapathavipadeso caṅkamaṃ nāmāti attho, etaṃ caṅkamaṃsu
atk-s0510a:2910_2: visesena ārūḷhoti sambandho. Ambare anilāyaneti varīyati chādiyati anenāti varaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2910_3: na baranti ambaraṃ, setavatthasadisaṃ ākāsanti attho. Natthi nilīyanaṃ gopanaṃ etthāti
atk-s0510a:2910_4: anilaṃ, ā samantato yanti gacchanti anena iddhimantoti āyanaṃ, anilañca taṃ āyanañceti
atk-s0510a:2910_5: anilāyanaṃ, tasmiṃ ambare anilāyane caṅkamaṃ māpayinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2913_0: Nisajja pāsādavaretiādikaṃ āyasmato gandhodakiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2913_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassībhagavato
atk-s0510a:2913_2: kāle seṭṭhikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā mahaddhano mahābhogo dibbasukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0510a:2913_3: viya manussasukhamanubhavanto ekasmiṃ divase pāsādavare nisinno hoti. Tadā bhagavā
atk-s0510a:2913_4: suvaṇṇamahāmeru viya vīthiyā vicarati, taṃ vicaramānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2913_5: gantvā vanditvā sugandhodakena bhagavantaṃ osiñcamāno pūjesi. So tena puññena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2913_6: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsena
atk-s0510a:2913_7: anallīno satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2914_0: 35. So aparabhāge attano pubbakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2914_1: nisajja pāsādavaretiādimāha. Tattha pāsādoti pasādaṃ somanassaṃ janeti uppādetīti
atk-s0510a:2914_3: pasādaṃ janayatīti attho. Pāsādo ca so patthetabbaṭṭhena varo cāti pāsādavaro, tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2914_4: pāsādavare nisajja nisīditvā vipassiṃ jinavaraṃ addasanti sambandho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2917_0: Jāyamāne vipassimhītiādikaṃ āyasmato sammukhāthavikattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2917_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2917_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sattavassikakāleyeva sakasippe nipphattiṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2917_3: gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto vipassimhi bodhisatte uppanne sabbabuddhānaṃ lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0510a:2917_4: vedattaye dissamānāni tāni rājappamukhassa janakāyassa vipassībodhisattassa lakkhaṇañca
atk-s0510a:2917_5: buddhabhāvañca byākaritvā janānaṃ mānasaṃ nibbāpesi, anekāni ca thutivacanāni nivedesi.
atk-s0510a:2917_6: So tena kusalakammena cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattisampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2917_7: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhājāto pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2917_8: nacirasseva arahā ahosi. Katakusalanāmena sammukhāthavikattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2918_0: 41. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jāyamāne
atk-s0510a:2918_1: vipassimhītiādimāha. Vipassimhi sammāsambuddhe jāyamāne uppajjamāne mātukucchito
atk-s0510a:2918_2: nikkhante ahaṃ pātubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhabhāvassa hetuṃ byākariṃ kathesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2918_3: anekāni acchariyāni pākaṭāni akāsinti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2921_0: Nagare dhaññavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato kusumāsaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:2921_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2921_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahaddhano mahābhogo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2921_3: pāraṃ gato brāhmaṇasippesu koṭippatto sakaparasamayakusalo mātāpitaro pūjetukāmo
atk-s0510a:2921_4: pañca uppalakalāpe attano samīpe ṭhapetvā nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ vipassiṃ
atk-s0510a:2921_5: bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā nīlapītādighanabuddharasmiyo ca disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2921_6: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha tāni pupphāni santharitvā bhagavantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2921_7: sakaghare mātu atthāya paṭiyattāni sabbāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni gahetvā saparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2921_8: bhagavantaṃ sahatthena santappento bhojesi. Bhojanāvasāne ekaṃ uppalahatthaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2921_9: Tena somanassajāto patthanaṃ akāsi. Bhagavāpi anumodanaṃ katvā pakāmi. So tena puññena
atk-s0510a:2921_10: devamanussesu dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2921_11: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto bhogayasehi vaḍḍhito kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_0: 65. So aparabhāge pubbe katakusalaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇena saritvā somanassappatto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_1: pakāsento nagare dhaññavatiyātiādimāha. Dhaññānaṃ puññavantānaṃ khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_2: anekesaṃ kulānaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī, atha vā muttāmaṇiādisattaratanānaṃ sattavidhadhaññānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_3: upabhogaparibhogānaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī, atha vā dhaññānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_4: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ārāmavihārādīnaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī, tassā dhaññavatiyā. Nagaranti
atk-s0510a:2922_5: patthenti ettha upabhogaparibhogatthikā janāti nagaraṃ, na gacchatīti vā nagaṃ, rājayuvarājamahāmattādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_6: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Nagaṃ rāti ādadāti gaṇhātīti nagaraṃ, rājādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānasamūhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0510a:2922_7: pākāraparikhādīhi parikkhittaṃ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ nāmāti attho. Nagare yadā
atk-s0510a:2922_8: ahaṃ vipassissa bhagavato santike byākaraṇaṃ alabhiṃ, tadā tasmiṃ dhaññavatiyā nagare
atk-s0510a:2922_9: brāhmaṇo ahosinti sambandho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2925_0: Ajjhāyako mantadharotiādikaṃ āyasmato phaladāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2925_1: katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2925_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā vedattayādisakasippesu pārappatto
atk-s0510a:2925_3: anekesaṃ brāhmaṇasahassāniṃ pāmokkho ācariyo sakasippānaṃ pariyosānaṃ adisvā tattha
atk-s0510a:2925_4: ca sāraṃ apassanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre
atk-s0510a:2925_5: assamaṃ kāretvā saha sissehi vāsaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā bhikkhāya
atk-s0510a:2925_6: caramāno tassānukampāya taṃ padesaṃ sampāpuṇi. Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2925_7: attano atthāya puṭake nikkhipitvā rukkhagge laggitāni madhurāni padumaphalāni madhunā
atk-s0510a:2925_8: saha adāsi. Bhagavā tassa somanassuppādanatthaṃ passantasseva paribhuñjitvā ākāse
atk-s0510a:2926_0: 75. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2926_1: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sattavassikoyeva arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2926_2: patvā pubbe katakusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ajjhāyako
atk-s0510a:2926_3: mantadharotiādimāha. Tattha ajjheti cintetīti ajjhāyi, ajjhāyiyeva ajjhāyako. Ettha
atk-s0510a:2926_4: hi akāro “paṭisedhe vuddhitabbhāve…pe… akāro virahappake”ti evaṃ vuttesu dasasu atthesu
atk-s0510a:2926_5: tabbhāve vattati. Sissānaṃ savanadhāraṇādivasena hitaṃ ajjheti cinteti sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2926_6: karotīti ajjhāyako, cintakoti attho. Ācariyassa santike uggahitaṃ sabbaṃ mantaṃ manena
atk-s0510a:2926_7: dhāreti pavattetīti mantadharo. Tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragūti vedaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, vedena
atk-s0510a:2926_8: veditabbā bujjhitabbāti vedā, iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātā tayo ganthā, tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:2926_9: vedānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato pattoti pāragū. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti
atk-s0510a:2929_0: Pabbate himavantamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato ñāṇasaññikattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2929_1: katādhikāro tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uppannuppanne bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2929_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2929_3: pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre pabbatantare paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattiyo
atk-s0510a:2929_4: nibbattetvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ parisuddhaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pulinatalaṃ disvā “īdisā parisuddhā
atk-s0510a:2929_5: buddhā, īdisaṃva parisuddhaṃ buddhañāṇa”nti buddhañca tassa ñāṇañca anussari thomesi ca.
atk-s0510a:2930_0: 84. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2930_1: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2930_2: arahattaṃ patto pubbe katapuññaṃ anussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2930_3: “pabbate himavantamhī”tiādimāha. Pulinaṃ sobhanaṃ disvāti paripuṇṇakataṃ viya pulākārena
atk-s0510a:2930_4: parisodhitākārena pavattaṃ ṭhitanti pulinaṃ, sobhanaṃ vālukaṃ disvā seṭṭhaṃ buddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2933_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato gaṇṭhipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2933_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu katapuññasañcayo vipassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:2933_2: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto upabhogaparibhogehi anūno ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2933_3: sagaṇaṃ disvā pasannamānaso lājāpañcamehi pupphehi pūjesi. So teneva cittappasādena
atk-s0510a:2933_4: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato devaloke nibbatto dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparabhāge manussesu
atk-s0510a:2933_5: manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhājāto

atk-s0510a:2934_1: patto”ti pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sambuddhotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0510a:2937_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato padumapūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2937_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2937_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippe nipphattiṃ patvā tattha
atk-s0510a:2937_3: sāraṃ apassanto buddhuppattito puretaraṃ uppannattā ovādānusāsanaṃ alabhitvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2937_4: pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre gotamakaṃ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya
atk-s0510a:2937_5: assamaṃ kāretvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā jhānasukheneva vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2937_6: Tadā padumuttaro bhagavā buddho hutvā satte saṃsārato uddharanto tassānukampāya himavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2937_7: agamāsi. Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sakasisse samānetvā tehi padumapupphāni
atk-s0510a:2937_8: āharāpetvā pūjesi. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2937_9: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddho pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2938_0: 97. So attano puññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2938_1: Gotamo nāma pabbatoti anekesaṃ yakkhadevatānaṃ āvāsabhāvena adhiṭṭhānavasena gotamassa
atk-s0510a:2938_2: bhavanattā gotamoti pākaṭo ahosi. Pavattati tiṭṭhatīti pabbato. Nāgarukkhehi sañchannoti
atk-s0510a:2938_3: ruhati tiṭṭhatīti rukkho. Atha vā pathaviṃ khananto uddhaṃ ruhatīti rukkho, nānā
atk-s0510a:2938_4: anekappakārā campakakappūranāgaagarucandanādayo rukkhāti nānārukkhā, tehi nānārukkhehi
atk-s0510a:2938_5: sañchanno parikiṇṇo gotamo pabbatoti sambandho. Mahābhūtagaṇālayoti bhavanti jāyanti
atk-s0510a:2938_6: uppajjanti vaḍḍhanti cāti bhūtā, mahantā ca te bhūtā cāti mahābhūtā, mahābhūtānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2938_7: gaṇo samūhoti mahābhūtagaṇo, mahābhūtagaṇassa ālayo patiṭṭhāti mahābhūtagaṇālayo.
atk-s0510a:2939: 98. Vemajjhamhi ca tassāsīti tassa gotamassa pabbatassa vemajjhe abbhantare assamo abhinimmito nipphādito katoti attho. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2944_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato sobhitattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2944_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2944_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2944_3: satthārā dhamme desiyamāne somanassena pasannamānaso nānappakārehi thomesi. So teneva
atk-s0510a:2944_4: somanassena kālaṃ katvā devesu nibbatto tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā manussesu
atk-s0510a:2944_5: ca manussasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto sattavassikova
atk-s0510a:2945: 1. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2948_0: Vitthatāya nadītīretiādikaṃ āyasmato sudassanattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:2948_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave katapuññūpacayo sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2948_2: nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto vitthatāya nāma gaṅgāya samīpe
atk-s0510a:2948_3: pilakkhuphalitaṃ pariyesanto tassā tīre nisinnaṃ jalamānaaggisikhaṃ iva sikhiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2948_4: disvā pasannamānaso ketakīpupphaṃ vaṇṭeneva chinditvā pūjento evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0510a:2948_5: yena ñāṇena tvaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvo sabbaññubuddho jāto, taṃ ñāṇaṃ ahaṃ pūjemī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2948_6: Atha bhagavā anumodanamakāsi. So tena puññena devamanussesu jāto ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2948_7: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2949_0: 10. So attano katakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vitthatāya
atk-s0510a:2949_1: nadītīretiādimāha. Tattha vitthatāyāti vittharati pattharati vitthiṇṇā hotīti vitthatā,
atk-s0510a:2949_2: nadanti saddaṃ karonti itā gatā pavattāti nadī, nadiṃ tarantā etaṃ patvā tiṇṇā nāma
atk-s0510a:2949_3: hontīti tīraṃ, tassā vitthatāya nadiyā tīre tīrasamīpeti attho. Ketakiṃ pupphitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2949_4: disvāti kucchitākārena gaṇhantānaṃ hatthaṃ kaṇḍako chindati vijjhatīti ketaṃ, ketassa
atk-s0510a:2949_5: esā ketakīpupphaṃ, taṃ disvā vaṇṭaṃ chinditvāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2950_0: 11. Sikhino lokabandhunoti sikhī vuccati aggi, sikhīsadisā nīlapītādibhedā jalamānā
atk-s0510a:2950_1: chabbaṇṇaghanaraṃsiyo yassa so sikhī, lokassa sakalalokattayassa bandhu ñātakoti
atk-s0510a:2950_2: lokabandhu, tassa sikhino lokabandhuno ketakīpupphaṃ vaṇṭe chinditvā pūjesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2953_0: Candabhāgānadītīretiādikaṃ āyasmato candanapūjanakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2953_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2953_2: bhagavato kāle himavante candabhāgānadiyā samīpe kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatto pupphabhakkho
atk-s0510a:2953_3: pupphanivasano candanaagaruādīsu gandhavibhūsito himavante bhummadevatā viya uyyānakīḷajalakīḷādianekasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2953_4: anubhavanto vāsaṃ kappesi. Tadā atthadassī bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2953_5: ākāsato oruyha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi. So kinnaro taṃ bhagavantaṃ vijjotamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2953_6: tattha nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sugandhacandanena pūjesi. Tassa bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2954_0: 17. So tena puññena tena somanassena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2954_1: aparāparaṃ cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattirajjapadesarajjasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2954_2: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2954_3: arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2954_4: candabhāgānadītīretiādimāha. Tattha candaṃ manaṃ ruciṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā viya jātoti
atk-s0510a:2954_6: ca samannāgatattā candena bhāgā sadisāti candabhāgā, tassā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre

atk-s0510a:2958_0: Sunando nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato pupphacchadaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2958_1: katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2958_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patto

atk-s0510a:2959_1: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā attano
atk-s0510a:2959_2: pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sunando nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2962_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato rahosaññakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2962_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto ekasmiṃ buddhasuññakāle
atk-s0510a:2962_2: majjhimadese brāhmaṇakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā tattha

atk-s0510a:2962_7: te sabbe sisse sannipātetvā buddhānaṃ abhāve nibbānādhigamābhāvaṃ pakāsetvā sayaṃ

atk-s0510a:2963_0: 34. So tattha jhānasukhena ciraṃ vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto kāmesu
atk-s0510a:2963_1: anallīno sattavassiko pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño hutvā pubbenivāsañāṇena

atk-s0510a:2963_3: Vasabho nāma pabbatoti himavantapabbataṃ vinā sesapabbatānaṃ uccatarabhāvena seṭṭhatarabhāvena
atk-s0510a:2963_4: vasabhoti saṅkhaṃ gato pabbatoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2966_0: Kaṇikāraṃva jotantantiādikaṃ āyasmato campakapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2966_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:2966_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto vuddhippatto sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā tattha
atk-s0510a:2966_3: sāraṃ apassanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vanantare vasanto vessabhuṃ
atk-s0510a:2966_4: bhagavantaṃ uddissa sissehi ānītehi campakapupphehi pūjesi. Bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2966_5: So teneva kusalena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2966_6: buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā pubbavāsanābalena gharāvāse anallīno
atk-s0510a:2967_0: 41. So aparabhāge attano pubbapuññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2967_1: pakāsento kaṇikāraṃva jotantantiādimāha. Tattha kaṇikāranti sakalapattapalāsāni paribhajja
atk-s0510a:2967_2: pātetvā pupphagahaṇasamaye kaṇṇikābaddho hutvā pupphamakuḷānaṃ gahaṇato kaṇṇikākārena
atk-s0510a:2967_3: pakatoti kaṇikāro, “kaṇṇikāro”ti vattabbe niruttinayena ekassa pubba ṇa-kārassa lopaṃ
atk-s0510a:2967_4: katvā “kaṇikāra”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ pupphitaṃ kaṇikārarukkhaṃ iva jotantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2970_0: Visālamāḷe āsīnotiādikaṃ āyasmato atthasandassakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2970_1: katādhikāro anekesu attabhāvesu katapuññūpacayo padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:2970_2: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto gehaṃ
atk-s0510a:2970_3: pahāya himavantaṃ gantvā ramaṇīye ṭhāne paṇṇasālaṃ katvā paṭivasati, tadā sattānukampāya
atk-s0510a:2970_4: himavantamāgataṃ padumuttarabhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcaṅgasamannāgato vanditvā
atk-s0510a:2970_5: thutivacanehi thomesi. So tena puññena yāvatāyukaṃ katvā kālaṅkatvā brahmalokūpago
atk-s0510a:2970_6: ahosi. So aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu
atk-s0510a:2970_7: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2971_0: 47. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento visālamāḷe
atk-s0510a:2971_1: āsīnotiādimāha. Tattha visālamāḷeti visālaṃ patthaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ māḷaṃ visālamāḷaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2971_2: tasmiṃ visālamāḷe āsīno nisinno ahaṃ lokanāyakaṃ addasanti sambandho. Tesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2974_0: Nārado iti me nāmantiādikaṃ āyasmato ekapasādaniyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2974_1: katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu katakusalo atthadassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2974_2: kesavoti pākaṭo hutvā viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2974_3: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggayha ativiya pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2974_4: pakkāmi. So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā teneva somanassena kālaṃ katvā devesu nibbatto tattha
atk-s0510a:2974_5: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu uppanno tattha sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2974_6: buddhuppāde aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito
atk-s0510a:2975_0: 55. So aparabhāge attano katakusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2975_1: pakāsento nārado iti me nāmantiādimāha. Tattha nāradoti jātivasena suddhasarīrattā
atk-s0510a:2975_2: natthi rajo dhūli malaṃ etassāti nārado, ja-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā nāradoti kuladattikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2975_3: nāmaṃ. Kesavoti kisavacchagotte jātattā kesavo nāradakesavo iti maṃ janā vidū jānantīti
atk-s0510a:2978_0: Migarājā tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato sālapupphadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2978_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave katakusalasañcayo kenaci kammacchiddena himavante
atk-s0510a:2978_2: sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto anekasīhaparivāro vihāsi. Tadā sikhī bhagavā tassānukampāya
atk-s0510a:2978_3: himavantaṃ agamāsi. Sīho taṃ upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso sākhābhaṅgena sakaṇṇikasālapupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2978_4: gahetvā pūjesi. Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2979_0: 60. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2979_1: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2979_2: arahattaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2979_3: migarājā tadā āsintiādimāha. Tattha maraṇaṃ gacchantīti migā, atha vā ghāsaṃ magganti
atk-s0510a:2979_4: gavesantīti migā, migānaṃ rājā migarājā. Sakalacatuppadānaṃ rājabhāve satipi gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2979_5: mige ādiṃ katvā migarājāti vuttaṃ. Yadā bhagavantaṃ disvā sapupphaṃ sālasākhaṃ bhañjitvā
atk-s0510a:2979_6: pūjesiṃ, tadā ahaṃ migarājā ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2980: 62. Sakosaṃ pupphamāharinti sakaṇṇikaṃ sālapupphaṃ āhariṃ pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2983_0: Parodhako tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato piyālaphaladāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:2983_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2983_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbatto himavante ekasmiṃ pabbhāre mige vadhitvā
atk-s0510a:2983_3: jīvikaṃ kappetvā vasati. Tasmiṃ kāle tattha gataṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2983_4: sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassamāno kañci deyyadhammaṃ apassanto madhurāni piyālaphalāni uccinitvā
atk-s0510a:2983_5: adāsi. Bhagavā tāni paribhuñji. So nesādo buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhasarīro
atk-s0510a:2983_6: pāpakamme virattacitto mūlaphalāhāro nacirasseva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2984_0: 66. So tattha dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca anekavidhasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2984_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde gahapatikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tattha
atk-s0510a:2984_2: anabhirato gehaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2984_3: arahattaṃ patto attano kataphaladānakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2984_4: pakāsento parodhako tadā āsintiādimāha. Tattha yadā ahaṃ piyālaphalaṃ datvā cittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2984_5: pasādesiṃ, tadā ahaṃ parodhako āsinti sambandho. Parodhakoti parasattarodhako vihesako.
atk-s0510a:2984_6: “Pararodhako”ti vattabbe pubbassa ra-kārassa lopaṃ katvā “parodhako”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2985: 69. Paricāriṃ vināyakanti taṃ nibbānapāpakaṃ satthāraṃ, “bhante, imaṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti pavāriṃ nimantesiṃ ārādhesinti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2990_0: Parinibbute bhagavatītiādikaṃ āyasmato atichattiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2990_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2990_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto dharamānassa bhagavato adiṭṭhattā parinibbutakāle
atk-s0510a:2990_3: “aho mama parihānī”ti cintetvā “mama jātiṃ saphalaṃ karissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno
atk-s0510a:2990_4: chattādhichattaṃ kāretvā tassa bhagavato sarīradhātuṃ nihitadhātugabbhaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2990_5: Aparabhāge pupphacchattaṃ kāretvā tameva dhātugabbhaṃ pūjesi. So teneva puññena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2990_6: saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde gahapatikule nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2990_7: viññutaṃ patto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vāyamanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2991_0: 1. So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento parinibbute
atk-s0510a:2991_1: bhagavatītiādimāha. Tattha chattātichattanti chādiyati saṃvariyati ātapādinti chattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2991_2: chattassa atichattaṃ chattassa upari katachattaṃ chattātichattaṃ, chattassa uparūpari
atk-s0510a:2991_3: chattanti attho. Thūpamhi abhiropayinti thūpiyati rāsikarīyatīti thūpo, atha vā thūpati
atk-s0510a:2991_4: thirabhāvena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjamāno patiṭṭhātīti thūpo, tasmiṃ thūpamhi
atk-s0510a:2991_5: mayā kāritaṃ chattaṃ uparūpari ṭhapanavasena abhi visesena āropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2992: 2. Pupphacchadanaṃ katvānāti vikasitehi sugandhehi anekehi phupphehi chadanaṃ chattupari vitānaṃ katvā pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2995_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato thambhāropakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:2995_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto dhammadassissa
atk-s0510a:2995_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto saddho pasanno parinibbute bhagavati tassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2995_3: dhātugabbhamāḷake thambhaṃ nikhanitvā dhajaṃ āropesi. Bahūni jātisumanapupphāni ganthitvā
atk-s0510a:2996_0: 5. So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kālaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2996_1: sabbattha pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto daharakālato pabhuti
atk-s0510a:2996_2: pūjanīyo sāsane baddhasaddho pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto attano
atk-s0510a:2996_3: pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2996_4: Tattha nibbute lokanāthamhīti sakalalokassa nāthe padhānabhūte paṭisaraṇe ca satthari
atk-s0510a:2996_5: khandhaparinibbānena nibbute nibbutadīpasikhā viya adassanaṃ gateti attho. Dhammadassīnarāsabheti
atk-s0510a:2996_6: catusaccadhammaṃ passatīti dhammadassī, atha vā satipaṭṭhānādike sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme
atk-s0510a:2996_7: dassanasīlo passanasīloti dhammadassī, narānaṃ āsabho pavaro uttamoti narāsabho,
atk-s0510a:2996_8: dhammadassī ca so narāsabho ceti dhammadassīnarāsabho, tasmiṃ dhammadassīnarāsabhe.
atk-s0510a:2996_9: Āropesiṃ dhajaṃ thambhanti cetiyamāḷake thambhaṃ nikhanitvā tattha dhajaṃ āropesiṃ
atk-s0510a:2997_0: 6. Nisseṇiṃ māpayitvānāti nissāya taṃ iṇanti gacchanti ārohanti uparīti nisseṇi,
atk-s0510a:2997_1: taṃ nisseṇiṃ māpayitvā kāretvā bandhitvā thūpaseṭṭhaṃ samāruhinti sambandho. Jātipupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2997_2: gahetvānāti jāyamānameva janānaṃ sundaraṃ manaṃ karotīti jātisumanaṃ, jātisumanameva
atk-s0510a:2997_4: katvā “jātipuppha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ jātisumanapupphaṃ gahetvā ganthitvā thūpamhi āropayiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3000_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato vedikārakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:3000_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0510a:3000_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:3000_3: nibbute satthari pasanno tassa cetiye valayaṃ kāresi, sattahi ratanehi paripūretvā
atk-s0510a:3000_4: mahāpūjaṃ kāresi. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekesu jātisatasahassesu
atk-s0510a:3000_5: pūjanīyo mahaddhano mahābhogo ubhayasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:3000_6: nibbatto vibhavasampanno pabbajitvā vāyamanto nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3001_0: 10. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbe katakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3001_1: pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Piyadassīnaruttameti
atk-s0510a:3001_2: piyaṃ somanassākāraṃ dassanaṃ yassa so piyadassī, ārohapariṇāhadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītānubyañjanabyāmappabhāmaṇḍalehi
atk-s0510a:3001_3: sādhu mahājanappasādaṃ janayanākāradassanoti attho. Narānaṃ uttamoti naruttamo, piyadassī
atk-s0510a:3001_4: ca so naruttamo ceti piyadassīnaruttamo, tasmiṃ piyadassīnaruttame nibbute dhātugabbhamhi
atk-s0510a:3001_5: muttavediṃ ahaṃ akāsinti sambandho. Pupphādhāratthāya pariyosāne vedikāvalayaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3002_0: 11. Maṇīhi parivāretvāti maṇati jotati pabhāsatīti maṇi, atha vā janānaṃ manaṃ pūrento
atk-s0510a:3002_1: somanassaṃ karonto ito gato pavattoti maṇi, jātiraṅgamaṇiveḷuriyamaṇiādīhi anekehi
atk-s0510a:3002_2: maṇīhi katavedikāvalayaṃ parivāretvā uttamaṃ mahāpūjaṃ akāsinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3005_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato saparivāriyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3005_1: katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3005_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahaddhano mahābhogo ahosi. Atha padumuttare
atk-s0510a:3005_3: bhagavati parinibbute mahājano tassa dhātuṃ nidahitvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ kāretvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3005_4: Tasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ upāsako tassupari candanasārena cetiyagharaṃ karitvā mahāpūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3005_5: So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3005_6: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya kusalaṃ katvā saddhāya sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3006_0: 15-8. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3006_1: padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Tattha omattanti lāmakabhāvaṃ nīcabhāvaṃ dukkhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3006_2: vā na passāmi na jānāmi, na diṭṭhapubbo mayā nīcabhāvoti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3009_0: Nibbute lokamahitetiādikaṃ āyasmato umāpupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3009_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3009_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto nibbutassa
atk-s0510a:3009_3: bhagavato cetiyamahe vattamāne indanīlamaṇivaṇṇaṃ umāpupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0510a:3009_4: puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto dibbamānusasampattiyo anubhavitvā uppannuppannabhave
atk-s0510a:3009_5: bahulaṃ nīlavaṇṇo jātisampanno vibhavasampanno ahosi. So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:3009_6: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā saddhājāto pabbajito nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3010_0: 21. So pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokamahitetiādi
atk-s0510a:3010_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha lokamahiteti lokehi mahito pūjitoti lokamahito, tasmiṃ lokamahite
atk-s0510a:3010_2: siddhatthamhi bhagavati parinibbuteti sambandho. Āhutīnaṃpaṭiggaheti āhutino vuccanti
atk-s0510a:3010_3: pūjāsakkārā, tesaṃ āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ arahatīti āhutīnaṃpaṭiggaho, aluttakitantasamāso,
atk-s0510a:3011: 22. Umāpupphanti uddhamuddhaṃ nīlapabhaṃ muñcamānaṃ pupphati vikasatīti umāpupphaṃ, taṃ umāpupphaṃ gahetvā cetiye pūjaṃ akāsinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3014_0: Anomadassīmuninotiādikaṃ āyasmato anulepadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3014_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:3014_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo tassa bhagavato bodhirukkhassa
atk-s0510a:3014_3: vedikāvalayaṃ kāretvā sudhākammañca kāretvā vālukasantharaṇaṃ daddaḷhamānaṃ rajatavimānamiva
atk-s0510a:3014_4: kāresi. So tena puññena sukhappatto uppannuppannabhave rajatavimānarajatageharajatapāsādesu
atk-s0510a:3014_5: sukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasanno
atk-s0510a:3015_0: 26. So aparabhāge “kiṃ nu kho kusalaṃ katvā mayā ayaṃ viseso adhigato”ti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
atk-s0510a:3015_1: paṭipāṭiyā anussaritvā pubbe katakusalaṃ jānitvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3015_2: pakāsento anomadassīmuninotiādimāha. Tattha anomaṃ alāmakaṃ dassanaṃ dassanīyaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0510a:3015_4: sundaradassanoti attho. Sudhāya piṇḍaṃ datvānāti bodhighare vedikāvalayaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0510a:3015_5: sakale bodhighare sudhālepanaṃ katvāti attho. Pāṇikammaṃ akāsahanti sārakaṭṭhena
atk-s0510a:3015_6: phalakapāṇiyo katvā tāhi pāṇīhi maṭṭhakammaṃ akāsinti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3018_0: Uttaritvāna nadikantiādikaṃ āyasmato maggadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:3018_1: katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu nibbānādhigamatthāya puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3018_2: bhagavato kāle lokasammate kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:3018_3: bhagavantaṃ ekaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā vanantaraṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso “idāni
atk-s0510a:3018_4: mayā bhagavato maggaṃ samaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kudālañca piṭakañca ādāya bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3018_5: gamanamaggaṃ samaṃ katvā vālukaṃ okiritvā bhagavato pāde vanditvā, “bhante, iminā
atk-s0510a:3018_6: maggālaṅkārakaraṇena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne pūjanīyo bhaveyyaṃ, nibbānañca pāpuṇeyya”nti
atk-s0510a:3018_7: patthanaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā “yathādhippāyaṃ samijjhatū”ti anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3019_0: 32-3. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito ahosi. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0510a:3019_1: buddhuppāde pākaṭe ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:3019_2: nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3019_3: pakāsento uttaritvāna nadikantiādimāha. Tattha nadati saddaṃ karoti gacchatīti nadī,
atk-s0510a:3019_4: nadīyeva nadikā, taṃ nadikaṃ uttaritvā atikkamitvāti attho. Kudālapiṭakamādāyāti
atk-s0510a:3019_5: ku vuccati pathavī, taṃ vidālane padālane chindane alanti kudālaṃ, piṭakaṃ vuccati
atk-s0510a:3019_6: paṃsuvālikādivāhakaṃ, tālapaṇṇavettalatādīhi katabhājanaṃ, kudālañca piṭakañca kudālapiṭakaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3019_7: taṃ ādāya gahetvāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3022_0: Yānakāro pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato phalakadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3022_1: katādhikāro anekesu attabhāvesu katapuññasambhāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle vaḍḍhakikule
atk-s0510a:3022_2: nibbatto ratanattaye pasanno candanena ālambanaphalakaṃ katvā bhagavato adāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3023_0: 37. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha kāle cittasukhapīṇito ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3023_1: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3023_2: sutvā sañjātappasādo pabbajitvā vāyamanto nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3023_3: patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento yānakāro
atk-s0510a:3023_4: pure āsintiādimāha. Tattha yānakāroti yanti etena icchiticchitaṭṭhānanti yānaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0510a:3023_5: karotīti yānakāro, pure buddhadassanasamaye ahaṃ yānakāro āsiṃ ahosinti attho. Candanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3023_6: phalakaṃ katvāti candati pariḷāhaṃ vūpasametīti candanaṃ. Atha vā candanti sugandhavāsanatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:3023_7: sarīraṃ vilimpanti etenāti candanaṃ, taṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ katvā. Lokabandhunoti sakalalokassa
atk-s0510a:3023_8: bandhu ñātibhūtoti lokabandhu, tassa lokabandhuno satthussa adāsinti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3026_0: Sumedho nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato vaṭaṃsakiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimamunindesu
atk-s0510a:3026_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:3026_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tattha ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0510a:3026_3: disvā gehaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahāvane vihāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye sumedho
atk-s0510a:3026_4: bhagavā vivekakāmatāya taṃ vanaṃ sampāpuṇi. Atha so tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3026_5: vikasitaṃ saḷalapupphaṃ gahetvā vaṭaṃsakākārena ganthetvā bhagavato pādamūle ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:3026_6: pūjesi. Bhagavā tassa cittappasādatthāya anumodanamakāsi. So tena puññena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:3026_7: saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne kule
atk-s0510a:3026_8: jāto vuddhimanvāya saddho pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3027_0: 43. So aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3027_1: sumedho nāma nāmenātiādi vuttaṃ. Vivekamanubrūhantoti janākiṇṇataṃ pahāya janavivekaṃ
atk-s0510a:3027_2: cittavivekañca anubrūhanto vaḍḍhento bahulīkaronto mahāvanaṃ ajjhogāhi pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3030_0: Sumedhassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato pallaṅkadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3030_1: katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu nibbānādhigamatthāya katapuññūpacayo sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3030_2: kāle gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya mahābhogasampanno satthari pasīditvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3030_3: sutvā tassa satthuno sattaratanamayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ kāretvā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0510a:3030_4: tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito ahosi. So anukkamena imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3030_5: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:3030_6: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katapuññanāmena
atk-s0510a:3030_7: pallaṅkadāyakattheroti pākaṭo ahosi. Heṭṭhā viya uparipi pubbe katapuññanāmena therānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3031_0: 47. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3031_1: sumedhassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Pallaṅko hi mayā dinnoti pallaṅkaṃ ūrubaddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3031_2: katvā yattha upavīsanti nisīdanti, so pallaṅkoti vuccati, so pallaṅko sattaratanamayo
atk-s0510a:3031_3: mayā dinno pūjitoti attho. Sauttarasapacchadoti saha uttaracchadena saha pacchadena
atk-s0510a:3031_4: sauttarasapacchado, uparivitānaṃ bandhitvā āsanaṃ uttamavatthehi acchādetvāti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3036_0: Candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhantiādikaṃ āyasmato bandhujīvakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā
atk-s0510a:3036_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3036_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto
atk-s0510a:3036_3: sikhissa bhagavato rūpakāyasampattiṃ disvā pasannamānaso bandhujīvakapupphāni gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3036_4: bhagavato pādamūle pūjesi. Bhagavā tassa cittappasādavaḍḍhanatthāya anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:3036_5: So yāvatāyutaṃ ṭhatvā teneva puññena devaloke nibbatto cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3036_6: manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā imassa amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0510a:3036_7: uppannakāle gahapatikule nibbatto rūpaggayasaggappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3036_8: saddhājāto gehaṃ pahāya pabbajito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3037_0: 1. So pubbenivāsañāṇena pubbe katakusalakammaṃ anussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3037_1: pakāsento candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhantiādimāha. Tattha candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhanti abbhā,
atk-s0510a:3037_2: mahikā, dhumo, rajo, rāhūti imehi upakkilesamalehi vimuttaṃ candaṃ iva diyaḍḍhasahassupakkilesamalānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3037_3: pahīnattā vimalaṃ nikkilesattā suddhaṃ pasannaṃ sikhiṃ sambuddhanti sambandho. Kilesakaddamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3037_4: abhāvena anāvilaṃ. Nandībhavasaṅkhātāya balavasnehāya parisamantato khīṇattā nandībhavaparikkhīṇaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3037_5: Tiṇṇaṃ loketi lokattayato tiṇṇaṃ uttiṇṇaṃ atikkantaṃ. Visattikanti visattikaṃ vuccati
atk-s0510a:3038_0: 2. Nibbāpayantaṃ janatanti dhammavassaṃ vassanto janataṃ janasamūhaṃ kilesapariḷāhābhāvena
atk-s0510a:3038_1: nibbāpayantaṃ vūpasamentaṃ. Sayaṃ saṃsārato tiṇṇaṃ, sabbasatte saṃsārato tārayantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3038_2: atikkamentaṃ catunnaṃ saccānaṃ munanato jānanato muniṃ sikhiṃ sambuddhanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3038_4: cittena bhāventaṃ vanamajjheti attho. Ekaggaṃ ekaggacittaṃ susamāhitaṃ suṭṭhu ārammaṇe
atk-s0510a:3038_5: āhitaṃ ṭhapitacittaṃ sikhiṃ muniṃ disvāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3039_0: 3. Bandhujīvakapupphānīti bandhūnaṃ ñātīnaṃ jīvakaṃ jīvitanissayaṃ hadayamaṃsalohitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3039_1: bandhujīvakaṃ hadayamaṃsalohitasamānavaṇṇaṃ pupphaṃ bandhujīvakapupphaṃ gahetvā sikhino
atk-s0510a:3042_0: Parakammāyane yuttotiādikaṃ āyasmato tambapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi āyasmā
atk-s0510a:3042_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3042_2: piyadassissa bhagavato kāle kenaci pure katena akusalakammena duggatakule nibbatto
atk-s0510a:3042_3: vuddhippatto paresaṃ kammaṃ katvā bhatiyā jīvikaṃ kappesi. So evaṃ dukkhena vasanto
atk-s0510a:3042_4: paresaṃ aparādhaṃ katvā maraṇabhayena palāyitvā vanaṃ pāvisi. Tattha gataṭṭhāne pāṭalibodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3042_5: disvā vanditvā sammajjitvā ekasmiṃ rukkhe tambavaṇṇaṃ pupphaṃ disvā taṃ sabbaṃ kaṇṇike
atk-s0510a:3042_6: ocinitvā bodhipūjaṃ akāsi. Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā vanditvā pallaṅkamābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3042_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe te manussā padānupadikaṃ anubandhitvā tattha agamaṃsu. So te disvā bodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3042_8: āvajjentova palāyitvā bhayānake gīriduggapapāte patitvā mari.
atk-s0510a:3043_0: 7. So bodhipūjāya anussaritattā teneva pītisomanassena tāvatiṃsādīsu upapanno cha
atk-s0510a:3043_1: kāmāvacarasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3043_2: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto vuddhippatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3043_3: pasannamānaso pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:3043_4: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento parakammāyane yuttotiādimāha. Tattha paresaṃ kammāni
atk-s0510a:3043_5: parakammāni, parakammānaṃ āyane karaṇe vāhane dhāraṇe yutto yojito ahosinti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3046_0: Udentaṃ sataraṃsiṃ vātiādikaṃ āyasmato vīthisammajjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3046_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu jātisatesu katapuññasañcayo sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3046_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vīthiṃ sajjetvā nīyamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3046_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vīthiṃ samaṃ katvā dhajaṃ tattha ussāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3047_0: 15. So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3047_1: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3047_2: bahumānahadayo pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3047_3: anussaranto paccakkhato jānitvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento udentaṃ sataraṃsiṃ vātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3047_4: Tattha udentaṃ uggacchantaṃ sataraṃsiṃ satapabhaṃ. Sataraṃsīti desanāsīsamattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3047_5: anekasatasahassapabhaṃ sūriyaṃ ivāti attho. Pītaraṃsiṃva bhāṇumanti pītaraṃsiṃ saṃkucitapabhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3047_6: bhāṇumaṃ pabhāvantaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ iva sambuddhaṃ disvāti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3050_0: Devaputto ahaṃ santotiādikaṃ āyasmato kakkārupupphapūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3050_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave katapuññasañcayo sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3050_2: kāle bhummaṭṭhakadevaputto hutvā nibbatto sikhiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā dibbakakkārupupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3051_0: 21. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ekatiṃsakappabbhantare ubhayasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3051_1: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari
atk-s0510a:3051_2: pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:3051_3: pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento devaputto ahaṃ santotiādimāha. Tattha dibbanti kīḷanti
atk-s0510a:3051_4: pañcahi dibbehi kāmaguṇehīti devā, devānaṃ putto, devo eva vā putto devaputto, ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:3051_5: devaputto santo vijjamāno dibbaṃ kakkārupupphaṃ paggayha pakārena, gahetvā sikhissa
atk-s0510a:3051_6: bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3054_0: Devaputto ahaṃ santotiādikaṃ āyasmato mandāravapupphapūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3054_1: thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3054_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle bhummaṭṭhakadevaputto hutvā nibbatto sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā

atk-s0510a:3058_0: Himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato kadambapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:3058_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sammāsambuddhasuññe

atk-s0510a:3111_0: Tivarāyaṃ pure rammetiādikaṃ āyasmato dussadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā
atk-s0510a:3111_1: purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3111_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle rājakule nibbatto vuddhippattakāle yuvarājabhāvaṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:3111_3: pākaṭo ekaṃ janapadaṃ labhitvā tatrādhipatibhūto sakalajanapadavāsino dānapiyavacanaatthacariyāsamānatthatāsaṅkhātehi
atk-s0510a:3111_4: catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgaṇhāti. Tasmiṃ samaye siddhattho bhagavā taṃ janapadaṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_5: sampāpuṇi. Atha so yuvarājā paṇṇākāraṃ labhitvā tattha sukhumavatthena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_6: pūjesi. Bhagavā taṃ vatthaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Tampi vatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_7: bhagavantameva anubandhi. Atha so yuvarājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā atīva pasanno añjaliṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_8: paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavato sampattasampattaṭṭhāne sabbe janā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3111_9: acchariyabbhutacittā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu. Bhagavā vihārameva agamāsi. Yuvarājā
atk-s0510a:3111_10: teneva kusalakammena tato cuto devaloke uppanno tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3111_11: manussesu cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:3111_12: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ratanattaye pasanno bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3111_13: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vāyamanto nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3112_0: 38. So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento

atk-s0510a:3115_0: Nagare bandhumatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato samādapakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi thero purimabuddhānaṃ

atk-s0510a:3115_6: anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde

atk-s0510a:3115_8: pabbajitvā sīlasampanno vattasampanno nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3116_0: 44. So aparabhāge attano katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3116_1: pakāsento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha. Tattha bandhanti ñātigottādivasena ekasambandhā

atk-s0510a:3116_3: nāma nagare mahāpūgagaṇo upāsakasamūho ahosīti attho. Māḷaṃ kassāma saṅghassāti ettha

atk-s0510a:3116_5: cittassa vivekakaraṇe alanti māḷaṃ, māḷameva māḷakaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa phāsuvihāratthāya
atk-s0510a:3119_0: Tisso nāmāsi bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcaṅguliyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu

atk-s0510a:3125_0: Pabbate himavantamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato kumudamāliyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi thero

atk-s0510a:3125_3: hutvā nibbatto atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso kumudapupphāni

atk-s0510a:3127_0: Kumudaṃ pupphate tatthāti tasmiṃ mahāsare sūriyaraṃsiyā abhāve sati sāyanhe makuḷitaṃ

atk-s0510a:3130_0: Koṇḍaññassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato nisseṇidāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimajinavaresu

atk-s0510a:3130_3: bhagavato vasanapāsādassārohanatthāya sārakaṭṭhamayaṃ nisseṇiṃ katvā ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.

atk-s0510a:3130_6: anubhavitvā manussesu jāyamāno nisseṇidānanissandena uccakule nibbatto manussasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3130_7: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā

atk-s0510a:3131_2: koṇḍato aññoti koṇḍañño, alāmako uttamapurisoti attho. Atha vā brāhmaṇagottesu koṇḍaññagotte
atk-s0510a:3131_3: uppannattā “koṇḍañño”ti gottavasena tassa nāmaṃ, tassa koṇḍaññassa. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3134_0: Migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato rattipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3134_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3134_2: bhagavato kāle nesādakule uppanno migavadhāya araññe vicaramāno tassa kāruññena araññe
atk-s0510a:3134_3: caramānaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphitaṃ rattikaṃ nāma pupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:3134_4: kuṭajapupphañca saha vaṇṭena ocinitvā somanassacittena pūjesi. Bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3135_0: 13. So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3135_1: buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3135_2: sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3135_3: saritvā “nesādabhūtena mayā katakusalaṃ sundara”nti somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3135_4: pakāsento migaluddo pure āsintiādimāha. Tattha migānaṃ luddo sāhasiko mārakoti migaluddo,
atk-s0510a:3135_5: migesu vā luddo lobhīti migaluddo, nesādo āsiṃ pureti attho.
atk-s0510a:3136_0: 14. Rattikaṃ pupphitaṃ disvāti padumapupphādīni anekāni pupphāni sūriyaraṃsisamphassena
atk-s0510a:3136_1: divā pupphanti rattiyaṃ makuḷitāni honti. Jātisumanamallikādīni anekāni pupphāni
atk-s0510a:3136_2: pana rattiyaṃ pupphanti no divā. Tasmā rattiyaṃ pupphanato rattipupphanāmakāni anekāni
atk-s0510a:3136_3: sugandhapupphāni ca kuṭajapupphāni ca gahetvā pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3139_0: Vipassino bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato udapānadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi thero

atk-s0510a:3139_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto “pānīyadānaṃ mayā dātabbaṃ, tañca nirantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3139_3: katvā pavattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ kūpaṃ khanāpetvā udakasampattakāle iṭṭhakāhi
atk-s0510a:3139_4: cināpetvā thiraṃ katvā tattha uṭṭhitena udakena puṇṇaṃ taṃ udapānaṃ vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3139_5: niyyādesi. Bhagavā pānīyadānānisaṃsadīpakaṃ anumodanaṃ akāsi. So tena puññena devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:3139_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddho pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3140_0: 18. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3140_1: vipassino bhagavatotiādimāha. Tattha udapāno kato mayāti udakaṃ pivanti etthāti udapāno,
atk-s0510a:3140_2: kūpapokkharaṇītaḷākānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. So udapāno kūpo vipassissa bhagavato atthāya
atk-s0510a:3143_0: Nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato sīhāsanadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3143_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānādhigamatthāya katapuññūpacayo padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3143_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ratanattaye
atk-s0510a:3143_3: pasanno tasmiṃ bhagavati parinibbute sattahi ratanehi khacitaṃ sīhāsanaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0510a:3143_4: bodhirukkhaṃ pūjesi, bahūhi mālāgandhadhūpehi ca pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3144_0: 21. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbattha
atk-s0510a:3144_1: pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3144_2: vasanto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso ñātivaggaṃ pahāya pabbajito nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:3144_3: arahā hutvā pubbūpacitakusalasambhāraṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3144_4: pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Tattha sīhāsanamadāsahanti sīharūpahiraññasuvaṇṇaratanehi
atk-s0510a:3144_5: khacitaṃ āsanaṃ sīhāsanaṃ, sīhassa vā abhītassa bhagavato nisinnārahaṃ, sīhaṃ vā
atk-s0510a:3144_6: seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ āsananti sīhāsanaṃ, taṃ ahaṃ adāsiṃ, bodhirukkhaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3147_0: Anomadassī bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato maggadattikattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3147_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:3147_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto anomadassiṃ
atk-s0510a:3147_3: bhagavantaṃ ākāse caṅkamantaṃ pāduddhāre pāduddhāracaṅkamanaṭṭhāne pupphānaṃ vikiraṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3147_4: acchariyañca disvā pasannamānaso pupphāni ākāse ukkhipi, tāni vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3148_0: 26. So tena puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3148_1: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto kamena yobbaññaṃ pāpuṇitvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3148_2: vattasampanno nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto caṅkamanassa pūjitattā maggadattikattheroti
atk-s0510a:3148_3: pākaṭo. So pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento anomadassī
atk-s0510a:3148_4: bhagavātiādimāha. Diṭṭhadhammasukhatthāyāti imasmiṃ attabhāve caṅkamanena sarīrasallahukādisukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3148_5: paṭiccāti attho. Abbhokāsamhi caṅkamīti abbhokāse aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne caṅkami, padavikkhepaṃ
atk-s0510a:3149_0: Uddhate pāde pupphānīti caṅkamantena pāde uddhate padumuppalādīni pupphāni pathavito
atk-s0510a:3149_1: uggantvā caṅkame vikiriṃsūti attho. Sobhaṃ muddhani tiṭṭhareti buddhassa muddhani
atk-s0510a:3149_2: sīse sobhayamānā tāni tiṭṭhantīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3152_0: Padumuttarassa muninotiādikaṃ āyasmato ekadīpiyattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā purimajinaseṭṭhesu
atk-s0510a:3152_1: katakusalasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3152_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto saddho pasanno bhagavato salalamahābodhimhi
atk-s0510a:3152_3: ekapadīpaṃ pūjesi, thāvaraṃ katvā niccamekapadīpapūjanatthāya telavaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3152_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha jalamāno pasannacakkhuko ubhayasukhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3152_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:3152_6: ratanattaye pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto dīpapūjāya laddhavisesādhigamattā
atk-s0510a:3153: 30. So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa muninotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3156_0: Orena himavantassātiādikaṃ āyasmato maṇipūjakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3156_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3156_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tatthādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3156_3: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaorabhāge ekissā nadiyā samīpe paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0510a:3156_4: kāretvā vasanto vivekakāmatāya tassānukampāya ca tattha upagataṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3156_5: disvā pasannamānaso maṇipallaṅkaṃ bhagavato pūjesi. Bhagavā tassa pasādavaḍḍhanatthāya
atk-s0510a:3156_6: tattha nisīdi. So bhiyyosomattāya pasanno nibbānādhigamatthāya patthanaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3156_7: anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito
atk-s0510a:3156_8: sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto
atk-s0510a:3156_9: gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3157_0: 34. So ekadivasaṃ attanā katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3157_1: pakāsento orena himavantassātiādimāha. Tattha orenāti himavantassa aparaṃ bhāgaṃ
atk-s0510a:3157_2: vihāya orena, bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, orasmiṃ disābhāgeti attho. Nadikā sampavattathāti
atk-s0510a:3157_3: apākaṭanāmadheyyā ekā nadī saṃsuṭṭhu pavattānī vahānī sandamānā ahosīti attho. Tassā
atk-s0510a:3157_4: cānupakhettamhīti tassā nadiyā anupakhettamhi tīrasamīpeti attho. Sayambhū vasate
atk-s0510a:3157_5: tadāti yadā ahaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ pūjesiṃ, tadā anācariyako hutvā sayameva buddhabhūto
atk-s0510a:3158_0: 35. Maṇiṃ paggayha pallaṅkanti maṇinti cittaṃ ārādheti somanassaṃ karotīti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3158_1: atha vā māti pamāṇaṃ karoti ābharaṇanti maṇi, atha vā marantāpi rājayuvarājādayo
atk-s0510a:3158_2: taṃ na pariccajanti tadatthāya saṅgāmaṃ karontīti maṇi, taṃ maṇiṃ maṇimayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0510a:3158_3: manoramaṃ sādhu cittaṃ suṭṭhu vicittaṃ paggayha gahetvā buddhaseṭṭhassa abhiropayiṃ
atk-s0510a:3161_0: Nagare bandhumatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato tikicchakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampāyasmā purimajinavaresu
atk-s0510a:3161_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3161_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare vejjakule nibbatto bahussuto susikkhito vejjakamme
atk-s0510a:3161_3: cheko bahū rogino tikicchanto vipassissa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa asokanāmattherassa
atk-s0510a:3161_4: rogaṃ tikicchi. So tena puññena devamanussesu aparāparaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanto nibbattanibbattabhave
atk-s0510a:3162_0: 39. So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sabbasippesu
atk-s0510a:3162_1: nipphattiṃ patto arogo sukhito vibhavasampanno ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3162_2: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3162_3: saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3165_0: Vessabhumhi bhagavatītiādikaṃ āyasmato saṅghupaṭṭhākattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi thero
atk-s0510a:3165_1: purimabuddhesu katakusalasambhāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3165_2: vessabhussa bhagavato kāle tassārāmikassa putto hutvā nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā saddho
atk-s0510a:3165_3: pasanno vihāresu ārāmikakammaṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ saṅghaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So teneva kusalakammena
atk-s0510a:3165_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3165_5: gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto vibhavasampanno sukhappatto pākaṭo satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3165_6: sutvā sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā vattasampanno sāsanaṃ sobhayamāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento
atk-s0510a:3165_7: nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto chaḷabhiñño pubbe katakusalakammavasena
atk-s0510a:3166_0: 45. So ekadivasaṃ “pubbe mayā kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā”ti
atk-s0510a:3166_1: attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā paccakkhato jānitvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:3166_2: karonto vessabhumhi bhagavatītiādimāha. Tattha ahosārāmiko ahanti ahaṃ vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:3166_3: bhagavato sāsane ārāmiko ahosinti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā
atk-s0510a:3171_0: Ito parampi ekūnavīsatimavagge āgatānaṃ imesaṃ kuṭajapupphiyattherādīnaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0510a:3171_1: therānaṃ apubbaṃ natthi. Tesañhi therānaṃ purimabuddhānaṃ santike katapuññasambhārānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3171_2: vasena pākaṭanāmāni ceva nivāsanagarādīni ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti taṃ
atk-s0510a:3176_0: 6. Dutiyattherāpadāne yaṃ dāyavāsiko isīti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vane vasanabhāvena
atk-s0510a:3176_1: dāyavāsiko isīti saṅkhaṃ gato, attano anukampāya taṃ vanaṃ upagatassa siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3176_2: satthuno vasanamaṇḍapacchādanatthāya yaṃ tiṇaṃ, taṃ lāyati chindatīti attho. Dabbachadanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3176_3: katvā anekehi khuddakadaṇḍakehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā taṃ tiṇena chādetvā siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3177: 8. Sattāhaṃ dhārayuṃ tatthāti taṃ maṇḍapaṃ tattha ṭhitā devamanussā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa satthuno dhārayuṃ dhāresunti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3178_0: Tatiyattherassa apadāne khaṇḍaphulliyattheroti ettha khaṇḍanti kaṭṭhānaṃ jiṇṇattā
atk-s0510a:3178_2: khaṇḍañca phullañca khaṇḍaphullāni, khaṇḍaphullānaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ punappunaṃ thirakaraṇanti
atk-s0510a:3178_3: khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Imassa pana therassa sambhārapūraṇakāle phussassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3178_4: cetiye chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne sudhāpiṇḍaṃ makkhetvā thirakaraṇaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3178_5: nāma. Tasmā so khaṇḍaphulliyo theroti pākaṭo ahosi. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3179: 17. Catutthattherassāpadāne rañño baddhacaro ahanti rañño paricārako kammakārako ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3180: 19. Jalajuttamanāminoti jale udake jātaṃ jalajaṃ, kiṃ taṃ padumaṃ, padumena samānanāmattā padumuttarassa bhagavatoti attho. Uttamapadumanāmassa bhagavatoti vā attho. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3182_1: ca sampannaṃ nagaranti dvāravatīnagaraṃ, dvāraṃ vatiñca padhānaṃ katvā nagarassa
atk-s0510a:3182_2: upalakkhitattā “dvāravatī nagara”nti voharantīti nagare dvāravatiyāti vuttaṃ. Mālāvaccho
atk-s0510a:3188_0: Ito paraṃ sabbattha anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Ekavīsatime bāvīsatime tevīsatime
atk-s0510a:3188_1: ca vagge sabbesaṃ therānaṃ sayaṃkatena puññena laddhanāmāni, katapuññānañca nānattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3188_2: tesaṃ byākaraṇadāyakānaṃ buddhānaṃ nāmāni vasitanagarāni ca heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sabbānipi
atk-s0510a:3192_0: 9. Tatiyāpadāne aruṇavatiyā nagareti ā samantato ālokaṃ karonto uṇati uggacchatīti
atk-s0510a:3192_1: aruṇo, so tasmiṃ vijjatīti aruṇavatī, tasmiṃ nagare ālokaṃ karonto sūriyo uggacchatīti
atk-s0510a:3192_2: attho. Sesanagaresupi sūriyuggamane vijjamānepi visesavacanaṃ sabbacatuppadānaṃ mahiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3192_3: sayanepi sati mahiyaṃ sayatīti mahiṃsoti vacanaṃ viya rūḷhivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3192_5: viya pabhāvatī aruṇavatī nāma, tasmiṃ aruṇavatiyā nagare, pūpiko pūpavikkayena jīvikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3193_0: 14. Catutthāpadāne tivarāyaṃ pure rammeti tīhi pākārehi parivāritā parikkhittāti
atk-s0510a:3193_2: tivarāyaṃ pure nagare ramme naḷakāro ahaṃ ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3195_0: 23. Chaṭṭhāpadāne vaṇṇakāro ahaṃ tadāti nīlapītarattādivaṇṇavasena vatthāni karoti
atk-s0510a:3195_1: rañjetīti vaṇṇakāro. Vattharajako hutvā cetiye vatthehi acchādanasamaye nānāvaṇṇehi
atk-s0510a:3196_0: 27. Sattamāpadāne piyālaṃ pupphitaṃ disvāti supupphitaṃ piyālarukkhaṃ disvā. Gatamagge
atk-s0510a:3196_1: khipiṃ ahanti ahaṃ migaluddo nesādo hutvā piyālapupphaṃ ocinitvā buddhassa gatamagge
atk-s0510a:3197_0: 30. Aṭṭhamāpadāne sake sippe apatthaddhoti attano takkabyākaraṇādisippasmiṃ apatthaddho
atk-s0510a:3197_1: patiṭṭhito cheko ahaṃ kānanaṃ agamaṃ gato sambuddhaṃ yantaṃ disvānāti vanantare gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3197_2: vipassiṃ sambuddhaṃ passitvā. Ambayāgaṃ adāsahanti ahaṃ ambadānaṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3198: 33. Navamāpadāne jagatī kāritā mayhanti atthadassissa bhagavato sarīradhātunidhāpitacetiye jagati chinnabhinnaālindapupphādhānasaṅkhātā jagati mayā kāritā kārāpitāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3203_0: 1. Pañcavīsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne bharitvā tuvaramādāyāti tuvaraaṭṭhiṃ muggakalayasadisaṃ
atk-s0510a:3203_1: tuvaraṭṭhiṃ bhajjitvā pupphetvā bhājanena ādāya saṅghassa vanamajjhogāhakassa adadiṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3204_0: 4-5. Dutiyāpadāne dhanuṃ advejjhaṃ katvānāti migādīnaṃ māraṇatthāya dhanuṃ sannayhitvā
atk-s0510a:3204_1: caramāno kesaraṃ ogataṃ disvāti supupphitaṃ khuddakasaraṃ disvā buddhassa abhiropesinti
atk-s0510a:3204_2: ahaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā vanaṃ sampattassa tissassa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3205_0: 9-10. Tatiyāpadāne jalakukkuṭoti jātassare caramānakukkuṭo. Tuṇḍena kesariṃ gayhāti
atk-s0510a:3205_1: padumapupphaṃ mukhatuṇḍena ḍaṃsitvā ākāsena gacchantassa tissassa bhagavato abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3206_0: 14. Catutthāpadāne viravapupphamādāyāti vividhaṃ ravati saddaṃ karotīti viravaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3206_1: saddakaraṇavelāyaṃ vikasanato “virava”nti laddhanāmaṃ pupphasamūhaṃ ādāya gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3207_0: 17. Pañcamāpadāne kuṭigopakoti senāsanapālako. Kālena kālaṃ dhūpesinti sampattasampattakālānukāle
atk-s0510a:3207_1: dhūpesiṃ, dhūpena sugandhaṃ akāsinti attho. Siddhatthassa bhagavato gandhakuṭikālānusāridhūpena
atk-s0510a:3209: 27. Aṭṭhamāpadāne satta sattalipupphānīti sattalisaṅkhātāni, satta pupphāni sīsenādāya vessabhussa bhagavato abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3210: 31. Navamāpadāne bimbijālakapupphānīti rattaṅkuravakapupphāni siddhatthassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3211: 35. Dasamāpadāne uddālakaṃ gahetvānāti jātassare vihaṅgasobbhe jātaṃ uddālakapupphaṃ ocinitvā kakusandhassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3216_0: 5-6. Dutiyāpadāne vijahitvā devavaṇṇanti devatā sarīraṃ vijahitvā chaḍḍetvā, manussasarīraṃ
atk-s0510a:3216_1: nimminitvāti attho. Adhikāraṃ kattukāmoti adhikakiriyaṃ puññasambhāraṃ kattukāmo
atk-s0510a:3216_2: devaro nāma ahaṃ devarājā bhariyāya saha buddhaseṭṭhassa sāsane sādaratāya idha imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3216_3: manussaloke āgamiṃ āgatoti attho. Tassa bhikkhā mayā dinnāti padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3216_4: yo nāmena devalo nāma sāvako ahosi, tassa sāvakassa mayā vippasannena cetasā bhikkhā
atk-s0510a:3217_0: 9-10. Tatiyāpadāne ānando nāma sambuddhoti ānandaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ jananato ānando nāma paccekabuddhoti
atk-s0510a:3217_1: attho. Amanussamhi kānaneti amanussapariggahe kānane mahāaraññe parinibbāyi anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0510a:3217_2: antaradhāyi, adassanaṃ agamāsīti attho. Sarīraṃ tattha jhāpesinti ahaṃ devalokā idhāgantvā
atk-s0510a:3217_3: tassa bhagavato sarīraṃ tattha araññe jhāpesiṃ dahanaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3219_0: 20. Chaṭṭhāpadāne ahosiṃ candano nāmāti nāmena paṇṇattivasena candano nāma. Sambuddhassatrajoti
atk-s0510a:3219_1: paccekasambuddhabhūtato pubbe tassa atrajo putto ahaṃ. Ekopāhano mayā dinnoti ekaṃ
atk-s0510a:3219_2: upāhanayugaṃ mayā dinnaṃ. Bodhiṃ sampajja me tuvanti tena upāhanayugena me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3220_0: 23-24. Sattamāpadāne mañjarikaṃ karitvānāti mañjeṭṭhipupphaṃ haritacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3220_1: rathiyaṃ vīthiyā paṭipajjiṃ ahaṃ tathā paṭipannova bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a:3220_2: parivutaṃ samaṇānaggaṃ samaṇānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ addasanti
atk-s0510a:3220_3: sambandho. Buddhassa abhiropayinti disvā ca pana taṃ pupphaṃ ubhohi hatthehi paggayha
atk-s0510a:3220_4: ukkhipitvā buddhassa phussassa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3221_1: loṇavirahitāni paṇṇāni pacitvā bhakkhāmi, aloṇapaṇṇabhakkho amhi bhavāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3221_2: Niyamesu ca saṃvutoti niyamasaññitesu pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu niccapañcasīlesu saṃvuto
atk-s0510a:3221_3: pihitoti attho. Pātarāse anuppatteti purebhattakāle anuppatte. Siddhattho upagacchi
atk-s0510a:3221_4: manti mama samīpaṃ siddhattho bhagavā upagañchi sampāpuṇi. Tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsinti
atk-s0510a:3221_5: ahaṃ taṃ aloṇapaṇṇaṃ tassa buddhassa adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3223_0: 37-38. Dasamāpadāne sikhinaṃ sikhinaṃ yathāti sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi
atk-s0510a:3223_1: obhāsayantaṃ jalantaṃ sikhīnaṃ sikhībhagavantaṃ sikhīnaṃ yathā jalamānaaggikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3223_2: viya. Aggajaṃ pupphamādāyāti aggajanāmakaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā buddhassa sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3227_0: 1-2. Sattavīsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne jalajagge duve gayhāti jale udake jāte agge
atk-s0510a:3227_1: uppalādayo dve pupphe gahetvā buddhassa samīpaṃ gantvā ekaṃ pupphaṃ pādesu nikkhipiṃ
atk-s0510a:3227_2: pūjesiṃ, ekaṃ pupphaṃ ākāse khipinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3229_0: 10. Tatiyāpadāne bodhiyā pādaputtameti uttame bodhipādape. Aḍḍhacandaṃ mayā dinnanti
atk-s0510a:3229_1: tasmiṃ bodhimūle aḍḍhacandākārena mayā anekapupphāni pūjitānīti attho. Dharaṇīruhapādapeti
atk-s0510a:3229_2: rukkhapabbataratanādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī, pathavī, dharaṇiyā ruhati patiṭṭhahatīti
atk-s0510a:3229_3: dharaṇīruho, pādasaṅkhātena mūlena udakaṃ pivati khandhaviṭapādīsu patthariyatīti
atk-s0510a:3229_4: pādapo, dharaṇīruho ca so pādapo ceti dharaṇīruhapādapo, tasmiṃ dharaṇīruhapādape
atk-s0510a:3231_0: 18-19. Pañcamāpadāne himavantassāvidūreti himavantassa āsanne. Romaso nāma pabbatoti
atk-s0510a:3231_1: rukkhalatāgumbābhāvā kevalaṃ dabbatiṇādisañchannattā romaso nāma pabbato ahosi. Tamhi
atk-s0510a:3231_2: pabbatapādamhīti tasmiṃ pabbatapariyante. Samaṇo bhāvitindriyoti samitapāpo vūpasantakileso
atk-s0510a:3231_3: samaṇo vaḍḍhitaindriyo, rakkhitacakkhundriyādiindriyoti attho. Atha vā vaḍḍhitaindriyo
atk-s0510a:3231_4: vaḍḍhitasaddhindriyādiindriyoti attho. Tassa samaṇassa ahaṃ biḷāliāluve gahetvā adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3237: 5. Dutiyāpadāne manomayena kāyenāti yathā cittavasena pavattakāyenāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_0: 10. Tatiyāpadāne mahāsamuddaṃ nissāyāti mahāsāgarāsanne ṭhitassa pabbatassa antare
atk-s0510a:3238_1: pabbataleṇeti attho. Siddhattho bhagavā vivekakāmatāya vasati paṭivasatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_2: Paccuggantvānakāsahanti ahaṃ tassa bhagavato paṭiuggantvā samīpaṃ gantvā vandanādipuññaṃ
atk-s0510a:3238_3: akāsinti attho. Caṅkoṭakamadāsahanti siddhatthassa bhagavato ahaṃ pupphabharitaṃ
