atk-s0510a:3241_1: sāṭakaṃ visamaṃ gophāsukena ghaṃsitvā nimmitaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā kantitvā tena suttena
atk-s0510a:3241_2: nisīdanatthāya vā bhūmattharaṇatthāya vā sāṭakaṃ vāyāpetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ mayā ratanattayassa dinnanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3242_0: 27. Sattamāpadāne candabhāgānadītīreti candabhāgāya nāma nadiyā tīrato, nissakke
atk-s0510a:3242_1: bhummavacanaṃ. Anusotanti sotassa anu heṭṭhāgaṅgaṃ vajāmi gacchāmi ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3242_2: Satta māluvapupphāni, citamāropayiṃ ahanti ahaṃ māluvapupphāni satta pattāni gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3242_3: citake vālukarāsimhi vālukāhi thūpaṃ katvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3243_1: suṭṭhu manoharā mahāsindhu nāma vārinadī ahosi. Tattha tissaṃ sindhuvārinadiyaṃ sappabhāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3243_2: pabhāya sahitaṃ sudassanaṃ sundararūpaṃ paramopasame yuttaṃ uttame upasame yuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:3243_3: samaṅgībhūtaṃ vītarāgaṃ ahaṃ addasanti attho. Disvāhaṃ vimhitāsayoti “evarūpaṃ bhayānakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3243_4: himavantaṃ kathaṃ sampatto”ti vimhitaajjhāsayo acchariyabbhutacittoti attho. Āluvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3243_5: tassa pādāsinti tassa arahato ahaṃ pasannamānaso āluvakandaṃ pādāsiṃ ādarena adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3248_1: bhuñjanatthāya paṇṇasālāya nisinno amhi bhavāmīti attho. Upaviṭṭhañca maṃ santanti
atk-s0510a:3248_2: paṇṇasālāyaṃ upaviṭṭhaṃ santaṃ vijjamānaṃ maṃ. Upāgacchi mahāisīti mahante sīlādikhandhe
atk-s0510a:3248_3: esanato mahāisi. Lokapajjoto lokapadīpo siddhattho bhagavā upagacchi, mama samīpaṃ
atk-s0510a:3248_4: agamāsīti attho. Nisinnassa paṇṇasanthareti upagantvā paṇṇasanthare nisinnassa khādanatthāya
atk-s0510a:3249_0: 5-7. Dutiyāpadāne sinerusamasantoso dharaṇīsamasādiso siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3249_1: Vuṭṭhahitvā samādhimhāti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā visuṃ hutvāti attho. Bhikkhāya
atk-s0510a:3249_2: mamupaṭṭhitoti bhikkhācāravelāya “ajja mama yo koci kiñci dānaṃ dadāti, tassa mahapphala”nti
atk-s0510a:3249_3: cintetvā nisinnassa mama santikaṃ samīpaṃ upaṭṭhito samīpamāgatoti attho. Harītakaṃ…pe…
atk-s0510a:3249_4: phārusakaphalāni cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ phalaṃ sabbalokānukampino tassa siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3249_5: mahesissa mayā vippasannena cetasā dinnanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3250_0: 11-12. Tatiyāpadāne sīhaṃ yathā vanacaranti vane caramānaṃ sīharājaṃ iva caramānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3250_1: siddhatthaṃ bhagavantanti sambandho. Nisabhājāniyaṃ yathāti vasabho, nisabho, visabho,
atk-s0510a:3250_2: āsabhoti cattāro gavajeṭṭhakā. Tesu gavasatassa jeṭṭhako vasabho, gavasahassassa
atk-s0510a:3250_3: jeṭṭhako nisabho, gavasatasahassassa jeṭṭhako visabho, gavakoṭisatasahassassa jeṭṭhako
atk-s0510a:3250_4: āsabho. Idha pana āsabho “nisabho”ti vutto, ājānīyaṃ abhītaṃ niccalaṃ usabharājaṃ
atk-s0510a:3250_5: ivāti attho. Kakudhaṃ vilasantaṃvāti pupphapallavehi sobhamānaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ iva
atk-s0510a:3250_6: narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ āgacchantaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā saddhāya
atk-s0510a:3250_7: sampayuttattā vippasannena cetasā paccuggamanaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3255_0: 1-2. Tiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmohanti pūjāsakkāraṃ kāretukāmo
atk-s0510a:3255_1: ahaṃ. Nānāpupphaṃ samānayinti nānā anekavidhaṃ campakasalalādipupphaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu
atk-s0510a:3255_2: ānayiṃ, rāsiṃ akāsinti attho. Sikhino lokabandhunoti sakalalokattayabandhussa ñātakassa
atk-s0510a:3255_3: sikhissa bhagavato parinibbutassa citakaṃ āḷāhanacitakaṃ dārurāsiṃ jalantaṃ ādittaṃ
atk-s0510a:3255_4: disvā tañca mayā rāsīkataṃ pupphaṃ okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3256_0: 6-7. Dutiyāpadāne ajinuttaravāsanoti ajinamigacammaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā nivāsino
atk-s0510a:3256_1: acchādanoti attho. Abhiññā pañca nibbattāti iddhividhādayo pañca abhiññāyo pañca
atk-s0510a:3256_2: ñāṇāni nibbattā uppāditā nipphāditā. Candassa parimajjakoti candamaṇḍalassa samantato
atk-s0510a:3256_3: majjako, phuṭṭho ahosinti attho. Vipassiṃ lokapajjotanti sakalalokattaye padīpasadisaṃ
atk-s0510a:3256_4: vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ mama santikaṃ abhigataṃ visesena sampattaṃ āgataṃ. Disvā pāricchattakapupphānīti
atk-s0510a:3256_5: devalokato pāricchattakapupphāni āharitvā vipassissa satthuno matthake chattākārena
atk-s0510a:3257_0: 11-13. Tatiyāpadāne putto mama pabbajitoti mayhaṃ putto saddhāya pabbajito. Kāsāyavasano
atk-s0510a:3257_1: tadāti tasmiṃ pabbajitakāle kāsāyanivattho, na bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3257_2: So ca buddhattaṃ sampattoti so mayhaṃ putto catūsu buddhesu sāvakabuddhabhāvaṃ saṃ
atk-s0510a:3257_3: suṭṭhu patto, arahattaṃ pattoti attho. Nibbuto lokapūjitoti sakalalokehi katasakkāro
atk-s0510a:3257_4: khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho. Vicinanto sakaṃ puttanti ahaṃ tassa gatadesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3257_5: pucchitvā sakaṃ puttaṃ vicinanto pacchato agamaṃ, anugato asmīti attho. Nibbutassa
atk-s0510a:3257_6: mahantassāti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi yuttattā mahantassa tassa mama puttassa arahato
atk-s0510a:3257_7: ādahanaṭṭhāne citakaṃ citakaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho. Paggayha añjaliṃ tatthāti
atk-s0510a:3257_8: tasmiṃ ādahanaṭṭhāne añjaliṃ dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ paggahetvā sirasi katvā ahaṃ citakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3257_9: dahanadārurāsiṃ vanditvā paṇāmaṃ katvā setacchattañca paggayhāti na kevalameva vanditvā
atk-s0510a:3257_10: dhavalacchattañca paggayha ukkhipitvā ahaṃ āropesiṃ patiṭṭhapesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3258_0: 17-18. Catutthāpadāne anuggatamhi ādicceti sūriye anuggate anuṭṭhite paccūsakāleti
atk-s0510a:3258_1: attho. Pasādo vipulo ahūti rogapīḷitassa mayhaṃ cittappasādo vipulo atireko buddhānussaraṇena
atk-s0510a:3258_2: ahu ahosi. Mahesino buddhaseṭṭhassa lokamhi pātubhāvo pākaṭabhāvo ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3258_3: Ghosamassosahaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ pātubhāve sati “ahaṃ gilāno buddho uppanno”ti ghosaṃ
atk-s0510a:3258_4: assosiṃ. Na ca passāmi taṃ jinanti taṃ jitapañcamāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0510a:3258_5: bāḷhagilānattā gantvā passituṃ na sakkomīti attho. Maraṇañca anuppattoti maraṇāsannakālaṃ
atk-s0510a:3258_6: anuppatto, āsannamaraṇo hutvāti attho. Buddhasaññamanussarinti buddhotināmaṃ anussariṃ,
atk-s0510a:3259_0: 21-23. Pañcamāpadāne ārāmadvārā nikkhammāti ārāmadvārato saṅghassa nikkhamanadvāramaggehi
atk-s0510a:3259_1: attho. Gosīsaṃ santhataṃ mayāti tasmiṃ nikkhamanadvāramagge “bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3259_2: ca pādā mā kaddamaṃ akkamantū”ti akkamanatthāya gosīsaṭṭhiṃ mayā santharitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_3: Anubhomi sakaṃ kammanti attano gosīsaattharaṇakammassa balena ājānīyā vātajavā sindhavā
atk-s0510a:3259_4: sīghavāhanādīni vipākaphalāni anubhomīti attho. Aho kāraṃ paramakāranti sukhette
atk-s0510a:3259_5: saṅghe mayā suṭṭhu kataṃ kāraṃ appakampi kiccaṃ mahapphaladānato paramakāraṃ uttamakiccaṃ
atk-s0510a:3259_6: aho vimhayanti attho. Yathā tiṇadosādivirahitesu khettesu vappitaṃ sālibījaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3259_7: deti, evameva rāgadosādidosarahite parisuddhakāyavacīsamācāre saṅghakhette gosīsaattharaṇakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3259_8: mayā kataṃ, idaṃ mahapphalaṃ detīti vuttaṃ hoti. Na aññaṃ kalamagghatīti aññaṃ bāhirasāsane
atk-s0510a:3259_9: kataṃ kammaṃ saṅghe katassa kārassa pūjāsakkārassa kalaṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3264_0: 1-2. Ekatiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne isisaṅghe ahaṃ pubbeti ahaṃ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle
atk-s0510a:3264_1: isisaṅghe paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṃ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule
atk-s0510a:3264_2: vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho. Manussādayo vāretīti vāraṇo, atha vā vācāya
atk-s0510a:3264_3: ravati koñcanādaṃ nadatīti vāraṇo. Mahesīnaṃ pasādenāti paccekabuddhamahesīnaṃ pasādena.
atk-s0510a:3264_4: Paccekajinaseṭṭhesu, dhutarāgesu tādisūti lokadhammehi niccalesu paccekabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3266_0: 13-16. Catutthāpadāne mahābodhimaho ahūti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato
atk-s0510a:3266_1: “bodhī”ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho. Rukkhaṭṭhasseva sambuddhoti
atk-s0510a:3266_2: assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho rukkhaṭṭho
atk-s0510a:3266_3: iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho. Bhagavā tamhi samayeti tasmiṃ bodhipūjākaraṇakāle
atk-s0510a:3266_4: bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto. Vācāsabhimudīrayanti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṃ
atk-s0510a:3266_5: udīrayaṃ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṃ pakāsesi, desesīti attho. Saṃkhittena
atk-s0510a:3266_6: ca desentoti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṃkhittena ca vitthārena ca
atk-s0510a:3266_7: desayīti attho. Vivaṭṭacchadoti rāgo chadanaṃ, doso chadanaṃ, moho chadanaṃ, sabbakilesā
atk-s0510a:3266_8: chadanā”ti evaṃ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṃsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0510a:3266_9: sambuddho. Taṃ mahājanaṃ desanāvasena nibbāpesi pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamesīti attho. Tassāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3266_10: dhammaṃ sutvānāti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0510a:3267: 20. Pañcamāpadāne phalahattho apekkhavāti vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṃ assamaṃ gañchinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3269: 40. Aṭṭhamāpadāne niṭṭhite navakamme cāti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṃ gate sati. Anulepamadāsahanti anupacchā sudhālepaṃ adāsiṃ, sudhāya lepāpesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3275: 16. Catutthāpadāne jalajaggehi okirinti jalajehi uttamehi uppalapadumādīhi pupphehi okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3277_0: 26-27. Chaṭṭhāpadāne cetiyaṃ uttamaṃ nāma, sikhino lokabandhunoti sakalalokattayassa
atk-s0510a:3277_1: bandhuno ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato uttamaṃ cetiyaṃ. Irīṇe janasañcaravirahite
atk-s0510a:3277_2: vane manussānaṃ kolāhalavirahite mahāaraññe ahosīti sambandho. Andhāhiṇḍāmahaṃ tadāti
atk-s0510a:3277_3: tasmiṃ kāle vane maggamūḷhabhāvena andho, na cakkhunā andho, ahaṃ āhiṇḍāmi maggaṃ
atk-s0510a:3277_4: pariyesāmīti attho. Pavanā nikkhamantenāti mahāvanato nikkhamantena mayā sīhāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3277_5: uttamāsanaṃ, sīhassa vā bhagavato āsanaṃ diṭṭhanti attho. Ekaṃsaṃ añjaliṃ katvāti
atk-s0510a:3277_6: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Santhaviṃ lokanāyakanti
atk-s0510a:3277_7: sakalalokattayanayaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ pāpentaṃ thomitaṃ thutiṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3278_1: manoharadassano mahāvīriyo siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho. Vasatigharamuttameti uttame
atk-s0510a:3284: 55. Sattamāpadāne samayaṃ agamāsahanti samūhaṃ samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3285_1: sataṃ nirabbuda”nti vuttattā āyunā abbudanirabbudāni gatamahāāyuvantā manujādhipā
atk-s0510a:3285_2: cakkavattino khattiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā kappānaṃ pañcavīsasahassamhi āsiṃsu ahesunti
atk-s0510a:3293_0: Navamāpadāne pana vipassino pāvacanetiādikaṃ āyasmato soṇassa koṭivīsattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3293_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3293_2: upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhave seṭṭhikule nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:3293_3: seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3293_4: bhagavato caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā ekañca leṇaṃ kāretvā nānāvirāgavatthehi
atk-s0510a:3293_5: leṇabhūmiyā santharitvā upari vitānañca katvā cātuddisassa saṅghassa niyyādetvā sattāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3293_6: mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā anumodanaṃ akāsi. So tena kusalakammena
atk-s0510a:3293_7: devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ kappe parinibbute kassapadasabale
atk-s0510a:3293_8: anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre
atk-s0510a:3293_9: paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā vasantaṃ ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0510a:3293_10: upaṭṭhahi. Paccekabuddho vuṭṭhavasso paripuṇṇaparikkhāro gandhamādanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3293_11: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3293_12: amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle campānagare aggaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato
atk-s0510a:3293_13: paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi. Tassa mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase
atk-s0510a:3293_14: sakalanagare mahālābhasakkārasammāno ahosi, tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena
atk-s0510a:3293_15: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi, tenassa soṇoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So mahatā
atk-s0510a:3293_16: parivārena abhivaḍḍhi. Tassa hatthapādatalāni bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇāni ahesuṃ, tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3293_17: satavāraṃ vihatakappāsaṃ viya mudusamphasso ahosi. Pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇalomāni
atk-s0510a:3293_18: jāyiṃsu. Vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kārāpetvā nāṭakitthiyo

atk-s0510a:3304_7: nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ sattāhaṃ dānaṃ

atk-s0510a:3304_10: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto

atk-s0510a:3305_1: arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto udānavasena taṃ pakāsento nagare

atk-s0510a:3305_3: rañño gehadvāre dvārapālako āsiṃ ahosinti attho. Akkhobhaṃ amitaṃ bhoganti rañño

atk-s0510a:3310_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ bākulattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayaṃ kira thero
atk-s0510a:3310_1: atīte ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3310_2: uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha
atk-s0510a:3310_3: sāraṃ apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ gavesissāmī”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde
atk-s0510a:3310_4: viharanto pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu
atk-s0510a:3310_5: santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu vātābādhe uppanne araññato
atk-s0510a:3310_6: bhesajjāni ānetvā taṃ vūpasametvā taṃ puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0510a:3310_7: nibbatto ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0510a:3310_8: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_9: appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_10: katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3310_11: uppattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_12: patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde
atk-s0510a:3310_13: vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_14: tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0510a:3310_15: nibbattitvā tato ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:3310_16: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ vinassamānaṃ mahāvihāraṃ

atk-s0510a:3310_19: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3311_0: So mātukucchito nikkhamitvā dhātīhi arogabhāvāya yamunāyaṃ nhāpiyamāno tāsaṃ hatthato
atk-s0510a:3311_1: muccitvā macchena gilito ahosi. Kevaṭṭā taṃ macchaṃ jālāya gahetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhibhariyāya
atk-s0510a:3311_2: vikkiṇiṃsu. Sā taṃ gahetvā phālayamānā pubbe katapuññaphalena arogaṃ dārakaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3311_3: “putto me laddho”ti gahetvā posesi. So janakehi mātāpitūhi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā āgantvā
atk-s0510a:3311_4: “ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto, detha no putta”nti anuyoge kate raññā “ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo
atk-s0510a:3311_5: hotū”ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā bākuloti laddhanāmo
atk-s0510a:3311_6: vayappatto mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto dvīsu seṭṭhikulesu ekekasmiṃ chamāsaṃ chamāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_7: vasati. Te attano vāre sampatte nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā tatrūpari ratanamaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_8: kāretvā pañcaṅgikatūriye nipphādetvā kumāraṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā ubhayanagaramajjhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_9: gaṅgāya āgacchanti, aparaseṭṭhimanussāpi evameva sajjetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_10: tattha āropetvā gacchanti. So evaṃ vaḍḍhamāno āsītiko hutvā ubhayaseṭṭhiputtoti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:3311_11: Satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhaṃ vāyamanto
atk-s0510a:3311_12: aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

atk-s0510a:3315_0: Sattamāpadāne bhariyā me kālaṅkatātiādikaṃ āyasmato girimānandattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3315_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3315_2: upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:3315_3: vasanto attano bhariyāya ca putte ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:3315_4: pavattaphalabhojano rukkhamūle vihāsi. Tadā sumedho bhagavā tassānukampāya tattha
atk-s0510a:3315_5: gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā sokasallaṃ abbūḷhesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso sugandhapupphehi
atk-s0510a:3315_6: bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.
atk-s0510a:3316_0: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayattha sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3316_1: rājagahe bimbisārarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, girimānandotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:3316_2: ahosi. So viññutaṃ patvā satthu rājagahāgamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3316_3: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ
atk-s0510a:3316_4: rājagahaṃ agamāsi. Bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idheva,
atk-s0510a:3316_5: bhante, vasatha, ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī”ti sampavāretvā gatopi bahukiccattā
atk-s0510a:3316_6: taṃ na sari. “Thero abbhokāseyeva vasatī”ti. Devatā therassa temanabhayena vassadhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3316_7: vāresuṃ. Rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ upadhāretvā ñatvā therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi. Thero
atk-s0510a:3316_8: kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena cittasamādhānaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā

atk-s0510a:3323_0: 1. Ekacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyātiādikaṃ tissametteyyattherassa

atk-s0510a:3328_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni

atk-s0510a:3329_1: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:3329_2: satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. Aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0510a:3329_3: vasanaguhādvāre pasannamānaso divasassa tikkhattuṃ madhurena vassitaṃ vassi. Evaṃ
atk-s0510a:3329_4: tattha tattha bhave puññāni katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:3329_5: nandakoti laddhanāmo satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā

atk-s0510a:3330_0: 183. Sattamāpadāne pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyātiādikaṃ āyasmato hemakattherassa apadānaṃ.

atk-s0510a:3331_1: Tattha rājāsi vijayo nāmāti daharakālato paṭṭhāya sabbasaṅgāmesu jinato, catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0510a:3331_2: janaṃ rañjanato allīyanato vijayo nāma rājā ahosīti attho. Ketumatīpuruttameti ketu
atk-s0510a:3331_3: vuccanti dhajapaṭākā. Atha vā nagarasobhanatthāya nagaramajjhe ussāpitaratanatoraṇāni,
atk-s0510a:3331_4: te ketū niccaṃ ussāpitā sobhayamānā assā atthīti ketumatī. Pūreti dhanadhaññehi sabbajanānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3331_5: mananti puraṃ. Ketumatī ca sā purañca seṭṭhaṭṭhena uttamañceti ketumatīpuruttamaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3331_6: tasmiṃ ketumatīpuruttame. Sūro vikkamasampannoti abhīto vīriyasampanno vijayo nāma
atk-s0510a:3331_7: rājā ajjhāvasīti sambandho. Itthaṃ bhūtaṃ purañca sabbavatthuvāhanañca chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0510a:3331_8: himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vasanto sumedhabhagavantaṃ disvā somanassaṃ
atk-s0510a:3332_0: 276. Navamāpadāne nagare haṃsavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato jatukaṇṇittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3332_1: Tattha seṭṭhiputto hutvā suvaṇṇapāsāde vasanabhāvo ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgī
atk-s0510a:3332_2: hutvā vasanabhāvo ca sabbadesavāsīnaṃ sabbasippaviññūnañca āgantvā sevanabhāvo ca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3333_0: 330. Dasamāpadāne himavantassāvidūretiādikaṃ āyasmato udenattherassa apadānaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0510a:3333_1: himavantasamīpe padumapabbataṃ nissāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vasantena padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3333_2: bhagavato padumapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjitabhāvova viseso. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3337: Bācattālīsamavagge paṭhamāpadānañca dutiyāpadānañca tatiyāpadānañca nayānusārena suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:3338_1: apadānaṃ. Tattha sūkarikoti sūkaramaṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento. Ukkoṭakaṃ randhayitvāti
atk-s0510a:3338_2: pihakapapphāsamaṃsaṃ pacitvā madhumaṃsamhi okiriṃ pakkhipiṃ. Tena maṃsena pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3338_3: pūretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā tena puññakammena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde arahattaṃ pāpuṇinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3343: Tecattālīsamavagge sabbatherāpadānāni uttānāneva. Kevalaṃ therānaṃ nāmanānattaṃ puññanānattañca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3344: Catucattālīsame vaggepi sabbāni apadānāni pākaṭāneva. Kevalaṃ puññanānattaṃ phalanānattañca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3345: 1. Pañcacattālīsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne kakusandho mahāvīrotiādikaṃ āyasmato vibhīṭakamiñjiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3346_0: 2. Tattha bījamiñjamadāsahanti vibhīṭakaphalāni phāletvā bījāni miñjāni gahetvā madhusakkarāhi
atk-s0510a:3346_1: yojetvā kakusandhassa bhagavato adāsinti attho. Dutiyāpadānādīni sabbāni suviññeyyāneva,
atk-s0510a:3347: 1. Chacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne jagatiṃ kārayiṃ ahanti uttamabodhirukkhassa samantato āḷindaṃ ahaṃ kārayinti attho. Sesāni dutiyāpadānādīni sabbānipi uttānāneva.
atk-s0510a:3350_0: 30. Tatiyāpadāne kosiyo nāma bhagavāti kosiyagotte jātattā kosiyo nāma paccekabuddhoti
atk-s0510a:3350_1: attho. Cittakūṭeti cittakūṭakelāsakūṭasānukūṭādīsu anotattadahaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitapabbatakūṭesu
atk-s0510a:3350_2: nānāratanaosadhādīhi vicitte cittakūṭapabbate so paccekabuddho vasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3352: 56. Chaṭṭhāpadāne kusaṭṭhakamadāsahanti pakkhikabhattauposathikabhattadhurabhattasalākabhattādīsu kusapaṇṇavasena dātabbaṃ aṭṭhasalākabhattaṃ ahaṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3353: 61. Sattamāpadāne sobhito nāma sambuddhoti ārohapariṇāhadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇabyāmappabhādīhi sobhamānasarīrattā sobhito nāma sammāsambuddhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3354: 66. Aṭṭhamāpadāne takkarāyaṃ vasī tadāti taṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthuṃ karontā janā paṭivasanti etthāti takkarā, rājadhānī. Tissaṃ takkarāyaṃ, tadā vasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3355: 72. Navamāpadāne pānadhiṃ sukataṃ gayhāti upāhanayugaṃ sundarākārena nipphāditaṃ gahetvāti attho. Dasamāpadānaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3360: 14. Dutiyāpadāne adhiccuppattikā buddhāti adhiccena akāraṇena uppattikā sayambhūtā, aññehi devabrahmamārādīhi upadesadāyakehi rahitā sayambhūñāṇena uppannā jātā pātubhūtāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3361_0: 16. Odumbarikapupphaṃ vāti udumbararukkhe pupphaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhuppattikaṃ iva.
atk-s0510a:3361_1: Candamhi sasakaṃ yathāti candamaṇḍale sasalekhāya rūpaṃ dullabhaṃ yathā. Vāyasānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3361_2: yathā khīranti kākānaṃ niccaṃ rattindivaṃ khuddāpīḷitabhāvena khīraṃ dullabhaṃ yathā,
atk-s0510a:3361_3: evaṃ dullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ caturāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā aṭṭhāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā soḷasāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3361_4: vā kappasatasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā buddhabhāvato dullabho lokanāyakoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3362_0: 30. Tatiyāpadāne madhuṃ bhisehi savatīti pokkharamadhupadumakesarehi savati paggharati.
atk-s0510a:3362_1: Khīraṃ sappiṃ muḷālibhīti khīrañca sappirasañca padumamuḷālehi savati paggharati.
atk-s0510a:3362_2: Tasmā tadubhayaṃ mama santakaṃ buddho paṭiggaṇhatūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3364_0: 119. Sattamāpadāne cattālīsadijāpi cāti dvikkhattuṃ jātāti dijā. Kumāravaye uṭṭhitadantānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3364_1: patitattā puna uṭṭhitadantā dijā, te ca dantā. Byākaraṇañca heṭṭhā nidānakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-s0510a:3366_0: 171. Navamāpadāne tadāhaṃ māṇavo āsinti yadā sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarabhagavato santikā
atk-s0510a:3366_1: byākaraṇaṃ labhi, tadā ahaṃ megho nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo hutvā sumedhatāpasena saha
atk-s0510a:3366_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sikkhāpadesu sikkhito kenaci pāpasahāyena saṃsaṭṭho saṃsaggadosena
atk-s0510a:3366_4: tato cuto samudde timiṅgalamahāmaccho hutvā nibbatto, samuddamajjhe gacchantaṃ mahānāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3366_5: gilitukāmo gato. Disvā maṃ vāṇijā bhītā “aho gotamo bhagavā”ti saddamakaṃsu. Atha
atk-s0510a:3366_6: mahāmaccho pubbavāsanāvasena buddhagāravaṃ uppādetvā tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:3366_7: brāhmaṇakule nibbatto saddho pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0510a:3366_8: arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saramāno vandati. Tadā
atk-s0510a:3367_0: 184. Atha so thero “suciraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādīhi gāthāhi thomesi. Bhante, satapuññalakkhaṇadhara
atk-s0510a:3367_1: gotama. Patipubbena visuddhapaccayanti pubbe dīpaṅkarapādamūle paripuṇṇapāramīpaccayasambhāro
atk-s0510a:3367_2: suṭṭhu ciraṃ kālaṃ mayā na diṭṭho asīti attho. Ahamajjasupekkhananti ajja imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3367_3: divase ahaṃ supekkhanaṃ sundaradassanaṃ, sundaradiṭṭhaṃ vā nirupamaṃ viggahaṃ upamārahitasarīraṃ
atk-s0510a:3367_4: gotamaṃ vata ekantena passāmi dakkhāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_0: 185-186. Suciraṃ vihatatamo mayāti visesena hatatamo viddhaṃsitamoho tvaṃ mayāpi
atk-s0510a:3368_1: suṭṭhu ciraṃ thomitoti attho. Sucirakkhena nadī visositāti esā taṇhānadī sundararakkhena
atk-s0510a:3368_2: gopanena visesena sositā, abhabbuppattikatā tayāti attho. Suciraṃ amalaṃ visodhitanti
atk-s0510a:3368_3: suṭṭhu ciraṃ dīghena addhunā amalaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena sodhitaṃ, suṭṭhu kataṃ adhigataṃ
atk-s0510a:3368_4: tayāti attho. Nayanaṃ ñāṇamayaṃ mahāmune. Cirakālasamaṅgitoti mahāmune mahāsamaṇa
atk-s0510a:3368_5: ñāṇamayaṃ nayanaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ cirakālaṃ samadhigato sampatto tvanti attho. Avinaṭṭho
atk-s0510a:3368_6: punarantaranti ahaṃ puna antaraṃ antarābhave majjhe parinaṭṭho parihīno ahosinti
atk-s0510a:3368_7: attho. Punarajjasamāgato tayāti ajja imasmiṃ kāle tayā saddhiṃ punapi samāgato ekībhūto
atk-s0510a:3368_8: saha vasāmīti attho. Na hi nassanti katāni gotamāti gotama sabbaññubuddha, tayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3368_9: katāni samāgamādīni na hi nassanti yāva khandhaparinibbānā na vinā bhavissantīti
atk-s0510a:3374: Paññāsamavagge ca ekapaññāsamavagge ca dvepaññāsamavagge ca tepaññāsamavagge ca sabbāni apadānāni uttānānevāti.
atk-s0510a:3377_0: Catupaññāsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa
atk-s0510a:3377_1: apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni
atk-s0510a:3377_2: puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3377_3: vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa
atk-s0510a:3377_4: vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0510a:3377_5: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā dānādīni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3377_6: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3377_7: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3378_0: So tena puññena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3378_1: kulagehe nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakammaṭṭhāne satasahassagghanikāya
atk-s0510a:3378_2: suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā “imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ me
atk-s0510a:3378_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3378_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa purohitagehe
atk-s0510a:3378_5: nibbatti, tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātā “mayhaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, attano nāmaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3378_6: āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotveva nāmaṃ akāsi. So vuddhimanvāya tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu
atk-s0510a:3378_7: accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. So gottavasena kaccāyanoti paññāyittha. Atha rājā
atk-s0510a:3378_8: caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā, “ācariya, tumhe tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānethā”ti
atk-s0510a:3378_9: pesesi. So attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ upagato tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0510a:3378_10: sattahi janehi saddhiṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3379_0: 1. So evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3379_1: pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Atha satthā “etha,
atk-s0510a:3379_3: vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Evaṃ thero sadatthaṃ nipphādetvā, “bhante, rājā
atk-s0510a:3379_4: pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī”ti ārocesi. Satthā “tvaṃyeva,
atk-s0510a:3379_5: kaccāna, tattha gaccha, tayi gate rājā pasīdissatī”ti āha. Thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo
atk-s0510a:3379_6: tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva
atk-s0510a:3379_7: āgato. Attano pubbapatthanāvasena kaccāyanappakaraṇaṃ mahāniruttippakaraṇaṃ nettippakaraṇanti
atk-s0510a:3379_8: pakaraṇattayaṃ saṅghamajjhe byākāsi. Atha santuṭṭhena bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0510a:3379_9: mama sāvakānaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti
atk-s0510a:3382_0: Dutiyāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato vakkalittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3382_1: thero purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3382_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3382_3: patto satthu santikaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante
atk-s0510a:3382_4: ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3382_5: disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3382_6: mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākari.
atk-s0510a:3383_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_1: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, tassa vakkalīti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tattha kalīti aparādhatilakāḷakādidosassa
atk-s0510a:3383_2: adhivacanaṃ. Niddhantasuvaṇṇapiṇḍasadisatāya apagato byapagato kali doso assāti va-kārāgamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_3: katvā vakkalīti vuccati. So vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_4: gato, satthāraṃ disvā rūpakāyasampattidassanena atitto satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0510a:3383_5: “Agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṃ satthu dassanaṃ na labhissāmī”ti satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3383_6: ṭhapetvā bhojanakālaṃ sarīrakiccakālañca sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_7: passituṃ, tattha ṭhito aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya bhagavantaṃ olokentoyeva viharati. Satthā
atk-s0510a:3383_8: tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento bahukālaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā
atk-s0510a:3383_9: punekadivasaṃ – “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_10: passati, so maṃ passati; yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. Dhammañhi, vakkali,
atk-s0510a:3383_11: passanto maṃ passatī”ti āha. Satthari evaṃ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṃ pahāya
atk-s0510a:3383_12: aññattha gantuṃ na sakkoti. Tato satthā, “nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3383_13: vassūpanāyikadivase – “apehi, vakkalī”ti theraṃ paṇāmesi. So satthārā paṇāmito satthu
atk-s0510a:3383_14: sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto – “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, yohaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:3383_15: gijjhakūṭe pabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi? Satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā – “ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_16: bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3386_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi, vakkalī”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Thero “dasabalo me diṭṭho, ‘ehī’ti
atk-s0510a:3386_1: avhāyanampi laddha”nti balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā “kuto gacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3386_2: ajānitvāva satthu sammukhe ākāse pakkhanditvā paṭhamena pādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva
atk-s0510a:3386_3: satthārā vuttagāthāyo āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0510a:3387_0: Idha pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – “kiṃ te, vakkalī”tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe
atk-s0510a:3387_1: viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṃ
atk-s0510a:3387_2: na otarati? Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So puna vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3387_3: pāpetuṃ nāsakkhiyeva. Athassa āhāravekallena vātābādho uppajji, taṃ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3399: Catasso gāthāyo abhāsi. Tāsaṃ attho theragāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Evaṃ thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3400_0: 28. So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3400_1: pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha. Tattha itoti kakusandhādīnaṃ uppannabhaddakappato
atk-s0510a:3403_0: 31. Andhānaṃ nayanūpamoti cakkhuvirahitānaṃ sattānaṃ nayanasadiso, dhammadesanāya
atk-s0510a:3403_1: sabbasattānaṃ paññācakkhādicakkhudāyakoti attho. Santavesoti santasabhāvo santairiyāpatho.
atk-s0510a:3403_2: Guṇanidhīti guṇānaṃ nidhi, sabbaguṇagaṇānaṃ nidhānaṭṭhānabhūtoti attho. Karuṇāmatiākaroti
atk-s0510a:3403_3: sādhūnaṃ cittakampanasaṅkhātāya karuṇāya ca atthānatthaminanaparicchinnamatiyā ca ākaro ādhārabhūto.
atk-s0510a:3404: 32. Brahmāsurasuraccitoti brahmehi ca asurehi ca devehi ca accito pūjitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3405_0: 33. Madhurena rutena cāti karavīkarutamadhurena saddena sakalaṃ janaṃ rañjayantīti
atk-s0510a:3405_1: sambandho. Santhavī sāvakaṃ sakanti attano sāvakaṃ madhuradhammadesanāya santhavī,
atk-s0510a:3406: 34. Saddhādhimuttoti saddahanasaddhāya sāsane adhimutto patiṭṭhitoti attho. Mama dassanalālasoti mayhaṃ dassane byāvaṭo tapparo.
atk-s0510a:3407: 35. Taṃ ṭhānamabhirocayinti taṃ saddhādhimuttaṭṭhānantaraṃ abhirocayiṃ, icchiṃ patthesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3408: 40. Pītamaṭṭhanivāsananti siliṭṭhasuvaṇṇavaṇṇavatthe nivatthanti attho. Hemayaññopacitaṅganti suvaṇṇapāmaṅgalaggitagattanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3409_1: asokapallavapattakomalamiva mudukanti attho. Pisācībhayatajjitāti tadā evaṃbhūtaṃ
atk-s0510a:3409_2: kumāraṃ maṃ aññā pisācī ekā rakkhasī bhayena tajjesi bhiṃsāpesīti attho. Tadā mahesissa
atk-s0510a:3409_3: sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle maṃ sāyesuṃ nipajjāpesuṃ. Dīnamānasā bhītacittā mama mātāpitaro
atk-s0510a:3409_4: imaṃ dārakaṃ te dadāma, imassa saraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā hotu nātha nāyakāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3410_0: 49. Tadā paṭiggahi so manti so bhagavā tadā tasmiṃ mama mātuyā dinnakāle jālinā jālayuttena
atk-s0510a:3410_1: saṅkhālakena cakkalakkhaṇādīhi lakkhitena mudukomalapāṇinā mudukena visuddhena hatthatalena
atk-s0510a:3411_0: 52. Sabbapāramisambhūtanti sabbehi dānapāramitādīhi sambhūtaṃ jātaṃ. Nīlakkhinayanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3411_1: varaṃ puññasambhārajaṃ uttamanīlaakkhivantaṃ. Sabbasubhākiṇṇaṃ sabbena subhena vaṇṇena
atk-s0510a:3411_2: saṇṭhānena ākiṇṇaṃ gahanībhūtaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato hatthapādasīsādirūpaṃ disvāti attho,
atk-s0510a:3412_0: 61. Tadā maṃ caraṇantagoti tasmiṃ mayhaṃ arahattaṃ pattakāle sīlādipannarasannaṃ
atk-s0510a:3412_2: pāṭho. Tassa maraṇassa antaṃ nibbānaṃ pattoti attho. Saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṃ paññapesīti
atk-s0510a:3412_3: sambandho. Atha satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3412_4: saddhādhimuttānaṃ yadidaṃ, vakkalī”ti maṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3415_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato kappinattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3415_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3415_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3415_3: suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3416_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto bārāṇasito avidūre ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3416_1: pesakāragāme jeṭṭhapesakāragehe nibbatto tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā himavante
atk-s0510a:3416_2: aṭṭha māse vasitvā vassike cattāro māse janapade vasanti. Te ekavāraṃ bārāṇasiyā
atk-s0510a:3416_3: avidūre otaritvā “senāsanaṃ karaṇatthāya hatthakammaṃ yācathā”ti rañño santikaṃ aṭṭha
atk-s0510a:3416_4: paccekabuddhe pahiṇiṃsu. Tadā pana rañño vappamaṅgalaṃ ahosi. So “paccekabuddhā kira
atk-s0510a:3416_5: āgatā”ti sutvā nikkhamitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “ajja, bhante, okāso natthi sve
atk-s0510a:3416_6: amhākaṃ vappamaṅgalaṃ, tatiyadivase karissāmā”ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva
atk-s0510a:3417_0: Tasmiṃ samaye jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā kenacideva karaṇīyena bārāṇasiṃ gacchantī
atk-s0510a:3417_1: te paccekabuddhe disvā vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante, avelāya ayyā āgatā”ti pucchi. Te ādito
atk-s0510a:3417_2: paṭṭhāya kathesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā buddhisampannā itthī “sve, bhante, amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3417_3: bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi. “Bahukā mayaṃ, bhaginī”ti. “Kittakā, bhante”ti? “Sahassamattā,
atk-s0510a:3417_4: bhaginī”ti. “Bhante, imasmiṃ no gāme sahassamattā vasimhā, ekeko ekekassa bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3417_5: dassati, bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetha, ahameva vo vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpessāmī”ti āha. Paccekabuddhā adhivāsesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3418_0: Sā gāmaṃ pavisitvā ugghosesi – “ammatātā, ahaṃ sahassamatte paccekabuddhe disvā nimantesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3418_1: ayyānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahatha, yāgubhattādīni sampādethā”ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0510a:3418_2: kārāpetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena
atk-s0510a:3418_3: bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne tasmiṃ gāme sabbā itthiyo ādāya tāhi
atk-s0510a:3418_4: saddhiṃ paccekabuddhe vanditvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhitvā puna gāme ugghosesi
atk-s0510a:3418_5: – “ammatātā, ekekakulato ekekapuriso vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre
atk-s0510a:3418_6: āharitvā ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karotū”ti. Gāmavāsino tassāyeva vacanaṃ sutvā ekeko
atk-s0510a:3418_7: ekekaṃ katvā saddhiṃ rattidivāṭṭhānehi paṇṇasālasahassaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā attano attano
atk-s0510a:3418_8: paṇṇasālāyaṃ upagataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ “ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0510a:3418_9: upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Sā vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle “attano attano paṇṇasālāya
atk-s0510a:3418_10: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā”ti samādapetvā ekekassa sahassa
atk-s0510a:3418_11: sahassamūlaṃ cīvaraṃ dāpesi. Paccekabuddhā vuṭṭhavassā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3418_12: Gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā tato cuto tāvatiṃsadevaloke nibbattitvā gaṇadevatā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3419_0: Te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_1: Pubbe jeṭṭhakapesakāro jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa putto ahosi. Bhariyāpissa ekassa jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa
atk-s0510a:3419_2: dhītā ahosi. Sesānaṃ bhariyāyo sesakuṭumbikānaṃ dhītaro ahesuṃ, tā sabbāpi vayappattā
atk-s0510a:3419_3: parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ tesaṃyeva gehāni agamaṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ vihāre dhammassavane
atk-s0510a:3419_4: saṅghuṭṭhe “satthā dhammaṃ desessatī”ti sutvā te sabbepi kuṭumbikā “dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:3419_5: bhariyāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu. Tesaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ paviṭṭhakkhaṇe vassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0510a:3419_6: Yesaṃ kulūpakā vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi, te tesaṃ pariveṇādīni pavisiṃsu. Te
atk-s0510a:3419_7: pana tathārūpānaṃ natthitāya katthaci pavisituṃ avisahantā vihāramajjheyeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_8: Atha ne jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko āha – “passatha, bho, amhākaṃ vippakāraṃ, kulaputtehi nāma
atk-s0510a:3419_9: ettakena lajjituṃ yutta”nti. “Ayya, kiṃ karomā”ti? “Mayaṃ vissāsikaṭṭhānassa abhāvena
atk-s0510a:3419_10: imaṃ vippakāraṃ pattā, sabbe dhanaṃ saṃharitvā pariveṇaṃ karissāmā”ti. “Sādhu, ayyā”ti
atk-s0510a:3419_11: jeṭṭhako sahassaṃ adāsi. Sesā pañca pañca satāni. Itthiyo aḍḍhateyyāni aḍḍhateyyāni
atk-s0510a:3419_12: satāni. Te taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3419_13: nāma kārāpesuṃ. Navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna
atk-s0510a:3419_14: upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu. Niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3419_15: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3420_0: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā attano paññāya ṭhitā ahaṃ tehi samakaṃ akatvā atirekataraṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_1: katvā “satthāraṃ pūjessāmī”ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_2: gahetvā satthāraṃ anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3420_3: nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne anojapupphavaṇṇaṃyeva me sarīraṃ hotu, anojātveva ca nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_4: hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ akāsi. Te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_5: ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Te imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhako
atk-s0510a:3420_6: kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3420_7: Sesā amaccakulesu nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhakassa bhariyā maddaraṭṭhe sākalanagare rājakule
atk-s0510a:3420_8: nibbatti anojapupphavaṇṇamevassā sarīraṃ ahosi, tena anojātvevassā nāmaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3420_9: sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā anojādevīti pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3421_0: Sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ gehāni
atk-s0510a:3421_1: agamaṃsu. Te sabbepi rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. Yadā hi rājā alaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0510a:3421_2: hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicarati, tadāpi te tatheva vicaranti. Tasmiṃ assena vā rathena
atk-s0510a:3421_3: vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti. Evaṃ te ekato hutvā katānaṃ puññānaṃ balena
atk-s0510a:3421_4: ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. Rañño pana vālo, vālavāhano, puppho, pupphavāhano,
atk-s0510a:3421_5: supattoti pañceva assā honti. Tesu rājā supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ ārohati, itare cattāro
atk-s0510a:3421_6: asse assārohānaṃ sāsanāharaṇatthāya adāsi. Rājā te pātova bhojetvā “gacchatha, bhaṇe,
atk-s0510a:3421_7: dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā uppannabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3421_8: sutvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ ārocethā”ti pesesi. Te catūhi dvārehi nikkhamitvā dve tīṇi
atk-s0510a:3421_9: yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā kiñci sāsanaṃ alabhitvāva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3422_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ āruhitvā amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto kilantarūpe
atk-s0510a:3422_1: pañcasatamatte vāṇijake nagaraṃ pavisante disvā “ime addhānakilantā, addho imesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3422_2: santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī”ti te pakkosāpetvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3422_3: “Atthi, deva, ito vīsatiyojanasatamatthake sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ, tato āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3422_4: “Atthi pana vo dese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna”nti. “Deva, aññaṃ kiñci natthi, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0510a:3422_5: uppanno”ti. Rājā tāvadeva balavapītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0510a:3422_6: muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā pana, “tātā, kiṃ vadethā”ti pucchi. “Buddho, deva, uppanno”ti.
atk-s0510a:3422_7: Rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthavāre “kiṃ vadetha, tātā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0510a:3422_8: “buddho uppanno”ti vutte, “tātā, sukhasāsanasavanāya satasahassaṃ vo dammī”ti vatvā
atk-s0510a:3422_9: “aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi, tātā”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva, dhammo uppanno”ti. Rājā
atk-s0510a:3422_10: tampi sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthavāre “dhammo uppanno”ti
atk-s0510a:3422_11: vutte – “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi, tātā”ti
atk-s0510a:3422_12: pucchi. “Atthi, deva, saṅgho uppanno”ti. Rājā tampi sutvā tatheva tayo vāre vītināmetvā
atk-s0510a:3422_13: catutthavāre “saṅgho uppanno”ti vutte – “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ
atk-s0510a:3422_14: oloketvā, “tātā, kiṃ karissāmā”ti pucchi. “Deva, tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Ahaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3422_15: tātā, ‘buddho uppanno dhammo uppanno saṅgho uppanno’ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi,
atk-s0510a:3422_16: bhagavantaṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi, deva, tumhehi
atk-s0510a:3422_17: saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā”ti. Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijakānaṃ datvā
atk-s0510a:3422_18: “imaṃ anojāya nāma deviyā detha, sā tumhākaṃ tīṇi satasahassāni dassati, evañca pana
atk-s0510a:3422_19: naṃ vadeyyātha ‘raññā kira te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ sampattiṃ paribhuñjāhī’ti,
atk-s0510a:3422_20: sace pana ‘vo rājā kaha’nti pucchati, ‘satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī’ti vatvā gatoti
atk-s0510a:3422_21: āroceyyāthā”ti āha. Amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3422_22: Rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃkhaṇaññeva nikkhami.
atk-s0510a:3423_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3423_1: “ayaṃ mahākappino vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3423_2: vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivuto maṃ uddissa
atk-s0510a:3423_3: pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati, so saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0510a:3423_4: paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī”ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3423_5: paccuggacchanto sayameva pattacīvaramādāya vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya
atk-s0510a:3423_6: nadiyā tīre nigrodharukkhamūle chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi. Rājāpi
atk-s0510a:3423_7: āgacchanto ekaṃ nadiṃ patvā “kā nāmāya”nti pucchi. “Aparacchā nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā
atk-s0510a:3423_8: parimāṇaṃ, tātā”ti? “Gambhīrato gāvutaṃ, puthulato dve gāvutāni, devā”ti. “Atthi
atk-s0510a:3423_9: panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo vā”ti? “Natthi, devā”ti. “Nāvādīni olokente amhe jāti jaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3423_10: upaneti, jarā maraṇaṃ. Ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto, tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3423_11: me ānubhāvena ‘idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū’ti ratanattayassa guṇaṃ āvajjetvā
atk-s0510a:3423_12: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”’ti buddhaguṇaṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena
atk-s0510a:3423_13: udakapiṭṭhe pakkhandi. Sindhavā piṭṭhipāsāṇe viya pakkhandiṃsu. Khurānaṃ aggaṭṭhāneva temiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3424_0: So taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi. “Nīlavāhā
atk-s0510a:3424_1: nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā parimāṇa”nti? “Gambhīratopi puthulatopi aḍḍhayojanaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3424_2: Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti dhammānussatiṃ
atk-s0510a:3424_3: anussaranto pakkhandi. Tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā
atk-s0510a:3424_4: nāmā”ti pucchi. “Candabhāgā nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā parimāṇa”nti? “Gambhīratopi puthulatopi
atk-s0510a:3424_5: yojanaṃ, devā”ti. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “suppaṭipanno bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3424_6: sāvakasaṅgho”ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi. Tampi nadiṃ atikkamitvā gacchanto
atk-s0510a:3424_7: satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo nigrodharukkhassa sākhāviṭapapalāsāni
atk-s0510a:3424_8: obhāsayamānā disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ obhāso neva candassa, na sūriyassa, na devamārabrāhmaṇasupaṇṇanāgānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3424_9: aññatarassa, addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto sammāsambuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3424_10: So tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro rasmiyānusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:3424_11: manosilārase nimujjanto viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto pāvisi. So satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3424_12: nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena. Satthā tesaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0510a:3425_0: Atha sabbe uṭṭhahitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā “āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3425_2: adaṃsu, kassapabuddhakāle vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ vīsaticīvarasahassānipi adaṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3425_3: anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana”nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:3425_4: pasāretvā “etha, bhikkhavo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti
atk-s0510a:3425_5: āha. Te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0510a:3426_0: Te pana vāṇijakā rājagehaṃ gantvā deviyā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ ārocetvā deviyā “āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0510a:3426_1: vutte pavisitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne devī pucchi – “tātā, kiṃkāraṇā āgatatthā”ti?
atk-s0510a:3426_2: “Mayaṃ raññā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesitā, tīṇi kira no satasahassāni dethā”ti. “Bahuṃ,
atk-s0510a:3426_3: bhaṇe, bhaṇatha, kiṃ tumhehi rañño santike kataṃ, kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3426_4: dhanaṃ dāpetī”ti? “Devi, na aññaṃ kiñci kataṃ, ekaṃ pana sāsanaṃ ārocayimhā”ti. “Sakkā
atk-s0510a:3426_5: pana, tātā, mayhampi taṃ ārocetu”nti. “Sakkā, devī”ti suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā
atk-s0510a:3426_6: “devi, buddho loke uppanno”ti. Sāpi taṃ sutvā pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci
atk-s0510a:3426_7: asallakkhetvā catutthavāre “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā “kiṃ, tātā, imasmiṃ pade raññā
atk-s0510a:3426_8: dinna”nti? “Satasahassaṃ, devī”ti. “Tātā, ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3426_9: sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassadadamānena, ahaṃ vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre tīṇi satasahassāni
atk-s0510a:3426_10: dammi. Aparaṃ kiñci tumhehi ārocita”nti? Te idañca idañcāti itarānipi dve sāsanāni
atk-s0510a:3426_11: ārocesuṃ. Devī purimanayeneva tayo tayo vāre asallakkhetvā catutthacatutthavāre tīṇi
atk-s0510a:3426_12: tīṇi satasahassāni adāsi. Evaṃ te sabbāni dvādasasatasahassāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3427_0: Atha ne devī pucchi – “rājā kahaṃ, tātā”ti? “Devi, rājā ‘satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī’ti
atk-s0510a:3427_1: vatvā gato”ti. “Mayhaṃ tena kiṃ sāsanaṃ dinna”nti? “Sabbaṃ kira issariyaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_2: vissaṭṭhaṃ, ‘tumhe kira yathāsukhaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavathā”’ti. “Amaccā pana kuhiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3427_3: tātā”ti? “Tepi raññā saddhiṃ ‘pabbajissāmā’ti gatā, devī”ti. Sā tesaṃ bhariyāyo pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0510a:3427_4: “ammā, tumhākaṃ sāmikā raññā saddhiṃ ‘pabbajissāmā’ti gatā, tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti?
atk-s0510a:3427_5: “Kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī”ti? “Tehi kira attano sampatti tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_6: vissaṭṭhā ‘tumhe kira sampattiṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā”’ti. “Tumhe pana, devi,
atk-s0510a:3427_7: kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Amhākaṃ so tāva rājā magge ṭhito tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni
atk-s0510a:3427_8: pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto, mayāpi tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_9: ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tāni navahi satasahassehi pūjitāni, na kho panesā sampatti
atk-s0510a:3427_10: nāma raññoyeva dukkhā, mayhampi dukkhā eva. Ko raññā chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jaṇṇukehi
atk-s0510a:3427_11: bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati, na mayhaṃ sampattiyā attho, satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_12: uddissa pabbajissāmī”ti. “Devi, mayampi tumhehi saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā”ti. “Sace sakkotha,
atk-s0510a:3427_13: sādhū”ti. “Sakkoma, devī”ti. Tena hi “ethā”ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha
atk-s0510a:3427_14: tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā paṭhamaṃ pucchitā,
atk-s0510a:3427_15: tatheva pucchitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “raññā gatamaggaṃ olokethā”ti vatvā “sindhavānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_16: padavalañjaṃ na passāmā”ti vutte rājā “tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhantosmī”ti saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_17: karitvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇe anussaritvā gato bhavissati, ahampi tīṇi ratanāni uddissa
atk-s0510a:3427_18: nikkhantā, tesaṃ me ānubhāvena “idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_19: guṇe anussarantī rathasahassaṃ pesesi. Udakaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇasadisaṃ ahosi, cakkānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_20: aggaṭṭhāneva temiṃsu. Eteneva upāyena itarā dvepi nadiyo uttariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3428_0: Satthā tāsaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā tā attano santike nisinne sāmike bhikkhū na
atk-s0510a:3428_1: passanti, tathā adhiṭṭhāsi. Devīpi āgacchantī satthu sarīrato nikkhantā rasmiyo disvā
atk-s0510a:3428_2: tatheva cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3428_3: mahākappino rājā tumhe uddissa nikkhamitvā gato, kahaṃ nu kho so, amhākaṃ taṃ dassethā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3428_4: “Nisīdatha tāva, idheva naṃ passissathā”ti. Tā sabbāpi haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “idheva kira
atk-s0510a:3428_5: nisinnā sāmike no passissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu. Satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Anojādevī
atk-s0510a:3428_6: desanāpariyosāne tāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Mahākappino thero tāsaṃ desiyamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3428_7: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0510a:3428_8: satthā tāsaṃ te bhikkhū dassesi. Tāsañhi āgatakkhaṇeyeva attano sāmike kāsāvadhare
atk-s0510a:3428_9: muṇḍasīse disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na bhaveyya, maggaphalaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkā na bhaveyya.
atk-s0510a:3428_10: Tasmā acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatte dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3428_11: Tāpi te disvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappatta”nti
atk-s0510a:3428_12: vatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3429_0: Evaṃ vutte satthā uppalavaṇṇāya theriyā āgamanaṃ cintesi. Sā satthu cintitakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0510a:3429_1: ākāsenāgantvā tā sabbā itthiyo gahetvā ākāsena bhikkhunupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0510a:3429_2: Tā sabbā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya ākāsena jetavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3429_3: agamāsi. Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino rattiṭṭhānādīsu “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti
atk-s0510a:3429_4: udānaṃ udānento vicarati. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ – “bhante, mahākappino ‘aho
atk-s0510a:3429_5: sukhaṃ, aho sukha’nti udānaṃ udānento vicarati, attano rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udāneti
atk-s0510a:3429_6: maññe”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina, kāmasukhaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0510a:3429_7: udānaṃ udānesī”ti? “Bhagavā me, bhante, taṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā aññaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0510a:3429_8: udānabhāvaṃ vā jānātī”ti. Atha satthā – “na, bhikkhave, mama putto kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3429_9: ārabbha udānaṃ udāneti, puttassa pana me dhammaṃ carato dhammapīti nāma uppajjati,
atk-s0510a:3429_10: so amatamahānibbānaṃ ārabbha evaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0510a:3432_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā bhikkhū āmantesi – “kacci, bhikkhave, kappino bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3432_1: desetī”ti? “Appossukko, bhante, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharati, ovādamattampi
atk-s0510a:3432_2: na detī”ti. Satthā theraṃ pakkosāpetvā – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina, antevāsikānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3432_3: ovādamattampi na desī”ti? “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. “Brāhmaṇa, mā evaṃ akāsi, ajja paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:3432_4: upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desehī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero bhagavato vacanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3432_5: sirasā sampaṭicchitvā ekovādeneva samaṇasahassaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena naṃ
atk-s0510a:3432_6: satthā paṭipāṭiyā attano sāvake ṭhānantare ṭhapento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3433_0: 66. Evaṃ thero pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3433_1: pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Udito ajaṭākāseti sakalākāse udito uṭṭhito
atk-s0510a:3433_2: pākaṭabhūto. Saradambare saradakāle ākāse ravīva sūriyo ivāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3434: 70. Akkhadasso tadā āsinti tasmiṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sāradassī hitadassī ācariyo pākaṭo ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3435_0: 71. Sāvakassa katāvinoti tassa bhagavato me manaṃ mama cittaṃ, tappayantassa tosayantassa
atk-s0510a:3435_1: sāvakassa ovādakassa guṇaṃ pakāsayato aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentassa katāvino sātaccakiccayuttassa
atk-s0510a:3436: 73. Haṃsasamabhāgoti haṃsasadisagāmi. Haṃsadundubhinissanoti haṃsaravo dundubhibherisaddasadisavacano “etaṃ mahāmattaṃ passatha, bhikkhavo”ti āhāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3437_0: 74. Samuggatatanūruhanti suṭṭhu uggatalomaṃ uddhaggalomaṃ, udagyamanaṃ vā. Jīmūtavaṇṇanti
atk-s0510a:3437_1: muttaphalasamānavaṇṇaṃ sundarasarīrapabhanti attho. Pīṇaṃsanti paripuṇṇaṃ aṃsaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3438: 75. Katāvinoti katādhikārassa etadagge ṭhitassa bhikkhuno ṭhānaṃ so eso muditāya pahaṭṭhacittatāya patthetīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3439_0: 81. Sataso anusāsiyāti dhammena samena vacanena kāraṇavasena anusāsitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3439_1: Bārāṇasiyamāsanneti bārāṇasiyā samīpe pesakāragāme. Jāto keniyajātiyanti tantavāyajātiyā
atk-s0510a:3442_0: Catutthāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato dabbamallaputtattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3442_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3442_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā jāto vibhavasampanno
atk-s0510a:3442_3: ahosi, satthari pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3442_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0510a:3442_5: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattāhaccayena bhagavato pādamūle nipatitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:3442_6: Bhagavāpissa samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā byākāsi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:3442_7: tusitādīsu devesu dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto vipassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:3442_8: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto asappurisasaṃsaggena tassa sāvakaṃ bhikkhuṃ arahāti jānantopi
atk-s0510a:3442_9: abbhūtena abbhācikkhi. Tasseva sāvakānaṃ khīrasalākabhattaṃ adāsi. So yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:3442_10: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3442_11: kāle kulagehe nibbatto osānakāle sāsane pabbajito parinibbute bhagavati sakalaloke
atk-s0510a:3442_12: kolāhale jāte satta bhikkhavo pabbajito paccantajanapade vanamajjhe ekaṃ pabbataṃ
atk-s0510a:3442_13: abhiruhitvā “jīvitāsā orohantu nirālayā nisīdantū”ti nisseṇiṃ pātesuṃ. Tesaṃ ovādadāyako
atk-s0510a:3442_14: jeṭṭhakatthero satthāhabbhantare arahā ahosi. Tadanantaratthero anāgāmī, itare pañca
atk-s0510a:3442_15: parisuddhasīlā tato cutā devaloke nibbattā. Tattha ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3442_16: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pukkusāti, sabhiyo, bāhiyo, kumārakassapoti ime cattāro
atk-s0510a:3442_17: tattha tattha nibbattiṃsu. Ayaṃ pana mallaraṭṭhe anupiyanagare nibbatti. Tasmiṃ mātukucchito
atk-s0510a:3442_18: anikkhanteyeva mātā kālamakāsi, atheko tassā sarīraṃ jhāpanatthāya citakasmiṃ āropetvā
atk-s0510a:3442_19: kumāraṃ dabbantare patitaṃ gahetvā jaggāpesi. Dabbe patitattā dabbo mallaputtoti
atk-s0510a:3442_20: pākaṭo ahosi. Aparabhāge pubbasambhāravasena pabbaji, so kammaṭṭhānamanuyutto nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:3443_0: Atha naṃ satthā majjhattabhāvena ānubhāvasampannabhāvena ca bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3443_1: paññāpane bhattuddesane ca niyojesi. Sabbo ca bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ samannesi. Taṃ vinayakhandhake
atk-s0510a:3443_2: āgatameva. Aparabhāge thero ekassa varasalākadāyakassa salākabhattaṃ mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3443_3: bhikkhūnaṃ uddisi. Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “sve mayhaṃ muggaghatamadhumissakabhattaṃ bhuñjissāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:3443_4: ussāhajātā ahesuṃ. So pana upāsako tesaṃ vārappattabhāvaṃ sutvā dāsiṃ āṇāpesi – “ye,
atk-s0510a:3443_5: je, bhikkhū sve idha āgamissanti, te kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisāhī”ti. Sāpi
atk-s0510a:3443_6: tatheva te bhikkhū āgate koṭṭhakapamukhe nisīdāpetvā bhojesi. Te bhikkhū anattamanā
atk-s0510a:3443_7: kopena taṭataṭāyantā there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “madhurabhattadāyakaṃ amhākaṃ amadhurabhattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3443_8: dāpetuṃ esova niyojesī”ti dukkhī dummanā nisīdiṃsu. Atha te mettiyā nāma bhikkhunī
atk-s0510a:3443_9: “kiṃ, bhante, dummanā”ti pucchi. Te, “bhagini, kiṃ amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne
atk-s0510a:3443_10: ajjhupekkhasī”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ, bhante, mayā sakkā kātu”nti? “Tassa dosaṃ āropehī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3443_11: Sā tattha tattha therassa abhūtāropanaṃ akāsi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3443_12: Atha bhagavā dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, dabba, mettiyāya
atk-s0510a:3443_13: bhikkhuniyā vippakāramakāsī”ti pucchi. “Yathā maṃ, bhante, bhagavā jānātī”ti. “Na
atk-s0510a:3443_14: kho, dabba, dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhenti, kārakabhāvaṃ vā akārakabhāvaṃ vā vadehī”ti. “Akārako
atk-s0510a:3443_15: ahaṃ, bhante”ti. Bhagavā – “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsetvā te bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti
atk-s0510a:3443_16: āha. Upālittherappamukhā bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuniṃ uppabbājetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū
atk-s0510a:3443_17: anuyuñjitvā tehi “amhehi niyojitā sā bhikkhunī”ti vutte bhagavato ekamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3444_0: Tena ca samayena dabbatthero bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paññāpento veḷuvanavihārassa sāmantā
atk-s0510a:3444_1: aṭṭhārasamahāvihāre sabhāge bhikkhū pesento rattibhāge andhakāre aṅguliyā padīpaṃ
atk-s0510a:3444_2: jāletvā tenevālokena aniddhimante bhikkhū pesesi. Evaṃ therassa senāsanapaññāpanabhattuddesanakicce
atk-s0510a:3444_3: pākaṭe jāte satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe dabbattheraṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0510a:3444_4: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ yadidaṃ dabbo mallaputto”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3445_0: 108. Thero attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3445_1: padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0510a:3445_2: vipassī nāma nāyako loke uppajjīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3446_0: 125. Duṭṭhacittoti dūsitacitto asādhusaṅgamena apasannacittoti attho. Upavadiṃ sāvakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3446_1: tassāti tassa bhagavato khīṇāsavaṃ sāvakaṃ upavadiṃ, upari abhūtaṃ vacanaṃ āropesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3447_0: 132. Dundubhiyoti dunduṃ iti saddāyanato dundubhisaṅkhātā bheriyo. Nādayiṃsūti saddaṃ
atk-s0510a:3447_1: kariṃsu. Samantato asaniyoti sabbadisābhāgato asane vināsane niyuttoti asaniyo, devadaṇḍā
atk-s0510a:3448: 133. Ukkā patiṃsu nabhasāti ākāsato aggikkhandhā ca patiṃsūti attho. Dhūmaketu ca dissatīti dhūmarājisahito aggikkhandho ca dissati paññāyatīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3451_0: Pañcamāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3451_1: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:3451_2: satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3451_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3451_4: karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3451_5: kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto tassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3451_6: katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto dibbasukhaṃ mānusasukhañca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3451_7: rājagahe ekissā seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi nibbatto. Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā
atk-s0510a:3451_8: mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā patikulaṃ gantvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā taṃ ajānitvā
atk-s0510a:3451_9: “sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpessāmī”ti cintesi. Sā sāmikaṃ ārādhentī, ayyaputta –
atk-s0510a:3453: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe nivāraye”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3454: Ādinā sarīrassa dosaṃ dassentī taṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0510a:3455_0: Sā sāmikena anuññātā gabbhinibhāvaṃ ajānantī devadattapakkhiyāsu bhikkhunīsu pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:3455_1: Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu. So “assamaṇī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:3455_2: Sā “nāhaṃ devadattaṃ uddissa pabbajitā, bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitā”ti bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3455_3: santikaṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ pucchi. Satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi. Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni
atk-s0510a:3455_4: kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya taṃ vinicchinanto “pure
atk-s0510a:3455_5: laddho gabbho, arogā pabbajjā”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā satthā “sādhu suvinicchitaṃ upālinā
atk-s0510a:3456_0: Sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Taṃ rājā pasenadi kosalo “dārakapariharaṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3456_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ palibodho”ti dhātīnaṃ dāpetvā posāpesi, kassapotissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3456_2: Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Kumārakāle pabbajitattā pana
atk-s0510a:3456_3: bhagavatā “kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti
atk-s0510a:3457_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti, buddhavacanañca uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0510a:3457_1: Atha tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbattamahābrahmā
atk-s0510a:3457_2: “vipassanāya mukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphaluppattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti pañcadasapañhe
atk-s0510a:3457_3: abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa therassa “ime pañhe satthāraṃ puccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0510a:3457_4: ācikkhi. Tato so te pañhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Bhagavāpissa vissajjesi. Thero bhagavatā
atk-s0510a:3457_5: kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3458_0: 150. So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3458_1: pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayañca uttānatthañca,
atk-s0510a:3458_2: taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṇṇayissāma. Anuttānapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0510a:3459: 169. Āpannasattā me mātāti mayhaṃ mātā garugabbhā gabbhinī pasutāsannagabbhāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3460_0: 173. Vammikasadisaṃ kāyanti sarīraṃ nāma vammikasadisaṃ yathā vammiko ito cito ca
atk-s0510a:3460_1: chiddāvachiddo gharagoḷikaupacikādīnaṃ āsayo, evameva ayaṃ kāyo navachiddo dhuvassavoti
atk-s0510a:3460_2: buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ pakāsitaṃ taṃ sutvā me cittaṃ āsave aggahetvā asesetvā
atk-s0510a:3460_3: kilesato vimucci, arahatte patiṭṭhāsīti attho. Aparabhāge tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3460_4: vicittadhammakathikabhāvaṃ sutvā satthā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato bāhiyassa dārucīriyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3463_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3463_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_3: gantvā vedaṅgesu anavayo ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3463_4: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattukāmo
atk-s0510a:3463_5: sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sattāhassa accayena bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3463_6: pādamūle nipanno “bhagavā, bhante, ito sattame divase yaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_7: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, so viya ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane khippābhiññānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_8: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā anāgataṃsañāṇena oloketvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_9: ñatvā “anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā khippābhiññānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3463_10: byākāsi. So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3463_11: anubhavitvā puna manussesu cakkavattiādisampattiyo anekakappakoṭisatesu anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3463_12: kassapassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto, bhagavati parinibbute pabbajito
atk-s0510a:3463_13: yadā sāsane osakkamāne satta bhikkhū catunnaṃ parisānaṃ ajjhācāraṃ disvā saṃvegappattā
atk-s0510a:3463_14: araññaṃ pavisitvā “yāva sāsanassa antaradhānaṃ na hoti, tāva attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:3463_15: suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ vanditvā tattha araññe ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “jīvitasālayā nivattantu,
atk-s0510a:3463_16: nirālayā imaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhantū”ti nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā sabbe taṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha
atk-s0510a:3463_17: nisseṇiṃ pātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu. Tesu saṅghatthero ekarattātikkamena arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_18: pāpuṇi. So anotattadahe nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto
atk-s0510a:3463_19: piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso, imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjathā”ti. Te āhaṃsu
atk-s0510a:3463_20: – “kiṃ, bhante, amhehi evaṃ katikā katā ‘yo paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, tenābhataṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_21: piṇḍapātaṃ avasesā paribhuñjantū”’ti? “No hetaṃ, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi sace mayampi
atk-s0510a:3463_22: tumhe viya visesaṃ nibbattessāma, sayaṃ āharitvā bhuñjissāmā”ti na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3464_0: Dutiyadivase dutiyatthero anāgāmī hutvā tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā itare nimantesi.
atk-s0510a:3464_1: Te evamāhaṃsu – “kiṃ panāvuso, katikā katā, ‘mahātherena ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā
atk-s0510a:3464_2: anutherena ābhataṃ bhuñjissāmā”’ti? “No hetaṃ, āvuso”ti. “Evaṃ sante tumhe viya mayampi
atk-s0510a:3464_3: visesaṃ nibbattetvā attano attano purisakārena bhuñjituṃ sakkontā bhuñjissāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:3464_4: na icchiṃsu. Tesu arahattappattatthero parinibbāyi, dutiyo anāgāmī brahmaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3464_5: itare pañca visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sussitvā sattame divase kālaṃ katvā devaloke
atk-s0510a:3464_6: nibbattiṃsu. Tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cavitvā manussesu
atk-s0510a:3464_7: nibbattiṃsu. Tesu eko pukkusāti rājā ahosi, eko gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ kumārakassapo,
atk-s0510a:3464_8: eko bāhiyo dārucīriyo, eko dabbo mallaputto, eko sabhiyo paribbājakoti. Tesu ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3464_9: bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārakapaṭṭane vāṇijakule nibbatto vāṇijakamme nipphattiṃ gato
atk-s0510a:3464_10: mahaddhano mahābhogo, so suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gacchantehi vāṇijehi saddhiṃ nāvamāruyha videsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3464_11: gacchanto katipāhaṃ gantvā bhinnāya nāvāya sesesu macchakacchapabhakkhesu jātesu
atk-s0510a:3464_12: ekoyeva avasiṭṭho ekaṃ phalakaṃ gahetvā vāyamanto sattame divase suppārakapaṭṭanatīraṃ
atk-s0510a:3464_13: okkami. Tassa nivāsanapārupanaṃ natthi, so aññaṃ kiñci apassanto sukkhakaṭṭhadaṇḍake
atk-s0510a:3464_14: vākehi paliveṭhetvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca devakulato kapālaṃ gahetvā suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3464_15: agamāsi. Manussā taṃ disvā yāgubhattādīni datvā “ayaṃ eko arahā”ti sambhāvesuṃ. So
atk-s0510a:3464_16: vatthesu upanītesu “sacāhaṃ nivāsemi, pārupāmi vā, lābhasakkāro me parihāyissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3465_0: Athassa “arahā, arahā”ti bahūhi sambhāviyamānassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi
atk-s0510a:3465_1: “ye keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti so
atk-s0510a:3466_0: Kassapadasabalassa sāsane sattasu janesu pabbataṃ āruyha samaṇadhammaṃ karontesu
atk-s0510a:3466_1: eko anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsabrahmaloke nibbattitvā attano brahmasampattiṃ olokento
atk-s0510a:3466_2: āgataṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento pabbatamāruyha samaṇadhammaṃ karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ disvā sesānaṃ nibbattanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_3: āvajjento ekassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ itaresañca pañcannaṃ kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbattabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_4: ñatvā te kālānukālaṃ āvajjesi “imasmiṃ pana kāle kahaṃ nu kho te”ti āvajjento dārucīriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_5: suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ nissāya kuhanakammena jīvitaṃ kappentaṃ disvā “naṭṭho vatāyaṃ bālo,
atk-s0510a:3466_6: pubbe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto atiukkaṭṭhabhāvena arahatāpi ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā
atk-s0510a:3466_7: idāni udarahetu anārahāva samāno arahattaṃ paṭijānitvā lokaṃ vañcento vicarati, dasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3466_8: uppannabhāvaṃ na jānāti, gacchāmi naṃ saṃvejetvā buddhuppādaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti khaṇeneva
atk-s0510a:3466_9: brahmalokato otaritvā suppārakapaṭṭane rattibhāgasamanantare dārucīriyassa sammukhe
atk-s0510a:3466_10: pāturahosi. So attano vasanaṭṭhāne obhāsaṃ disvā bahi nikkhamitvā mahābrahmānaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3466_11: añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ porāṇakasahāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_12: patvā brahmaloke nibbatto, amhākaṃ sabbajeṭṭhako arahā hutvā parinibbuto, tumhe pana
atk-s0510a:3466_13: pañcajanā devaloke nibbattā. Svāhaṃ dāni taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kuhanakammena jīvikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_14: kappentaṃ disvā damituṃ āgato”ti vatvā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āha – “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya,
atk-s0510a:3466_15: arahā nāpi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā
atk-s0510a:3466_16: vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti. Athassa satthu uppannabhāvaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_17: vasanabhāvañca ācikkhitvā “satthu santikaṃ gacchā”ti taṃ uyyojetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3467_0: Bāhiyo pana ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi – “aho bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3467_1: kammaṃ mayā kataṃ, anarahaṃ arahā ahanti cintesiṃ, ayañca maṃ ‘na tvaṃ arahā, nāpi
atk-s0510a:3467_2: arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannāsī’ti vadati, atthi nu kho loke añño arahā”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0510a:3467_3: pucchi – “atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3467_4: Athassa devatā ācikkhi – “atthi, bāhiya, uttaresu janapadesu sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:3467_5: tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. So hi, bāhiya, bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3467_6: arahā ceva arahattāya ca dhammaṃ desesī”ti. Bāhiyo rattibhāge devatāya kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3467_7: saṃviggamānaso taṃkhaṇaṃyeva suppārakā nikkhamitvā ekarattivāsena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0510a:3467_8: gacchanto ca pana devatānubhāvena buddhānubhāvena ca vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:3467_9: sāvatthiṃ anuppatto, tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti. So jetavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3467_10: pavisitvā abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū pucchi – “kuhiṃ etarahi satthā”ti?
atk-s0510a:3467_11: Bhikkhū “sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā “tvaṃ pana kuto āgatosī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3467_13: “Dūratopi āgato, nisīda tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi, āgatakāle
atk-s0510a:3467_14: satthāraṃ dakkhissatī”ti āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ, bhante, satthu vā attano vā jīvitantarāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3467_15: na jānāmi, katthaci aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā ekaratteneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0510a:3467_16: satthāraṃ passitvāva vissamissāmī”ti āha. So evaṃ vatvā taramānarūpo sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:3467_17: bhagavantaṃ anopamāya buddhasiriyā carantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ vata me gotamo sammāsambuddho
atk-s0510a:3467_18: diṭṭho”ti diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatasarīro gantvā antaravīthiyaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0510a:3467_19: vanditvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā evamāha – “desetu, bhante bhagavā, dhammaṃ, desetu
atk-s0510a:3467_20: sugato dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “akālo
atk-s0510a:3467_21: kho tāva, bāhiya, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyā”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0510a:3468_0: Taṃ sutvā bāhiyo, “bhante, saṃsāre saṃsarantena kabaḷīkārāhāro na aladdhapubbo, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3468_1: vā mayhaṃ vā jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi, desetu me, bhante bhagavā, dhammaṃ, desetu
atk-s0510a:3468_2: sugato dhamma”nti puna yāci. Satthā dutiyampi tatheva paṭikkhipi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
atk-s0510a:3468_3: – “imassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0510a:3468_4: balavapītivego dhammaṃ sutvāpi na sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ, majjhattupekkhāya tāva
atk-s0510a:3468_5: tiṭṭhatu, ekaratteneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgatassapi cassa daratho balavā sopi
atk-s0510a:3468_6: tāva paṭippassambhatū”ti. Tasmā dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyaṃ yācito antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3468_7: ṭhitova “tasmātiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā
atk-s0510a:3468_8: nayena anekapariyāyena dhammaṃ desesi. So satthu dhammaṃ suṇantoyeva sabbāsave khepetvā
atk-s0510a:3469_0: 178. So arahattaṃ pattakkhaṇeyeva pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3469_1: pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva. Anuttānapadavaṇṇanameva karissāma.
atk-s0510a:3470: 181. Hasanaṃ paccavekkhaṇanti paripuṇṇasomanassajātaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ, komāravaṇṇaṃ atikomalanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3471_2: attho. Setatiṇhasamaṃ dijanti sunisitatikhiṇaayalohaghaṃsanena ghaṃsitvā samaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0510a:3472: 183. Pītisamphullitānananti pītiyā suṭṭhu phullitaṃ vikasitaṃ ānanaṃ mukhaṃ ādāsatalasadisamukhavantanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3473: 184. Khippābhiññassa bhikkhunoti khippaṃ desanāya samugghāṭitakkhaṇeyeva abhivisesena ñātuṃ samatthassa bhikkhunoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3474: 186. Saggaṃ agaṃ sabhavanaṃ yathāti attano gehaṃ viya saggaṃ lokaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3475: 196. Na tvaṃ upāyamaggaññūti tvaṃ nibbānādhigamūpāyabhūtamaggaññū na ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3476_0: 200. Satthuno sadā jinanti sadā sabbakālaṃ jinaṃ jinanto parājitakopo satthuno sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0510a:3476_1: vimalānanaṃ ādāsatalasadisamukhaṃ passissāmi passituṃ nikkhamāmīti yojanā. Dije apucchiṃ
atk-s0510a:3476_2: kuhiṃ lokanandanoti kuhiṃ ṭhāne lokapasādakaro satthāti dije brāhmaṇe ahaṃ bhikkhū apucchinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3477: 201. Sasova khippaṃ munidassanussukoti munidassane tathāgatadassane ussuko ussāhajāto saso iva khippaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3478: 202. Tuvaṭaṃ gantvāti sīghaṃ gantvā. Piṇḍatthaṃ apihāgidhanti piṇḍapātaṃ paṭicca apihaṃ apagatapihaṃ agidhaṃ nittaṇhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3479_0: 203. Alolakkhanti ito cito ca anolokayamānaṃ uttame sāvatthinagare piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3479_1: adakkhinti sambandho. Sirīnilayasaṅkāsanti siriyā lakkhaṇānubyañjanasobhāya nilayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3480: 204. Kupathe vippanaṭṭhassāti kucchitapathe sopaddavamagge mūḷhassa micchāpaṭipannassa me saraṇaṃ hohi patiṭṭhā hohi. Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati.
atk-s0510a:3481_0: 218. Na tattha sukkā jotantīti sukkapabhāsampannā jotamānaosadhitārakādayo na jotanti
atk-s0510a:3481_1: nappabhāsanti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. So evaṃ pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsetvā tāvadeva
atk-s0510a:3481_2: ca bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. “Paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvara”nti ca puṭṭho “na paripuṇṇa”nti
atk-s0510a:3481_3: āha. Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. So kira vīsativassasahassāni
atk-s0510a:3481_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto “bhikkhunā nāma attanā paccaye labhitvā aññaṃ anoloketvā sayameva
atk-s0510a:3481_5: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā ekabhikkhussāpi pattena vā cīvarena vā saṅgahaṃ nākāsi,
atk-s0510a:3481_6: “na tenassa iddhimayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ uppajjissatī”ti ñatvā bhagavā ehibhikkhubhāvena
atk-s0510a:3481_7: pabbajjaṃ nādāsi. Tampi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesamānameva saṅkāraṭṭhānato coḷakkhaṇḍāni
atk-s0510a:3481_8: saṃkaḍḍhentaṃ pubbaveriko amanusso ekissā taruṇavacchāya gāviyā sarīre adhimuccitvā
atk-s0510a:3481_9: vāmaūrumhi paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco
atk-s0510a:3481_10: sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nikkhamanto bāhiyassa sarīraṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3481_11: disvā “gaṇhatha, bhikkhave, etaṃ bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyanti ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ṭhatvā mañcakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3481_12: āharāpetvā imaṃ sarīraṃ nagaradvārato nīharitvā jhāpetvā dhātuyo gahetvā thūpaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhū āṇāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3482_0: Te bhikkhū dhātuṃ mahāpathe thūpaṃ kāretvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano katakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3482_1: ārocesuṃ. Tato saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi – “tathāgato bhikkhusaṅghena sarīrajhāpanakiccaṃ
atk-s0510a:3482_2: kāresi, dhātuyo ca gāhāpetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpesi, kataramaggo nu kho tena samadhigato,
atk-s0510a:3482_3: sāmaṇero nu kho so, bhikkhu nu kho”ti. Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0510a:3482_4: bhikkhave, bāhiyo dārucīriyo arahatto”ti upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍheti. Tassa parinibbutabhāvañca
atk-s0510a:3482_5: ācikkhitvā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0510a:3483_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū pucchiṃsu – “tumhe, bhante, ‘bāhiyo dārucīriyo arahattaṃ patto’ti
atk-s0510a:3483_1: vadetha, kadā so arahattaṃ patto”ti? “Mama dhammaṃ sutakāle, bhikkhave”ti. “Kadā
atk-s0510a:3483_2: panassa, bhante, tumhehi dhammo kathito”ti? “Bhikkhāya carantena antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitenā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3483_3: “Appamattako, bhante, tumhehi antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā kathitadhammo; kathaṃ so tāvattakena
atk-s0510a:3483_4: visesaṃ nibbattesī”ti? Atha ne satthā, “bhikkhave, mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ’ vā ‘bahuṃ
atk-s0510a:3483_5: vā’ti mā cintayittha. Anekānipi hi anatthapadasaṃhitāni gāthāsahassāni na seyyo,
atk-s0510a:3483_6: atthanissitaṃ pana ekampi gāthāpadaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0510a:3485: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3489_0: Sattamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato mahākoṭṭhikattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3489_1: Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni
