atk-s0510a:3489_2: puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3489_3: viññutaṃ patto mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_5: yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho, tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā
atk-s0510a:3489_6: tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_7: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo, yaṃnūnāhampi
atk-s0510a:3489_8: ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ viya paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:3489_9: satthu desanāpariyosāne vuṭṭhitāya parisāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, sve
atk-s0510a:3489_10: mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi. Satthā adhivāsesi. So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0510a:3489_11: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ buddhassa ca bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3489_12: ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ gandhamālādīhi alaṅkaritvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā
atk-s0510a:3489_13: rattiyā accayena sakanivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivāraṃ satthāraṃ vividhayāgukhajjakaparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_15: kho ahaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthemi, na pana yuttaṃ mayā ekadivasameva dānaṃ datvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_16: ṭhānantaraṃ patthetuṃ, anupaṭipāṭiyā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā patthessāmī”ti. So teneva
atk-s0510a:3489_17: niyāmena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā
atk-s0510a:3489_18: uttamaṃ ticīvarappahonakaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0510a:3489_19: ca ticīvaraṃ datvā tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattame
atk-s0510a:3489_20: divasamatthake paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate
atk-s0510a:3489_21: uppajjanakassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0510a:3489_22: satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “anāgate
atk-s0510a:3489_23: ito kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tava
atk-s0510a:3489_24: patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:3490_0: Evaṃ so devamanussesu saṃsaranto tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāre sambharanto
atk-s0510a:3490_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, koṭṭhikotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_2: akaṃsu. Kasmā mātuyā vā ayyakapayyakādīnaṃ vā nāmaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ nāmaṃ kariṃsūti
atk-s0510a:3490_3: ce? Attano paññavantatāya vedaṅgesu satakkaparatakkesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu sākkharappabhedesu
atk-s0510a:3490_4: sakalabyākaraṇesu ca chekabhāvena ca diṭṭhadiṭṭhe jane mukhasattīhi koṭṭhento pakkoṭṭhento
atk-s0510a:3490_5: vitudanto vicaratīti anvatthanāmaṃ kariṃsūti veditabbaṃ. So vayappatto tayo vede
atk-s0510a:3490_6: uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_7: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:3490_8: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhīto mahāthere
atk-s0510a:3490_9: upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_10: pucchi. Evamayaṃ thero tattha katādhikāratāya tattha ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_11: aggo jāto. Atha naṃ satthā mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_12: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3491_0: 221. So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3491_1: pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:3492: Itthaṃ sudamāyasmā mahākoṭṭhikoti ettha sudanti nidassane nipāto. Āyasmāti gāravādhivacanaṃ, yathā taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānoti.
atk-s0510a:3495_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato uruvelakassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3495_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3495_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto satthu santike
atk-s0510a:3495_3: dhammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparivārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3495_4: sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā cassa
atk-s0510a:3495_5: anantarāyataṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparivārānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3495_6: byākāsi. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3495_7: ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussassa bhagavato vemātikakaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3495_8: aññepissa dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro ahesuṃ. Te tayo buddhappamukhabhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0510a:3495_9: paramāya pūjāya pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_10: bhagavato uppattito puretarameva bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule tayo bhātaro hutvā nibbattā
atk-s0510a:3495_11: gottavasena tayopi kassapāti evaṃ nāmakā ahesuṃ. Te tayo vayappattā tayo vede uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3495_12: Tesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa pañcamāṇavakasatāni parivārā, majjhimassa tīṇi, kaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0510a:3495_13: dve, te attano ganthesu sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva atthaṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_14: rocesuṃ. Tesu jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_15: pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma jāto, majjhimo gaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito nadīkassapo
atk-s0510a:3495_16: nāma jāto, kaniṭṭho gayāsīse pabbajito gayākassapo nāma jāto. Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_17: pabbajitvā tattha tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto
atk-s0510a:3495_19: pavattetvā pañcavaggiyatthere arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasakulaputtappamukhe pañcapaññāsajane
atk-s0510a:3495_20: sahāyake vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha, bhikkhave, cārika”nti vissajjetvā tiṃsabhaddavaggiye
atk-s0510a:3495_21: vinetvā uruvelakassapassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tattha
atk-s0510a:3495_22: gatanāgadamanādīhi aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ saparivāraṃ vinetvā
atk-s0510a:3495_23: pabbājesi. Tassa pabbajjāvidhānañca iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇañca sabbaṃ nadīkassapassa
atk-s0510a:3495_24: apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā itarepi dve bhātaro
atk-s0510a:3495_25: saparisā āgantvā satthu santike pabbajiṃsu. Sabbeva te iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0510a:3495_26: ehibhikkhukā ahesuṃ. Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe
atk-s0510a:3495_27: nisinno ādittapariyāyadesanāya te sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3496: 251. So evaṃ arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Anuttānapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0510a:3497_0: 268. So ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvāti so phusso bhagavā rāgadosamohādikilesandhakāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3497_1: viddhaṃsetvā. Vijaṭetvā mahājaṭanti taṇhāmānādīhi diyaḍḍhasahassehi kilesagaṇehi
atk-s0510a:3497_2: mahābyākulaṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā padāletvā phāletvāti attho. Sadevakaṃ devalokasahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3497_3: sakalaṃ lokasannivāsaṃtappayanto santappayanto pīṇento amataṃ vuṭṭhiṃ mahānibbānavuṭṭhidhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3498_0: 269. Tadā hi bārāṇasiyanti “bārasa manussā”tiādīsu viya bārasa dvādasarāsī hutvā
atk-s0510a:3498_1: purā, himavantato isayo ca paccekamunisaṅkhātā isayo ca gandhamādanato ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0510a:3498_2: ettha gacchanti otaranti pavisantīti bārāṇasī, atha vā sammāsambuddhasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3498_4: katvā itthiliṅgavasena bārāṇasīti vuccati, tissaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3499_1: nibbisevanaṃ katvā punarupaccatanti punarapi taṃ nagaraṃ upecca upagamma sampattāti
atk-s0510a:3502: 296. Navamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato rādhattherassa apadānaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ pāṭhānusārena nayānucintanena viññūhi suviññeyyameva. Kevalaṃ puññanānattamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3508_0: Pañcapaññāsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherassa
atk-s0510a:3508_1: apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni
atk-s0510a:3508_2: puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3508_3: viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mañjussarānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3508_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3508_5: sappisakkharādimadhurarasasammissaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā “ahampi, bhante, anāgate ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3508_6: bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3508_7: Bhagavā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3509_0: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3509_1: phussabhagavato kāle citrakokilo hutvā nibbatto rājuyyānato madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍenādāya
atk-s0510a:3509_2: gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso “dassāmi buddhassā”ti cittaṃ uppādesi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:3509_3: tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdi. Kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ
atk-s0510a:3509_4: ṭhapesi. Satthā tassa somanassuppādanatthaṃ tassa passantasseva taṃ paribhuñji. Atha
atk-s0510a:3509_5: so kokilo pasannamānaso teneva pītisukhena sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. Teneva puññakammena
atk-s0510a:3509_6: uppannuppannabhave mañjussaro ahosi. Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle vaḍḍhakikule nibbattetvā
atk-s0510a:3509_7: jeṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī hutvā pākaṭo ahosi. Parinibbute bhagavati tassa sarīradhātuyo nidahituṃ
atk-s0510a:3509_8: sattayojanappamāṇe thūpe āraddhe so āha – “yojanāvaṭṭaṃ yojanubbedhaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3509_9: Te sabbe tassa vacane aṭṭhaṃsu. Iti appamāṇassa buddhassa orappamāṇaṃ cetiyaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0510a:3509_10: tena kammena nibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi hīnappamāṇo ahosi. So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0510a:3509_11: nibbattitvā atirassatāya ca suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sundarasarīratāya ca lakuṇḍakabhaddiyoti
atk-s0510a:3509_12: paññāyittha. So aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3509_13: bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā madhurena sarena paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:3510_0: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase ekena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ rathena gacchantī ekā gaṇikā theraṃ
atk-s0510a:3510_1: disvā dantavidaṃsakaṃ hasi. Thero tassā dantaṭṭhike nimittaṃ gahetvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0510a:3510_2: taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmī ahosi, so abhiṇhaṃ kāyagatāya satiyā
atk-s0510a:3510_3: viharanto ekadivasaṃ āyasmatā dhammasenāpatinā ovadiyamāno anusāsiyamāno arahatte
atk-s0510a:3510_4: patiṭṭhahi. Ekacce bhikkhū ca sāmaṇerā ca tassa arahattappattabhāvaṃ ajānanto kaṇṇesu
atk-s0510a:3510_5: gahetvā kaḍḍhanti, sīse bāhāya hatthapādādīsu vā gahetvā cāletvā kīḷantā viheṭhesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3510_6: Atha bhagavā sutvā – “mā, bhikkhave, mama puttaṃ viheṭhethā”ti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:3511_0: 12. So arahā hutvā sañjātasomanasso attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro
atk-s0510a:3511_1: nāma jinotiādimāha. Mañjunābhinikūjahanti madhurena pemaniyena sarena abhinikūjiṃ
atk-s0510a:3511_2: saddaṃ nicchāresiṃ ahanti attho. Sesamettha suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3514_0: 34. Dutiyāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato kaṅkhārevatattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3514_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3514_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto, taṃ sabbaṃ pāṭhānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3517_0: Tatiyāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato sīvalittherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3517_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3517_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayena vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:3517_3: parisāya pariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3517_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasabalaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0510a:3517_5: sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhasaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, iminā adhikārakammena
atk-s0510a:3517_6: na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ahampi tumhehi
atk-s0510a:3517_7: so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0510a:3517_8: tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate gotamassa buddhassa santike samijjhissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3517_9: byākaritvā pakkāmi. So kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3517_10: anubhavitvā vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ gāmake nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3517_11: tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3518_0: Ekadivasaṃ sabbe ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānagge natthī”ti olokentā
atk-s0510a:3518_1: madhuñca guḷadadhiñca nāddasaṃsu. Te “yato kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagarapavisanamaggesu
atk-s0510a:3518_2: purise ṭhapesuṃ. Tadā esa kulaputto attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā “kiñcideva
atk-s0510a:3518_3: āharissāmī”ti nagaraṃ gacchanto “mukhaṃ dhovitvā dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3518_4: olokento naṅgalasīsappamāṇaṃ nimmakkhikadaṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti
atk-s0510a:3518_5: gahetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Nāgarehi ṭhapitapuriso taṃ disvā, “mārisa, kassa imaṃ harasī”ti
atk-s0510a:3518_6: pucchi. “Na kassaci, sāmi, vikkāyikaṃ me ida”nti. “Tena hi imaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3519_0: So cintesi – “idaṃ me na bahuṃ agghati, ayañca ekappahāreneva bahuṃ deti, vīmaṃsissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3519_1: Tato naṃ āha – “nāhaṃ ekakahāpaṇena demī”ti. “Yadi evaṃ dve kahāpaṇe gahetvā dehī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3519_2: “Dvīhipi na demī”ti. Etenupāyena vaḍḍhetvā yāva sahassaṃ pāpuṇi, so cintesi – “atiañchituṃ
atk-s0510a:3519_3: na vaṭṭati, hotu tāva iminā kattabbakammaṃ pucchissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ āha – “na idaṃ
atk-s0510a:3519_4: bahuagghanakaṃ, tvaṃ pana bahuṃ desi, kena kammena idaṃ gaṇhasī”ti. “Idha, bho, nagaravāsino
atk-s0510a:3519_5: raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassisammāsambuddhassa dānaṃ dentā idaṃ dvayaṃ dānagge
atk-s0510a:3519_6: apassantā maṃ pariyesāpenti. Sace idaṃ dvayaṃ na labhissanti, nāgarānaṃ parājayo
atk-s0510a:3519_7: bhavissati. Tasmā sahassaṃ datvā gaṇhāmī”ti. “Kiṃ panetaṃ nāgarānaṃ eva vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:3519_8: udāhu aññesampi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Yassa kassaci dātuṃ avāritameta”nti. “Atthi pana
atk-s0510a:3519_9: koci nāgarānaṃ dāne ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātā”ti? “Natthi, sammā”ti. “Imesaṃ me dvinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3519_10: sahassagghanakabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Āma, jānāmī”ti. “Tena hi gaccha, nāgarānaṃ ārocehi
atk-s0510a:3519_11: – ‘eko puriso imāni dve mūlena na deti, tumhehi saddhiṃ sahattheneva dātukāmo, tumhe
atk-s0510a:3519_12: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇā nibbitakkā hothā”ti. “Tvaṃ imasmiṃ dāne jeṭṭhakabhāgassa kāyasakkhī
atk-s0510a:3519_13: hohī”ti vatvā gato. So pana kulaputto gāmato paribbayatthaṃ gahitakahāpaṇena pañcakaṭukaṃ
atk-s0510a:3519_14: gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito kañciyaṃ vāhetvā tattha madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena
atk-s0510a:3519_15: yojetvā paduminipatte pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā ādāya dasabalassa avidūre nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3519_16: Mahājanehi āhariyamānassa sakkārassa antare attano pattavāraṃ olokento okāsaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0510a:3519_17: satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante, ayaṃ me duggatasakkāro, imaṃ me anukampaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0510a:3519_18: paṭiggaṇhathā”ti. Satthā tassānukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājehi dattiyena selamayapattena
atk-s0510a:3519_19: taṃ paṭiggahetvā yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassassa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3520_0: So kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno āha – “diṭṭho
atk-s0510a:3520_1: me, bhante bhagavā, ajja bandhumatīnagaravāsīhi tumhākaṃ sakkāro āhariyamāno, ahampi
atk-s0510a:3520_2: imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti. Satthā
atk-s0510a:3520_3: “evaṃ hotu kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3520_4: So kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3520_5: suppavāsāya rājadhītuyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato
atk-s0510a:3520_6: paṭṭhāya sāyaṃ pātañca pañcapaṇṇākārasatāni suppavāsāya upanīyanti. Athassa sā puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:3520_7: hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpentī aṭṭhāsi. Ekekabījato salākasataṃ salākasahassampi
atk-s0510a:3520_8: niggacchati, ekekakarīsakhettato paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi sakaṭapamāṇāni uppajjanti. Koṭṭhapūraṇakālepissā
atk-s0510a:3520_9: koṭṭhadvāraṃ hatthena phusantiyā rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṃ puna
atk-s0510a:3520_10: pūrati. Paripuṇṇabhattakumbhitopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci dentā
atk-s0510a:3520_11: naṃ yāva na ukkaḍḍhanti, na tāva bhattaṃ khīyati. Dārake kucchigateyeva satta vassāni atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3521_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi. Sā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā – “pure
atk-s0510a:3521_1: maraṇā jīvamānā dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, sāmi, imaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3521_2: satthu ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi, yañca satthā vadati, taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā
atk-s0510a:3521_3: āgantvā mayhaṃ kathehī”ti. So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ satthu ārocesi – “satthu bhante,
atk-s0510a:3521_4: koḷiyadhītā pāde vandatī”ti. Satthā tassā anukampaṃ paṭicca – “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā
atk-s0510a:3521_5: koḷiyadhītā arogā, arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha. So taṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0510a:3521_6: attano gāmābhimukho pāyāsi. Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya kucchito dhammakaraṇato
atk-s0510a:3521_7: udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami, parivāretvā nisinnajano assumukho rodituṃ āraddho haṭṭhatuṭṭhova
atk-s0510a:3521_8: tassā sāmikassa tuṭṭhisāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi. So tesaṃ iṅgitaṃ disvā – “dasabalena
atk-s0510a:3521_9: kathitakathā nipphannā bhavissati maññe”ti cintesi. So āgantvā satthu kathaṃ rājadhītāya
atk-s0510a:3521_10: kathesi. Rājadhītā tayā nimantitaṃ jīvabhattameva maṅgalabhattaṃ bhavissati, gaccha
atk-s0510a:3521_11: sattāhaṃ dasabalaṃ nimantehīti. So tathā akāsi. Sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3521_12: mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu. So dārako ñātīnaṃ santattacittaṃ nibbāpento sītalabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3521_13: kurumāno jātoti, sīvalitveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So satta vassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato
atk-s0510a:3521_14: paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi. Dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero sattame divase tena
atk-s0510a:3521_15: saddhiṃ kathāsallāpamakāsi. Satthāpi imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:3525_0: Atha naṃ thero evamāha – “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ na
atk-s0510a:3525_1: vaṭṭatī”ti? “Labhanto pabbajeyyaṃ, bhante”ti. Suppavāsā taṃ therena saddhiṃ kathentaṃ
atk-s0510a:3525_2: disvā – “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0510a:3525_3: – “mayhaṃ putto tumhehi saddhiṃ kiṃ katheti, bhante”ti? Attanā anubhuttagabbhavāsadukkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3525_4: kathetvā – “tumhehi anuññāto pabbajissāmī”ti vadatīti. “Sādhu bhante, pabbājetha
atk-s0510a:3525_5: na”nti. Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājento, “sīvali,
atk-s0510a:3525_6: tuyhaṃ aññena ovādena kammaṃ natthi, tayā satta vassāni anubhuttadukkhameva paccavekkhāhī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3525_7: “Bhante, pabbajjāyeva tumhākaṃ bhāro, yaṃ pana mayā sakkā kātuṃ, tamahaṃ jānissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3525_8: So pana paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā oropitakkhaṇeyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, dutiyāya
atk-s0510a:3525_9: oropitakkhaṇe sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Sabbesaṃyeva kesānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3525_10: oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apure apacchā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3526_0: Atha bhikkhusaṅghe kathā udapādi – “aho evaṃ puññavāpi thero sattamāsādhikāni satta
atk-s0510a:3526_1: saṃvaccharāni mātugabbhe vasitvā satta divasāni mūḷhagabbhe vasī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0510a:3526_2: – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā – “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0510a:3526_3: vutte – “na, bhikkhave, iminā kulaputtena imāya jātiyā katakamma”nti vatvā atītaṃ
atk-s0510a:3526_4: āharitvā atīte, bhikkhave, buddhuppādato puretarameva esa kulaputto bārāṇasiyaṃ rājakule
atk-s0510a:3526_5: nibbatto, pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya vibhavasampanno pākaṭo ahosi. Tadā eko paccantarājā
atk-s0510a:3526_6: “rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgantvā nagaraṃ uparundhitvā khandhāvāraṃ kāretvā vihāsi. Atha
atk-s0510a:3526_7: rājā mātuyā saddhiṃ samānacchando hutvā sattāhaṃ khandhāvāranagare catūsu disāsu
atk-s0510a:3526_8: dvāraṃ pidhāpesi, nikkhamantānaṃ pavisantānañca dvāramūḷhaṃ ahosi. Atha migadāyavihāre
atk-s0510a:3526_9: paccekabuddhā ugghosesuṃ. Rājā sutvā dvāraṃ vivarāpesīti. Paccantarājāpi palāyi.
atk-s0510a:3526_10: So tena kammavipākena narakādīsu dukkhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājakule
atk-s0510a:3526_11: nibbattopi mātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhamanubhavi. Tassa pana pabbajitakālato
atk-s0510a:3526_12: paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yadicchakaṃ uppajjanti. Evaṃ ettha vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3527_0: Aparabhāge satthā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Thero bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā, “bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3527_1: puññabalaṃ vīmaṃsissāmi, pañcabhikkhusatāni dethā”ti. “Gaṇha, sīvalī”ti. So pañcasate
atk-s0510a:3527_2: bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati. Tassa paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3527_3: diṭṭhanigrodhe adhivatthā devatā satta divasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0510a:3532_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu. Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā
atk-s0510a:3532_1: sattasu divasesu ekadivasaṃ khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, ekadivasaṃ sappipiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3532_2: Atha naṃ bhikkhusaṅgho āha – “āvuso, imassa devarañño neva dhenuyo duyhamānā paññāyanti,
atk-s0510a:3532_3: na dadhinimmathanaṃ, kuto te, devarāja, idaṃ uppajjatī”ti? “Bhante, kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3533_0: Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatattherassa paccuggamanaṃ akāsi. Kathaṃ? Athāyasmā
atk-s0510a:3533_1: sāriputto satthāraṃ āha – “bhante, mayhaṃ kira kaniṭṭhabhātā revato pabbajito, so
atk-s0510a:3533_2: abhirameyya vā na vā, gantvā naṃ passissāmī”ti. Bhagavā revatassa āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3533_3: ñatvā dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre yācito arahattappattabhāvaṃ ñatvā – sāriputta,
atk-s0510a:3533_4: ahampi gamissāmi bhikkhūnaṃ ārocehīti. Thero bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā – “āvuso, satthā
atk-s0510a:3533_5: cārikaṃ caritukāmo, gantukāmā āgacchantū”ti sabbesaṃyeva ārocesi. Dasabalassa cārikatthāya
atk-s0510a:3533_6: gamanakāle ohiyyamānakabhikkhū nāma appakā honti, “satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ passissāma,
atk-s0510a:3533_7: madhuradhammakathaṃ vā suṇissāmā”ti yebhuyyena gantukāmā bahutarāva honti. Iti satthā
atk-s0510a:3534_0: Athekasmiṃ padese ānandatthero dvedhāpathaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi – “bhante, imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3534_1: ṭhāne dvedhāpatho, kataramaggena bhikkhusaṅgho gacchatū”ti? “Kataramaggo, ānanda,
atk-s0510a:3534_2: ujuko”ti? “Bhante, ujumaggo tiṃsayojaniko amanussapatho. Parihāramaggo pana saṭṭhiyojaniko
atk-s0510a:3534_3: khemo subhikkho”ti. “Ānanda, sīvali, amhehi saddhiṃ āgato”ti? “Āma, bhante, āgato”ti.
atk-s0510a:3534_4: “Tena hi saṅgho ujumaggameva gacchatu, sīvalissa puññaṃ vīmaṃsissāmā”ti. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0510a:3535_0: Maggaṃ abhiruhanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya devasaṅgho yojane yojane ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā
atk-s0510a:3535_1: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanatthāya vihāre paṭiyādesi. Devaputtā raññā
atk-s0510a:3535_2: pesitakammakārā viya hutvā yāgukhajjakādīni gahetvā – “kahaṃ, ayyo sīvalī”ti pucchantā
atk-s0510a:3535_3: gacchanti. Thero sakkārasammānaṃ gāhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a:3535_4: saddhiṃ paribhuñji. Imināva niyāmena satthā sakkāraṃ anubhavanto devasikaṃ yojanaparamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3535_5: gantvā tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma khadiravaniyarevatattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3535_6: patto, thero satthu āgamanaṃ ñatvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3535_7: pahonakavihāre dasabalassa gandhakuṭiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca iddhiyā māpetvā
atk-s0510a:3535_8: tathāgatassa paccuggamanaṃ gato. Satthā alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:3535_9: Atha tathāgate gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū vassaggena pattasenāsanāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3535_10: Devatā “akālo āhārassā”ti aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānakaṃ āhariṃsu. Satthā saṅghena saddhiṃ pānakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3535_11: pivi. Iminā niyāmeneva tathāgatassa sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavantasseva addhamāso atikkanto.
atk-s0510a:3536_0: Athekacce ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhū ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā kathaṃ uppādayiṃsu – “dasabalo
atk-s0510a:3536_1: ‘mayhaṃ aggasāvakassa kaniṭṭhabhātā’ti vatvā evarūpaṃ navakammikaṃ bhikkhuṃ passituṃ
atk-s0510a:3536_2: āgato, imassa vihārassa santike jetavanavihāro vā veḷuvanavihārādayo vā kiṃ karissanti?
atk-s0510a:3536_3: Ayampi bhikkhu evarūpassa navakammassa kārako, kiṃ nāma samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”ti?
atk-s0510a:3536_4: Atha satthā cintesi – “mayi idha ciraṃ vasante idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ bhavissati, āraññakā
atk-s0510a:3536_5: nāma bhikkhū pavivekatthikā honti, revatassa phāsuvihāro na bhavissatī”ti. Tato therassa
atk-s0510a:3536_6: divāṭṭhānaṃ gato. Theropi ekakova caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya pāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0510a:3536_7: nisinno satthāraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0510a:3537_0: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi – “revata, idaṃ vāḷamigaṭṭhānaṃ, caṇḍānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3537_1: saddaṃ sutvā kiṃ karosī”ti? “Tesaṃ me, bhante, saddaṃ suṇato araññapīti nāma uppannā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3537_2: Satthā imasmiṃ ṭhāne revatattherassa pañcahi gāthāsatehi araññānisaṃsaṃ nāma kathetvā
atk-s0510a:3537_3: punadivase avidūraṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā revatattheraṃ āmantetvā yehi bhikkhūhi therassa
atk-s0510a:3537_5: Te attano parikkhāratthāya nivattā āgatamaggeneva gacchantāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ
atk-s0510a:3537_6: na sakkonti. Paṭhamañhi te alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena gantvā, taṃdivasaṃ pana visamamaggena
atk-s0510a:3537_7: gacchantā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdantā jaṇṇukehi gacchanti. Te gumbe ca
atk-s0510a:3537_8: gacche ca kaṇḍake ca maddantā attanā vasitasabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khadirakhāṇuke
atk-s0510a:3537_9: laggitaṃ attano chattaṃ sañjānanti, upāhanaṃ kattarayaṭṭhiṃ telanāḷiñca sañjānanti.
atk-s0510a:3537_10: Te tasmiṃ samaye “iddhimā ayaṃ bhikkhū”ti ñatvā attano parikkhāramādāya “dasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3537_11: paṭiyattasakkāro nāma evarūpo hotī”ti vadantā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3538_0: Purato āgate bhikkhū, visākhā upāsikā, attano gehe nisinnakāle pucchi – “manāpaṃ
atk-s0510a:3538_1: nu kho, bhante, revatassa vasanaṭṭhāna”nti? “Manāpaṃ, upāsike, nandavanacittalatāvanapaṭibhāgaṃ
atk-s0510a:3538_2: taṃ senāsana”nti. Atha tesaṃ pacchato āgate bhikkhū pucchi – “manāpaṃ, ayyā, revatassa
atk-s0510a:3538_3: vasanaṭṭhāna”nti? “Mā puccha, upāsike, kathetuṃ ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ, etaṃ ujjaṅgalasakkharapāsāṇavisamakhadiravanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3539_0: Visākhā purimānaṃ pacchimānañca bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā, “kesaṃ nu kho kathā saccā”ti
atk-s0510a:3539_1: pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālaṃ ādāya dasabalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3539_2: nisinnā satthāraṃ pucchi – “bhante, revatattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ekacce ayyā vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0510a:3539_3: ekacce nindanti, kimetaṃ, bhante”ti? “Visākhe, ramaṇiyaṃ vā hotu mā vā, yasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3539_4: ariyānaṃ cittaṃ ramati, tadeva ṭhānaṃ ramaṇiyaṃ nāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0510a:3540: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0510a:3542: Aparabhāge bhagavā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ, sīvalī”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3543_0: 54. Athāyasmā sīvalitthero arahattaṃ patvā pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3543_1: saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3544: 55. Sīlaṃ tassa asaṅkheyyanti tassa padumuttarassa bhagavato sīlaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3549_0: Evaṃ vuttasikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ sāvakapaññattivasena vuttāni. Bhagavato pana sīlaṃ
atk-s0510a:3549_1: asaṅkheyyameva saṃkhātuṃ gaṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyanti attho. Samādhivajirūpamo yathā vajiraṃ
atk-s0510a:3549_3: karoti, evameva padumuttarassa bhagavato lokuttaramaggasamādhi paṭipakkhapaccanīkadhamme
atk-s0510a:3549_4: vijjhati bhindati samucchindatīti attho. Asaṅkheyyaṃ ñāṇavaraṃ tassa buddhassa cattāri
atk-s0510a:3549_5: saccāni sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhamme ca jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0510a:3549_7: saṃkhāvirahitanti attho. Vimutti ca anopamāti saṃkilesehi vimuttattā sotāpattiphalādikā
atk-s0510a:3549_8: catasso vimuttiyo anupamā upamārahitā “imā viya bhūtā”ti upametuṃ na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3552_0: Catutthāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato vaṅgīsattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3552_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3552_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:3552_3: dhammaṃ sotuṃ gacchantehi nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3552_4: ekabhikkhuṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:3552_5: – “ahampi anāgate paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā satthārā byākato
atk-s0510a:3552_6: yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3552_7: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mātu paribbājikābhāvena aparabhāge paribbājakoti
atk-s0510a:3552_8: pākaṭo vaṅgīsoti ca laddhanāmo tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tato ācariyaṃ ārādhetvā chavasīsajānanamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3552_9: nāma sikkhitvā chavasīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā – “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti jānāti.
atk-s0510a:3553_0: Brāhmaṇā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ jivikāya maggo”ti vaṅgīsaṃ gahetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo vicariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3553_1: Vaṅgīso tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ āharāpetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā – “ayaṃ satto
atk-s0510a:3553_2: asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti vatvā mahājanassa kaṅkhācchedanatthaṃ te te jane āvāhetvā
atk-s0510a:3553_3: attano attano gatiṃ kathāpeti. Tena tasmiṃ mahājano abhippasīdati. So taṃ nissāya
atk-s0510a:3553_4: mahājanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhati. Brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsaṃ ādāya yathāruci
atk-s0510a:3553_5: vicariṃsu. Vaṅgīso satthu guṇe sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi. Brāhmaṇā “samaṇo
atk-s0510a:3554_0: Vaṅgīso tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyitvā, satthu santikaṃ gantvā, paṭisanthāraṃ katvā, ekamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_1: nisīdi. Satthā taṃ pucchi – “vaṅgīsa, kiñci sippaṃ jānātī”ti? “Āma, bho gotama, chavasīsamantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_2: nāmekaṃ jānāmi, tena tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_3: jānāmī”ti. Atha satthā tassa ekaṃ niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ, ekaṃ manussesu, ekaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_4: devesu, ekaṃ parinibbutassa sīsaṃ āharāpetvā dassesi. So paṭhamasīsaṃ ākoṭetvā, “bho
atk-s0510a:3554_5: gotama, ayaṃ satto niraye nibbatto”ti āha. Sādhu vaṅgīsa, suṭṭhu tayā diṭṭhaṃ, “ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_6: satto kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti pucchi. “Manussaloke”ti. “Ayaṃ kuhi”nti? “Devaloke”ti. Tiṇṇannampi
atk-s0510a:3554_7: nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Parinibbutassa pana sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭento neva antaṃ na
atk-s0510a:3554_8: koṭiṃ passi. Atha naṃ satthā “na sakkosi, vaṅgīsā”ti pucchi. “Passatha, bho gotama,
atk-s0510a:3554_9: upaparikkhāmi tāvāti punappunaṃ parivattetvāpi bāhirakamantena khīṇāsavassa sīsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_10: jānituṃ na sakkoti. Athassa matthakato sedo mucci. So lajjitvā tuṇhī ahosi”. Atha
atk-s0510a:3554_11: naṃ satthā “kilamasi, vaṅgīsā”ti āha. “Āma, bho gotama, imassa nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānituṃ
atk-s0510a:3554_12: na sakkomi. Sace tumhe jānātha, kathethā”ti. “Vaṅgīsa, ahaṃ etampi jānāmi, ito uttaripi jānāmī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0510a:3556: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3559_0: Imā dve gāthāyo abhāsi. So tena hi, bho gotama, taṃ vijjaṃ me dethāti apacitiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0510a:3559_1: satthu santike nisīdi. Satthā “amhehi samānaliṅgassa demā”ti āha. Vaṅgīso “yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0510a:3559_2: katvā mayā imaṃ mantaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti brāhmaṇe upagantvā āha – “tumhe mayi pabbajante
atk-s0510a:3559_3: mā cintayittha, ahaṃ mantaṃ uggaṇhitvā sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi, tumhākampi
atk-s0510a:3559_4: tena bhaddameva bhavissatī”ti so mantatthāya satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3559_5: yāci. Tadā ca thero nigrodhakappo bhagavato santike ṭhito hoti, taṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi
atk-s0510a:3559_6: – “nigrodhakappa, imaṃ pabbājehī”ti. Thero satthu āṇāya taṃ pabbājetvā “mantaparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3559_7: tāva uggaṇhāhī”ti dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca ācikkhi. So dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3559_8: sajjhāyantova vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Brāhmaṇā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “kiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3559_9: bho vaṅgīsa, samaṇassa gotamassa santike sippaṃ uggahita”nti pucchiṃsu. “Āma sikkhitaṃ”.
atk-s0510a:3559_10: “Tena hi ehi gamissāmā”ti. “Kiṃ sippasikkhanena, gacchatha tumhe na mayhaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0510a:3559_11: kattabbakicca”nti. Brāhmaṇā “tvampi dāni samaṇassa gotamassa vasaṃ āpanno, māyāya
atk-s0510a:3559_12: āvaṭṭito, kiṃ mayaṃ tava santike karissāmā”ti āgatamaggeneva pakkamiṃsu. Vaṅgīso
atk-s0510a:3560: 96. Evaṃ thero arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Anuttānatthameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0510a:3561_0: 99. Pabhāhi anurañjantoti so padumuttaro bhagavā nīlapītādichabbaṇṇapabhāhi raṃsīhi
atk-s0510a:3561_1: anurañjanto jalanto sobhayamāno vijjotamānoti attho. Veneyyapadumāni soti padumuttarasūriyo
atk-s0510a:3561_2: attano vacanasaṅkhātena sūriyaraṃsiyā veneyyajanasaṅkhātapadumāni visesena bodhento
atk-s0510a:3565: Evaṃ vuttacatuvesārajjañāṇehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3566_0: 105. Vāgīso vādisūdanoti vādīnaṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ īso padhāno “vādīso”ti vattabbe da-kārassa
atk-s0510a:3566_1: ga-kāraṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakatthaparatthavādaṃ sūdati paggharāpeti
atk-s0510a:3567_0: 110. Māramasanāti khandhamārādayo pañcamāre masati parāmasati viddhaṃsetīti māramasano.
atk-s0510a:3567_1: Diṭṭhisūdanāti vohāraparamatthasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhidassanaṃ sūdati paggharaṃ dīpetīti diṭṭhisūdano.
atk-s0510a:3568: 111. Vissāmabhūmi santānanti sakalasaṃsārasāgare santānaṃ kilamantānaṃ sotāpattimaggādiadhigamāpanena vissamabhūmi vissamaṭṭhānaṃ vūpasamanaṭṭhānanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3569_0: 132. Tatohaṃ vihatārambhoti tato paccekabuddhassa sarīradassanena ahaṃ vihatārambho
atk-s0510a:3569_1: vinaṭṭhasārambho, vinaṭṭhamāno nimmado hutvā pabbajjaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu yāciṃ saṃyāciṃ
atk-s0510a:3572: Pañcamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato nandakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikārotiādi sabbaṃ pāṭhānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3575_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato kāḷudāyittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3575_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3575_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3575_3: patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3575_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ abhinīhārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Satthāpi
atk-s0510a:3575_5: byākāsi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa
atk-s0510a:3575_6: mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase devalokato cavitvā kapilavatthusmiṃyeva amaccakule
atk-s0510a:3575_7: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Bodhisattena saha ekadivaseyeva jāto, taṃdivasaṃyeva naṃ dukūlacumbaṭakena
atk-s0510a:3575_8: nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānaṃ nayiṃsu. Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho,
atk-s0510a:3575_9: rāhulamātā, cattāro nidhī, ārohaniyahatthī, kaṇḍako, channo, kāḷudāyīti ime satta
atk-s0510a:3575_10: ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa
atk-s0510a:3575_11: udaggacittadivase jātattā udāyītveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyīti
atk-s0510a:3575_12: paññāyittha. So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3576_0: Aparabhāge lokanāthe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:3576_1: pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0510a:3576_2: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ “puttaṃ me idhānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:3576_3: So satthu dhammadesanāvelāyaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3576_4: sutvā saparivāro arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha ne satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0510a:3576_5: Sabbe taṃkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Arahattappattato
atk-s0510a:3576_6: paṭṭhāya ariyā nāma majjhattāva honti, tasmā raññā pesitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa nārocesi.
atk-s0510a:3576_7: Rājā neva gato āgacchati, na sāsanaṃ suyyatīti aparampi amaccaṃ purisasahassaparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3576_8: pesesi. Tasmimpi tathā paṭipanne aparampīti etena nayena navapurisasahassaparivāre
atk-s0510a:3576_9: nava amacce pesesi. Sabbe gantvā arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhībhūtā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3577_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya
atk-s0510a:3577_1: na kiñci kathayiṃsu, ayaṃ kho pana udāyī dasabalena samavayo sahapaṃsukīḷiko, mayi
atk-s0510a:3577_2: ca sinehavā, imaṃ pesessāmī”ti. Atha taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, tvaṃ purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0510a:3577_3: gantvā dasabalaṃ idhānehī”ti vatvā pesesi. So pana gacchanto “sacāhaṃ, deva, pabbajituṃ
atk-s0510a:3577_4: labhissāmi, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ idhānessāmī”ti vatvā raññā “pabbajitopi mama puttaṃ
atk-s0510a:3577_5: dassehī”ti vutto rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya parisapariyante ṭhito
atk-s0510a:3577_6: dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi. So arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3577_7: patvā – “na tāvāyaṃ dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ kālo, vassante pana upagate pabbatesu
atk-s0510a:3577_8: vanasaṇḍesu haritatiṇasañchannāya bhūmiyā gamanakālo bhavissatī”ti gamanakālaṃ āgamento
atk-s0510a:3577_9: vassante sampatte satthu kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ gamanavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇesi. Vuttañcetaṃ theragāthāya –
atk-s0510a:3578: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0510a:3579: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra bhāgī rasānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3581: Pattaṃ pahāya phalamāsasānā, kālo ito pakkamanāya vīra.
atk-s0510a:3582: “Nevātisītaṃ na panātiuṇhaṃ, sukhā utu addhaniyā bhadante;
atk-s0510a:3583: Passantu taṃ sākiyā koḷiyā ca, pacchāmukhaṃ rohiniyaṃ tarantaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3586: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu.
atk-s0510a:3588: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmuni. ;
atk-s0510a:3590: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3592: Punappunaṃ dānapatī daditvā, punappunaṃ saggamupenti ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3593: “Vīro have sattayugaṃ puneti; Yasmiṃ kule jāyati bhūripañño;
atk-s0510a:3594: Maññāmahaṃ sakkati devadevo, tayā hi jāto muni saccanāmo.
atk-s0510a:3595: “Suddhodano nāma pitā mahesino, buddhassa mātā pana māyanāmā;
atk-s0510a:3596: Yā bodhisattaṃ parihariya kucchinā, kāyassa bhedā tidivamhi modati.
atk-s0510a:3597: “Sā gotamī kālakatā ito cutā, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūtā;
atk-s0510a:3598: Sā modati kāmaguṇehi pañcahi, parivāritā devagaṇehi tehi.
atk-s0510a:3600: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosī”ti. ;
atk-s0510a:3635: Disā sabbā pavāyanti, ubho magge pasobhayaṃ;
atk-s0510a:3636: Sādarā te palambanti, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3643: Maggamhi ubhato vūḷhā, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3646: Tehi te sādarā natā, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3652: Ubho magge gāyamānāva, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3655: Sevamānā tehi tadā, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3656: “Dīpī acchā taracchā ca, tudarā varuṇā sadā;
atk-s0510a:3657: Te dāni sikkhitā sabbe, mettāya tava tādino;
atk-s0510a:3658: Te paccasevakā addhā, samayo te mahāyasa.
atk-s0510a:3660: Kasturā sūrā gandhā te, kevalā gāyamānāva.
atk-s0510a:3664: Nādaṃ karontā pūjenti, kālo te pitudassane.
atk-s0510a:3672: Rukkhaggā sampatantā te, ubho maggesu kūjino;
atk-s0510a:3673: Tesu tesu nikūjanti, kālo te pitudassane.
atk-s0510a:3684: Tattha nhatvā pivitvā ca, samayo te ñātidassane.
atk-s0510a:3687: Tattha nhatvā pivitvā ca, samayo te ñātidassane.
atk-s0510a:3690: Tattha sītalakā toyā, samayo te ñātidassane.
atk-s0510a:3692: Ubho maggesu sobhanti, pokkharañño tahiṃ tahiṃ;
atk-s0510a:3696: Ubho maggehi sandanti, samayo te ñātidassane.
atk-s0510a:3702_0: Evaṃ thero saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi satthu gamanavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇesi. Atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3702_1: “kāḷudāyī mama gamanaṃ pattheti, pūressāmissa saṅkappa”nti tattha gamane bahūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3702_5: kapilavatthugāmimaggaṃ paṭipajji. Thero iddhiyā kapilavatthuṃ gantvā rañño purato
atk-s0510a:3702_6: ākāse ṭhito adiṭṭhapubbaṃ vesaṃ disvā, raññā – “kosi tva”nti pucchito “sace amaccaputtaṃ
atk-s0510a:3702_7: tayā bhagavato santike pesitaṃ na jānāsi, evaṃ jānāhī”ti vadanto –
atk-s0510a:3704: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosī”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0510a:3705_0: Tattha buddhassa puttomhīti sabbaññubuddhassa ure vāyāmajanitāhi dhammadesanāhi jātatāya
atk-s0510a:3705_1: orasaputto amhi. Asayhasāhinoti abhisambodhito pubbe ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi
atk-s0510a:3705_2: sahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhassa sakalabodhisambhārassa, mahākaruṇākarassa ca sahanato
atk-s0510a:3705_3: tato parampi aññehi sahituṃ abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3705_6: sahanato tattha vā sādhukārībhāvato asayhasāhino. Aṅgīrasassāti aṅgīkatasīlādisampattikassa.
atk-s0510a:3705_7: “Aṅgamaṅgehi niccharaṇakaobhāsassā”ti apare. Keci pana “aṅgīraso siddhatthoti imāni
atk-s0510a:3705_8: dve nāmāni pitarāyeva gahitānī”ti vadanti. Appaṭimassāti anupamassa iṭṭhādīsu tādilakhaṇasampattiyā
atk-s0510a:3705_9: tādino. Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsīti ariyajātivasena mayhaṃ pitu sammāsambuddhassa lokavohāravasena
atk-s0510a:3705_10: tvaṃ pitā asi. Sakkāti vaṃsena rājānaṃ ālapati. Dhammenāti sabhāvena ariyajātilokiyajātīhi
atk-s0510a:3705_11: dvinnaṃ jātīnaṃ sabhāvasamodhānena. Gotamāti gottena rājānaṃ ālapati. Ayyakosīti
atk-s0510a:3705_12: pitāmaho ahosi. Ettha ca “buddhassa puttomhī”tiādiṃ vadanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3706_0: Evaṃ pana attānaṃ jānāpetvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano
atk-s0510a:3706_1: paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā patte dinne gamanākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3706_2: “Kasmā gantukāmattha, bhuñjathā”ti vutte, satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhuñjissāmīti. Kahaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_3: pana satthāti? Vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya maggaṃ paṭipannoti.
atk-s0510a:3706_4: Tumhe imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjatha, aññaṃ bhagavato haratha. Yāva ca mama putto imaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_5: nagaraṃ pāpuṇāti, tāvassa itoyeva piṇḍapātaṃ harathāti. Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:3706_6: rañño ca parisāya ca dhammaṃ desetvā satthu āgamanato puretarameva rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_7: ratanattayaguṇesu abhippasannaṃ karonto sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva satthu āharitabbabhattapuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_8: pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ upanetvā satthu
atk-s0510a:3706_9: hatthe ṭhapesi. Satthāpi taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji. Evaṃ saṭṭhiyojanaṃ maggaṃ divase
atk-s0510a:3706_10: divase yojanaṃ gacchantassa bhagavato rājagehato bhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3706_11: kamena kapilavatthunagaraṃ patvā punadivase rājavīthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carati. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3706_12: suddhodanamahārājā tattha gantvā, “mā evaṃ kattabbaṃ maññi, nayidaṃ rājavaṃsappaveṇī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3706_13: “Ayaṃ tumhākaṃ, mahārāja, vaṃso, īdiso amhākaṃ pana buddhavaṃso”ti vatvā –
atk-s0510a:3708: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0510a:3709: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0510a:3710: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3711_0: Dhammaṃ desesi. Rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tato rājā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0510a:3711_1: nimantetvā sakamandire bhojetvā sampavāretvā bhojanāvasāne dhammapālajātakaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3711_2: sapariso anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi. Aparabhāge setacchattassa heṭṭhā nipannova arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0510a:3712_0: Tato bhagavā rāhulamātuyā bimbādeviyā pāsādaṃ gantvā tassā dhammaṃ desetvā sokaṃ
atk-s0510a:3712_1: vinodetvā candakinnarījātakadesanāya pasādaṃ janetvā nigrodhārāmaṃ agamāsi. Atha
atk-s0510a:3712_2: bimbādevī puttaṃ rāhulakumāraṃ āha – “gaccha, tava pitu santakaṃ dhanaṃ yācāhī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3712_3: Kumāro “dāyajjaṃ, me samaṇa, dehī”ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ anubandhitvā, “sukhā, te samaṇa,
atk-s0510a:3712_4: chāyā”ti vadanto gacchati. Taṃ bhagavā nigrodhārāmaṃ netvā “lokutaradāyajjaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti
atk-s0510a:3712_5: vatvā pabbājesi. Atha bhagavā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0510a:3712_6: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti theraṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3713: 165. Thero pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādigāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha anuttānapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0510a:3714_0: 166. Guṇāguṇavidūti guṇañca aguṇañca guṇāguṇaṃ, vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ, kusalākusalaṃ vā taṃ
atk-s0510a:3714_1: jānātīti guṇāguṇavidū. Kataññūti aññehi kataguṇaṃ jānātīti kataññū, ekadivasampi
atk-s0510a:3714_2: bhattadānādinā katūpakārassa rajjampi dātuṃ samatthattā kataññū. Katavedīti kataṃ
atk-s0510a:3714_3: vindati anubhavati sampaṭicchatīti katavedī. Titthe yojeti pāṇineti sabbasatte nibbānapavesanupāye
atk-s0510a:3714_4: kusalapathe magge dhammadesanāya yojeti sampayojeti patiṭṭhāpetīti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:3717_0: Sattamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato abhayattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3717_1: purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vipaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3717_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto. So vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:3717_3: vedaṅgapārago sakaparasamayakusalo ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3717_4: bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi thomesi. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puññāni katvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:3717_5: devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyevaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0510a:3717_6: bimbisārarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, abhayotvevassa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0510a:3717_7: nigaṇṭhehi saddhiṃ vissāsiko hutvā caranto ekadivasaṃ nigaṇṭhena nāṭaputtena satthu
atk-s0510a:3717_8: vādāropanatthāya pesito nipuṇapañhaṃ pucchitvā nipuṇabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā pasanno satthu
atk-s0510a:3717_9: santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānānurūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3718: 195. So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3721_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato lomasakaṅgiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3721_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3721_2: upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto saddho pasanno ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3721_3: Aparo candano nāma tassa sahāyo cāsi. Te dvepi satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānasā
atk-s0510a:3721_4: pabbajitvā yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā suparisuddhasīlā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3721_5: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhaviṃsu. Tesu ayaṃ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākiyakule
atk-s0510a:3721_6: nibbattitvā aparo candano devaputto hutvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. Atha so sakyakulappasādakena
atk-s0510a:3721_7: kāḷudāyinā ārādhitena bhagavatā sakyarājūnaṃ mānamaddanāya kataṃ vessantaradhammadesanāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3721_8: pokkharavassaiddhipāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā majjhimanikāye vuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:3721_10: saritvā tadanusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3722_0: 225. Arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3722_1: pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha. Tattha kappo tāva catubbidho – sārakappo,
atk-s0510a:3722_2: varakappo, maṇḍakappo, bhaddakappoti. Tesu yasmiṃ kappe eko buddho uppajjati, ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3722_3: sārakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ dve vā tayo vā buddhā uppajjanti, ayaṃ varakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3722_4: cattāro buddhā uppajjanti, ayaṃ maṇḍakappo nāma. Yasmiṃ pañca buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0510a:3725: “Eko dve tayo cattāro, pañca buddhā yathākkamaṃ;
atk-s0510a:3727: Evaṃ pañca kappā vuttā. Tesu ayaṃ kappo “kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo gotamo metteyyo”ti pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddakappo nāma jāto.
atk-s0510a:3728: Tasmā imasmiṃ bhaddakappamhi kassapo nāyako uppajjīti sambandho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3731_0: Navamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato vanavacchattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3731_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3731_2: upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_3: sutvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā tato cuto devaloke
atk-s0510a:3731_4: nibbatto, tato cuto araññāyatane bhikkhūnaṃ samīpe kapotayoniyaṃ nibbatto. Tesu mettacitto
atk-s0510a:3731_5: dhammaṃ sutvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_6: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Tassa mātukucchigatakāleyeva mātu dohaḷo udapādi vane vasituṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_7: vane vijāyituṃ. Tato icchānurūpavasena vane vasantiyā gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Gabbhato
atk-s0510a:3731_8: nikkhantañca naṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍena paṭiggahesuṃ. Tadā bodhisattassa uppannakālo, rājā
atk-s0510a:3731_9: taṃ kumāraṃ āharāpetvā saheva posesi. Atha bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:3731_10: pabbajitvā chabbasāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā buddhe jāte so mahākassapassa santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_11: gantvā tassovāde pasanno tassa santikā buddhuppādabhāvaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:3731_12: dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3732_0: 251. So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3732_1: pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha. Tattha brahmabandhu mahāyasoti ettha brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3732_3: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Lokattayabyāpakayasattā mahāyaso. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3735_0: Dasamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato sugandhattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3735_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3735_2: kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:3735_3: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sabbadā namassamāno mahādānaṃ dadamāno māsassa sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:3735_5: sarīrato sugandhagandho nibbattatū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Bhagavā taṃ byākāsi. So yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:3735_6: ṭhatvā puññāni karonto tato cuto devaloke nibbatto kāmāvacaralokaṃ sarīragandhena
atk-s0510a:3735_7: sugandhaṃ kurumāno sugandhadevaputtoti pākaṭo ahosi. So devalokasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3735_8: tato cuto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mahābhogakule nibbatti, tassa mātukucchigatasseva mātuyā
atk-s0510a:3735_9: sarīragandhena sakalagehaṃ sakalanagarañca sugandhena ekagandhaṃ ahosi, jātakkhaṇe
atk-s0510a:3735_10: sakalaṃ sāvatthinagaraṃ sugandhakaraṇḍako viya ahosi, tenassa sugandhoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3735_11: So vuddhiṃ agamāsi. Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṃ patvā jetavanamahāvihāraṃ paṭiggahesi,
atk-s0510a:3735_12: taṃ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0510a:3735_13: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa uppannadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā etthantare nipannaṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0510a:3736_0: 272. Sopi thero arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3736_1: pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā
atk-s0510a:3736_2: ca suviññeyyameva, kevalaṃ puññanānattaṃ nāmanānattañca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3741_0: Chappaññāsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne mahāsamuddaṃ oggayhātiādikaṃ āyasmato yasattherassa
atk-s0510a:3741_1: apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni
atk-s0510a:3741_2: puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3741_3: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ attano bhavanaṃ netvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi, bhagavantaṃ mahagghena
atk-s0510a:3741_4: ticīvarena acchādesi, ekekañca bhikkhuṃ mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena ca
atk-s0510a:3741_5: samaṇaparikkhārena. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3741_6: kāle seṭṭhiputto hutvā mahābodhimaṇḍalaṃ sattahi ratanehi pūjesi. Kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3741_7: kāle sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ so sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3741_8: bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā sujātāya bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3741_9: khīrapāyāsaṃ dinnāya seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi nibbatti, yaso nāma nāmena paramasukhumālo.
atk-s0510a:3741_10: Tassa tayo pāsādā honti – eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassikoti. So vassike pāsāde
atk-s0510a:3741_11: vassike cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno vasati, heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ na
atk-s0510a:3741_12: otarati. Hemantike pāsāde cattāro māse suphusitavātapānakavāṭe tattheva paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:3741_13: Gimhike pāsāde bahukavāṭavātapānajālāhi sampanne tattheva vasati. Hatthapādānaṃ sukhumālatāya
atk-s0510a:3741_14: bhūmiyaṃ nisajjādikiccaṃ natthi. Simbalitulādipuṇṇasabhāve attharitvā tattha upadhānāni
atk-s0510a:3741_15: kiccāni karoti. Evaṃ devaloke devakumāro viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa
atk-s0510a:3741_16: paricārayamānassa paṭikacceva niddā okkami, parijanassāpi niddā okkami, sabbarattiyo
atk-s0510a:3741_17: ca telapadīpo jhāyati. Atha kho yaso kulaputto paṭikacceva pabujjhitvā addasa sakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3741_18: parijanaṃ supantaṃ aññissā kacche vīṇaṃ, aññissā kaṇṭhe mudiṅgaṃ, aññissā kacche
atk-s0510a:3741_19: āḷambaraṃ, aññaṃ vikesikaṃ, vikkheḷikaṃ, aññā vippalapantiyo hatthapattaṃ susānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3741_20: maññe, disvānassa ādīnavo pāturahosi, nibbidāya cittaṃ saṇṭhāsi. Atha kho yaso kulaputto
atk-s0510a:3741_21: udānaṃ udānesi – “upaddutaṃ vata bho, upassaṭṭhaṃ vata bho”ti.
atk-s0510a:3742_0: Atha kho yaso kulaputto suvaṇṇapādukāyo ārohitvā yena nivesanadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:3742_1: amanussā dvāraṃ vivariṃsu – “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā
atk-s0510a:3742_2: anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti. Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:3742_3: amanussā dvāraṃ vivariṃsu – “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā
atk-s0510a:3742_4: anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti. Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a:3743_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati,
atk-s0510a:3743_1: addasā kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā
atk-s0510a:3743_2: paññatte āsane nisīdi. Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato avidūre udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0510a:3743_3: “upaddutaṃ vata bho, upassaṭṭhaṃ vata bho”ti. Atha kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3743_4: – “idaṃ kho, yasa, anupaddutaṃ, idaṃ anupassaṭṭhaṃ, ehi, yasa, nisīda, dhammaṃ te
atk-s0510a:3743_5: desessāmī”ti. Atha kho yaso kulaputto, “idaṃ kira anupaddutaṃ, idaṃ anupassaṭṭha”nti
atk-s0510a:3743_6: haṭṭho udaggo suvaṇṇapādukāhi orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:3743_7: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa
atk-s0510a:3743_8: bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ, dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ
atk-s0510a:3743_9: kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi. Yadā bhagavā aññāsi
atk-s0510a:3743_10: yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3743_11: atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3743_12: maggaṃ. Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-s0510a:3743_13: evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi
atk-s0510a:3744_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa mātā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ apassantī
atk-s0510a:3744_1: yena seṭṭhi gahapati tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca – “putto
atk-s0510a:3744_2: te gahapati yaso na dissatī”ti. Atha kho, seṭṭhi gahapati, catuddisā assadūte uyyojetvā
atk-s0510a:3744_3: sāmaṃyeva yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami. Addasā kho, seṭṭhi gahapati, suvaṇṇapādukānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3744_4: nikkhepaṃ, disvāna taṃyeva anugamāsi. Addasā kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova
atk-s0510a:3744_5: āgacchantaṃ, disvāna bhagavato etadahosi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3744_6: abhisaṅkhareyyaṃ, yathā seṭṭhi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0510a:3744_7: na passeyyā”ti. Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharesi. Atha
atk-s0510a:3744_8: kho seṭṭhi gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3744_9: – “api, bhante, bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passeyyā”ti. Tena hi gahapati nisīda, appeva
atk-s0510a:3744_10: nāma idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passeyyāsīti. Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati
atk-s0510a:3744_11: “idheva kirāhaṃ nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passissāmī”ti haṭṭho udaggo
atk-s0510a:3744_12: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho seṭṭhissa gahapatissa
atk-s0510a:3744_13: bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi…pe… aparappaccayo atthu sāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3744_14: – “abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya,
atk-s0510a:3744_15: paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ
atk-s0510a:3744_16: dhāreyya ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti, evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo
atk-s0510a:3744_17: pakāsito. Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca,
atk-s0510a:3744_18: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata”nti. Sova loke paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_1: bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āyavehi cittaṃ vimucci. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3745_2: – “yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_3: paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā
atk-s0510a:3745_4: kāme paribhuñjituṃ, seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto, yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_5: paṭippassambheyya”nti. Atha kho bhagavā taṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhesi. Addasā
atk-s0510a:3745_6: kho seṭṭhi gahapati yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ nisinnaṃ, disvāna yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3745_7: – “mātā te tāta, yasa, paridevasokasamāpannā, dehi mātuyā jīvita”nti. Atha kho yaso
atk-s0510a:3745_8: kulaputto bhagavantaṃ ullokesi. Atha kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca – “taṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_9: kiṃ maññasi, gahapati, yassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito
atk-s0510a:3745_10: seyyathāpi tayā, tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya
atk-s0510a:3745_11: āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, bhabbo nu kho so, gahapati, hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_12: seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti? “No hetaṃ, bhante”. “Yasassa kho, gahapati, kulaputtassa
atk-s0510a:3745_13: sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā, tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3745_14: yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, abhabbo
atk-s0510a:3745_15: kho, gahapati, yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ seyyathāpi pubbe
atk-s0510a:3745_16: agārikabhūto”ti. “Lābhā, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, suladdhaṃ, bhante, yasassa
atk-s0510a:3745_17: kulaputtassa, yathā yasassa kulaputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, adhivāsetu
atk-s0510a:3745_18: me, bhante bhagavā, ajjatanāya bhattaṃ yasena kulaputtena pacchāsamaṇenā”ti. “Adhivāsesi
atk-s0510a:3745_19: bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena”. Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati, bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0510a:3745_20: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante
atk-s0510a:3745_21: seṭṭhimhi gahapatimhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike
atk-s0510a:3745_22: pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti. “Ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavā avoca – “svākkhāto dhammo,
atk-s0510a:3745_23: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti, sāva tassa āyasmato upasampadā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3746_0: 1. Arahā pana hutvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0510a:3746_1: oggayhātiādimāha. Tattha samuddanti aṅgulimuddāya saṃ suṭṭhu dassetabbato samuddo,
atk-s0510a:3746_2: atha vā saṃ suṭṭhu udiyati khobhiyati pasodhiyati ghosanaṃ karonto āluḷiyatīti samuddo,
atk-s0510a:3746_3: mahanto ca so samuddo cāti mahāsamuddo, taṃ mahāsamuddaṃ. Oggayhāti ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0510a:3746_4: abbhantaraṃ pavisitvā tassa mahāsamuddassa anto pavisitvā, sāmyatthe cetaṃ upayogavacananti
atk-s0510a:3746_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhavanaṃ me sumāpitanti ettha bhavanti nibbattanti nivasanti catūhi iriyāpathehi
atk-s0510a:3746_6: vāsaṃ kappenti etthāti bhavanaṃ, mayhaṃ taṃ bhavanaṃ taṃ vimānaṃ taṃ pāsādaṃ pañcapākārakūṭāgārehi
atk-s0510a:3746_7: saṃ suṭṭhu māpitaṃ nagaraṃ, attano balena suṭṭhu nimmitanti attho. Sunimmitā pokkharaṇīti
atk-s0510a:3746_8: sumahantā hutvā bhūtā itā gatā pavattā khaṇitā katāti pokkharaṇī, macchakacchapapupphapulinatitthamadhurodakādīhi
atk-s0510a:3746_9: suṭṭhu nibbattā nimmitāti attho. Cakkavākūpakūjitāti cakkavākakukkuṭahaṃsādīhi kūjitā
atk-s0510a:3746_10: ghositā nāditā sā pokkharaṇīti sambandho. Ito paraṃ nadīvanadvipadacatuppadapādapapakkhīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3746_11: vaṇṇañca sumedhassa bhagavato dassanañca nimantetvā sumedhassa bhagavato dānakkamañca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:3747_0: Lokāhutipaṭiggahanti ettha loke āhuti lokāhuti, kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātassa lokassa āhutiṃ
atk-s0510a:3747_1: pūjāsakkāraṃ paṭiggaṇhātīti lokāhutipaṭiggahaṃ, sumedhaṃ bhagavantanti attho. Sesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3750_0: Dutiyāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3750_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3750_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:3750_3: satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṃ
atk-s0510a:3750_4: manosilāvaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3750_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa bhātā hutvā nibbatto
atk-s0510a:3750_6: vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3750_7: tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṃ māpetvā viharati. Nadītīre
atk-s0510a:3750_8: vasanato kassapagottatāya ca nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi. Tassa bhagavā saparisassa
atk-s0510a:3750_9: ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. So bhagavato gayāsīse ādittapariyāya desanāya
atk-s0510a:3751_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – satthā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ pabbājetvā uruvelāyaṃ tayo bhātikajaṭile
atk-s0510a:3751_1: dametuṃ yena uruvelā tadavasari. Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṃ tayo jaṭilā paṭivasanti
atk-s0510a:3751_2: uruvelakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapoti, tesu uruvelakassapo jaṭilo pañcannaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3751_3: nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho, nadīkassapo jaṭilo tiṇṇaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3751_4: nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho, gayākassapo jaṭilo dvinnaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3751_5: nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho. Atha kho bhagavā yena uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a:3751_6: jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3751_7: “sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ agyāgāre”ti. Na kho me, mahāsamaṇa,
atk-s0510a:3751_8: garu, caṇḍettha nāgarājā iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso, so taṃ mā viheṭhesīti. Dutiyampi
atk-s0510a:3751_9: kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca…pe… tatiyampi…pe… so taṃ mā viheṭhesīti.
atk-s0510a:3751_10: Appeva maṃ na viheṭheyya, iṅgha tvaṃ, kassapa, anujānāhi agyāgāranti. Vihara, mahāsamaṇa,
atk-s0510a:3751_11: yathāsukhanti. Atha kho bhagavā agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi
atk-s0510a:3751_12: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0510a:3752_0: Addasā kho so nāgo bhagavantaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ, disvā dummano padhūpāyi. Atha kho bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3752_1: etadahosi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca
atk-s0510a:3752_2: aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyeyya”nti. Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:3752_3: iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā padhūpāyi. Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno pajjali.
atk-s0510a:3752_4: Bhagavāpi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā pajjali. Ubhinnaṃ sajotibhūtānaṃ agyāgāraṃ ādittaṃ
atk-s0510a:3752_5: viya hoti sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ. Atha kho te jaṭilā agyāgāraṃ parivāretvā evamāhaṃsu
atk-s0510a:3752_6: – “abhirūpo vata, bho, mahāsamaṇo nāgena viheṭhiyatī”ti. Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā
atk-s0510a:3752_7: accayena tassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca
atk-s0510a:3752_8: tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā patte pakkhipitvā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa dassesi
atk-s0510a:3752_9: – “ayaṃ te, kassapa, nāgo pariyādinno assa tejasā tejo”ti. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a:3752_10: jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma caṇḍassa
atk-s0510a:3752_11: nāgarājassa iddhimato āsivisassa ghoravisassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyissati, na tveva
atk-s0510a:3754: Sace te kassapa agaru, viharemu ajjaṇho aggisālamhī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3755: “Na kho me mahāsamaṇa garu, phāsukāmova taṃ nivāremi;
atk-s0510a:3758: “Appeva maṃ na viheṭheyya, iṅgha tvaṃ kassapa anujānāhi agyāgāranti;
atk-s0510a:3759: Dinnanti naṃ viditvā, abhīto pāvisi bhayamatīto.
atk-s0510a:3766: Udicchare jaṭilā, abhirūpo vata bho mahāsamaṇo;
atk-s0510a:3768: “Atha tassā rattiyā accayena, hatā nāgassa acciyo honti;
atk-s0510a:3769: Iddhimato pana ṭhitā, anekavaṇṇā acciyo honti.
atk-s0510a:3773: Ayaṃ te kassapa nāgo, pariyādinno assa tejasā tejo”ti.
atk-s0510a:3774: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato iminā iddhipāṭihāriyena abhippasanno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “idheva, mahāsamaṇa, vihara, ahaṃ te dhuvabhattenā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3776_0: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe
atk-s0510a:3776_1: vihāsi. Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ
atk-s0510a:3776_2: vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0510a:3776_3: catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā. Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo
atk-s0510a:3776_4: tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3776_5: – “kālo, mahāsamaṇa, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattaṃ, te nu kho te, mahāsamaṇa, abhikkantāya rattiyā
atk-s0510a:3776_6: abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:3776_7: taṃ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā”ti. Ete kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3776_8: cattāro mahārājāno yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu dhammassavanāyāti. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a:3776_9: jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma cattāropi
atk-s0510a:3776_10: mahārājāno upasaṅkamissanti dhammassavanāya, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3776_11: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.

atk-s0510a:3778_5: kho so, mahāsamaṇa, abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ

atk-s0510a:3778_7: seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3778_8: Eso kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami dhammassavanāyāti. Atha

atk-s0510a:3778_10: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya, na tveva ca kho
atk-s0510a:3778_11: arahā yathā aha”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā

atk-s0510a:3782_0: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0510a:3782_1: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamitukāmā honti.
atk-s0510a:3782_2: Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito,
atk-s0510a:3782_3: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti, sace
atk-s0510a:3782_4: mahāsamaṇo mahājanakāye iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0510a:3782_5: mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, aho nūna mahāsamaṇo svātanāya nāgaccheyyā”ti. Atha
atk-s0510a:3782_6: kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṃ
atk-s0510a:3782_7: gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3782_8: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3782_9: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “kālo, mahāsamaṇa, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattaṃ, kiṃ nu
atk-s0510a:3782_10: kho, mahāsamaṇa, hiyyo nāgamāsi, apica mayaṃ taṃ sarāma, ‘kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo nāgacchatī’ti,
atk-s0510a:3782_11: khādanīyassa ca bhojanīyassa ca te paṭivīso ṭhapito”ti. Nanu te, kassapa, etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3782_12: – “etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3782_13: bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti, sace mahāsamaṇo mahājanakāye iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karissati,
atk-s0510a:3782_14: mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati, mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, aho
atk-s0510a:3782_15: nūna mahāsamaṇo svātanāya nāgaccheyyā”ti, so kho ahaṃ, kassapa, tava cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya
atk-s0510a:3782_16: uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3782_17: akāsinti. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo
atk-s0510a:3782_18: mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā
atk-s0510a:3782_19: aha”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3784_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hoti. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3784_1: – “kattha nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhoveyya”nti? Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3784_2: cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3784_3: “idha, bhante bhagavā, paṃsukūlaṃ dhovatū”ti. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi – “kimhi
atk-s0510a:3784_4: nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ parimaddeyya”nti? Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā
atk-s0510a:3784_5: cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha, bhante bhagavā, paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0510a:3784_6: parimaddatū”ti. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi – “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ ālambitvā uttareyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:3784_7: Atha kho kakudhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3784_8: onāmesi – “idha, bhante bhagavā, ālambitvā uttaratū”ti. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3784_9: – “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ vissajjeyya”nti? Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3784_10: cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha, bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0510a:3784_11: paṃsukūlaṃ vissajjetū”ti. Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena
atk-s0510a:3784_12: bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “kālo, mahāsamaṇa, niṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3784_13: bhattaṃ, kiṃ nu kho, mahāsamaṇa, nāyaṃ pubbe idha pokkharaṇī sāyaṃ idha pokkharaṇī,
atk-s0510a:3784_14: nayimā silā pubbe upanikkhittā, kenimā silā upanikkhittā, nayimassa kakudhassa pubbe
atk-s0510a:3784_15: sākhā onatā, sāyaṃ sākhā onatā”ti? Idha me, kassapa, paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ ahosi, tassa
atk-s0510a:3784_16: mayhaṃ, kassapa, etadahosi – “kattha nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhoveyya”nti? Atha kho,
atk-s0510a:3784_17: kassapa, sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0510a:3784_18: khaṇitvā maṃ etadavoca – “idha, bhante bhagavā, paṃsukūlaṃ dhovatū”ti. Sāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_19: amanussena pāṇinā khaṇitā pokkharaṇī. Tassa mayhaṃ, kassapa, etadahosi – “kimhi nu
atk-s0510a:3784_20: kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ parimaddeyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo mama cetasā
atk-s0510a:3784_21: cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha, bhante bhagavā, paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0510a:3784_22: parimaddatū”ti? Sāyaṃ, kassapa, amanussena upanikkhittā silā. Tassa mayhaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_23: etadahosi – “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ ālambitvā uttareyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa, kakudhe
atk-s0510a:3784_24: adhivatthā devatā mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ onāmesi – “idha, bhante
atk-s0510a:3784_25: bhagavā, ālambitvā uttaratū”ti? Svāyaṃ āharahattho kakudho. Tassa mayhaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_26: etadahosi – “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ vissajjeyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa, sakko
atk-s0510a:3784_27: devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_28: bhante bhagavā, paṃsukūlaṃ vissajjetū”ti? Sāyaṃ, kassapa, amanussena upanikkhittā
atk-s0510a:3784_29: silāti. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0510a:3784_30: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo veyyāvaccaṃ karissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā
atk-s0510a:3784_31: aha”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.

atk-s0510a:3785_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocesi – “kālo, mahāsamaṇa, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta”nti.
atk-s0510a:3785_2: “Gaccha tvaṃ, kassapa, āyāmaha”nti uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā
atk-s0510a:3785_3: jambudīpo paññāyati, tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi. Addasā
atk-s0510a:3785_4: kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ agyāgāre nisinnaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0510a:3785_5: – “katamena tvaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, maggena āgato, ahaṃ tayā paṭhamataraṃ pakkanto, so
atk-s0510a:3785_6: tvaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti? “Idhāhaṃ, kassapa, taṃ uyyojetvā yāya
atk-s0510a:3785_7: jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati, tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno.
atk-s0510a:3785_8: Idaṃ kho, kassapa, jambuphalaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ gandhasampannaṃ rasasampannaṃ, sace
atk-s0510a:3785_9: ākaṅkhasi paribhuñjā”ti. “Alaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, tvaṃyeva taṃ arahasi, tvaṃyeva taṃ paribhuñjā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3785_10: Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0510a:3785_11: yatra hi nāma maṃ paṭhamataraṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati, tato phalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3785_12: gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.

atk-s0510a:3787_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti kaṭṭhāni phāletuṃ.
