atk-s0510a:3787_4: pañca kaṭṭhasatāni phāliyiṃsu. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko
atk-s0510a:3787_5: kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma kaṭṭhānipi phāliyissanti, na tveva ca kho
atk-s0510a:3788_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti aggiṃ ujjaletuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3788_1: Atha kho tesaṃ jaṭilānaṃ etadahosi – “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo
atk-s0510a:3788_2: yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ ujjaletu”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ
atk-s0510a:3788_4: pañca aggisatāni ujjaliyiṃsu. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko
atk-s0510a:3788_5: kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma aggīpi ujjaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho
atk-s0510a:3789_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritvā na sakkonti aggiṃ vijjhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3789_1: Atha kho tesaṃ jaṭilānaṃ etadahosi – “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo
atk-s0510a:3789_2: yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ vijjhāpetu”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ
atk-s0510a:3789_4: pañca aggisatāni vijjhāyiṃsu. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko
atk-s0510a:3789_5: kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma aggīpi vijjhāyissanti, na tveva ca kho
atk-s0510a:3790_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamaye
atk-s0510a:3790_1: najjā nerañjarāya ummujjantipi nimujjantipi ummujjananimujjanampi karonti. Atha kho
atk-s0510a:3790_2: bhagavā pañcamattāni mandāmukhisatāni abhinimmini yattha te jaṭilā uttaritvā visibbesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3790_3: Atha kho tesaṃ jaṭilānaṃ etadahosi – “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo
atk-s0510a:3790_4: yathayimā mandāmukhiyo nimmitā”ti. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3790_5: – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma tāva bahū mandāmukhiyopi
atk-s0510a:3790_6: abhinimminissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3791_0: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho pāvassi, mahā udakavāhako sañjāyi, yasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3791_1: padese bhagavā viharati so padeso udakena na otthaṭo hoti. Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi
atk-s0510a:3791_2: – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkameyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:3791_3: Atha kho bhagavā samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkami. Atha
atk-s0510a:3791_4: kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo “māheva kho mahāsamaṇo udakena vūḷho ahosī”ti nāvāya sambahulehi
atk-s0510a:3791_5: jaṭilehi saddhiṃ yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati, taṃ padesaṃ agamāsi. Addasā kho
atk-s0510a:3791_6: uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā
atk-s0510a:3791_7: caṅkamantaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “idaṃ nu tvaṃ, mahāsamaṇā”ti. “Ayamahamasmi,
atk-s0510a:3791_8: kassapā”ti bhagavā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā nāvāya paccuṭṭhāsi. Atha kho uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a:3791_9: jaṭilassa etadahosi – “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma udakampi
atk-s0510a:3791_10: na pavāhissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3792_0: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi – “cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa evaṃ bhavissati
atk-s0510a:3792_1: ‘mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’nti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3792_2: imaṃ jaṭilaṃ saṃvejeyya”nti. Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3792_3: “neva ca kho tvaṃ, kassapa, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggasamāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā
atk-s0510a:3792_4: natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assasi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti. Atha kho uruvelakassapo
atk-s0510a:3792_5: jaṭilo bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3792_6: bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti. “Tvaṃ khosi, kassapa, pañcannaṃ
atk-s0510a:3792_7: jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho, tepi tāva apalokehi, yathā te
atk-s0510a:3792_8: maññissanti, tathā te karissantī”ti. Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo yena te jaṭilā
atk-s0510a:3792_9: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te jaṭile etadavoca – “icchāmahaṃ, bho, mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3792_10: carituṃ, yathā bhavanto maññanti tathā karontū”ti. “Cirapaṭikā mayaṃ, bho, mahāsamaṇe
atk-s0510a:3792_11: abhippasannā, sace bhavaṃ mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carissati, sabbeva mayaṃ mahāsamaṇe
atk-s0510a:3792_12: brahmacariyaṃ carissāmā”ti. Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ
atk-s0510a:3792_13: aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3792_14: pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ – “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3792_15: santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampada”nti. “Etha, bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā avoca –
atk-s0510a:3792_16: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti. Sāva tesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3793_0: Addasā kho nadīkassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ

atk-s0510a:3793_2: pāhesi – “gacchatha me bhātaraṃ jānāthā”ti, sāmañca tīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā

atk-s0510a:3793_5: jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3793_6: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ – “labheyyāma
atk-s0510a:3793_7: mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampada”nti. “Etha, bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0510a:3793_8: bhagavā avoca – “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.

atk-s0510a:3795_0: “Bhagavato adhiṭṭhānena pañca kaṭṭhasatāni na phāliyiṃsu, phāliyiṃsu, aggī na ujjaliyiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3795_1: ujjaliyiṃsu, na vijjhāyiṃsu, vijjhāyiṃsu, pañca mandāmukhisatāni abhinimmini, etena
atk-s0510a:3796_0: “Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena gayāsīsaṃ tena cārikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3796_1: pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sahassena sabbeheva purāṇajaṭilehi. Tatra
atk-s0510a:3796_2: sudaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena. Tatra kho bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3796_3: bhikkhu āmantesi – ‘sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ ādittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3796_4: cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso
atk-s0510a:3796_5: āditto, yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3796_6: vā tampi ādittaṃ. Kena ādittaṃ, rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya
atk-s0510a:3796_7: maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi? Sotaṃ
atk-s0510a:3796_8: ādittaṃ, saddā ādittā…pe… ghānaṃ ādittaṃ, gandhā ādittā…pe… jivhā ādittā, rasā ādittā…pe…
atk-s0510a:3796_9: kāyo āditto, phoṭṭhabbā ādittā…pe… mano āditto, dhammā ādittā, manoviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3796_10: manosamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā
atk-s0510a:3796_11: dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ. Kena ādittaṃ, rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā
atk-s0510a:3796_12: ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi āditta”’nti vadāmi.
atk-s0510a:3797_0: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati,
atk-s0510a:3797_1: cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā
atk-s0510a:3797_2: uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
atk-s0510a:3797_3: Sotasmimpi nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati…pe… ghānasmimpi nibbindati, gandhesupi
atk-s0510a:3797_4: nibbindati…pe… jivhāyapi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati…pe… kāyasmimpi nibbindati,
atk-s0510a:3797_5: phoṭṭhabbesupi nibbindati…pe… manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manoviññāṇepi
atk-s0510a:3797_6: nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3797_7: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati. Nibbindaṃ virajjati,
atk-s0510a:3797_8: virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti, ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3798: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3799_0: 29. Evaṃ ādittapariyāyadesanaṃ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ sampatto nadīkassapo
atk-s0510a:3799_1: thero somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3799_2: Tattha aggaphalanti uttamaphalaṃ, attanā ropitaambarukkhassa ādimhi gahitaphalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3802_2: ito ekatiṃsakappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0510a:3802_3: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ māpetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0510a:3802_4: vasati. Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpenāgacchi, so bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_5: disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito velaṃ olokento manoharāni
atk-s0510a:3802_6: kolaphalāni satthu upanesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_7: buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_8: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ gayāya viharati. Gayāya
atk-s0510a:3802_9: vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca gayākassapoti samaññā ahosi. So bhagavato saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_10: parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṃ datvā nadīkassapassa vuttanayena ādittapariyāya desanāya
atk-s0510a:3803_0: 35. So arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ajinacammavatthohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3803_3: pūretvā. Kolaṃ ahāsi assamanti kolaphalaṃ assame pūretvā assame nisinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3803_4: Agopayinti pāṭhe kolaphalaṃ pariyesitvā assamaṃ gopesiṃ rakkhinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3806_0: Catutthāpadāne nibbute kakusandhamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato kimilattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3806_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3806_2: kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto parinibbute satthari
atk-s0510a:3806_3: tassa dhātuyo uddissa salalamālāhi maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0510a:3806_4: tāvatiṃsesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare
atk-s0510a:3806_5: sakyarājakule nibbattitvā kimiloti tassa nāmaṃ akāsi. So vayappatto bhogasampattiyā
atk-s0510a:3806_6: pamatto viharati. Tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā saṃvegajananatthaṃ anupiyāyaṃ viharanto
atk-s0510a:3806_7: satthā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ itthirūpaṃ abhinimminitvā purato dassetvā
atk-s0510a:3806_8: puna anukkamena yathā jarārogavipattīhi abhibhūtā dissati, tathā akāsi. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3806_9: kimilakumāro ativiya saṃvegajāto attano saṃvegaṃ pakāsento bhagavato pākaṭaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:3807_0: 42. So arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute
atk-s0510a:3807_1: kakusandhamhītiādimāha. Brāhmaṇamhi vusīmatīti pañcahi vasitāhi vasippattamhi bhagavati.
atk-s0510a:3807_2: Brāhmaṇassa sabbaguṇagaṇehi maṇḍitattā abhivūḷhītattā brāhmaṇamhi kakusandhe bhagavati
atk-s0510a:3810_0: Sahassaraṃsī bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0510a:3810_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavutikappe
atk-s0510a:3810_2: ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ bhikkhāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kadaliphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3810_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakumāro
atk-s0510a:3810_4: hutvā nibbatti, vajjirājaputtattā vajjiputtotvevassa samaññā. So daharo hutvā hatthisippādisikkhanakālepi
atk-s0510a:3810_5: hetusampannatāya nissaraṇajjhāsayova hutvā vicaranto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3810_6: satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ katvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3810_7: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ saṅketaṃ
atk-s0510a:3810_8: katvā mahātheresu tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sekhaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:3810_9: samānaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṃ janento –
atk-s0510a:3812: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0510a:3813_0: Tattha rukkhamūlagahananti rukkhamūlabhūtaṃ gahanaṃ, gahanañhi atthi, na rukkhamūlaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3813_1: rukkhamūlañca atthi, na gahanaṃ, tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāya sampannatāya
atk-s0510a:3813_3: janasambādhābhāvañca dasseti, tadubhayena ca bhāvanāyogyataṃ. Pasakkiyāti upagantvā.
atk-s0510a:3813_4: Nibbānaṃ hadayasmiṃ opiyāti “evaṃ mayā paṭipajjitvā nibbānaṃ adhigantabba”nti nibbutiṃ
atk-s0510a:3813_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā citte katvā. Jhāyāti tilakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāya, vipassanābhāvanāsahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3813_6: maggabhāvanaṃ bhāvehi. Gotamāti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ gottenālapati. Mā ca pamādoti
atk-s0510a:3813_7: adhikusalesu dhammesu mā pamādaṃ āpajji. Idāni yādiso therassa pamādo, taṃ paṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0510a:3813_8: dassento “kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti āha. Tattha biḷibiḷikāti biḷibiḷikiriyā,
atk-s0510a:3813_9: biḷibiḷitisaddapavatti yathā niratthakā, evaṃ biḷibiḷikāsadisā janapaññatti. Kiṃ
atk-s0510a:3813_10: te karissatīti kīdisaṃ atthaṃ tuyhaṃ sādhessati, tasmā janapaññattiṃ pahāya sadatthapasuto
atk-s0510a:3814_0: Taṃ sutvā aññehi vuttena vissagandhavāyanavacanena saṃvegajāto bahudeva rattiṃ caṅkamena
atk-s0510a:3814_1: vītināmento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisinnamattova “kiñci
atk-s0510a:3814_2: sayāmī”ti sīsaṃ bimbohanamasampattaṃ pādaṃ bhūmito uggataṃ sarīrassa ākāsagatakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3815_0: 49. Vajjiputtatthero aparabhāge somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3815_2: vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “sahassaraṃsī”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3818_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato uttarasāmaṇerassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3818_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3818_2: upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena vicarati. Tena ca samayena
atk-s0510a:3818_3: satthā tasseva anuggaṇhanatthaṃ vanantare aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo
atk-s0510a:3818_4: vissajjento. So antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ākāsato oruyha
atk-s0510a:3818_5: suvisuddhehi vipulehi kaṇikārapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjesi, pupphāni buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0510a:3818_6: satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṃsu, so tena bhiyyosomattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:3818_7: kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto yāvatāyukaṃ tattha
atk-s0510a:3818_8: ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālassa
atk-s0510a:3818_9: putto hutvā nibbatti, uttarotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu
atk-s0510a:3818_10: nipphattiṃ gantvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya vayena sīlācārena ca lokassa sambhāvanīyo jāto.
atk-s0510a:3819_0: Tassa taṃ sampattiṃ disvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṃ dātukāmo hutvā
atk-s0510a:3819_1: attano adhippāyaṃ pavedesi. So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṃ paṭikkhipitvā kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0510a:3819_2: dhammasenāpatiṃ payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3820_0: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno, tassa bhesajjatthāya uttaro sāmaṇero
atk-s0510a:3820_1: pātova pattacīvaramādāya vihārato nikkhanto antarāmagge taḷākassa samīpe pattaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:3820_2: udakasamīpaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovati. Atha aññataro umaṅgacoro katakammo ārakkhapurisehi
atk-s0510a:3820_3: anubaddho aggamaggena nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto attanā gahitaṃ ratanabhaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0510a:3820_4: sāmaṇerassa patte pakkhipitvā palāyi. Sāmaṇeropi pattasamīpaṃ upagato. Coraṃ anubandhantā
atk-s0510a:3820_5: rājapurisā sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “ayaṃ coro, iminā coriyaṃ kata”nti sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0510a:3820_6: pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ. Vassakāro ca tadā rañño
atk-s0510a:3820_7: vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsati, so “pubbe mama vacanaṃ nādiyi,
atk-s0510a:3820_8: suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī”ti kammaṃ asodhetvā ghātukāmattāva jīvantameva taṃ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0510a:3821_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0510a:3821_2: uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā “uttara, idaṃ te purimakammassa phalaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha tayā
atk-s0510a:3821_3: paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā”ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:3821_5: uḷārapītipāmojjaṃ paṭilabhitvā yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3821_6: gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena tāvadeva maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbe kilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0510a:3821_7: ahosi. Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3821_8: dassesi. Mahājano acchariyabbhutacittajāto ahosi. Tāvadevassa vaṇo saṃrūḷhi, so bhikkhūhi,
atk-s0510a:3821_9: “āvuso, tādisadukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkhī”ti puṭṭho,
atk-s0510a:3821_10: “pageva me, āvuso, saṃsāre ādīnavo, saṅkhārānañca sabhāvo sudiṭṭho, evāhaṃ tādisaṃ
atk-s0510a:3821_11: dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantu”nti āha. “Pubbajātiyā
atk-s0510a:3821_12: daharakāle makkhikaṃ gahetvā nimbasūlakaṃ gahetvā sūlāropanakīḷaṃ paṭicca evaṃ anekajātisatesu
atk-s0510a:3821_13: sūlāropanadukkhamanubhavitvā imāya pariyosānajātiyā evarūpaṃ dukkhamanubhūta”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:3822: 55. Atha aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādimāha. Tattha anuttānapadavaṇṇanameva karissāma.
atk-s0510a:3823_0: 57. Vijjādharo tadā āsinti bāhirakamantādivijjāsiddhiyā ākāsagāmisamattho hutvā caraṇavasena
atk-s0510a:3823_1: taṃ vijjaṃ rakkhitvā avināsetvā pariharaṇavasena vijjādharayoni āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3823_2: Antalikkhacaro ahanti antaṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ likhate saṃkarissatīti antalikkhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3823_3: Atha vā antaṃ pariyosānaṃ likhyate olokiyate etenāti antalikkhaṃ, tasmiṃ antalikkhe,
atk-s0510a:3823_4: ākāse caraṇasīlo ahanti attho. Tisūlaṃ sukataṃ gayhāti tikhiṇaṃ sūlaṃ, aggaṃ āvudhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3823_5: Tisūlaṃ sundaraṃ kataṃ, koṭṭanaghaṃsanamaddanapaharaṇavasena suṭṭhu kataṃ sūlāvudhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3823_6: gayha gahetvā ambarato gacchāmīti attho. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattāva nayānuyogena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3826_0: Sattamāpadāne nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato aparassa uttarattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3826_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3826_2: upacinanto ito catunnavutikappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3826_3: vayappatto viññutaṃ patvā sāsane laddhappasādo hutvā upāsakattaṃ nivedesi. So satthari
atk-s0510a:3826_4: parinibbute attano ñātake sannipātetvā bahupūjāsakkāraṃ saṃharitvā dhātupūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3826_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:3826_6: nibbattitvā uttaroti laddhanāmo vayappatto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiṃ gato kaṇḍambamūle
atk-s0510a:3826_7: kataṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā puna kāḷakārāmasuttadesanāya abhivaḍḍhamānasaddho
atk-s0510a:3826_8: pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā upasampadaṃ labhitvā tatheva caranto
atk-s0510a:3826_9: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā satthari
atk-s0510a:3826_10: sāvatthiyaṃ viharante buddhupaṭṭhānatthaṃ rājagahato sāvatthiṃ upagato bhikkhūhi
atk-s0510a:3826_11: – “kiṃ, āvuso, pabbajjākiccaṃ tayā matthakaṃ pāpita”nti puṭṭho aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3827: 93. Arahattaṃ pana patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3830_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇintiādikaṃ āyasmato bhaddajittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3830_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3830_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:3830_3: brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāraṃ gantvā kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane
atk-s0510a:3830_4: assamaṃ kāretvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3830_5: añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ disvā ākāsato otari. Otiṇṇassa
atk-s0510a:3830_6: pana bhagavato madhuñca bhisamuḷālañca sappikhīrañca upanāmesi, tassa taṃ bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3830_7: anukammaṃ upādāya paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena tusitesu
atk-s0510a:3830_8: nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3830_9: bhagavato kāle mahaddhano seṭṭhi hutvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ bhojetvā ticīvarena acchādesi.
atk-s0510a:3831_0: Evaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0510a:3831_1: manussalokesu uppanno buddhasuññe loke pañca paccekabuddhasatāni catūhi paccayehi
atk-s0510a:3831_2: upaṭṭhahitvā tato cuto rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṃ anusāsanto attano puttaṃ paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3831_3: adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā tassa parinibbutassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:3831_4: pūjesi. Evaṃ tattha tattha tāni tāni puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare
atk-s0510a:3831_5: asītikoṭivibhavassa bhaddiyaseṭṭhissa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti, bhaddajītissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:3831_6: ahosi. Tassa kira issariyabhogaparivārasampatti carimabhave bodhisattassa viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3832_0: Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṃ vasitvā bhaddajikumāraṃ saṅgaṇhanatthāya mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a:3832_1: saddhiṃ bhaddiyanagaraṃ gantvā jātiyāvane vasi tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno. Sopi
atk-s0510a:3832_2: uparipāsāde nisinno sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokento bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_3: gacchantaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā, “katthāyaṃ mahājano gacchatī”ti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_4: sutvā sayampi mahatā parivārena satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova
atk-s0510a:3832_5: sabbakilese khepetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahatte pana tena adhigate satthā bhaddiyaseṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_6: āmantesi – “tava putto alaṅkatapaṭiyatto dhammaṃ suṇanto arahatte patiṭṭhāsi, tenassa
atk-s0510a:3832_7: idāneva pabbajituṃ yuttaṃ, no ce pabbajissati, parinibbāyissatī”ti. Seṭṭhi “na mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_8: puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbānena kiccaṃ atthi, pabbājetha na”nti āha. Taṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_9: satthā pabbājetvā upasampādetvā tattha sattāhaṃ vasitvā koṭigāmaṃ pāpuṇi, so ca gāmo
atk-s0510a:3832_10: gaṅgātīre ahosi. Koṭigāmavāsino ca buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3832_11: Bhaddajitthero satthārā anumodanāya āraddhamattāya bahigāmaṃ gantvā “gaṅgātīre maggasamīpe
atk-s0510a:3832_12: satthu āgatakāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_13: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Mahātheresu āgacchantesupi avuṭṭhahitvā satthu āgatakāleyeva
atk-s0510a:3832_14: vuṭṭhāsi. Puthujjanā bhikkhū – “ayaṃ adhunā pabbajito, mahātheresu āgacchantesu mānathaddho
atk-s0510a:3833_0: Koṭigāmavāsino satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bahū nāvāsaṅghāṭe bandhiṃsu. Satthā “bhaddajissānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:3833_1: pakāsemī”ti nāvāya ṭhatvā “kahaṃ bhaddajī”ti pucchi. Bhaddajitthero – “sohaṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0510a:3833_2: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “ehi, bhaddaji, amhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3833_3: ekanāvaṃ abhiruhā”ti. So uppatitvā satthu ṭhitanāvāyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Satthā gaṅgāya majjhe
atk-s0510a:3833_4: gatakāle, “bhaddaji, tayā mahāpanādakāle ajjhāvuṭṭharatanapāsādo kaha”nti āha. “Imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3833_5: ṭhāne nimuggo, bhante”ti. “Tena hi, bhaddaji, sabrahmacārīnaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3833_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero satthāraṃ vanditvā iddhibalena gantvā pāsādathūpikaṃ pādaṅgulantarena
atk-s0510a:3833_7: sannirujjhitvā pañcavīsatiyojanaṃ pāsādaṃ gahetvā ākāse uppati, uppatanto ca paññāsayojanāni
atk-s0510a:3833_8: ukkhipi. Athassa purimabhave ñātakā pāsādagatena lobhena macchakacchapamaṇḍūkā hutvā
atk-s0510a:3833_9: nibbattā tasmiṃ pāsāde uṭṭhahante parivattitvā patiṃsu. Satthā te sampatante disvā
atk-s0510a:3833_10: “ñātakā te, bhaddaji, kilamantī”ti āha. Thero satthu vacanena pāsādaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0510a:3833_11: Pāsādo yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhahi. Satthā pāraṅgato bhikkhūhi – “kadā, bhante, bhaddajittherena
atk-s0510a:3833_12: ayaṃ pāsādo ajjhāvuṭṭho”ti puṭṭho mahāpanādajātakaṃ kathetvā bahujanaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0510a:3834_0: 98. Thero pana arahattaṃ patto pubbasambhāraṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3834_1: pakāsetuṃ ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇintiādimāha. Tattha ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇinti puthunānāanekamahoghehi
atk-s0510a:3834_2: khaṇitattā “pokkharaṇī”ti laddhanāmaṃ jalāsayaṃ ogayha ogahetvā pavisitvā ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0510a:3834_3: ghāsahetukhādanatthāya tattha pokkharaṇiyaṃ pavisitvā bhisaṃ padumapuṇḍarīkamūlaṃ
atk-s0510a:3834_4: uddharāmīti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānapadatthattā ca nayānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3837_0: Navamāpadāne esanāya carantassātiādikaṃ āyasmato sivakattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayampi
atk-s0510a:3837_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3837_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3837_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pattaṃ ādāya kummāsassa pūretvā adāsi. So tena
atk-s0510a:3837_4: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakulagehe
atk-s0510a:3837_5: nibbattitvā sivakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0510a:3837_6: kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3837_7: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3838: 117. Arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento esanāya carantassātiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3841_0: Dasamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato upavānattherassa apadānaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3841_1: kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3841_2: kenaci kammacchiddena padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle dalliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3841_3: patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷayakkhakumbhaṇḍagandhabbehi
atk-s0510a:3841_4: sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ veḷagge
atk-s0510a:3841_5: ābandhitvā dhajaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati
atk-s0510a:3841_6: devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse dhārento cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:3841_7: padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. Taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0510a:3841_8: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3841_9: upavānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3841_10: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Athāyasmā upavāno bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3841_11: upaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho uppajji. Therassa gihisahāyo
atk-s0510a:3841_12: devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati. So theraṃ catūhi paccayehi pavāresi.
atk-s0510a:3841_13: Athāyasmā upavāno nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0510a:3841_14: Brāhmaṇo “kenaci maññe payojanena thero āgato bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “vadeyyātha, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3841_15: kenattho”ti āha. Thero tassa brāhmaṇassa payojanaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0510a:3843: Sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0510a:3847_0: Tassattho – yo imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi
atk-s0510a:3847_1: ca brahmehi pūjito, sakkareyyānaṃ sakkātabbehi bimbisārakosalarājādīhi sakkato, apaceyyānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3847_2: apacāyitabbehi mahesīhi khīṇāsavehi apacito, kilesehi ārakattādinā arahaṃ, sobhanagamanādinā
atk-s0510a:3847_3: sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṃ satthā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā,
atk-s0510a:3847_4: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṃ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa, uṇhodakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3847_5: atthi, tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṃ taṃ hātave upanetuṃ icchāmīti.
atk-s0510a:3848: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo uṇhodakaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vātaharañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi. Tena ca satthu rogo vūpasami. Tassa bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3849_0: 122. Athāyasmā upavāno aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3849_1: pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha. Tattha padumuttarotiādīni pubbe vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0510a:3850: 123. Mahājanā samāgammāti sakalajambudīpavāsino rāsibhūtāti attho. Citakaṃ katvāti yojanubbedhaṃ candanarāsicitakaṃ katvā bhagavato sarīraṃ tattha abhiropayiṃsūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3851: 124. Sarīrakiccaṃ katvānāti ādahanāti agginā dahanakiccaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3852: 127-28. Jaṅghā maṇimayā āsīti manussehi katathūpe jaṅghā pupphavāhatthaṃ caritaṭṭhānaṃ maṇimayā indanīlamaṇinā katāti attho. Mayampīti sabbe devā thūpaṃ karissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3853_0: 129. Dhātu āveṇikā natthīti devamanussehi visuṃ visuṃ cetiyaṃ kātuṃ āveṇikā visuṃ
atk-s0510a:3853_1: dhātu natthi, taṃ dassento sarīraṃ ekapiṇḍitanti āha. Adhiṭṭhānabalena sakalasarīradhātu
atk-s0510a:3853_2: ekaghanasilāmayapaṭimā viya ekameva ahosīti attho. Imamhi buddhathūpamhīti sakalajambudīpavāsīhi
atk-s0510a:3853_3: katamhi imamhi suvaṇṇathūpamhi mayaṃ sabbe samāgantvā kañcukathūpaṃ karissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3854_0: 133. Indanīlaṃ mahānīlanti indīvarapupphavaṇṇābhaṃ maṇi indanīlamaṇi. Tato adhikavaṇṇatā
atk-s0510a:3854_1: mahāmaṇi indanīlamaṇayo ca mahānīlamaṇayo ca jotirasamaṇijātiraṅgamaṇayo ca ekato
atk-s0510a:3854_2: sannipātetvā rāsī katvā suvaṇṇathūpe kañcukathūpaṃ katvā achādayunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3855: 144. Paccekaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassāti buddhuttamassa pati ekaṃ visuṃ uparichadanena thūpaṃ akaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3856_0: 147. Kumbhaṇḍā guyhakā tathāti kumbhamattāni aṇḍāni yesaṃ devānaṃ te kumbhaṇḍā, paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0510a:3856_1: niguhitvā paṭicchādanato garuḷā guyhakā nāma jātā, te kumbhaṇḍā guyhakāpi thūpaṃ akaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3857: 151. Atibhonti na tassābhāti tassa cetiyassa pabhaṃ candasūriyatārakānaṃ pabhā na atibhonti, na ajjhottharantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3858: 158. Ahampi kāraṃ kassāmīti tādino lokanāthassa thūpasmiṃ ahampi kāraṃ puññakiriyaṃ kusalakammaṃ dhajapaṭākapūjaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3861_0: Ekādasamāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3861_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:3861_2: upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tassa uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0510a:3861_3: gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena
atk-s0510a:3861_4: dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ kulavaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3861_5: ayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ
atk-s0510a:3861_6: vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ deti. So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ
atk-s0510a:3861_7: upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce uyyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devo
atk-s0510a:3861_8: hutvā nibbatti. So tattha devaloke devarajjaṃ karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:3861_9: manussaloke bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3861_10: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro nāma bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0510a:3861_11: veneyyasattaṃ nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātakhemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi. Atha so kulaputto
atk-s0510a:3861_12: anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_0: Tena ca samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, taṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_1: disvā pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3862_2: mahatā sakkārena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyena
atk-s0510a:3862_3: ijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_4: aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3862_5: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvānavutikappe
atk-s0510a:3862_6: phussassa bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu
atk-s0510a:3862_7: tesaṃ puññakiriyāya sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave taṃ taṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_8: upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe thullakoṭṭhikanigame
atk-s0510a:3862_9: raṭṭhapālaseṭṭhigehe nibbatti, tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule nibbattattā
atk-s0510a:3862_10: raṭṭhapāloti vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi. So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena
atk-s0510a:3862_11: yobbanaṃ patto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā mahante ca yase patiṭṭhāpito
atk-s0510a:3862_12: dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ paccanubhoti. Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_13: caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi. Taṃ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:3862_14: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho sattavāre bhattacchede katvā kicchena
atk-s0510a:3862_15: kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu
atk-s0510a:3862_16: āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:3863_0: 179-180. Athāyasmā aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3863_1: pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha. Sunāgo so mayā dinnoti tadā mahādhanaseṭṭhi
atk-s0510a:3863_2: hutvā sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dānamukhe vissajjanasamaye sattappatiṭṭho sundaro nāgo hatthirājā
atk-s0510a:3863_3: mayā dinno ahosi. Taṃ dassento īsādantotiādimāha. Īsādanto rathaīsappamāṇadanto,
atk-s0510a:3863_4: so mayā dinno hatthināgo. Urūḷhavāti rājāvahanayoggasamattho, rājāraho vā. Setacchattoti
atk-s0510a:3863_6: rūpasobhāhi sampannoti attho. Sakappano sahatthipoti hatthialaṅkārasahito hatthigopakasahitoti
atk-s0510a:3863_7: attho. Itthambhūto hatthināgo padumuttarassa bhagavato mayā dinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3864: 181. Mayā bhattaṃ kāretvānāti mayā kārāpitavihāre vasantānaṃ koṭisaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā mahesino niyyādesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3865: 183. Jalajuttamanāmakoti jalato jāto jalajo, kiṃ taṃ? Padumaṃ, padumena samānanāmattā uttamattā ca padumuttaro nāma bhagavāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3871_1: taṇhāmānadiṭṭhādayo chedananiggahavivecanādyatthaṃ sattahi māsehi ativiya ārādhanena
atk-s0510a:3871_3: tipiṭakadharena paṇḍitena ābhataṃ imaṃ apadāna-aṭṭhakathaṃ sabbo sadevaloko jānātūti.
atk-s0510a:3872: Anena lobhādimalā pajānaṃ, cakkhādirogā vividhā ca dukkhā;
atk-s0510a:3873: Kalahādibhayā dukkhitā jātā, corādayonatthakarā ca loke.
atk-s0510a:3874: Nassantu me pañca verā ca pāpā, nassantu gimhe yathā vuṭṭhivātā;
atk-s0510a:3879: Sabbe dhammānuyāyantu, tayo lokā utupi cāti.
